[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D158}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya brah+ma pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs 
[\[1b.2\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa na tshal chen po'i khang pa 
[\[1b.3\]]brtsegs pa'i gnas na dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom 
[\[1b.4\]]ldan 'das mi nyal tsam gyi nam gyi gung thun la skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i 
[\[1b.5\]]dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/_btang snyoms pa dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde bar gnas pa bsam gtan 
[\[2a.2\]]gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas phyir sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang 
[\[2a.3\]]dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la 
[\[2a.4\]]zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[2a.5\]]zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs te/_mi mjed 
[\[2a.6\]]kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]gyur nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di snyam du bsams te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par 
[\[2b.2\]]dka' ba rnam par shes pa dka' ba yin na bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la bdag gis lud pa bsal ba'i sgra'am smra ba tsam gyis bzhengs par gsol ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs 
[\[2b.3\]]par gsol/_gor ma chag snyam ste/_de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de mgo btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag 
[\[2b.4\]]gis bzhengs par gsol to/_/ma gos dri ma ma mchis rnam par dag_/lha dang mi mchog rnams dang dri za dang /_/klu dang lha min rnams kyis legs mchod pa/_/sems can sman slad mgon po khyod la mchod/_/dper na ri ni rab tu mi g.yos dang /_/ji ltar 
[\[2b.5\]]rgya mtsho gting ni mi dpogs ltar/_/bdud rnams thams cad kyis kyang mi g.yos la/_/thub pa skyes bu mchog ni bsam gtan mdzad/_/zang zing mi mnga' mtshan ma mi mnga' zhing /_/tha dad mi mnga' brtan pa mi mnga' la/_/gnas mi mnga' zhing snang ba mi mnga' 
[\[2b.6\]]ba'i/_/thub pa skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan mdzad/_/rtog ge rnams kyi yul ni ma lags shing /_/byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/_/sems dang sems las byung bas rab 'das pa/_/bsam gtan pha rol gshegs pa bsam gtan mdzad/_/mgon 
[\[2b.7\]]po seng ge bzhin du gsung yang sgrog_/thub pa 'brug bzhin sgrog pa rab tu mdzad/_/dpa' bo zla ba bzhin du rab tu mdzes/_/sems can dkon mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bskul ba'i tshigs 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul bar thugs su chud nas ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so/_/bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sbran pa'i phyir mgur bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa 
[\[3a.2\]]dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba 
[\[3a.3\]]byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 
[\[3a.4\]]'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[3a.5\]]tshangs pa zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/_tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang /_zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[3a.6\]]skabs phye bas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags/_
[\[3a.7\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/chos gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ci lta bu yin zhe na/_tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro'o snyam pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin 
[\[3b.2\]]zhing yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ldog go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyal lo snyam pa dang /_ldang ngo snyam pa dang /_'chag go snyam pa dang /_'dug go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin 
[\[3b.3\]]zhing yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'khrug pa med pa'i yid kyis lus 'di nyid la 'di lta ste/_kye ma lus 'di ni mi brtan pa/_mi rtag pa/_rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba/_snying po med 
[\[3b.4\]]pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_rnam par 'thor ba'i chos can/_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/_zil pa'i thigs pa dang 'dra ba/_g.yo ba mi gnas pa/_mi gtsang ba/_rnag gi dri ma can/_rlung dang nyi mas mthar 
[\[3b.5\]]thug pa/_mthar 'dul ba/_mthar rdul du 'gyur ba/_ngan skyugs kyi mthar thug pa/_nad mang ba/_gnod pa can/_'go ba'i nad mang ba/_na ba/_'jig pa'i ngang can/_rus pa bsogs pa/_dri nga ba/_'dzag pa can bsgrims te rim gro byed dgos pa yin par yang dag pa'i 
[\[3b.6\]]dran pas yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/_/de de ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas lus kyi skyon rnams yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas lus la chags pa dang /_lus la kun tu 'dod chags dang /_lus la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi bskyed do/_/de 
[\[3b.7\]]lus la mi lta bas srog la chags pa dang /_srog la kun tu 'dod chags dang /_srog la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi bskyed do/_/de lus dang srog la mi lta bar chos gos ngan ngon dang /_kha zas ngan ngon dang /_mal cha dang /_stan ngan ngon dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]yo byad ngan ngon tsam dag gis chog par 'dzin pa yin no/_/de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi bya ba gang dag yin pa don dang ldan pa rnams sam/_dge ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang de dag la stong par byed de/_yongs su mi skyo zhing yongs su 
[\[4a.2\]]yid 'chad pa med la yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi bskyed do/_/de mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro na dran pa dang ldan zhing 'di snyam du sems te/_mkhan po dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba'o/_/slob dpon dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba ste/_bdag der song ba na sdig pa 
[\[4a.3\]]mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'ga' zhig gis bdag la glengs shing dran par byas na mi rung ngo snyam nas de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des bslab pa rnams la gus pa byed par 'gyur te/_rtun par byed pa dang /_legs par bya ba byed pa dang /_zhi ba rnal du byed pa dang /_shin tu 
[\[4a.4\]]yongs su mthar thug par byed pa can du 'gyur ro/_/de la bslab pa rnams la gus pa byed pa nyid dang /_rtun par byed pa nyid dang /_legs par bya ba byed pa nyid dang /_zhi ba rnal du byed pa nyid dang /_shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa nyid kyis mkhan po dang /_
[\[4a.5\]]slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro ba na bag tsha ba med pa dang /_bag 'khums pa med par 'gro zhing mi 'jigs pa dang /_lhan cig tu byung ba'i rgod pa yang mi ston te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pa yin la/_rigs kyi bag ma bzhin du 'dzem pa dang 
[\[4a.6\]]ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de la 'dzem pa dang ldan pas lus kyi skyon dang /_lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo /_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi skyon dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa de dag gang zhe na/_tshangs pa 
[\[4a.7\]]srog gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no/_/tshangs pa ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' ci ltar na srog 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gcod pa spong ba yin zhe na/_tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par mi byed/_zhe sdang gi dbang dang gti mug gi dbang gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par mi byed do/_/de sems can gzhan dag dang gang 
[\[4b.2\]]zag gzhan rnams la bdag tsam du 'du shes par byed cing sdug pa tsam du 'du shes par byed de/_bdag nyid kyis sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed do/_/gzhan dag kyang srog gcod du mi 'jug go/_/gzhan dag 
[\[4b.3\]]srog gcod pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/bdag gis kyang mi gcod do/_/gzhan dag kyang gcod du mi 'jug go/_/gzhan dag gcod pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/bdag kyang mi rdeg go/_/gzhan dag kyang rdeg tu mi 'jug go/_/
[\[4b.4\]]gzhan dag rdeg par byed pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/ji ltar na ma byin pa len pa spong ba yin zhe na/_tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_
[\[4b.5\]]bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul la sogs pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gyi rnam pa dag dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bde ba'i rnam pa de dag la chags pa mi skyed/_de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed cing rku 'phrog 
[\[4b.6\]]mi byed do/_/rku 'phrog byed du mi 'jug go/_/rku 'phrog byed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/de grong na yod pa'am/_dgon pa na yod pa ma byin zhing ma gnang ba rtswa'i 'dab ma tsam yang len par mi byed do/_/ji ltar na mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba yin zhe na/_
[\[4b.7\]]tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rnams kyi sgo legs par bsrungs shing gnas pa yin/_legs par bsdams pa yin/_'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu ba yin/_shin tu bsrung ba'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_rtag tu bsrung ba'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_de dran pas yid kun tu 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]bsrung ba yin/_lus dang ngag shin tu bsdams pa yin no/_/'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu la dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing 'di snyam du yang sems bskyed do/_/mi zhig gis bye ma zhib mo shin tu bsregs pa lag pa gnyis kyi snyim pas blangs te mig bkang ba ni sla'i/_
[\[5a.2\]]chags pa'i sems kyis yul gyi bzang mo la lta ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag yul gyi bzang mo la bltas pas yun ring por phung zhing bcom la ma rung bar gyur pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_
[\[5a.3\]]gnas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan rnams la dran pa legs par gnas pa yin te/_de dag la spyod pa na ro myong bar mi byed cing chags pa'i sems med pa yin no/_/gal te de yongs su spyod pa na bde ba skyed pa lta na des de la 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya ste/_bde bar 
[\[5a.4\]]snang ba 'di ni bzlog pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal yin te/_khams gsum pa 'di na 'dus byas kyi dngos po bde ba gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus byas mi rtag pa'i phyir ro/_/mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can dag dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes ji ltar skyed snyam du 
[\[5a.5\]]brtag par bya'o/_/tshangs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyod pa na sdug bsngal kho na skye ba'i bde ba ni ma yin te/_sdug bsngal des kyang yongs su gnon cing nyon mongs na des de la sems 'di ltar nye bar gzhag par bya ste/_lus 'di ni bsgrims te yongs su bskyed dgos 
[\[5a.6\]]pa/_gsug gis bsgrub dgos pa ste/_'di ni sdug bsngal rtsom pas gzung bar mi nus kyi/_bde ba rtsom pas gzung ba bya ba yin te/_bdag gi lus brtan zhing 'tsho ba 'dis dge ba'i chos rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/dper na rnyed pa 'dod pa'i tshong pa khur khal rnams stong 
[\[5a.7\]]bran byed bcos legs byed pa ni khur khal rnams brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin/_bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi gzhan du na ji tsam du khal bkal ba bskur ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha zas za ba yang lus brgyan pa'i phyir zas za ba ma yin/_lus bde bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]ma yin te/_gzhan du na ji tsam lus dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i phyogs bsgral ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/tshangs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnyen pos sems shes par byed mi nus na/_des 'di snyam du 
[\[5b.2\]]bsam par bya ste/_sems zhes bya ba 'dis ni mthar phyin par dka' ba/_mi 'thun par 'dzin pa/_'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa/_dge ba'i phyogs la mi phyogs pa/_yul la mngon du phyogs pa/_dben pa la mi phyogs pa/_bde ba la mngon du phyogs pa/_
[\[5b.3\]]sdug bsngal la mi phyogs pa/_smra ba la dga' ba la mngon du phyogs pa/_de kho na la rnam par lta ba la mi phyogs pa/_mi gtsang ba la mngon du phyogs pa/_gtsang ba la mi phyogs pa/_gdul dka' ba/_gzung dka' ba/_gnas med pa/_
[\[5b.4\]]rten med pa/_gsog_/gsob/_skad cig pa/_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba yin na/_mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro zhing rjes su 'jug snyam du bsam mo/_/de de ltar sems dran pa nye bar gnas pas sems 
[\[5b.5\]]gdul ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/_/de ser sna'i sems gdul ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_tha na kham gcig tsam mam/_rgya shug tsam mam/_mon sran gre'u tsam mam/_til 'bru tsam yang rung /_de yang thams cad la sbyin par byed kyi/_sdug pa rnams la ma yin/_
[\[5b.6\]]'dris pa rnams la yin no/_/de 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir tshul khrims bsrung ste/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi skyon med par byed pa yin/_'dren mar mi byed pa yin/_nag nog can du mi byed pa yin te/_tshul khrims des bdag la stod 
[\[5b.7\]]par mi byed/_gzhan la smod par mi byed do/_/de gnod sems kyi sems 'dul ba'i phyir bzod pa sgom ste/_de grong ngam grong rdal du zhugs pa na gshe yang ci mi snyam par byed do/_/brgyab kyang rung rdeg kyang rung /_sdigs kyang rung /_rnam par 'joms kyang rung /_smod kyang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]rung ste ci mi snyam par byed do/_/kye ma dge sbyong 'di ni mgo reg ngan pa'o/_/kye ma dge sbyong 'di ni mgo reg mi sdug pa ngan pa'o zhes 'jig rten gyis dpyas kyang ci mi snyam par byed do/_/yang dag par ma yin pas skur kyang bzod par byed cing dang du len la/_
[\[6a.2\]]las bdag gir bya ba nyid la rton te/_bzod pa des kyang bdag la stod par mi byed/_gzhan la smod par mi byed do/_/de le lo'i sems gdul ba'i phyir dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_thob pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i 
[\[6a.3\]]phyir dang /_'phel ba rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang /_yongs su smin pa rnams yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_yang dag par gzung ba rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/de sems can gyi ched rnams dang sems can gyi bya 
[\[6a.4\]]ba rnams la yongs su mi skyo zhing yongs su yi mi chad de/_yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/de gdol pa la phan gdags kyang rung /_rgyal po la phan gdags kyang rung /_shin tu lam ring por yang 'gro ste/_tha dad pa mi dmigs shing rgyun mi gcod pa yin 
[\[6a.5\]]no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal zhing bkren pa'i sems can gyi dngos po thams cad ngan pa zhig gis gtams sam/_'byor cing nor che ba gang yang rung ba zhig gis dngos po bzang po mchog gya nom pa zhig bstabs kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse 
[\[6a.6\]]ba'i sems bzhag la gus par bstod cing /_yang dag par gzengs bstod la/_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug cing dngos po ngan pa de blang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa bya dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de rnam par g.yeng 
[\[6a.7\]]ba'i sems gdul ba'i phyir bsam gtan la bsam gtan par byed do/_/ji ltar bsam gtan byed ce na/_tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma kho nar lus legs par bsdams pa yin no/_/lus dben par gnas pa yin no/_/lus kyi 'du 'dzi rnams kyang 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]yongs su spong ngo /_/lus la lhag par chags pa yang 'dor ro/_/lus lci ba 'am yang ba yang shes so/_/lus dang 'thun pa dang /_lus 'tsho ba dang /_lus kyi stobs kyang rab tu shes so/_/ngag legs par bsdams pa yin te/_smra ba nyung zhing brjod pa nyung 
[\[6b.2\]]ngo /_/don smra ba yin zhing rigs pa smra ba yin te/_bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba yongs su spong ba yin no/_/de yid legs par bsdams pa yin te/_mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs so/_/de de ltar gnas gsum yongs su dag pas sngon po 
[\[6b.3\]]dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po'i gzugs rnams mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/_de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin mngon rtags su mi 'dzin to/_/rgyan dang gos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag la yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa 
[\[6b.4\]]yin no/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa sna tshogs pa dag la yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams la yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags 
[\[6b.5\]]su mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/de gcig pu dben par 'dug nas nang du yang dag par 'jog cing sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/_mi sdug pa la dmigs pa'am/_byams pa la dmigs pa'am/_snying rje la dmigs pa'am/_yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[6b.6\]]gang yang rung bas ji ltar lus khengs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar dmigs par byed de/_dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba mi 'gag go/_/rgyun rnams kyang mi 'chad do rlung 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems log par rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'chag gam/_
[\[6b.7\]]nyal lam/_'greng ngam/_'dug kyang dmigs pa de nyid kyis 'dug go/_/de nyid la sems gtod do/_/tshangs pa gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe sems la sems mnyam par 'jog ste/_sems kyis sems 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]kyang mi dmigs so/_/gang gis mnyam par 'jog pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/gang gi phyir mnyam par 'jog pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag ni gsog gi chos rnams dang /_gsob 
[\[7a.2\]]kyi chos rnams la mngon par zhen to snyam du sems te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong zhes bya'o/_/de ltar rnam par mthong bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi 'byung zhing mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa gzhan 
[\[7a.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas ming dang yi ge ji ltar thos pa rnams nges pa'i tshig gi gdags pas yang dag par 'jog cing yi ge de dag la nye bar rtogs te/_de de ltar nye bar rtogs pa na yi ge rnams gsog dang gsob tu 
[\[7a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/de yi ge rnam pa gsog dang gsob tu mthong nas ming rnams kyang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo /_/gang la ming de 'dogs pa de yang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo /_/de la gzugs gang dang gang snang ba de dang de yang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo /_/de gsog 
[\[7a.5\]]dang gsob tu mthong bas yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pas de la 'dus byas rmi lam dang 'dra bar snang ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' so sor brtags nas sems can la lta bas snying rje 
[\[7a.6\]]chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas gnas so/_/de 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir shes rab sgom par byed do/_/ji ltar sgom par byed ce na/_de kun rdzob kyi tshul du bshad pa 'am don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i mdo sde gang dag yin pa de dag brjod pa 
[\[7a.7\]]gsal zhing zur phyin pa dag gis ma nor bar 'dzin to/_/ma nor bas chos ston pa las bzung nas kyang /_/ma nor ba'i bsam pas sems par byed do/_/sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la yang brtson par byed do/_/de ye shes kyi stobs dang shes rab kyi bye brag gis sems can mi 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]dmigs/_srog mi dmigs/_gsob mi dmigs/_skyes bu mi dmigs/_gang zag mi dmigs/_shed las skyes mi dmigs/_shed bu mi dmigs te/_thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par lta bar yang mi lhung ngo /_/btags pa'i tha snyad rnams 
[\[7b.2\]]la yang legs par bslab pa yin no/_/de zin pa'i sa'i khams dang /_ma zin pa'i sa'i khams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go/_/zin pa'i chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_ma zin pa la yang yang dag 
[\[7b.3\]]pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog ste de gnyi ga yang gsog nyid dang gsob nyid du mthong zhing /_bems po nyid dang /_snying po med pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid du mthong ngo /_/des de ltar mthong bas ji ltar phyi rol gyi khams rnams la mngon par chags pa 
[\[7b.4\]]med pa de ltar nang gi rnams la yang ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_gzugs rnams la yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sgra rnams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_dri rnams dang /_lce'i 
[\[7b.5\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_ro rnams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_reg bya rnams la yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go/_/de'i sa'i khams la ni sra ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la gsher ba nyid dang /_tsha ba nyid dang /_khong stong nyid du 
[\[7b.6\]]yang rab tu shes so/_/chu'i khams la gsher ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la sra ba nyid dang /_tsha ba nyid dang /_khong stong nyid du yang rab tu shes so/_/me'i khams la tsha ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la sra ba nyid dang /_gsher ba nyid dang /_khong stong nyid du yang rab tu shes 
[\[7b.7\]]so/_/rlung gi khams la g.yo ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la yang zhing g.yo ba nyid du yang rab tu shes so/_/de nam mkha'i khams la khong stong nyid du yang rab tu shes la thams cad du yang song ba nyid du yang rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid du 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]yang rab tu shes la phyin ci log nyid du yang rab tu shes/_phyin ci ma log pa nyid yang rab tu shes so/_/de mig gi rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs la mi rtag pa nyid du yang rab tu shes so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[8a.2\]]sgra la mi rtag pa nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang /_dri la mi rtag pa nyid dang /_lce'i rnam parashes pa la stong pa nyid dang /_ro la mi rtag pa nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang /_reg bya la mi rtag pa nyid du yang rab tu shes 
[\[8a.3\]]so/_/de de ltar shes rab la mkhas pas shin tu rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing shes rab rno ba dang ldan te/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/_nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/_
[\[8a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes so/_/de mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam 
[\[8a.5\]]par smin pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/der skyes pa rnams kyi tshor ba chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po yang rab tu shes so/_/dge ba'i chos 
[\[8a.6\]]rnams kyi rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po lha rnams kyi nang du'am/_mi rnams kyi nang du smin pa yang rab tu shes so/_/der skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po yang rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos yang dag par 
[\[8a.7\]]'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rnam pa yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]shes rab kyi rnam par grol ba nyid dang /_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba yang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyis yang dag par 'grub pa yang rab tu shes so/_/'bras bu dang zhi ba nyid kyang rab tu shes 
[\[8b.2\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs kyi lam yang rab tu shes so/_/ye shes kyi lam yang rab tu shes so/_/shes nas kyang tshogs kyi lam dang ye shes kyi lam la brtson par byed do/_/sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[8b.3\]]yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul che ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/mthu che ba nyid dang /_dam pa nyid dang /_rab mchog nyid dang /_phul du byung ba nyid dang /_che ba nyid dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[8b.4\]]dpa' thams cad dang /_thun mong ba yang ma yin na/_gzhan sems can thams cad lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/de de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa legs par nye bar gnas pa sdig pa'i chos thams cad 
[\[8b.5\]]dang ni bral/_dge ba'i chos ni yang dag par thob/_lus kyi gnod pa ni med/_rnam par shes pas 'phangs pa ni med/_sems kyis 'phangs pa ni med la chos rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs dang 'bras bu yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas/_dper na rgya mtsho'i 
[\[8b.6\]]rlabs bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel te/_ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'bri zhing yang 'byung ba ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no/_/de dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 
[\[8b.7\]]mngon par 'phel te/_ji ltar mar gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no/_/dper na dbyar gyi dus kyi phu chu brug pa ltar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/_ji ltar phu chu 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]brug pa dbyar gyi dus zad na 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no/_/tshangs pa de ltar bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[9a.2\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/lus kyi skyon rnams rab shes na/_/lus yod skyon rnams mi ston to/_/lus la dran pa legs gnas na/_/skyon med zhi ba'i gnas thob bo/_/lus kyi skyon 
[\[9a.3\]]rnams mi shes na/_/lus la yod pa'i skyon mi rtog_/lus la dran pa mi gnas na/_/sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas thob bo/_/sems kyi skyon rnams rab shes na/_/sems yod skyon rnams mi sten to/_/sems la dran pa legs gnas na/_/skyon 
[\[9a.4\]]med zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo/_/sems kyi skyon rnams mi shes na/_/sems la yod pa'i skyon mi rtogs/_/sems la dran pa mi gnas na/_/sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo/_/dge ba'i chos rnams sten byed cing /_/mi dge chos rnams mi sten pa/_/
[\[9a.5\]]chos rnams la ni mkhas pa'i mi/_/skyon med zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo/_/dge ba'i chos rnams mi sten cing /_/mi dge chos rnams sten byed pa/_/chos rnams la ni mi mkhas mi/_/sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po 
[\[9a.6\]]tshangs pas lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/mngon par gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas 
[\[9a.7\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam nangs par mkhyen nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma dang 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]'dir mi nyal tsam gyi nam gyi gung thun la nga gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis snang bar byas nas nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la mngon par bstod de/_lan gsum 
[\[9b.2\]]bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[9b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /_ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa zhu ba lung bstan pa'i 
[\[9b.4\]]phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/_tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang /_zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas ngas skabs phye bas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nga la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[9b.5\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags/_dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /_ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[9b.6\]]pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/chos gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste lus kyi rjes su song ba'i 
[\[9b.7\]]dran pa'o/_/dge slong dag ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la lus kyi rjes su song ba dran pa'i rgyu dang /_las dang 'bras bu yang bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/legs so legs so bcom ldan 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bstan pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol dge slong sar pa rnams dang /_chos 
[\[10a.2\]]'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas ring por ma lags shing mchis nas ring po ma lags pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis thos na dga' ba dang /_dad pa thob par 'gyur/_bslabs pa de la yang sbyor bar brtson 
[\[10a.3\]]par gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bshad pa de dge slong de dag la yang bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[10a.4\]]legs par bka' stsal to/_/bde bar gshegs pa legs par bka' stsal to/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas mdo sde 'di lta bu dag yongs su zhu ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas zhus pa yang legs par smras pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[10a.5\]]'das mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gal te dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan ma mchis na yang zhu ba zhus pa'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[10a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' dang mu ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhu ba 'di/_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[10a.7\]]spyi'i don du zhus pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bag yod pa'i tshul 
[\[10b.2\]]bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma 
[\[10b.3\]]yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu zhen gyi lo tswa ba ban+de 
[\[10b.4\]]ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D159}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya brah+ma dat+ta pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya 
[\[10b.5\]]ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge 
[\[10b.6\]]slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa thob pa/_gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/_
[\[10b.7\]]sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i gzungs la mkhas pa/_stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba ma brtags pa'i smon lam can/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa sha stag dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ba don yod byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas/_mthar gyis ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las lnga 'dzin gyi ljongs su phyin to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs 
[\[11a.2\]]pas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod bdag gi yul 'dir phyin to zhes thos nas de tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas skye bo'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[11a.3\]]mthong ba don yod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/skye bo phal po che de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[11a.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod kyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa 'khod par rig nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur 
[\[11a.5\]]ba'i rgyal po chos lnga dang ldan pa ni 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe rtag tu khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur la/_mi khom pa rnams su yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang phrad cing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos 
[\[11a.6\]]ston pa na yang ldem po'i ngag la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa mi chod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_mdzes par yang 'gyur/_dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang don dam pa dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di lta ste/_bden 
[\[11a.7\]]pa bzhi bstan pa dang ldan pas bod par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di la rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni dad pa can yin te/_dad pa'i shas che zhing zhe 'gras pa med pa'i yid dang ldan no/_/de'i dad pa de yang nges par rtsa zug tu 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bstan pa yin no/_/dad pa de yang rnam pa bcur blta bar bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_g.yo med par sbyin pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang /_dang ba'i shas che ba dang /_'phags 
[\[11b.2\]]pa'i bstan pa la skyon du mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge slong rab 'bring tha ma rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /_stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /_lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pa ste bcu po 
[\[11b.3\]]de dag yin no/_/rgyal po chen po chos dang po 'di dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni chos 'dod pa yin 
[\[11b.4\]]te/_rgyun mi chad par 'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_thos pa tshol ba la chog mi shes so/_/de'i mang du thos pa de yang sems kyis shin tu brtags pa dang /_mthong bas shin tu rtogs pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po yan lag bcu dang ldan na chos dang 
[\[11b.5\]]ldan pa'i rgyal por rig par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 'dod pas lus la mi lta zhing srog la mi lta ba dang /_'khor ba la skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_khyim na gnas pa la skyon mang bar sems pa dang /_dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba'i yid 
[\[11b.6\]]dang ldan pa dang /_sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa'i las kyi nang nas sdig pa'i las la smod cing ma 'ongs pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la nges par sems pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_bsam pa thag pa nas bsgrubs pas byang chub sems 
[\[11b.7\]]dpa'i spyod pa rdzogs par byed de/_tshig lhur len par mi byed pa dang /_ye shes yongs su tshol bas dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang /_rang gi g.yog 'khor byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_rgyun mi chad par de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su smin par 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]byed la/_de dag gi zang zing yang sdud par byed pa ste/_bcu po de dag yin no/_/rgyal po chen po chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni/_ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal 
[\[12a.2\]]po chen po gzhan yang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni chos zab mo'i bzod pa la mos shing stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa thob pa yin no/_/de'i zab mo la mos pa de yang rnam pa bcur rig par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji skad 
[\[12a.3\]]smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba las shas cher gus pa drag po dang ldan zhing ya nga ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa yang yongs su spong ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa yid du 'ong ba yang mngon par 'du byed pa 
[\[12a.4\]]dang /_skye bo dbang phyug dang ldan pa rnams la yang gzu lums su nan gyis gnon par mi byed pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i sbyin pa yang gzhan dag la stobs par byed de/_yid du mi 'ong ba yongs su spong ba dang /_chos thams cad la yang stong ngo snyam du nges par 'byung 
[\[12a.5\]]bar byed pa dang /_byed pa med pa'i lta bas yang dag pa'i mtha' la mtshan nyid gcig tu mos par yang mi byed la tha dad pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin pa dang /_rang gi yon tan gyis kyang gzhan gyi yon tan khyad du gsod par mi byed pa dang /_tshad nges par 'dzin 
[\[12a.6\]]pa yang mi byed pa dang /_gang zag sbyor ba med pa rnams la yang chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_'thun par byed pa ste bcu po de dag yin no/_/rgyal po chen po chos gsum po 'di dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni ji skad 
[\[12a.7\]]smos pa'i yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni 'jig rten gnas pa'i gnod pas sbags pas sbags par yang dag par mthong ba na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]phyir bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa la 'jug ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi stobs bskyed pa la brtson shing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo'o/_/de'i bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa de yang rnam pa bcur rig par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[12b.2\]]lta ste/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi tshugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa la brtson pa dang /_gzungs yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir rnam par nges pa la mkhas pa dang /_gang zag gang dag mngon par brtson pa de dag 
[\[12b.3\]]gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad kyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams bstabs pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la brtson pa dang /_legs par bsams pa sems pa dang /_legs par smra 
[\[12b.4\]]bas smra ba dang /_legs pa'i las byed pa dang /_rab tu 'byung bar sems pa dang /_rgyal po la dga' ba la skyon du rtog pa dang /_gzugs sdug cing gzugs bzang ba thams cad la mi lta ba'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_tha na rgyal po gcig pur sred pas bsgrub 
[\[12b.5\]]pa la yang mi lta ba'i yid dang ldan pa ste/_bcu po 'di dag yin no/_/rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang rgyal rigs spyi bo 
[\[12b.6\]]nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni gang zag gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa de dag la chos bzhin du srung ba dang /_skyob pa 
[\[12b.7\]]dang /_sbed par byed la sems can gang dag gang zag de lta bu dag la gnod pa byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag de lta bu de dag la ni 'di ltar chos kyi longs spyod 'di la spyod pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir chad pas gcod par byed do/_/de'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]pa de yang rnam pa bcur rig par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_nges par phangs par byed pa dang /_chos la mos pa dang /_'khrul pa med par kun tu spyod pa dang /_ye shes 'dod cing yon tan gyi 
[\[13a.2\]]khyad par la yid ches pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi snod du rung ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung sdud pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'bar bar byed pa dang /_skye bo mang po yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_
[\[13a.3\]]bcu po de dag yin no/_/rgyal po chen po chos lnga po 'di dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ni ji skad smos pa'i yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad 
[\[13a.4\]]smras so/_/rgyal po sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/rtag tu lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med pas/_/dad pa dang ni dang ba mi phyed pa/_/de la yon tan 'di dag dkon pa med/_/bcos ma ma yin shes nas dad pa skyes/_/de la dngos po ci yod sri ba 
[\[13a.5\]]med/_/byin nas kyang ni de la 'gyod pa med/_/'dir ni yon tan de dag dad pa'i mtshan/_/de dag bsam pa rtag tu rnyog pa med/_/mi phyed ri rab bzhin du skyod du med/_/bum pa gang ba legs gnas mi g.yo ltar/_/de dag dad pa shin tu g.yo med pa/_/
[\[13a.6\]]mthong la ma mthong thos la ma thos pa/_/gang dag ri bzhin du ni g.yo ba med/_/de dag lta bu dad pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/gnas rnams kun tu nams kyang 'gyur ba med/_/zhi ba 'dod phyir chos 'dod gang yin pa/_/mkhas pa des ni chos don kun spongs 
[\[13a.7\]]shig_/de spangs nas kyang de la sems pa med/_/de dag chos 'dod rnams kyi mtshan nyid do/_/skye bo'i bdag po gang zhig chos 'dod pa/_/gang tshe legs par gsungs pa mi nyan pa/_/sa bon rul pa zhing ngan btab pa ltar/_/'dren pa'i bstan pa dag 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]la skye mi 'gyur/_/thos kyang 'di la bdag ni mkhas snyam sems/_/chos rnams rang bzhin ci 'dra rtogs snyam ste/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas spyod pa ma dag la/_/gnyis sems ldan la dag pa ga las 'ong /_/chos 'dod gang dag dran pa'i blo dang ni/_/gus 
[\[13b.2\]]bcas g.yo med lug ltar lkugs med pa/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du 'bab pa med/_/de 'dra de dag byang chub mchog gi snod/_/chos 'dod pa ni nang dang phyi rol gyi/_/dngos po kun la sdug 'dzin ci yang med/_/shes pa rnams la phangs shing byis pas 
[\[13b.3\]]smad/_/'dis ni chos 'dod gang yin shes par bya/_/de yi phyir na rgyal po chos 'dod pa/_/'di thos nas ni bsgrub pa dag pa yis/_/smras pa tsam dang thos la gnas ma byed/_/bsam pa nyams pa la ni shes rab med/_/zab mo bzod la mos pa gang yin de/_/
[\[13b.4\]]sdug dang mi sdug rnams la chags pa med/_/de dag rlung ltar chags pa med pa yang /_/bskal pa brgya grangs mtha' yas spyod par 'gyur/_/rgyal po gal te byang chub khyod 'dod na/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam pa sbyang bar gyis/_/bdag dang bdag gi snyam pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[13b.5\]]gyis/_/gnas 'dir phyin ci log tu gnas ma byed/_/khyod kyis nyes pa rtag tu bshags par gyis/_/khyod ni 'thun pa'i sdom la gnas par gyis/_/dbang phyug dang ni gnyen la mi rtag soms/_/rten pa med pa 'di ni yang dag stong /_/stong pa'i chos rnams 
[\[13b.6\]]mang po ji snyed smra/_/stong nyid ji bzhin de la gnas pa min/_/chos nyid las ni gang gis 'gal byas pa/_/de ni zab mo'i tshul la bzod pa min/_/de phyir stong pa 'di ni kun tu 'gal/_/stong nyid ji bzhin de ni gang gis shes/_/de ni ngang pa'i rgyal pos rdzab spangs bzhin/_/
[\[13b.7\]]khams las nges byung byang chub mchog la reg_/de bzhin gshegs la gus par byas nas kyang /_/rgyal po khyod kyis bstan pa brtag par gyis/_/rgyal po lus ni rab tu 'jig pa'i phyir/_/byang chub theg pa la ni yi ma 'chad/_/ston pa'i bstan 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bcos spyod yul cho ga shes/_/mkhas pa de dag la ni rtag tu bsrung /_/smra ba tsam gyi dbang du ma 'gro shig_/nad pa rgyun ring por ni gyur ta re/_/gang gis bstan pa 'di ni legs brtag pa/_/de ni don du bsrung ba'i rgyud la sgrims/_/las 
[\[14a.2\]]dang nyon mongs sna tshogs spangs nas de/_/khyad par du ni byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/_/pha rol phyin drug 'di la legs par slobs/_/de la bslab na byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/ji snyed bstan pa 'di ni bsgrub par gyis/_/kun mkhyen chos rnams ring po mi 
[\[14a.3\]]thogs 'thob/_/me tog khu bar bung ba mi chags dang /_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes med pa ltar/_/yul rnams la ni gang sems de 'dra ba/_/de 'dra de ni rgyal pos sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/zab mo'i bzod dang spobs pa thob nas 'dir/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[14a.4\]]rnams kyi mdzod 'dzin gang yin pa/_/de dag khyod kyis chos bzhin bsrung bar gyis/_/mkhas pa de 'dra srog phyir ma btang shig_/mkhas pa de dag la ni gnod byed mi/_/chos dang mi ldan brtson pa mang po rnams/_/de dag rtag tu khyod kyis chad pas 
[\[14a.5\]]chod/_/chos kyi tshul 'di myur du nyams sa re/_/gang phyir 'jig rten mgon po mi 'byung na/_/mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten ston par 'gyur/_/srog chags phan phyir chos sgron 'bar bar byed/_/de phyir de dag don du rtag tu sgrims/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang 
[\[14a.6\]]po bye ba stong /_/snying nas sems can don ni spyod mi byed/_/de dag lhag sems med cing tshul khrims med/_/de dag lung bstan rgyal ba gsung mi 'gyur/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa rnams/_/de ltar de dag skye med spyod yul can/_/rgyal khyod yang dag spyod 
[\[14a.7\]]pa 'di thos kyis/_/ji skad bstan pa'i bstan 'dir gnas par gyis/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mthong ba don yod skyon 'di dag thams cad ni bdag la mchis par gda' 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]la/_yon tan rnams ni mi gda'o/_/mthong ba don yod bdag ni gnod pa'i sbags pas sbags pa'o/_/mthong ba don yod bdag ni gzu lums kyi las la lhag par zhen pa'i shas che ba dang /_nor yongs su tshol ba dang /_'khor yongs su bsdu bas 
[\[14b.2\]]kun nas mnar sems kyis sems skyes pa bsal bar rngo mi thogs so/_/gzhan yang bdag ni gzhan dag la dbyug pas bsnun pa dang /_mtshon gyis bsnun pas bsnun par bgyid de/_mthong ba don yod des na bdag gis byang chub tu sems ma bskyed do/_/
[\[14b.3\]]bdag ni tha na rmi lam du yang gzhan dag la kun nas mnar sems kyis sems skyed par bgyid do/_/mthong ba don yod da ni bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/mthong ba don yod bdag gis ji 
[\[14b.4\]]ltar bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la ma bslabs na bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 
[\[14b.5\]]bsgrubs pa'i slad du/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rjes su bslabs pa'i srog chags brgyad khris sngon ma bskyed pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag 
[\[14b.6\]]gis kyang ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dag la smon lam btab bo/_/srog chags nyi khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[14b.7\]]mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mthong ba don yod bdag la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che 'di dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag gis 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par gnang bar mdzod cig_/mthong ba don yod 'di ltar smod kyi rkyen du mi 'bab 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]cing spyod yul gyi rkyen du mi 'bab la skye bo dang skal ba mnyam pa ma lags shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi mthong la chos kyang rgyun du mi thos te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyang mi mang la sems can mang po yongs su smin par bgyir yang ma 
[\[15a.2\]]mchis mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag cag la phan gdags par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin la snying brtse ba'i phyir khas blangs so/_/de'i 
[\[15a.3\]]tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang /_'khor lnga brgya'i mal cha dang /_stan dang /_gding ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bza' ba thams cad kyi yo lang yang bshams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[15a.4\]]mthong ba don yod la yang chos kyi mchod pa ci rigs par byas so/_/de'i tshe gnas de na dge slong drug cu gnas par gyur to/_/de dag mi brtson pa dang /_thos pa nyung ba dang /_kun nas mnar sems mang ba dang /_gzhan mchod pa dag la sems sdug bsngal ba 
[\[15a.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang /_cang shes ma yin pa dang /_dbang po kho ru chud pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_rgod bag can dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_khwa ltar skru ba dang /_'jig rten pha rol la mi lta 
[\[15a.6\]]ba dang /_las kyis mi 'jigs pa dang /_bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang /_gnyid che ba dang /_chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' ma bsdams pa dang /_rtsod pa mang ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sdang ba dang /_
[\[15a.7\]]gzhan gyi shes pa la shas cher ma mos pa dang /_tha na ston pa blta bar yang mngon par mi dga' na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa sha stag ste/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod la chos bzhin ma yin par skur pa 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'debs so/_/de yang dad pa chung ngu'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du song nas sgrogs par byed de/_de thos nas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur sems can dmyal ba chen por skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[15b.2\]]mthong ba don yod kyis sems can de dag nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin la ma bsnyad do/_/de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi mdun na 'don pa bram ze rab tu rmugs byed ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_des de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams byang 
[\[15b.3\]]chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang bye bar byas te/_chos ma yin pas kyang skur pa btab bo/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin yang mi mngon pa'i thabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang bye bar byas so/_/chos kyi mchog tu dga' ba byung ngo cog kyang 'gag 
[\[15b.4\]]par byed de/_ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod la sems mi dga' bar 'gyur bar byed do/_/chos kyi gtam la zhugs na yang de las phyir bzlog pa'i gtam byed de/_ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod rnams kyis bya ba byed do/_/de la 
[\[15b.5\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_khwa ltar skru ba dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_gzhan gyi yid dang mi sbyor ba yin/_bdag la bstod pa dang /_gzhan la smad pa yin/_tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa dang /_sdig pa'i 
[\[15b.6\]]bsam pa can yin/_'thun pa 'byed pa'i shas che ba yin te/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis der bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid mi bde bas dbyar 
[\[15b.7\]]gnas pa de 'das par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mi brtson pa dang lhan cig gnas pa ni sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod kyis dbyar gnas par byas te/_dbyar zla gsum 'das nas chos 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]gos byas shing chos gos bsgrubs te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos zin nas mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing mnyan du yod pa'i rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[16a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dge slong gnas pa rnams kyis gnod pa byas pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo 
[\[16a.3\]]zhes thos so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin srog chags khri dang lhan cig tu lnga 'dzin gyi ljongs nas ko sa la'i ljongs ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig 
[\[16a.4\]]tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod ni bdag gi yul nas ha cang sngar mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[16a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gang zag phrag dog can dang /_mngon par mi brtson pa dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_bre mo'i gtam byed pa mang ba dang /_tshul bzhin las thag ring ba dang /_sbyor ba dang bral ba rnams gang na gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs 
[\[16a.6\]]pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos mi gnas so/_/rgyal po chen po rgyu bcus na gang zag mngon par mi brtson pa yin par rig par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gnyid che ba dang /_mkhas so snyam du mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa dang /_bdag la bstod pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[16a.7\]]la smod pa dang /_bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_tshogs la dga' ba dang /_rnyed pa ched cher 'dzin pa dang /_bkur sti ched cher 'dzin pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa ste/_rgyal po chen po rgyu bcu po de dag dang ldan na gang zag mngon par mi 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]brtson pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mi rigs ldan pa rtag tu mi 'thun te/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po mi ro dang /_/ji ltar skye bo bya dang phrad pa bzhin/_/de ni mkhas pa 
[\[16b.2\]]rnams dang shin tu ring /_/dad med de ni 'khrul pa tshol bar byed/_/bre mo gtam smra spyod yul tshogs la dga'/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la ma gus pa/_/'di nas shi 'phos myur du ngan 'gror 'gro/_/mi ldan pa la dran med shes rab med/_/mya ngan mi 
[\[16b.3\]]'da' mi 'grol tshul khrims med/_/de ni dmus long lam dang ji bzhin du/_/'phags pa'i lam dang shin tu ring bas ring /_/gang zag mi ldan de ni smra ba mang /_/dgod la dga' zhing rtag tu dbang po g.yengs/_/de ni bstan la chu ra'i chu 'os min/_/
[\[16b.4\]]de ni grong zas lcags kyi thu lum za/_/sbyin pa po yis dad pas byin pa na/_/ldan dang grol la nga yis gnang ba yin/_/mi ldan pas ni kham gcig zos na yang /_/ngo lon ri rab tsam yang bya ba yin/_/bstan la yul 'khor zas ni sbyong bar dka'/_/ldan 
[\[16b.5\]]pa gang yin rnams kyang 'di la 'dzem/_/mi ldan de yis rgod bzhin zos na ni/_/glang chen rta dang ba lang bong bur skye/_/de dag de zos brnyes pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/_/de dag rid cing nyam chung smad par 'gyur/_/zas blang zos pas mi gtsang dri ngar 'gyur/_/de 
[\[16b.6\]]dag dbyug pas bsnun pas sbyong bar 'gyur/_/sems kyang g.yengs shing dran pa rnam par nyams/_/slong mo byed cing smyon pa dag tu 'gyur/_/bstan pa bsod nams stegs 'di thob na yang /_/bag med gyur na ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur/_/lo ni bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[16b.7\]]mtha' yas par/_/ngan song sdug bsngal mang po de myong nas/_/mi yi 'jig rten khom pa thob par 'gyur/_/sdig byas phyir yang ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur/_/lcags kyi thu lum rgya mtsho chen po yi/_/nang du ltung bar gyur na gnas med de/_/lo ni bye ba phrag 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]stong snyed du yang /_/rgya mtsho che las slar ni dbyung mi nus/_/de bzhin byis pa ngan 'gror ltung ba yang /_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/_/de dag mir skye ba yang the tsom bcas/_/de dag mtho ris byang chub ga la thob/_/bsam pa dag 
[\[17a.2\]]cing rtag tu brtson pa dang /_/legs par bsdams shing g.yo sgyu med pa dang /_/mnyam pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob 'gyur te/_/de la thams cad mkhyen nyid dka' ba med/_/rgyal po chen po chos bcu drug po 'di dag ni gang zag phrag dog can gyi mtshan ma yin par 
[\[17a.3\]]rig par bya ste/_bcu drug gang zhe na/_khwa ltar skru ba dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_legs par ma bsdams pa dang /_gzhan gyi bsngags pa ma yin pas bde bar 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan gyi yon tan dag la yid mi ches pa dang /_bsam pa mang ba dang /_mya ngan mang ba 
[\[17a.4\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba mang ba dang /_mig ser ba dang /_kha dog dang dbyibs nyams pa dang /_nga rgyal gyis non pa dang /_dge slong la mi dga' ba dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa la bsting ba'i ngang tshul can dang /_brtsad du rung ba'i 'khrul pa tshol ba dang /_gnas la 
[\[17a.5\]]ser sna byed pa dang /_chos nyan du mi 'gro la rna blags te mi nyan/_sems rnam par g.yengs shing gzhan dang gzhan du gtam rlung la bskur bar byed cing chos kyi gtam la mi dga' ste/_'di skad du ci zer ba ngas mi shes so/_/'di ni blun po yin te/_'jig rten gyi tha 
[\[17a.6\]]snyad kyi chos ston to zhes kyang zer te/_gang 'phags pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i chos 'dul ba la ma gus pa 'di nyid mi blun po de dag mi shes pa yin no/_/bdag gis ni byang chub thob nas gdod byang chub kyi shing drung du chos la gus par gnas par bya'o zhes zer zhing dge 
[\[17a.7\]]slong rnams la chos ston pa na yang phyi sgo na 'greng zhing 'dug la chos nyan par byed de/_stan la 'dug mi 'dod na yang dge slong dag la 'tsho bar byed de/_brgyad sde'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam ston pa na yang bdag gis mnyan par bya'o/_/de thos na bdag gis nad de 'byung 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de bas na mi blun po de dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pas byang chub yongs su btsal bar sems pa dag ni dper na mi'i mig gnyis phyung nas blta bar 'dod pa'am/_nor thams cad med par byas nas 'dron pa mang po dang 'thun par 'dod pa'am/_rkang pa 
[\[17b.2\]]bcad nas lam du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang 'dra ste/_rgyal po chen po de ltar 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag gi byang chub ni de 'dra ba snyam byed do/_/rgyal po chen po chos nyi shu rtsa lnga dang ldan na gang zag byang chub las nyams par rig par bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/_gnas la ser sna 
[\[17b.3\]]byed pa dang /_khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /_bsngags pa la ser sna byed pa dang /_phrag dog can dang /_ma dad pa dang /_ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_sdig pa'i bsam pa can dang /_g.yo ba'i bsam pa can dang /_gzhan la gnod pa dang ldan pa 
[\[17b.4\]]dang /_spyod lam kho re chud pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_'khon dam du 'dzin pa dang /_sog 'jog gi shas che ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la skrag nas log par brda sprod cing sgro 'dogs te/_chos spong bar byed pa dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal can 
[\[17b.5\]]yin te mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang /_chos la slu ba byas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang /_snying mi 'bebs shing dgra zla mang ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du song na mthong ma thag tu gzhan gyi mos pa bzlog pa'i phyir gzhan dag gi mtshang 'dru ba dang /_gsang ba'i gnas la yid brtan 
[\[17b.6\]]pa las 'khu ba dang /_sngon mthong yang rung ma mthong yang rung ba'i dge slong dag la 'di rnams la su yang dga' bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam ste/_gnod par bya ba'i phyir bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang /_gzhan gyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir gzhan 
[\[17b.7\]]spong ba dang /_rnyed pa'i bsam pas bdag gi bsnyen par rdzogs pa de nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam ste/_so sor brtags nas tshul khrims srung ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang zag de 'dra ba de dag ni bstan pa las tshabs cher nyams par 'gyur ba'am/_khyim gyi 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/khwa ltar skru zhing ma bsdams mu cor smra/_/'jig rten mkhyen rnams bstan la gus pa med/_/khengs pa khrel med rtag tu mi 'thun pa/_/
[\[18a.2\]]phrag dog zil gnon rtags ni 'di rnams yin/_/gzhan dag gis ni bsngags pa ma yin la/_/mi dgar mi byed dbul pos gser rnyed bzhin/_/snying por 'dzin cing thams cad rnam par spangs/_/gnod sems can la byang chub ga la yod/_/snga ma de yis kun nas 
[\[18a.3\]]mnar sems ltas/_/de yi rnam smin gyis ni ngan 'gro myong /_/'dir ni mi lus thob nas mig kyang ser/_/de yi mdog kyang gsal zhing mdzes mi 'gyur/_/de ni su la'ang btsam pa mang yod de/_/kun tu de yi zhe ni 'gras par 'gyur/_/la la'i shes pa'i khyad 
[\[18a.4\]]par mthong na yang /_/phrag dog bskyed nas chos ni spong bar byed/_/rgod cing snying la thogs pa med pa yis/_/gzhan dang lhan cig sdig pa mang po smra/_/gal te gzhan gyis gtam ngan ma smras kyang /_/'khrug pa'i sems kyis mtshan mo 'da' bar byed/_/de ni grong du 
[\[18a.5\]]spyod lam gzhan du sgyur/_/gtsug lag khang du dmu rgod rta bzhin byed/_/gzhan gyi skyon 'dzin bdag gi 'dzin mi byed/_/phrag dog can rnams chos ni de 'dra'o/_/'di ni ci nas phyogs 'dir mi gnas par/_/'di yi khyim du 'di dang 'di skad bya/_/sang ni bdag 
[\[18a.6\]]gis ngan du brjod snyam ste/_/de ni sdang ba'i yid kyis mang du sems/_/de ni mya ngan mang zhing yid mi bde/_/gzhan gyis shes phyir bkur pa rnams mthong na/_/de ni las kyi rnam smin yid mi ches/_/nyes pas non nas bsngags pa ma yin smra/_/mkhas pa de 
[\[18a.7\]]dag sman rnams khong du chud/_/de phyir de yi bsnyen bkur 'phel 'gyur na/_/de ni sbyin mchog bla med sbyin byed na/_/chos mchog 'dzin par yin pa yong mi shes/_/dge slong bya ba dag la des pa yi/_/glo bur pa dag 'ong ba mthong na na gnong /_/shin tu sdug bsngal 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gnas 'dir ci 'dod ces/_/gus pa med par ma dad chos rnams smra/_/gtsug lag khang 'di rtag tu las mang la/_/rnyed pa'ang med de spyod yul rnams mi bzad/_/gal te des bskul de ni mi 'gro na/_/legs par ma bsdams thab mo byed par 'gyur/_/'di 
[\[18b.2\]]'dra dag gi gnas 'dir gang yang med/_/yul zhig tu ni ci 'dra dran par gyis/_/gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis khyod bskrad na/_/yul 'di sun dbyung phyir ni 'ongs sam khyod/_/dge bsnyen blun po rnams ni 'di mi shes/_/'di dag khrims 'chal tshul khrims ldan 
[\[18b.3\]]mi shes/_/dge slong dga' dang mi dgas myur du song /_/mi sdug pa dang drag pos song nga re/_/sangs rgyas la ni slob pa'i chos smra ba/_/des shing dam brtan dag gis mthong na ni/_/blun dang mi 'thun 'gyur na mi rung zhes/_/de dag ga las 'ongs par phyir yang 
[\[18b.4\]]'gro/_/kye ma bdag gi 'dren pa'i bstan pa po/_/rgyal ba dag gi chos 'di 'gag par 'gyur/_/dge slong sdig can 'di dag rab tu 'phel/_/chos smra gang yin rnams ni nyung bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe mang du thos pa glo bur 'ongs/_/skye bo mang po dga' byed ston 
[\[18b.5\]]pa na/_/blo gros chung ngu 'di ltar ci shes zhes/_/mi gus de dag gzhan la sbron par byed/_/des ni lung yang ma mnos chos ma dris/_/'di yi mkhan po ci 'dra slob dpon gang /_/rang skye shing ltar chos gos bgos nas ni/_/bde ba'i don du rnyed pa tshol bar byed/_/
[\[18b.6\]]de 'dir mdo sde de la mi mkhas te/_/de yis shes pa bdag cag shes so snyam/_/de dag blun zhing bstan pa sun 'byin pa/_/ting 'dzin ma thob byis pa'i bsam pa sems/_/rgyal po ngas ni 'das pa'i dus dran pas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'od ces bya ba byung /_/lo ni 
[\[18b.7\]]brgyad khri tham pa'i bar dag tu/_/chos rnams bstan nas rgyal ba mya ngan 'das/_/rgyal ba de ni 'das pa'i dus kyi 'og_/dam pa'i chos ni nyams shing thug pa na/_/dge slong dran pa'i blo can zhes bya byung /_/gzungs thob ma yin spobs pa thob par 'gyur/_/mdzes 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]shing des la bka' blo bde ba dang /_/rtag tu ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa/_/skye dgu sprin gyi chus ni tshim byed ltar/_/lhar bcas 'gro ba chos kyis tshim par byed/_/de yi dus kyi tshe na sa steng du/_/bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya grong khyer byung /_/kho ra 
[\[19a.2\]]khor yug dpag tshad brgyad du gyur/_/mi rnams de dag blo ldan lo legs bde/_/chos smra dran pa'i blo can de 'ongs nas/_/srog chags rnams la phan phyir chos kyang bstan/_/srog chags bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum/_/bla med byang chub la ni bkod par gyur/_/me tog 
[\[19a.3\]]rnams dang spos dang gos rnams dang /_/bca' ba thug pa dang ni 'tsham pa yi/_/glu dbyangs rol mo'i sgra rnams rab mchog gis/_/de dag de la sangs rgyas bzhin du mchod/_/dge slong lnga brgya shin tu mi 'thun gyur/_/grong khyer du ni de yi bsngags min sgrogs/_/
[\[19a.4\]]tshul khrims mi ldan nyes pa des shes zhes/_/re re nas ni phyin pa'i mdun du brjod/_/zla ba nya ba'i gso sbyong bab pa na/_/gal te do nub myur du ma song na/_/gnad rnams gtub cing srog kyang gcad do zhes/_/smra ba'i dge slong sdig can langs par gyur/_/dge 
[\[19a.5\]]slong de dag nyid la snying rje nas/_/sems can dag pa de ni ma zhum song /_/sangs rgyas sras la ci phyir brnyas byed ces/_/lha rnams stong dag mi dga' ngu bar byed/_/de na dge slong lnga brgya de dag kun/_/dgod cing mgu bas mtshan mo 'da' bar byed/_/kye ma bdag 
[\[19a.6\]]cag de las legs par thar/_/khur lci bor ba snyam du nyams la sems/_/dge slong lnga brgya dus las 'das gyur na/_/bskal pa brgyad cu dmyal bar gnas par 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye stong bdun cu rtsa drug tu/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten der ni dge slong gnas/_/sems 
[\[19a.7\]]can de dag tshe rabs dag tu ldongs/_/de dag sbrul gdug skyes te sa rdul za/_/byis pa rnams kyis mthong nas bong bas brgyab/_/skyabs kyang med cing dpung gnyen med par gyur/_/tshe rabs bye ba stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du/_/mi yi nang du skyes nas dbul por gyur/_/
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]smyo zhing ldongs la rtag tu lus kyang rul/_/mdog ngan smad par gyur te mthu yang chung /_/de ltar bye ba lnga brgya zil gyis gnon/_/bdag nyid rtag tu mi sdug mang po byed/_/gzhan gyi sbyin pa la ni skyon yang 'dogs/_/g.yang sa chen por bdag nyid 'dor bar byed/_/
[\[19b.2\]]ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa drug cu pa/_/grags chen zhes bya bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/der ni skyob pa 'jig rten don mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs stong phrag bcu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dag nang na sangs rgyas tha ma'i tshe/_/der ni de dag mi lus thob 'gyur te/_/
[\[19b.3\]]sangs rgyas de mthong nas ni bzod pa thob/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed mthong bar 'gyur/_/sngon ni lhan cig de dag thams cad kyis/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems su smon lam btab/_/der ni de dag byang chub sems ma nyams/_/bsam pa'i bye brag gis ni ngan 'gror 
[\[19b.4\]]ltung /_/nga ni de tshe chos smra rgyal ba'i bu/_/dran pa'i blo can zhes bya der yang gyur/_/sun 'byin de ni ston la sun 'byin 'gyur/_/de phyir nga rgyal spangs shing bor nas ni/_/tshul min spangs te ye shes sbyor bar gyis/_/gang zhig bdag nyid brlag par mi 'dod pa/_/des ni 
[\[19b.5\]]mi shes tshig rnams spangs nas kyang /_/me yi phung po bzhin du phrag dog spongs/_/mthong dang ma mthong thos dang ma thos dang /_/bden dang mi bden pas ni gzhan mi gleng /_/byang chub mchog tu 'tshang rgya 'dod pa yi/_/dge slong des ni bdag gi nyes pa bsal/_/des pa rnams 
[\[19b.6\]]ni nang dang phyi rol gyi/_/dngos po de dag thams cad gtong bar byed/_/gang zhig nga yi byang chub mchog la 'dun/_/de dag ci phyir gzhan la spro ba skyed/_/phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bstan pa la/_/dmu rgod mang po byang chub sun yang 'byin/_/de dag gcong rong g.yang sa chen por 
[\[19b.7\]]'gro/_/bsam pa nyams la byang chub ci byar yod/_/nga yi byang chub mchog 'dod gang yin pas/_/rigs ngan bu 'drar nga rgyal spangs byas nas/_/sems can kun la byams pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/thob dang ma thob mi dgar yong mi bya/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang gang na gus 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]pa med pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_gzhan dag la sdang ba dang /_glags lta ba dag yod pa/_der ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams yun ring du mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur te/_myur ba kho nar 'dod bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[20a.2\]]rgyal po chen po chos bcu drug po 'di dag ni ma dad pa'i gang zag ston pa ste/_bcu drug po gang zhe na/_mi 'thun par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sdig pa'i bstan pa la 'thad par lta ba dang /_chos kyi gtam la mi 'thad par lta ba dang /_sdig pa'i bsam pa can dang /_sems khengs 
[\[20a.3\]]pa dang /_glags lta ba dang /_khong g.yo can dang /_'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa dang /_sems kyi rgyud mi dge ba dang /_sbyor ba med pa dang /_gzhan la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_gcig tu nges par skyon 'dzin pa dang /_bstan pa la ma nges pa dang /_log 
[\[20a.4\]]par lta ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la the tsom za ba ste/_rgyal po chen po chos bcu drug po de dag ni ma dad pa'i gang zag ston pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rjes su bstan pa 'thun par mi 'dzin pa/_/khron pa 
[\[20a.5\]]rnying pa bzhin du yongs su spangs/_/thar dang mi 'thun rgyun gzhan 'gro ba de/_/sdang sems mu stegs can dang khyad par med/_/las kyi rnam par smin la yid mi ches/_/yid mi ches pas gzhan la 'dems mi byed/_/bdag nyid ri rab zom ltar mthor 'dzin te/_/nga rgyal 
[\[20a.6\]]myos pa de ni de bzhin byed/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos ni ston pa na/_/sdig pa'i spyod yul can de mi 'thad 'dzin/_/dad med chos la som nyi bskyed nas ni/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por smyon par 'gyur/_/ma dad pa yi bsam pas sdig can 'gyur/_/blo sdang gang gi 
[\[20a.7\]]yid kyang srung mi byed/_/snying po can kun rnam par spangs nas ni/_/dad pa med pas snyigs ma 'dzin par byed/_/'gying bar byed cing rtag tu khengs pa ste/_/ma dad de ni gzhan la 'dud mi byed/_/shi nas rigs dmar skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur/_/dbul por 'gyur zhing 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]gzhan la 'khu bar byed/_/gang zag ma dad bdag nyid gling mi byed/_/klan ka tshol zhing gzhan gyi nyes pa 'dzin/_/nags kyi e raN+Da yi shing lta bu/_/de ni khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/_/rnam par ma dag rung bzhin khong g.yo can/_/su yi bstan pa la yang 
[\[20b.2\]]'jug mi byed/_/gzhan gyi yid brtan na yang 'khu bar byed/_/bskal par gsos kyang mdza' bor yong mi 'gyur/_/de dag 'tsho ba rnams kyang dag pa med/_/ma dad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams/_/de dag thar pa'i chos mang spangs pas na/_/ring por mi thogs par 
[\[20b.3\]]ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/dad pa med pa bsnyen bkur 'dod pa'i phyir/_/mi bden chos rnams gzhan la go bar byed/_/g.yo byed rang bzhin rnam par sbed byed cing /_/de ni gzhogs slong kha gsag byed pa yin/_/de yi sems rgyud rtag tu g.yan yang spyo/_/gzhan dag 
[\[20b.4\]]gtam brjod pa ni thos na yang /_/gtam 'di bdag gi phyir ni gtam byed snyam/_/dad pa med pa khu 'phrigs za bar 'gyur/_/de ni gzhan gyi gtam dag brjod byas nas/_/bdag nyid ma dag de bzhin gzhan yang mthong /_/ma dad pa ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skrag pa bzhin/_/su 
[\[20b.5\]]la'ang mi 'bebs yid kyi rton mi byed/_/sbyor ba nyams shing gzhan yid mi srung ba/_/tshogs kyi nang du yid kyang zhum par 'gyur/_/lag pas tsham ngam byed cing 'thab par byed/_/'ong ba dag la tshar yang gcod byed cing /_/gzhung med par ni 'dzugs shing gleng bar byed/_/phra ma'i 
[\[20b.6\]]rang bzhin sdig pa mang po can/_/'thun dang bral la 'thab cing sdang ba rnams/_/ma dad rang bzhin mtshan ma 'di dag yin/_/de dag dad med rab tu byung nas ni/_/'dren pa'i bstan la de dag sun yang 'byin/_/'thun pa gang gis dge 'dun mdzes 'gyur te/_/de dag chos min tshig gis 
[\[20b.7\]]'gal bar byed/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la dri ma des/_/mu stegs can ltar som nyi the tsom bcas/_/des ni chos la glags gtong 'gal byas nas/_/dad med de ni chos kyang spong bar byed/_/de yi log par lta ba ma spangs te/_/phyi rol mu stegs can gyis nang du smod/_/des 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]ni bstan pa 'di la gting mi tshugs/_/chos gos 'chang ba tsam gyis dge slong brjod/_/bdag med rdo rje shin tu sgom pa des/_/'jig tshogs lta ba 'di dang bral ba yi/_/dge slong de ni bstan 'dir ye shes la/_/spyod yul rlung ltar 'dus byas chags pa med/_/
[\[21a.2\]]dad pa med pa las la yid mi ches/_/sdig pa'i sems kyi dbang du song nas ni/_/de ni ji ltar gzhan la gtses pa bzhin/_/ring por mi thogs ngan song gnas par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho che la ji ltar chu gnas bzhin/_/bstan pa 'di la dad pa gzhi yin te/_/gang zag gang zhig 
[\[21a.3\]]bstan la ma dad de/_/nga yi ma yin nga yang de'i ma yin/_/bgrod pa phun sum tshogs gzhi dad pa yin/_/bdud rtsi thob pa'i lam dang snang ba yin/_/ci ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i rgyal po bzhin/_/'di ni yon tan kun gyi thog mar 'gro/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi gtsug lag khang 
[\[21a.4\]]gi dge slong de dag ni yon tan de lta bu de dag dang mi ldan pas na de'i phyir der byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis so sor brtags nas ma 'dug par myur ba kho nar song ngo /_/rgyal po chen po dge slong drug cu po de dag thams cad ni de nas shi 'phos nas bskal pa gsum gyi bar du 
[\[21a.5\]]ngan song rnams su 'khor 'khor nas tshe rabs brgyad khri'i bar du rigs ngan du skye bar 'gyur te/_dman pa dang /_gzhan gyi zas kyis 'tsho ba dang /_'jig rten gyis smad par 'gyur ba dang /_lus rid pa dang /_mdog ngan pa dang chung bar grags pa dang /_byad ngan pa dang /_tshe rabs 
[\[21a.6\]]thams cad du shas cher nad rgyun ring dang /_khams ma snyoms te 'khrug pa dang /_nyam thag pa'i skad kyis cho nge 'don pa dang /_gshis ngan du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe rabs kyi tha ma las shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_lo brgyad khri'i 
[\[21a.7\]]bar du de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med chos ston par thos la shes par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od mthong la de bzhin gshegs pa de ni mi mthong ngo /_/de dag gi lus la 'od kyis phog par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis gtan du rnam par dag 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]par bya ba'i phyir nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te/_nyes pa bshags nas gdod de'i 'og tu las de rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong /_chos kyang shes par 'gyur la/_
[\[21b.2\]]byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong de dag bsal du stsal bar bgyi'o/_/dge slong sdig can de lta bu dag chags 'og thams cad du grags pa yang mi 
[\[21b.3\]]spro na/_mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag btang ste/_dge slong de dag bsal du bcug nas chags 'og thams cad du de dag mi 'dug par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de dag gi tshe 'di'i rnam par smin pa lags 
[\[21b.4\]]so/_/de dag ni tshe phyi ma la yang bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid brdegs pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i g.yang sa yin te/_bzhi gang 
[\[21b.5\]]zhe na/_sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_chos smra ba la sdang ba dang /_mngon par brtson pa med par dad pas byin pa len pa ste/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i g.yang sa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[21b.6\]]su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas som nyi za ba g.yang sa'i mchog_/'jig rten kun gyis skyabs byed mi nus te/_/blo chung de ni bstan las nyams gyur pas/_/mgon med de ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/des ni chos kyang spangs pas ngan song 'gro/_/lo ni stong 
[\[21b.7\]]las mi nyung bar du yang /_/dmus long dbang po dman zhing sems kyang nyams/_/sdug bsngal chen po 'di ni g.yang sa gnyis/_/sangs rgyas chos 'dzin mi 'jigs gang yin pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes skyong byed pa/_/de dag skur 'debs g.yang sa chen po 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gsum/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por myong bar 'gyur/_/de ni dad pas byin pa mi rigs spyod/_/de ni g.yang sa chen po bzhi pa yin/_/de ni 'jig rten sus kyang skyabs mi nus/_/sdig pa'i las can ngan song kun tu rgyug_/bsam pa dag pa 'phags pa'i 
[\[22a.2\]]dag pa yin/_/byang chub g.yo med de ni sems kyi gzhi/_/smras pa tsam gyis byang chub mi 'thob kyi/_/sems kyang dag par bya zhes bde gshegs gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na 
[\[22a.3\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de mi skye ba'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par gyur to rgyal po tshangs pas byin yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing 
[\[22a.4\]]dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/lha dung phyur gyis ni sngon ma bskyed pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i mod la/_bcom 
[\[22a.5\]]ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med 
[\[22a.6\]]pa snang bas khyab par byas nas steng du yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/_nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang med par byas nas phyir log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[22a.7\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]stsal pa/_mthong ba don yod rgyal po tshangs pas byin 'di ni bskal pa sum cu'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas sangs rgyas dung phyur phrag brgyad mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[22b.2\]]por 'gyur te/_gling bzhi yongs su btang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyis dgongs pa bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de de'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi bkod pa dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang 
[\[22b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs 
[\[22b.4\]]te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ba don yod la gang gi phyir bdag gi slad du dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag dang lhan cig 'ob rgyal cing 
[\[22b.5\]]bzhugs par gyur pa bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis kyang rgyal po tshangs pas byin la snying brtse ba'i phyir bzod par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal 
[\[22b.6\]]po tshangs pas byin dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[22b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//sho lo ka sum brgya mchis so//_//
[\[23a\]]
