[\[23a.1\]{D160}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya brah+ma bi she Sha tsin ti pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[23a.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu 
[\[23a.3\]]bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/_gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_mngon par shes pas rnam par rol cing spobs pa mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa la 
[\[23a.4\]]mkhas pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_gzhon nur gyur pa 'jam dpal dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa lag na rin po che dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che dpal dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa nam mkha' mdzod dang /_
[\[23a.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa dpal gyi snying po dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_
[\[23a.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pa pad ma bkod pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa seng ge dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa zla 'od dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa blo gros mchog dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes 
[\[23a.7\]]bu dam pa bcu drug la 'di lta ste/_bzang skyong dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon mchog dang /_mes byin dang /_phug sbas dang /_chus byin dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_bla ma'i blo gros dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_blo gros 'phel dang /_mthong ba 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]don yod dang /_shin tu yang dag zhugs dang /_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_blo gros mtha' yas pa dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /_
[\[23b.2\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha brgya stong 
[\[23b.3\]]dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong 
[\[23b.4\]]du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can gyi 'od bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_
[\[23b.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo bar byas nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom 
[\[23b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la 
[\[23b.7\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dra ba can gyi 'od khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de nyid lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni blta bas chog mi shes pa kha dog nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'am brtag par nus 
[\[24a.2\]]pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das yang bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'am rtog pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dra ba can gyi 'od ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/_de 
[\[24a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas skabs ma phye bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'am brtag par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/_'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[24a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang blta zhing rtog la de dag gi mig gi dbang po yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la mi 'jigs pa spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/_'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs 
[\[24a.5\]]pa la kun 'dri zhing phyir 'dri bar byed do/_/dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/_'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rgyal srid thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 
[\[24a.6\]]'dri'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'od zer dge ba'i rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o/_/'od zer bdag po thob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams tshangs 
[\[24a.7\]]pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o/_/'od zer nyon mongs pa med par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la nyan thos kyi theg pa kun 'dri'o/_/'od zer rtse gcig pa dben pa dang ldan pa 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa kun 'dri'o/_/'od zer thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su dbang bskur ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[24b.2\]]theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi theg pa kun 'dri'o/_/'od zer khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa'am bzhud pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis sems can gang la reg pa de dag shi 'phos ma thag tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o/_/
[\[24b.3\]]rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer de/_de bzhin gshegs pa grong du gshegs pa na 'byin te/_der de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od des sems can su dag la reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rgyan thams cad bkod pa yang 
[\[24b.4\]]grong khyer der 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed do/_/bde ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems 
[\[24b.5\]]can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal med par byed do/_/'od zer byams pas 'phags pa zhes bya ba des ni byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can rnams gcig la gcig mi za bar byed do/_/'od zer rab tu sim par byed pa zhes bya ba des ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[24b.6\]]sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal med par byed do/_/dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can ldongs pa rnams mig thob par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can 'on pa rnams rna ba thob par 
[\[24b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro/_/ngo tsha shes pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can myos pa rnams dran pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can log par lta ba can rnams yang dag par lta ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su gdung ba 
[\[25a.2\]]med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can rnams tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/phan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can gnod par sems pa rnams bzod pa dang des pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'bar ba can zhes bya ba'i 
[\[25a.3\]]'od zer des ni sems can le lo can rnams brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro/_/rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can dran pa nyams pa rnams bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro/_/ye shes zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab 
[\[25a.4\]]can rnams shes rab thob par 'gyur ro/_/rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can ma dad pa rnams dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can thos pa nyung ba rnams thos pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa dang ldan 
[\[25a.5\]]pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can ngo tsha ba dang 'dzem pa med pa rnams ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/skyo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod chags 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba zhes bya 
[\[25a.6\]]ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can zhe sdang spyod pa rnams kyi zhe sdang 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/snang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can gti mug spyod pa rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems 
[\[25a.7\]]can cha mnyam pa spyod pa rnams cha mnyam pa spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/_'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma/_
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]kha dog brgya stong du mas lhag par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dra ba can gyi 'od ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la brtsams te/_bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa yongs 
[\[25b.2\]]su zad par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'od zer gyi yon tan mtha' yas mu med pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can 
[\[25b.3\]]gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i bkod pa tshad ma mchis par bstan pa 'di dang /_thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od zer 
[\[25b.4\]]'di dag ni bdag cag gis sngon ma thos te/_ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang la la 'od zer 'di dag gi ming thos nas dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad yang dag 
[\[25b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer 'di lta bus rab tu snang bar bgyid pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul ma thag tu mi mjed kyi 
[\[25b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' su dag 'dri ba dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_bshad pa la mthar phyin pa rnams mchis nas de bzhin gshegs pa la kun zhu zhing bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_slar zhu bar 'gyur ba'i 'od zer 
[\[25b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba zhes bgyi ba gtang du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'od gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar 'gyur ba'i 'od zer de lta bu sku las phyung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'od des 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bskul ma thag tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na yongs su dag pa zhes bya 
[\[26a.2\]]ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig la chos kyang 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas 
[\[26a.3\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa khyad par sems zhes bya ba de 'od des bskul ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[26a.4\]]'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du snang ba chen po 'di byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[26a.5\]]nas nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[26a.6\]]rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir sku las 'od 'di gtang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems 
[\[26a.7\]]kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag gzigs par bzhed na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la lta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_kun zhu ba dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]slar zhu ba'i slad du bdag mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa da ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po yang phyin gyis de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod song shig_/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[26b.2\]]zhing der lhag pa'i bsam pa bcu rnams kyis gnas par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_snyan par smra ba dang /_ngan du smra ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /_snyan pa thos pa dang /_mi snyan pa thos pa la byams pa'i sems dang /_dus thams cad du sems 
[\[26b.3\]]can rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang /_sems can rab 'bring tha ma rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /_ri mo byed pa dang /_brnyas par byed pa rnams la sems mnyam pa dang /_gzhan gyi ltung ba'i 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par mi lta ba dang /_theg pa 
[\[26b.4\]]sna tshogs la ro gcig pa dang /_ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyi sgras mi skrag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la ngo mtshar du 'du shes pa ste/_
[\[26b.5\]]tshangs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bcu po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag seng ge'i sgra mi sgrog ste/_'on kyang 
[\[26b.6\]]bdag gis spyod pa gang lags pa'i spyod pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid mngon sum du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa de dag kyang rnam par sbyang zhing mnyam par gzhag pa'i bye brag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas par bgyi'o/_/
[\[26b.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems can ma rungs pa rnams tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bdag cag ma skyes pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams de skad ces ma 'dzer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang bskal pa brgya stong du tshangs par 
[\[27a.2\]]spyod pa la gnas pa bas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang snga dro'i dus gcig sems zhe sdang med par gnas na de bas de shin tu mchog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams de ni de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ste/_sems can de dag kyang de tsam du 
[\[27a.3\]]gtse ba mang zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa mang ba yin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis tshangs pa khyad par sems dang lhan cig tu chas te/_tshangs pa bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi'o/_/
[\[27a.4\]]bsam pa 'di dag kyang rnam par sbyong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la yang blta'o/_/phyag bgyi'o/_/bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i bye brag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems byang 
[\[27a.5\]]chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa'i skad cig yud 
[\[27a.6\]]tsam thang cig de tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir phyin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 
[\[27a.7\]]'od la bka' stsal pa/_dra ba can gyi 'od khyod kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems 'ong ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dra ba can gyi 'od tshangs pa khyad par sems 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bzhin 'dri ba/_kun 'dri ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/tshig gzung ba rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/tshig btsun pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/tshig 'jam pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/gsong por smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/tshig mchod 
[\[27b.2\]]pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/tshig thogs pa med pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/ldem po ngag tu smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/sems khong khro ba med pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/snying rje la gnas pa rnams 
[\[27b.3\]]kyi nang na mchog go/_/dga' ba la gnas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' the tsom thams cad gcod pa dang kun 'dri ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par 
[\[27b.4\]]sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[27b.5\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rnam pa mang pos mngon par bstod do/_/rnam par sgra bsgrags srid pa gsum du grags/_/bsngags pa'i phreng ba 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/bdag gis sems can mchog rnams zhing na 
[\[27b.6\]]mthong /_/de dag kun kyang khyed kyi yon tan gsungs/_/'di na yongs su dag pa'i zhing mchis te/_/dri ma ma mchis ngan song gsum spangs pa/_/de 'dra'i zhing rnams de dag rnam spangs nas/_/khyed kyi thugs rjes ngan pa yongs su bzung /_/'jig rten mgon khyod 
[\[27b.7\]]ye shes dman ma mchis/_/ma lus bde bar gshegs dang khyod du mtshungs/_/shin tu rnam dag bsam pa mngon mdzad pa/_/'di 'dra ba yi zhing 'di khyod kyis bzung /_/tshul khrims thams cad rnam dag 'dod spangs nas/_/gang zhig bskal par gzhan na spyod pa 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bas/_/su dag byams pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'dir/_/skad cig spyod na'ang 'dir ni khyad par 'phags/_/lus dang ngag dang 'on te yid kyis kyang /_/gang la nyes bgyis rnam pa gsum mchis te/_/ngan song gsum du myong bar gang 'gyur 
[\[28a.2\]]ba/_/de ni tshe 'di nyid la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di na gang mchis pa/_/de dag rtag tu gdung bar mi bgyi ste/_/de yi las gang log ltung mchi ba yang /_/de dag 'dir ni klad pa na bas 'byang /_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skyon med grang /_/
[\[28a.3\]]dam pa'i chos gsungs chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams/_/de dag 'di las phyin cad nam du yang /_/dran pa mi 'khrug blo yang nyams mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig bdud kyis bcings pa gcad pa dang /_/de bzhin nyon mongs las bcas spyod 'tshal ba/_/de ni zhing 'dir dam 
[\[28a.4\]]pa'i chos nyid gsungs/_/'di la ye shes ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gang zhig bskal pa bye bar zhing gzhan du/_/sems ldan dam chos 'dzin par gyur pa bas/_/su dag snga dro cig tsam mi mjed du/_/'di ni de bas mchog tu mkhas pas dgongs/_/gang gis mngon 
[\[28a.5\]]par dga' ba'i 'jig rten dang /_/de bzhin tshe dpag med kyi bde can mchog_/de na sdug bsngal sdug bsngal sgra ma mchis/_/der ni yon tan bgyi ba rmad mi che/_/nyon mongs 'byung gnas 'jig rten nyes gang 'dir/_/zhe sdang can gyi rab tu nyes bzod la/_/chos 
[\[28a.6\]]'di la yang gzhan dag 'dzud pa ni/_/'di ni de bas dka' ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/snying rjes rlan sems sdug bsngal mang las grol/_/bla med bla ma khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/gtum sems can la chos gang 'chad pa ni/_/bdag po 'jig rten na yang 
[\[28a.7\]]de sbyang dka'/_/shin tu rgya che ba yi 'khor 'di dang /_/phyogs su rnam par grags pa'i sangs rgyas sras/_/chos kyis mi ngoms rgya mtsho 'dre ba tshogs/_/de dag la ni rgyal ba'i byang chub gsungs/_/tshangs pa dbang po 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_/lha klu lha min 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]mi 'am cir bcas pa/_/chos nyid 'tshal ba mang po tshogs pa la/_/ji ltar mos pa bzhin du chos nyid gsungs/_/dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma dang dge slong dang /_/dge slong ma dang 'khor bzhi 'di dag tshogs/_/ji ltar thos nas nor grub rab 'dong bar/_/de ltar 
[\[28b.2\]]de dag la ni chos bstan gsol/_/gang rnams sangs rgyas theg la rtag mos dang /_/de bzhin rang rgyal theg dang nyan thos theg_/theg pa gang gi sems bsam gang mkhyen pa/_/de la sman pa'i slad du de gsungs shig_/sangs rgyas rigs la gnas phyir 
[\[28b.3\]]gang bzhugs pa/_/dkon mchog gsum po gang las byung ba yi/_/byang chub nges sems dag la sman slad du/_/chos kyi rgyal po khyod la bdag gsol lo/_/khyod kyi bsngags pa'i phreng ba grags thos nas/_/shes rab yangs pa 'di rnams bde bar lhags/_/
[\[28b.4\]]sems can gtso bo de dag mkhyen pa bzhin/_/de dag la ni bla med spyod pa shod/_/'di ltar bde gshegs mkhyen pa bsam mi khyab/_/dgra bcom bdag nyid chen pos 'di min/_/'di ni rang rgyal gyi yang yul ma lags/_/bdag kyang 'dren la dad pa'i rjes 
[\[28b.5\]]su 'brang /_/bdag gis gang khyod don chen 'di dris pa/_/'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bzod gsol/_/gang phyir khyod kyi thugs ni skyo mi mnga'/_/de phyir byang chub lam mchog bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs pa khyad par 
[\[28b.6\]]sems kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan zhing yid mi skyo ba rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[28b.7\]]dpa' dag mgo gcig tu smra zhing tshig gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na bslad pa ma mchis shing spyod lam yang mi 'khrug pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos dkar po rnams rnam par 'phel 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bar bgyid pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na sa nas sar 'phar bar bgyid pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la thabs mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems can rnams la nye bar spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_
[\[29a.2\]]ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems srung ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems rtse gcig cing yid rnam par ma 'dres pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos rnams yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na ltung ba las 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji 
[\[29a.3\]]ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 'khor gyi nang du mchi ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na rgyu'i stobs dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba chab mi 'tshal ba rnams 
[\[29a.4\]]lags/_ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bstan par sbyin pa dang /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma bstan par shes pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan rnams kyi bde ba las ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar 
[\[29a.5\]]na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa rnams lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa legs 
[\[29a.6\]]so legs so/_/yang tshangs pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la de lta bu'i don dri bar sems pa legs so/_/tshangs pa de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas tshangs pa khyad par sems 
[\[29a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan zhing yid mi skyo ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]rnams la snying rje ba dang /_mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_'khor ba la rmi lam lta bur mos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par yongs su 'jal ba ste/_tshangs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 
[\[29b.2\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan zhing yid mi skyo ba rnams yin no/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mgo gcig tu smra zhing tshig gdung ba med pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams 
[\[29b.3\]]cad la gang zag med par mgo gcig tu smra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye gnas thams cad la dga' ba med par mgo gcig tu smra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa mgo gcig tu smra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[29b.4\]]dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams chud mi za bar mgo gcig tu smra'o/_/tshangs pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig mgo gcig pa bzhi'o/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge 
[\[29b.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_'byung ba ste bzhi po de dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi slad cing spyod lam rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[29b.6\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_rnyed pa med pa dang /_smad pa med pa dang /_grags pa med pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshangs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi slad cing spyod lam rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshangs 
[\[29b.7\]]pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'phel bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzud pa dang /_sbyin pa byin pa na rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]su 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes rab ston pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sa nas sar 'phar te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags 
[\[30a.2\]]pa dang /_nyes pa thams cad rnam par spang ba dang /_bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang /_brtson 'grus shin tu 'bar ba dang /_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la thabs 
[\[30a.3\]]mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_gzhan gyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_nyes pa 'chags pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol bar 'debs pa ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang 
[\[30a.4\]]ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la nye bar spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang /_bdag bde ba la ma chags pa dang /_bzod cing des pa dang /_nga rgyal bcom 
[\[30a.5\]]pa ste bzhi po de dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzon te bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro 
[\[30a.6\]]ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsngags pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems rtse gcig cing yid rnam par ma 'dres pa rnams 
[\[30a.7\]]su rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sems rnam par spong ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa gtong ba dang /_chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa bzhin du chos ston pa ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos yongs su tshol te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir rin po cher 'du shes pa dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir rtsir 'du shes pa dang /_chud mi za ba'i phyir don du 'du shes pa 
[\[30b.2\]]dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'du shes pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ltung ba las 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[30b.3\]]nang nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /_mi 'pho bas mi 'gag pa la bzod pa dang /_rgyu la so sor rtog pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bzod pa dang /_gcig nas gcig tu sems phan tshun du gyur pa ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/_
[\[30b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa dang /_dkar po'i chos kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_rab tu dben par gnas pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag 
[\[30b.5\]]go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos 'dod pa'i phyir te/_klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas ma yin pa dang /_ri mo dang bcas pa'i phyir te nga rgyal dang khengs bsam 
[\[30b.6\]]yin pa dang /_dge ba gang yin pa tshol ba'i phyir te bdag spyoms pas ma yin pa dang /_sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzud pa'i phyir te rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang 
[\[30b.7\]]ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi shes rab gsal bar byed pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i las byed pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]rnam par byang ba ston pa ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rgyu'i stobs dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la nyes par mi lta 
[\[31a.2\]]ba dang /_khros pa rnams la byams pa sgom pa dang /_chos rnams kyi rgyu ston pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma bstan par 
[\[31a.3\]]shes pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dag la sngon du 'gro ba rnams yin/_ltung ba rnams kyi pha rol la rtsod par mi byed pa yin/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/_chos rnams la zab mor mos pa rnams yin te bzhi 
[\[31a.4\]]po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan la gnas nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sems las su rung ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis stobs bskyed pa dang /_sems can 
[\[31a.5\]]rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang thabs dang shes rab sgom pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'khor ba dpag tu med pa 
[\[31a.6\]]yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang /_byams pa dpag tu med pa sgom pa dang /_snying rje dpag tu med pa sgom pa ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs 
[\[31a.7\]]rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sngar dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la shin tu mos pa dang /_bsam pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ste/_tshangs pa chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[31b.2\]]sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 
[\[31b.3\]]lha'i me tog rnams kyis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par byas so/_/de nas gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can gyi 'od kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin dri ba 'dri ba la mkhas pa 
[\[31b.4\]]rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs na/_de ji ltar dris na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin dri ba yin/_khyad par sems kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas 'dri na tshul bzhin ma yin pas 'dri'o/_/gzhan du sgro 'dogs pas 'dri na tshul bzhin ma yin par 
[\[31b.5\]]'dri'o/_/chos su sgro 'dogs pas 'dri na tshul bzhin ma yin par 'dri'o/_/dra ba can gyi 'od gang la bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang /_gzhan du sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang /_chos su sgro 'dogs pa med pa 'di ni tshul bzhin 'dri'o/_/gzhan yang dra ba can gyi 'od 
[\[31b.6\]]bskyed pa'i phyir 'dri na tshul bzhin ma yin par 'dri'o/_/'gag pa'i phyir 'dri na tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/dra ba can gyi 'od gang la chos gang yang skye ba'i phyir ram/_'gag pa'i phyir ram/_
[\[31b.7\]]gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyir 'dri ba med pa de ni tshul bzhin 'dri ba'o/_/gzhan yang dra ba can gyi 'od kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/rnam par byang ba'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/'khor ba'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]yin pa'o/_/'khor ba las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/dra ba can gyi 'od gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par byang ba'i phyir 
[\[32a.2\]]ma yin/_'khor ba'i phyir ma yin/_'khor ba las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir ma yin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir 'dri ba med pa de ni tshul bzhin 'dri ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid ni kun nas nyon mi mongs/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/_mi 'khor zhing 
[\[32a.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/gzhan yang dra ba can gyi 'od 'thob pa'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/yongs su shes pa dang 
[\[32a.4\]]sgom pa'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/'bral ba'i phyir 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/dra ba can gyi 'od gang la thogs pa med pa dang /_'dzin pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa med 
[\[32a.5\]]pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_bsgom pa med pa dang /_bsgom par lta ba med pa de ni tshul bzhin 'dri ba'o/_/gzhan yang dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni dge ba'o/_/'di ni mi dge ba'o/_/'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'di ni zag pa med pa'o/_/'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang 
[\[32a.6\]]bcas pa'o/_/'di ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/'di ni 'dus byas so/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas so/_/'di ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/zhes 'dri na de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ste/_dra ba can gyi 'od ji tsam du gnyis su 'jug pas 'dri ba 
[\[32a.7\]]de tsam du tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/dra ba can gyi 'od gang la gnyis med pa dang /_gnyis ma yin pa med pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_ming med pa dang /_spyi mi 'jug pa de ni tshul bzhin 'dri ba'o/_/gzhan yang dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas tha dad du byed pa dang /_chos tha 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dad du byed pa dang /_dge 'dun tha dad du byed pa dang /_zhing tha dad du byed pa dang /_sems can tha dad du byed pa dang /_theg pa tha dad du byed pa de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/dra ba can gyi 'od gang la chos gang yang tha dad par ram/_gcig par mi 'dri ba de ni tshul bzhin 'dri 
[\[32b.2\]]ba'o/_/gzhan yang dra ba can gyi 'od chos thams cad ni tshul bzhin no/_/chos thams cad ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/smras pa tshangs pa ji ltar na chos thams cad ni tshul bzhin/_chos thams cad ni tshul bzhin ma yin/_smras pa/_chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[32b.3\]]phyir chos thams cad ni tshul bzhin no/_/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems par zhugs pa de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid de ni tshul bzhin no/_/gang dben pa la ma mos pa de dag ni lhag par byed pa la zhugs pa'o/_/
[\[32b.4\]]gang lhag par byed pa la zhugs pa de dag ni lhag par byed pa la brtson pa'o/_/gang lhag par byed pa la brtson pa de dag ji tsam du lhag par byed pa de tsam du tshul bzhin du ma yin pa'o/_/smras pa tshangs pa chos rnams kyi tshul gang yin/_smras pa rigs kyi bu rang gi yul dben pa 
[\[32b.5\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' ni chos rnams kyi tshul lo/_/smras pa tshangs pa gang chos thams cad kyi tshul 'di khong du chud pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/_mang po yang ma yin 
[\[32b.6\]]te/_dra ba can gyi 'od rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos rnams kyi tshul bzhin 'di dag gi rjes su song ba'am/_rjes su 'gro ba'am/_rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gis chos gang yang ma rtogs mi rtogs rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khong du 
[\[32b.7\]]chud pa med par bcom ldan 'das kyis kun shes pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/_/gang rnams tshul bzhin du chos bstan pa 'di thos nas mos par byed pa de dag ni ji ltar bstan par de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba yin te/_de dag ni chos gang la yang spros par mi byed par 'gyur ro/_/su chos 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gang la yang spros par byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni chos gang yang khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro/_/su chos gang yang khong du chud par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni 'khor bar 'gro ba yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[33a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba yang ma dmigs/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba las bzla ba'i phyir chos ma bshad dam/_smras pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'khor ba las 'da' ba'i chos 
[\[33a.3\]]gang yang ma bstan tam/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba yang mi sel/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang thob par mi byed mod kyi/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su 'du shes pa las mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[33a.4\]]bar ston te/_'di la gang yang 'khor ba las 'da' bar yang mi byed/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'thob par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mnyam pa nyid ni mi 'khor/_mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/kun nas nyon mi mongs/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[33a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_tshangs pa legs so legs so/_/tshangs pa ci ste bshad par bya na de skad bshad par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du chos bstan pa 'di bstan pa na dge slong nyis stong rnams zag pa las len pa med par 
[\[33a.6\]]sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa ngas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor bar 'dogs kyang 'di la gang yang 
[\[33a.7\]]'khor ba med do/_/mya ngan las 'das par ston kyang 'di la gang yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/tshangs pa gang rnams tshul 'di la zhugs pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no/_/de nas 'khor 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]de'i nang nas dge slong lnga brgya bstan pa 'di thos pa dang /_stan las langs te dong ngo /_/tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/_gal te 'di la gang yang mi 'khor/_gal te gang yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' na/_bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yang don med do/_/bdag 
[\[33b.2\]]cag lam sgom pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa yang ci dgos zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos gang la skye ba'am/_'gag 
[\[33b.3\]]par 'tshal ba de dag la sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por tshol ba de dag la yang 'khor ba las 'da' ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang mtshan ma 
[\[33b.4\]]thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /_g.yo ba thams cad ma mchis par gyur pa lags na bcom ldan 'das skyes bu blun po 'di dag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas mu stegs can gyi lta bar lhung ste/_mya ngan las 'das par dngos por tshol lo/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[33b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das til las til mar dang /_'o ma las mar bzhin du chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la gang rnams mya ngan las 'das pa la dngos por tshol ba de dag ni nyan thos mu stegs can nga rgyal can zhes bdag mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa 
[\[33b.6\]]yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos gang la yang skye ba'am 'gag par mi mthong /_chos gang la'ang 'thob pa'am/_mngon par rtogs par mi 'tshal lo/_/de nas gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can gyi 'od kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa dge slong lnga brgya 
[\[33b.7\]]'khor 'di nas stan las langs te/_dong ba 'di dag ci nas kyang chos 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang /_mos par 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba de las rnam par grol bar ston cig_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'dod la rag go/_/'dod la rag go/_/
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dong yang bstan pa 'di las mi thar to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can nam mkhas 'jigs shing skrag ste bros kyang de ga las gar song ba de dang de dag tu nam mkha' 
[\[34a.2\]]mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du dge slong 'di dag ji srid du ring du song yang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid las ma 'das so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu gzhan zhig nam mkha' rnyed par bya'o/_/zhes nam mkha' tshol te/_phyogs dang 
[\[34a.3\]]phyogs mtshams su rgyug cing ji tsam nas nam mkha'i ming nas brjod kyang nam mkha' mi rnyed do/_/de nam mkha' de nyid kyi nang nas 'gro yang de mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang nam mkha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du dge slong 'di dag kyang 
[\[34a.4\]]mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por tshol te/_mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid la rnam par spyod kyang de mi mthong khong du mi chud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/ji ltar nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes brjod kyang gzung du med pa 
[\[34a.5\]]de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes brjod pa yang gzung du med pa'o/_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag bshad pa 'di thos nas zag pa las len pa med par sems rnam par grol te/_mngon par shes pa thob pa de dag gis tshig smras pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[34a.6\]]'das gang rnams chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por tshol ba de dag la sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni so so skye bo yang ma lags/_slob pa yang ma lags/_dgra bcom pa yang ma 
[\[34a.7\]]lags/_'khor ba'i chos can yang ma lags/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma lags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni byed pa dang /_sems dang g.yo ba dang /_spros pa thams cad ma mchis pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]shA ri'i bus dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis dge sbyong nyid khong du chud do/_/rang gi don byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag cag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa khong du chud do/_/mi bya ba byas so/_/shA ri'i bus smras 
[\[34b.2\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ji las bsams te de skad ston/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir dge sbyong nyid do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu mi bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_'di la bsam nas bdag cag gis kun nas 
[\[34b.3\]]nyon mongs pa khong du chud do/_/mi bya ba byas so zhes ston to/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams legs so legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rnams ni sbyin gnas kyi sar gnas pa yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu ston pa gang yin pa 'di nyid kyang sbyin 
[\[34b.4\]]pa mi sbyong na bdag cag gis lta ji ltar sbyangs/_smras pa ci'i phyir smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bus de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[34b.5\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na gang dag sbyin gnas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi mi 'phrogs pa rnams so/_/gsol pa 'jig rten na sbyin pa spyod pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag chos gang yang 
[\[34b.6\]]yongs su mi 'dzin pa rnams so/_/gsol pa 'jig rten na bsod nams kyi zhing gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzon pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag gis sems 
[\[34b.7\]]can thams cad la byams pa yongs su ma btang ba rnams so/_/gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bgyis pa gzo ba gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag mi skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pa lags so/_/gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang nye bar gnas pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag srog gi phyir yang bslab pa mi 'dral ba rnams so/_/gsol 
[\[35a.2\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ri mo dang bcas pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dbang po rab tu bsdams te gnas pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_'jig rten na nor che ba gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag nor bdun dang ldan pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[35a.3\]]'jig rten na mchog 'tshal ba gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten na gang dag la shes rab bla na med pa yod pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_rab tu dben pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag khams gsum du smon pa med pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[35a.4\]]'jig rten na shin tu bsdams pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang kun tu sbyor ba thams cad shin tu byang ba rnams so/_/gsol pa/_'jig rten na bde ba rnams gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_yongs 
[\[35a.5\]]su mi 'dzin pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag gi phung po yongs su shes pa'o/_/gsol pa/_pha rol tu mchis pa gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gis skye mched drug spangs pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'gram du phyin pa rnams 
[\[35a.6\]]gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang gis mnyam pa nyid thob pa rnams so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa rgyas pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la mos 
[\[35a.7\]]par byed pa'o/_/gsol pa ji ltar na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'dor ba'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]zad par mthong ba rnams so/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la brtags nas mi dmigs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na bsam gtan pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam thams cad mkhyen 
[\[35b.2\]]pa'i sems rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam chos thams cad la spros par mi byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam sems 
[\[35b.3\]]can du 'du shes 'jug par mi byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam chos thams cad la 'du shes 'jug par mi byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam bdag tu 'du 
[\[35b.4\]]shes 'jug par mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes 'jug par mi byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na dad pa la gnas pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam chos thams cad brjod du 
[\[35b.5\]]med par mos pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na thos pa la gnas pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam sgra thams cad la mngon par mi chags pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na ngo tsha 'tshal ba dang ldan pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nang yongs su shes pas so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[35b.6\]]ji ltar na khrel mchis pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_bka' stsal pa/_phyi rol gyi skye mched 'dor bas so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na yon tan thams cad tshogs shing kun tu 'gro ba rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[35b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/lus ni rnam par dag cing sdig pa mi byed de/_/ngag kyang rnam par dag pas rtag tu rdzun rnams spangs/_/yid kyang gtsang 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bas rtag tu bsam pa dri ma med/_/de phyir de ni rgyal bas kun tu 'gro bar gsungs/_/mi sdug sgom zhing 'dod chags kyis kyang chags pa med/_/byams la gnas shing zhe sdang gis ni gtum pa med/_/shes rab dag la gnas shing gti mug blun ma yin/_/mkhas pa rnams 
[\[36a.2\]]ni de la kun tu 'gro bar gsungs/_/de ni grong du ci bzhin de bzhin sgom pa yang /_/dgon pa dang ni grong dang 'khor du de 'dra bar/_/de ni spyod lam rnam par 'gyur ba mi byed de/_/de phyir rgyal bas de la kun tu 'gro bar brjod/_/rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid la ni de mos te/_/mkhas pas chos 
[\[36a.3\]]nyid la yang 'dod chags bral ba dang /_/dge 'dun la yang 'dus ma byas par shin tu mos/_/de phyir rgyal ba rnams kyis kun tu 'gro bar gsungs/_/'dod chags mos pa dag gi spyod pa rab tu shes/_/zhe sdang mos pa rnams dang de bzhin gti mug dang /_/spyod pa rnam par 'gyur ba la 
[\[36a.4\]]yang de mkhas te/_/de phyir de ni rgyal bas kun tu 'gro bar bstan/_/'dod pa'i khams la shin tu gnas par mi byed de/_/gzugs kyi khams la yang ni gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni gzugs med pa yi khams la mi gnas te/_/de phyir de ni rgyal bas kun tu 'gro bar brjod/_/rtag tu 
[\[36a.5\]]mtshan ma dang ni smon pas gsog gyur dang /_/dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du de mos te/_/zag pa rnams ni bar du zad par mi byed de/_/de phyir de ni rgyal bas kun tu 'gro bar bstan/_/de ni rang rgyal theg pa la yang mkhas pa yin/_/sgra phyir 'brang ba nyan thos 'gyur ba'ang de yis shes/_/
[\[36a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa'i pha rol song ba yin/_/de phyir bde bar gshegs pas kun tu 'gro bar brjod/_/de dag rtag par kun tu blo gros dri ma med/_/de dag tshul dang tshul ma yin la mi rmongs te/_/mdza' ba dang ni mi mdza' ba la mnyam pa'i yid/_/de phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[36a.7\]]kun tu 'gro ba yin/_/'das pa dag gi chos la'ang rnam par mi rtog cing /_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi la'ang de bzhin te/_/thams cad du yang dpa' bo rnam par mi rtog spyod/_/de phyir sems can dag pa kun tu 'gro ba'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las shin tu 'da'/_'jig rten gyi chos kyi nang na'ang gda' la 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi gos/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[36b.2\]]chos kyi 'jug pa yang rab tu 'tshal la 'jig rten gyi chos kyi 'jug par yang mi mchi/_'jig rten gyi chos kyi 'jug pas kyang sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yongs su thar bar bgyid/_'jig rten gyi chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang thob la 'jig rten na yang rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten 
[\[36b.3\]]gyi chos rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten phung por ngas bshad de/_/'jig rten dag ni 'di la gnas/_/'di la gnas par ma byas na/_/'jig rten 
[\[36b.4\]]chos las rnam par grol/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa der/_/'jig rten rang bzhin nyid shes nas/_/phung po rnams dang rab ldan yang /_/'jig rten chos dang ldan pa yi/_/rnyed pa dang ni ma rnyed dang /_/de bzhin grags dang ma grags dang /_/bstod smad bde dang sdug bsngal dang /_/
[\[36b.5\]]de dag gis ni 'jig rten skyong /_/shes rab chen po brten de rnams/_/'jig rten chos rnams rab rtogs shing /_/'jig rten 'jig pa mthong nas ni/_/'di dag la yang g.yo mi 'gyur/_/rnyed pas thos par mi sems te/_/ma rnyed pas kyang ngoms pa med/_/ri rab bzhin du mthu 
[\[36b.6\]]brtan pa/_/rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin grags dang ma grags kyang /_/rtag tu mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin/_/bde dang sdug bsngal bstod smad la/_/mnyam pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di ni gnyis las byung /_/phyin ci log las kun tu langs/_/de phyir 
[\[36b.7\]]'jig rten 'gro rtogs nas/_/mkhas pa rnams ni 'gro med 'gro/_/'jig rten 'di 'gro gang yin pa/_/'gro ba de ni de dag shes/_/de phyir 'jig rten 'gror zhugs nas/_/mi bde ba las skye bo 'grol/_/dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten spyod/_/pad mo bzhin du chags pa med/_/
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]chos kyi dbyings la rab gnas nas/_/'jig rten dag kyang 'jig mi byed/_/'jig rten chos nyid mi shes par/_/'jig rten gang la spyod pa yang /_/'jig rten mtshan nyid shes nas ni/_/mkhas pa de dag nyid na spyod/_/'jig rten nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 
[\[37a.2\]]de/_/nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/_/de dag de yi 'gro rig nas/_/'jig rten chos kyis gos pa med/_/ji ltar 'jig rten rab shes pa/_/de bzhin srog chags rnams la smra/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shes nas ni/_/'jig rten dag kyang 'jig mi byed/_/phung 
[\[37a.3\]]po rnams la rang bzhin med/_/'di ni 'jig rten chos nyid do/_/gang rnams de ltar mi shes pa/_/de dag rtag tu 'jig rten gnas/_/ma skyes pa dang ma byung bar/_/gang gi phung po kun shes pa/_/de dag 'jig rten spyod 'gyur yang /_/'jig rten 'di la'ang mi gnas so/_/'jig 
[\[37a.4\]]rten chos rnams mi shes shing /_/'du shes gnyis la gang gnas pa/_/'di bden 'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no zhes/_/mi mkhas de dag rtsod par 'gyur/_/'di ltar 'jig rten chos rnams kyi/_/yang dag chos nyid ngas shes pas/_/nga ni 'jig rten rnams dang yang /_/nams kyang rtsod 
[\[37a.5\]]par mi byed do/_/rtsod pa med pa'i chos 'di ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad pa ste/_/'jig rten mnyam pa nyid shes na/_/'di la bden pa'am [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa med/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'am yang na bden pa zhig_/bstan pa la ni rnyed gyur na/_/mthar 'dzin par ni nga 'gyur te/_/mu stegs 
[\[37a.6\]]can dang khyad par med/_/gang phyir chos rnams yang dag min/_/bden pa dang ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa med/_/de phyir 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos/_/ngas 'di gnyis su med par bshad/_/'jig rten chos nyid ji lta bar/_/gang gi 'jig rten 'di shes pa/_/mkhas pa de dag bden pa'am/_/
[\[37a.7\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i lta ba'ang mi 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' lta bur rnam dag par/_/gang gi 'jig rten 'di shes pa/_/grags pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/_/snang ba lta bur gyur pa yin/_/nga nyid kyis ni mthong ba ltar/_/de ltar gang gis 'jig rten mthong /_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gang bzhugs pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gzigs/_/chos rnams ngo bo nyid med par/_/brten pa'i chos rnams rab tu shes/_/gang rnams brten pa shes pa ni/_/de dag chos nyid shes pa yin/_/gang rnams chos nyid rab shes pa/_/de dag stong pa nyid de shes/_/
[\[37b.2\]]gang rnams stong nyid rab shes pa/_/de yi 'dren pa de rnams mthong /_/gang rnams 'jig rten bstan pa 'di/_/rna lam grags par 'gyur ba ni/_/de dag 'jig rten spyod mod kyi/_/'jig rten 'di la gnas ma yin/_/lta la gnas pa gang su dag_/gzhan gyi sa ni 'di ma yin/_/
[\[37b.3\]]'jig rten du ni spyod byed kyang /_/'jig rten 'di la gnas pa med/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/gang rnams bzod pa 'dir mos pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la bzhugs/_/gang gis tshul 'di shes pa ni/_/des ni nga yi chos 
[\[37b.4\]]bzung ste/_/de yis nga la rtag tu mchod/_/de dag 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/gang zhig 'jig rten bstan pa 'di/_/rna lam grags par gyur pa ni/_/sdig can bdud kyis de dag la/_/glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis rnam pa 'di shes pa/_/de dag phyug cing longs spyod che/_/
[\[37b.5\]]de dag sbyin la rtag par dga'/_/de dag tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/_/gang gis 'jig rten 'di shes pa/_/de dag bzod pa'i stobs ldan pa/_/de dag brtson 'grus rtogs par rigs/_/mkhas pa de dag bsam gtan dga'/_/gang gis rnam pa 'di shes pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin 
[\[37b.6\]]phun sum tshogs/_/de dag nye bar bzhi la dga'/_/bstan pa de dag shes rab 'phags/_/gang na 'di 'dra grags pa yi/_/phyogs de sangs rgyas stongs ma yin/_/sems dpa' chen po ring mi thogs/_/byang chub snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang rnams 'jig rten bstan pa 'di/_/
[\[37b.7\]]rna lam grags par 'gyur ba dag_/g.yon can bdud rnams bcom nas ni/_/byang chub mchog tu rdzogs 'tshang rgya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi yul las 'das pas 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'jig rten dang /_'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang /_'jig rten 'gog pa dang /_'jig rten 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du yang 'dogs so/_/tshangs pa de la 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga rnams so/_/gang de la chags pa de ni 'jig rten kun 'byung ba'o/_/gang phung 
[\[38a.2\]]po rnams kyi zad pa dang 'gag pa de ni 'jig rten 'gag pa'o/_/gang phung po rnams tshol ba dang mi tshol ba gnyis su med pa de ni lam mo/_/gzhan yang tshangs pa phung po rnams phung po rnams zhes tha dad du 'dogs pa la/_gang smra ba dang /_smra bar lta ba 'di ni 'jig rten no/_/gang 
[\[38a.3\]]lta ba de'i rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni 'jig rten kun 'byung ba'o/_/gang lta ba de ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan nyid 'gag pa de ni 'jig rten 'gag pa zhes bya'o/_/lam gang gis lta ba de dag mi 'dzin pa de ni 'jig rten 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ste/_tshangs pa ngas 'di la bsam nas nga ni lus 
[\[38a.4\]]'dom gang ba 'di la 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang /_'jig rten 'gag pa dang /_'jig rten 'gag par 'gro ba'i lam du 'dogs so zhes tshig de skad bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[38a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan na/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin no/_/
[\[38a.6\]]tshangs pa 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/zhes bya ba ci ste 'phags 
[\[38a.7\]]pa rnams kyi bden pa yin du zin na/_de ni byol song ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi yang 'phags pa'i bden par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo /_/tshangs pa 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'byung ba zhes bya ba de ji ste/_'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin du zin na de ni gang 'gro ba rnams su 'byung ba'i 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang 'phags pa'i bden par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba de ji ste 'phags pa'i bden pa yin du zin na/_
[\[38b.2\]]de ni gang rnams dngos po bshigs pas mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba dang 'gog par lta bar ltung ba chad par smra ba thams cad la yang 'phags pa'i bden par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni lam mo zhes bya ba de ci ste/_'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin du zin na/_'di ni 'dus byas kyi 'du 
[\[38b.3\]]byas las 'byung bar tshol ba 'dus byas lam du dmigs pa thams cad la yang 'phags pa'i bden par 'gyur te/_de bas na tshangs pa rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin par 
[\[38b.4\]]khyod kyis rig par bya'o/_/de lta mod kyi tshangs pa gang sdug bsngal mi skye ba de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/_/gang kun 'byung ba la mi 'jug pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/_/gang chos thams cad shin tu 'gag pa la mi skye mi 'gog pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 
[\[38b.5\]]bden pa'o/_/gang chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang gnyis su med pa'i lam sgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/_/tshangs pa gang bden pa bden pa zhes bya ba ni gang bden pa yang ma yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa gang zhe na/_bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_sems 
[\[38b.6\]]can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_'byung bar 'dzin pa dang /_'jug par 'dzin pa dang /_skye bar 'dzin pa dang /_'gag par 'dzin pa dang /_'khor bar 'dzin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin pa 
[\[38b.7\]]de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gang 'dzin pa 'di dag la mi 'dzin cing mchog tu mi snyems pa 'di ni bden pa zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ngo zhes bya ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/lam sgom 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]mo zhes bya ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i dran pa las nyams pa yin te/_de'i phyir [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i dran pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad la mi dran zhing yid la mi byed pa 
[\[39a.2\]]'di ni sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i dran pa zhes bya ste/_gang dran pa de la gnas pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/_/gang mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o/_/gang yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa de ni yid mi gnas pa'o/_/
[\[39a.3\]]gang mi gnas pa de ni bden par smra ba yang ma yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par smra ba yang ma yin te/_de'i phyir tshangs pa rnam grangs 'dis gang la bden pa'ang med/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'ang med pa de ni/_'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshangs pa bden pa zhes bya ba de ni nam yang mi bden 
[\[39a.4\]]pa ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung /_ma skyes kyang rung chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'khor ba dang /_de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa 'khor ba spang 
[\[39a.5\]]ba'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin te/_tshangs pa gang dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams de ltar mngon par rtogs pa mngon du byas pa de dag ni bden par smra ba yin no/_/yang 
[\[39a.6\]]tshangs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong /_lus ma bsgoms pa/_sems ma bsgoms pa/_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/_shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung ste/_de dag ni sdug bsngal skye ba la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/kun 'byung ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba 'phags 
[\[39a.7\]]pa'i bden pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/lam gyis 'byung ba'i phyir lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gnyis su smra bar 'gyur te/_skyes bu blun po de dag ni nyan thos mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/_/gang 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]rnams dngos po 'jig pas 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ba de dag ni lam log par zhugs pa yin te/_nga yang de dag gi ston pa ma yin/_de dag kyang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/_/tshangs pa ltos shig nga byang /_/chub kyi snying por 'dug nas bden pa'am/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes 
[\[39b.2\]]bya ba khong du ma chud do/_/chos gang ngas khong du ma chud pa'i chos de de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan la ston par mdzad dam/_'chad par mdzad dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byang chub 
[\[39b.3\]]ni mi dmigs pa ste/_ma zin pa srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas/_chos gang yang ma dmigs na/_ji 
[\[39b.4\]]mngon par brtags pas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes shing yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa 'di ci snyam du sems/_gang ngas 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos bshad pa 'di dag de bzhin nam de lta ma 
[\[39b.5\]]yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa chos gang rnams med pa de dag yod dam/_'on te med gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang ma mchis pa de ni 
[\[39b.6\]]mchis pa'am ma mchis pa zhes mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gang yang yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa de la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 
[\[39b.7\]]gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i ngo bo nyid du mkhyen te/_ji ltar shin tu mi mkhyen pa yang 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]shin tu rnam par mi dmigs pa de ltar mkhyen to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa ngas 'di ltar chos gang yang mngon par sangs rgyas pa de ni ma mthong /_ma thos/_mi dran/_ma rtogs/_rnam par mi rig cing /_gzung ba yang med/_sbyar ba yang med/_brjod du yang 
[\[40a.2\]]med/_rjes su sbyor ba yang med/_yul thams cad las 'das pa/_smrar med pa/_rab tu smrar med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_rtogs par mi rung ba/_yi ge med pa/_tshig gi lam med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa yin te/_tshangs pa de ltar chos gang nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[40a.3\]]chos de mngon par rtogs par 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan te/_de ltar rab tu zhi ba'i chos mngon par sangs rgyas nas yi ge dang 
[\[40a.4\]]nges pa'i tshig gis gzhan dag la go bar mdzad pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos la mngon par dad pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'jig rten 
[\[40a.5\]]thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa ji ltar 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'jig rten ni bden pa la mngon par chags na/_chos 'di ni bden pa yang ma lags/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yang ma lags so/_/'jig rten ni 
[\[40a.6\]]chos la mngon par chags na chos 'di ni chos kyang ma lags/_chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags so/_/'jig rten ni mya ngan las 'das pa la chags na/_chos 'di la ni 'khor ba yang ma mchis/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mchis so/_/'jig rten ni dge ba la mngon par chags na 
[\[40a.7\]]'di la ni dge ba yang ma mchis/_mi dge ba yang ma mchis so/_/'jig rten ni bde ba la mngon par chags na/_'di la ni bde ba yang ma mchis/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis so/_/'jig rten ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mngon par chags na 'di la sangs 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rgyas 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mchis so/_/chos bstan kyang de brjod du ma mchis pa'o/_/dge 'dun bstan kyang 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/de'i slad du chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper 
[\[40b.2\]]na/_me dang chu'am/_chu dang me'i gnas 'di ni mi 'thun pa'o/_/de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang byang chub 'am/_byang chub dang nyon mongs pa ni mi 'thun pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_nyon mongs pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/bshad kyang snang 
[\[40b.3\]]ba'i gzugs ma lags/_kun mkhyen kyang rnam par mkhyen pa ma mchis/_bsgom kyang gnyis su ma bgyis/_mngon du bgyis kyang thob pa ma mchis/_mya ngan las bzlas kyang zhi ba yang ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnams chos kyi tshul 
[\[40b.4\]]gyi rnam pa 'di la mos pa de dag ni lta bar gyur pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags so/_/de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba lags so/_/
[\[40b.5\]]de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba'i slad du rgya chen po las mos par 'gyur ro/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod 'chang ba'i slad du gter rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag legs par bgyi ba'i las bgyid pa'i slad du las kyi mtha' shin tu 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sangs 
[\[40b.6\]]rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin pa'i slad du rigs btsun par 'gyur ro/_/de dag nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su btang ba'i slad du gtong ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag tshul khrims kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/_nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma lags/_lus srog bor ba'i slad 
[\[40b.7\]]du de dag bzod pa'i stobs can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag yid yongs su skyo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi stobs can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag sdig pa'i las bsregs pa'i slad du bsam gtan gyi stobs can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag sdig par lta ba rnams dang bral ba'i slad du shes rab 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]kyi stobs can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag bdud rnams kyis rab tu thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag phyir rgol ba rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mi slu bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa la mkhas pa'i slad du 
[\[41a.2\]]yang dag par smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag don dam pa'i chos ston pa'i slad du bden par smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'grogs na bde ba'i slad du des par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'phags pa'i nor rnams kyi nor dang ldan 
[\[41a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'phags pa'i rigs rnams kyis mchog 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/gso sla zhing dgang sla bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag pha rol tu mchi ba'i slad du dbugs 'byin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ma rgal ba rnams sgrol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ma grol ba rnams grol 
[\[41a.4\]]bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dbugs 'byin pa ma mchis pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag lam ston par 'gyur ro/_/de dag mya ngan las 'das pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[41a.5\]]dag sman thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du sman pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de dag nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i slad du sman lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag mthus spro ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gzhan 
[\[41a.6\]]gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i slad du rtsal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'jigs pas spu ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du seng ge lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag cang shes pa'i slad du ba lang lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems rab tu dul ba'i slad du glang po cher 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'khor mang 
[\[41a.7\]]po yongs su sdud pa'i slad du khyu mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de dag bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams rab tu bcom pa'i slad du dpa' bor 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'khor gyis 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du brtan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i slad du mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dag bden pa bstan pa rnams la 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rgyas pa'i slad du zla ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag shes rab kyi snang bar bgyid pas nyi ma lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag mun pa chen po dang bral ba'i slad du sgron ma lta bur 
[\[41b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag mdza' ba dang khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhi rten lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i slad du sa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i slad du rlung dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag nyon mongs 
[\[41b.3\]]pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba'i slad du chu dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag rlom sems thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'i slad du me dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag bskyod mi nus pa'i slad du ri rab dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan zhing mi phyed 
[\[41b.4\]]pa'i slad du rdo rje ltar sra ba'i khor yug gi ri lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gdul dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos rin po che thams cad 'du ba'i slad du rgya mtsho 
[\[41b.5\]]lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de dag nyon mongs pa thams cad bas pa'i slad du gting dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos yongs su tshol bas chog mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/de dag shes rab kyis ngoms par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bas rgyal po dang mtshungs par 
[\[41b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag gzugs 'dzin pa'i slad du brgya byin dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dbang sgyur ba'i slad du tshangs pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos mngon par sgrog pa'i slad du sprin dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag bdud rtsi'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i slad du char dang 'dra bar 
[\[41b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'phel bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]de dag blos mnyam pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thos pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gzhal ba las 'das pa'i slad du mtshungs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de dag spobs pas thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gzungs 
[\[42a.2\]]rab tu thob pa'i slad du dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag don rtogs pa'i slad du 'brang bas rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa'i slad du blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la mkhas par 
[\[42a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag 'jig rten la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'jig rten las 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag pad mo lta bur mi chags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis yongs su ma zin par 'gyur ro/_/de dag mkhas pa rnams 
[\[42a.4\]]dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag mang du thos pa rnams kyis cher bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag rig pa rnams kyis ri mo bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'jig rten rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'phags pa rnams 
[\[42a.5\]]kyis bkur sti bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis smon par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de dag nyi tsher spyod pa la re ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du tshul mi 'chos par 'gyur ro/_/de dag spyod lam mdzes par 'gyur 
[\[42a.6\]]ro/_/de dag gzugs blta na sdug par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gzi brjid kyis yid chags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag mtshan rnams kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rnam par spras par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin par 
[\[42a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag chos kyi rigs yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag dge 'dun gyi rigs kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs so/_/de dag gis chos kyi spyan rab tu thob bo/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]de dag gi bzod pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bgyis so/_/de dag byang chub kyi snying po yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas so/_/de dag gis bdud kyi sde rab tu bcom mo/_/de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/_/de dag chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 
[\[42b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi tshul zab mo 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang shin tu dngang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byang chub 'di ltar zab pa/_'di ltar shes dka' ba/_
[\[42b.3\]]'di ltar blta dka' ba/_'di ltar khong du chud par dka' ba 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan la yang rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_chos 'di la rab tu zhugs shing gzhan yang nan tan la 'god par 
[\[42b.4\]]bgyid pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi bsngags pa bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par brjod cing yon tan yongs su bsgrags kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan mthar mi phyin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa 
[\[42b.5\]]khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag gi bsngags pa'am yon tan ji tsam du shes/_tshangs pas gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas zag pa ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ji snyed pa mkhyen pa dang /_de dag gi yon tan de dag dang de las lhag par yang 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_
[\[42b.6\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge zab mo rnams rtogs par rig pa dang /_ldem po ngag 'tshal ba dang /_'thun par bgyid cing 'gal bar mi bgyid pa dang /_yang dag par sbyor zhing sun 'byin par mi bgyid pa dang /_don rtogs par rig cing yi 
[\[42b.7\]]ge'i phyir mi snyegs pa de dag ni brjod pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos gsung ba dang /_ldem po ngag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa chos gsung ba dang /_thabs gang dang /_tshul gang dang /_snying rje chen po gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par nges pa'i tshig brjod pa 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rab tu 'tshal to/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga'i sbyor ba 'di shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[43a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga'i sbyor ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos smra ba dang /_ldem po ngag tu smra ba bstan pa dang /_thabs kyi chos la mos par byed pa dang /_tshul nye bar bstan pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i rjes su 
[\[43a.3\]]'jug pa ste/_tshangs pa 'di dag ni gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga'i sbyor ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gsung ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnams gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[43a.4\]]stsal pa/_tshangs pa 'das pa smra ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa smra ba dang /_da ltar byung ba smra ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa smra ba dang /_rnam par byang ba smra ba dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba smra ba dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa smra ba dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang 
[\[43a.5\]]zag pa med par smra ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa smra ba dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas smra ba dang /_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag smra ba dang /_thob pa mngon du byed pa smra ba dang /_'khor 
[\[43a.6\]]ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa smra ba ste/_tshangs pa smra ba de dag kyang yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis smra ba sgyu ma lta bur blta'o/_/med par mthong ba'i tshul gyis smra ba rmi lam lta bur blta'o/_/nam mkha'i sgra skad kyi tshul gyis smra ba brag ca lta bur blta'o/_/rkyen 'dus pa'i tshul 
[\[43a.7\]]gyis smra ba mig yor lta bur blta'o/_/rgyu mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis smra ba gzugs brnyan lta bur blta'o/_/phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i tshul gyis smra ba smig rgyu lta bur blta'o/_/mi 'byung mi 'jig pa'i tshul gyis smra ba nam mkha' lta bur blta'o/_/brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis smra 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]ba smrar med par blta'o/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang chos smra ba 'di shes na byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni smra ba thams cad smra yang chos gang la yang mngon par mi chags so/_/de mngon par ma chags pas ye shes thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa gang gis bskal 
[\[43b.2\]]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du chos bshad kyang rgyun mi chad pa dang /_smra ba thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad par smra ba dang /_chos rnams kyi tha mi dad pa la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob po/_/tshangs pa de bzhin 
[\[43b.3\]]gshegs pas de ltar gsungs pas chos rnams brjod do/_/tshangs pa de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag la mkhas pa khong du chud ce na/_tshangs pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa yang rnam par byang bar ston/_
