[\[64b.1\]]gang sha'i spyan dang /_lha'i spyan dang /_shes rab kyi spyan dang /_chos kyi spyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan la'ang mngon par ma chags pa des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sus chos mthong /_smras pa/_gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 
[\[64b.2\]]mthong zhing 'gal bar mi byed pa rnams kyis so/_/smras pa/_sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams mthong /_smras pa/_gang mnyam pa nyid mi skyed cing 'gal bar mi byed pas so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal su dag mngon par shes pa thob/_smras pa/_gang zag 
[\[64b.3\]]pa mi skyed cing mi 'gog pa rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa la slob/_smras pa/_gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_myong bar mi byed pa dang /_mi skyed pa dang /_so sor mi spong ba rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal su 
[\[64b.4\]]yang dag par zhugs/_smras pa/_gang khams gsum pa la ma zhugs pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang shin tu dul ba yin/_smras pa/_gang yang srid pa mi len pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang bde bar gyur pa yin/_smras pa/_gang nga yir bya ba 
[\[64b.5\]]med pa rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal su dag grol ba yin/_smras pa/_gang dmigs par 'khrug par mi byed pa rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal su dag rgal ba yin/_smras pa/_gang 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams so/_/
[\[64b.6\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal zag pa zad pa'i dge slong ci zad/_smras pa/_tshangs pa gal te zad par gyur na ni zag pa zad par mi 'gyur te/_zag pa de dag ni skad cig pa yin pa des de dag de bzhin du shes pas na de'i phyir zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[64b.7\]]dpal su dag bden par smra ba yin/_smras pa/_gang rtsod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal su lam du zhugs pa yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lam du zhugs pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal su lam ma 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]yin par zhugs pa yin/_smras pa/_gang gis chos thams cad gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa dang /_gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa'i 'phags pa rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal bden pa mthong ba gang yin/_smras pa/_chos gang yang mi mthong 
[\[65a.2\]]ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji tsam du mthong ba de tsam du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te/_mthong ba med pa ni bden pa mthong ba'o/_/smras pa/_gang mthong bas bden pa mthong /_smras pa/_lta bar gyur pa thams cad ma mthong bas bden pa mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_de gang du btsal bar bya/_
[\[65a.3\]]smras pa/_phyin ci log bzhi dag las bden pa btsal bar bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci la bsams te de skad ston/_smras pa/_phyin ci log bzhi tshol ba gang yin pa de la rtag pa yang med/_bde ba yang med/_bdag kyang med/_gtsang ba yang med de/_gang la rtag 
[\[65a.4\]]pa med pa de ni mi rtag pa'o/_/gang la bde ba med pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang la bdag med pa de ni bdag yod pa'o/_/gang la gtsang ba med pa de ni mi gtsang ba'o/_/tshangs pa chos thams cad la bdag med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa tshol ba ste/_gang bden pa 
[\[65a.5\]]tshol ba 'di ni sdug bsngal yongs su mi shes pa nas lam gyi bar du mi sgom pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na lam sgom pa yin/_smras pa/_sgom pa na ji ltar dngos por yang mi ltung /_dngos po med pa yang mi ltung zhing chos gang yang dngos por yang mi ltung ngo /_/dngos 
[\[65a.6\]]po med pa yang mi byed de/_tshangs pa gnyis dang bral ba ni lam mo/_/lam gang gis btsal bas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa 'di ni lam mo/_/lam gang gang du yang phrad par mi byed de/_'dor ba yang mi byed cing 'khor ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa'o/_/
[\[65a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phrad par byed pa yang med/_'dor ba'ang med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi lam mo/_/de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pa zhes bya bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ji ltar na dge 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bsnyen sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin/_ci ltar na chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_ji ltar na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu nam dge bsnyen lta ba gnyis nye bar mi len pa ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_bdag tu lta ba mi len/_pha 
[\[65b.2\]]rol tu lta ba mi len/_bdag tu lta ba mi len/_sangs rgyas su lta ba mi len/_bdag tu lta ba mi len/_chos su lta ba mi len/_bdag tu lta ba mi len/_dge 'dun du lta ba mi len pa de tsam gyis dge bsnyen sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba 
[\[65b.3\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nam dge bsnyen de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs su khas mi len/_tshor bar ma yin/_'du shes su ma yin/_'du byed du ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes par yang khas mi len na de ltar na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song 
[\[65b.4\]]ba yin no/_/nam chos gang la yang rnam par mi rtog cing sgro mi 'dogs na/_de ltar na chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/nam dge 'dun 'dus ma byas su'ang mos la/_'dus byas las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas su mos par yang mi byed na/_de ltar na dge 'dun la skyabs 
[\[65b.5\]]su song ba yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nam dge bsnyen/_sangs rgyas su'ang mi dmigs/_chos su'ang mi dmigs/_dge 'dun du yang mi dmigs na de ltar na sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/mnyam par gnas pas 
[\[65b.6\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag byang chub tu rab tu zhugs pa de dag gang du rab tu zhugs pa yin/_smras pa/_bla gab med pa la rab tu zhugs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni bla gab med pa dang mtshungs so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na 
[\[65b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu rab tu zhugs pa zhes brjod par bya/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa thams cad rab tu 'jug pa ma yin par rab tu shes pa dang /_chos thams cad chos ma yin par rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]thams cad sems can ma yin par rab tu shes pa ste/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pas 'di 
[\[66a.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' log par nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed cing yang dag 
[\[66a.3\]]par nges pa'i sems can rnams la lhag par gus pa mi skyed pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni nges pa dang ma nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi/_gzhan 
[\[66a.4\]]du na log par nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' log par nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje bar byas nas byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te de'i phyir 
[\[66a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub ces bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba bdag kyang spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[66a.6\]]byang chub khyod spobs par gyis shig_/byang chub kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_skyes pa'am/_bud med ji lta bur bstan pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la ma ral ma zhig par nye bar gnas na de yan lag brgyad kyi gso sbyin yang dag par 
[\[66a.7\]]blangs pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du byang chub kyi sems las ma g.yos pa lags te/_de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas sems can la mi dmigs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa lags te/_de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[66b.2\]]sems can sgrol gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gru'am zam pa ni sems can rgal ba la skyo ba ma mchis shing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang la sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i slad du de lta bu'i 
[\[66b.3\]]sems mchis pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngan song sel gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sug pa bzhag ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_
[\[66b.4\]]de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang mthong ba tsam gyis sems can byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang /_ming thos pas kyang 'jigs pa 
[\[66b.5\]]thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gom pa 'dor zhing mchi ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten 
[\[66b.6\]]gyi khams kyi bdud kyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur te/_de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mi skyo bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nyin zhag gcig tu 'gyur la/_
[\[66b.7\]]de nyin zhag tu bgrang ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la zla ba phyed/_zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig pa'i lo bye ba brgya stong la sangs rgyas gcig byung nas mnyes par byed de/_rnam grangs 'di lta bus gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]zhing na tshangs pa spyod pa spyad nas phyis lung bstan kyang yongs su mi skyo ba ste/_de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang lam ngan par zhugs 
[\[67a.2\]]pa'i sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la lam bzang po la dgod pa'i slad du snying rje chen po bskyed cing de la lan re ba ma mchis pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri rab chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[67a.3\]]chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad ri rab dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog par rab tu 'tshal ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo ches gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[67a.4\]]cad kyis mi chom pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems kyi chos thams cad la sems kyang de la ma rmas shing ma nyams pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems 
[\[67a.5\]]dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'gros su 'gro bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos zab mo la bzod cing mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/_pha rol gyi mu stegs can thams cad skrag par bgyid pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems 
[\[67a.6\]]dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sems las bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug cing mi sems rnam par mi sems pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 
[\[67a.7\]]gsol pa/_gang lha'i gnas thams cad du yang skye la ci la'ang chags par mi bgyid/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang khong du chud par mi bgyid pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra bas gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gi ngag bden pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rmi lam na yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi smra ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' bas gsol pa/_gang gzugs thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[67b.2\]]gzugs su mthong ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu snying brtse bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor bar zhugs pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams mthong nas chos la dga' ba ma 
[\[67b.3\]]gtogs pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba ma gtogs par dga' ba thams cad la dga' bar mi bgyid pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[67b.4\]]dpa' gang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_bdud thams cad la yang thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dga' dgod dbang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[67b.5\]]gang rtag tu dgod pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po dag gis bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs shing bgyi ba bgyis pa/_bgyid par bgyis pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/sring mo yid gnyis rnam par 'joms mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[67b.6\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad la yid gnyis ma mchis shing the tsom ma mchis pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/gzhon nu ma seng ges gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la bud med kyi chos kyang ma mchis/_skyes pa'i chos kyang 
[\[67b.7\]]ma mchis la sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du gzugs sna tshogs kyang ston pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/bu mo rin chen gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rin po che 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]ma gtogs pa'i rin po che gzhan la dga' ba mi skyed pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/dge bsnyen sa gas byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa can la ni byang chub ma mchis te/_gang chos thams cad la mi dmigs 
[\[68a.2\]]pa dang /_mi skyed mi 'gog pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag bzang skyong gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gi ming tsam bzung bas sems can byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[68a.3\]]zhes bgyi'o/_/gzhon nur gyur pa rin chen zla bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzhon nu'i tshangs pa spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'dod pa la rtog pas kyang yongs su mi spyod na/_gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis mjal ba lta ci smos te/_
[\[68a.4\]]de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/lha'i bu man dA ra ba'i dris gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang tshul khrims kyi dris yongs su bsgos pas gang tshul khrims kyi dri las dri gzhan gyi ngad mi ldang ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems 
[\[68a.5\]]dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_chos gsum gyis 
[\[68a.6\]]dga' ba bgyid pa de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lags pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so zhes snang bar 'gyur ba de ni de'i slad du byang 
[\[68a.7\]]chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang mthong ma thag tu sems can dag byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos ston pa thams cad kyang ston la chos su 'du shes pa yang ma mchis/_chos ma lags par 'du shes pa yang ma mchis/_bdag tu 'du shes pa yang ma mchis/_pha rol tu 'du shes pa yang 
[\[68b.2\]]mi bgyid de/_de ni de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gi 'od kyis sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa de ni de'i slad du byang 
[\[68b.3\]]chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu me tog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis me tog rgyas pa lta bur mthong ba de ni de'i 
[\[68b.4\]]slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi spobs pa rnam par bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' gang sdug 
[\[68b.5\]]bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad thar bar bya bar spro zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la gtong ba de ni de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs 
[\[68b.6\]]kyi bu khyod gnas pa ci lta bur gnas par byed/_smras pa/_gnas pa gang gis 'dus byas thams cad la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad gnas pa'o/_/smras pa/_gang gnas pa ni 'dus byas thams cad la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad gnas pa gang gis gnas smras 
[\[68b.7\]]pa/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas pa gang gis gnas pa'o/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas pa gang gis gnas pa mdzad/_smras pa/_don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la gnas pas so/_/smras pa/_gal te rigs kyi bu gnas pa 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]gang gis byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad gnas pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas par mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la khyad par du 'phags pa ci zhig yod/_smras pa/_tshangs pa de stong pa nyid la khyad par yod par 'dod dam/_smras pa/_
[\[69a.2\]]'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad stong pa zhes bshad dam smras pa/_de de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de'i phyir chos thams cad bye brag med de/_de dag gis gnas pa yang de'i mtshan nyid do/_/tshangs 
[\[69a.3\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos tha dad du mi 'dogs so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gnas pa gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnas pa de gang yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa gang la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yod pa de ni gnas zhes bya ste/_gang tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral ba de ni 
[\[69a.4\]]gnas la gnas pa ma yin no/_/gnas gang la gnas pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de dag ni gnas la gnas pa'o/_/tshangs pa dgon pa'am bla gab med pa na gnas kyang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral na de gnas la gnas pa ma yin no/_/gnas 
[\[69a.5\]]pa la mkhas pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de ste yang thog dang khang bu brtsegs par gser gyi khri la gding ba dang /_dgab pa bshams pa'i gnas na gnas kyang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ldan na de dag gnas la gnas shing gnas la mkhas pa yin no/_/smras pa/_gnas pa gang 
[\[69a.6\]]gis gnas na ye shes mthong bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_gnas pa gang gis gnas na bdag mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur pa'o/_/smras pa/_ci 'jam dpal gang bdag mthong ba de ye shes mthong ba'am/_smras pa/_tshangs pa de de bzhin te/_gang bdag mthong ba de ye shes 
[\[69a.7\]]mthong ngo /_/tshangs pa 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu gser lta mkhas pa ni ngan pa lta shes pas bzang po lta shes pa la nges par 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du bdag mthong bas ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag mthong ba gang yin/_smras pa/_
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gang bdag med pa'i chos nyid de/_tshangs pa bdag ni shin tu dngos po med pa/_ma grub pa gang de ltar mgo gcig tu gyur pa de ni bdag mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ji ltar bshad pa'i don des shes te bdag mthong bas sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[69b.2\]]zhe na/_bdag gis ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /_smras pa/_gang bdag tu lta ba 'khrug par mi byed pas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag tu lta ba ni chos su lta 
[\[69b.3\]]ba ste/_chos mthong bas/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis gang ma zhugs pa de dag yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba yod dam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa gang 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad la yang ma zhugs pa de yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[69b.4\]]yin no/_/smras pa/_ji lta bu la zhugs na yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_gang spong ba'i phyir yang ma yin/_mngon du bya ba'i phyir yang ma yin pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[69b.5\]]ma mthong la 'phags pa shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyangs par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa gang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su mi lta ba de dag gi 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal shes rab kyi mig 
[\[69b.6\]]gis ci mthong /_smras pa/_tshangs pa gal te chos gang yang mthong bar gyur na shes rab kyi mig ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa shes rab kyi mig ni 'dus byas kyang mi mthong /_'dus ma byas kyang mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_
[\[69b.7\]]de ni 'dus byas mthong bar rung ba ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas kyang mig gi lam las 'das pas de yang mi mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa yang dag par sbyor 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ba la 'bras bu thob pa med pa yang yod do/_/yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni gang la yang mi sbyor ba'o/_/de la 'bras bu thob par rnam par rtog pa yang med de/_tshangs pa 'thob pa med pa las 'thob par lta'o/_/gang 'thob pa de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o/_/
[\[70a.2\]]yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang med/_thob pa yang med/_mngon par rtogs pa yang med do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal chos gang dag mngon du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir khong du chud pa zhes bstan/_smras pa/_tshangs pa chos 
[\[70a.3\]]gang ma skyes/_ma bskyed/_skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i chos de dag mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir khong du chud pa'o zhes bstan to/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ma skyes pa'i chos la mngon par rtogs pa gang yin/_smras pa/_gang mi skye ba 'di nyid mngon par rtogs pa yin te/_de'i 
[\[70a.4\]]phyir 'dus byas thams cad ma skyes par mthong zhing yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba de gang la bya/_smras pa/_bdag dang mya ngan las 'das pa mtshungs te/_'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar 
[\[70a.5\]]med de/_de bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa nyid du zhugs pas na de'i phyir yang dag par nges pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid la nges par byung bas na de'i phyir yang dag par nges pa zhes bya'o/_/nges pa'i don la don 'dren pas na de'i phyir 
[\[70a.6\]]yang dag par nges pa zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir de ni yang dag par nges pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras te/_
[\[70a.7\]]ji ltar ston pa de de bzhin no/_/khyod kyi bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong bdun stong len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis chos rnams la mig rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig skyes so/_/srog chags stong 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]phrag bcu 'dod chags dang bral ba thob bo/_/srog chags nyis brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad 
[\[70b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi bgyi ba bgyis so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_tshangs pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba gang la yang phan pa'am gnod par nye bar mi gnas so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[70b.3\]]tshad med pa'i sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_khyod kyang tshad med pa'i sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin nam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa sems can med pa la sems can du rab tu 'byed par 'dod dam/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshangs 
[\[70b.4\]]pa sems can med pa la sems can du bstan pa'am/_sems can med pa la sems can yongs su grub par 'dod dam/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'am 'gag par 'dod dam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[70b.5\]]pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can de dag gang yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa gang gis ston pa ltar na 'di la 'khor ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med do/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de de bzhin te/_de bzhin 
[\[70b.6\]]gshegs pas 'khor ba yang ma dmigs/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma dmigs so/_/tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang nyan thos btul ba de dag gis kyang 'khor ba yang ma dmigs/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma dmigs so/_/tshangs pa yongs su mya ngan 
[\[70b.7\]]las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'di ni btags pa'i tshig tha snyad tsam ste/_'di la gang yang 'khor ba yang med/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang med do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di la su dag dad par 'gyur/_smras pa/_chos gang la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal mngon par chags pa zhes bya ba de ci la mngon par chags/_smras pa/_tshangs pa mngon par chags pa zhes bya ba ni med pa la mngon par chags so/_/gal te tshangs pa yod pa la mngon par chags par gyur na 'di ltar shin tu 
[\[71a.2\]]mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bral bar gyur pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar med pa la mngon par chags pa ste/_de bas na med pa'o zhes rtogs nas mngon par chags par mi byed de/_gang mngon par chags pa mi byed pa de mi 'khor ro/_/gang mi 'khor ba de rnam par mi 'gro ba'o/_/gang rnam 
[\[71a.3\]]par mi 'gro ba de mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ci'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_tshangs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni phan tshun rkyen la sgro mi 'dogs pa'i 
[\[71a.4\]]phyir ro/_/ma rig pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_'du byed mi 'jug pas kyang nye bar mi sbyor te/_gang nye bar mi sbyor ba de ni kun nas mi slong ngo /_/gang kun nas mi slong ba de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/kun nas mi slong bar spyod pa ni shin tu 'gog pa'o/_/
[\[71a.5\]]de'i lam mngon par rtogs pa ni shin tu mi skye ba yin te/_'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis bstan pa thams 
[\[71a.6\]]cad ni yang dag par bstan pa'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu tshig thams cad ni yang dag pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig yod pa ma yin pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa'am/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de yang yang dag pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[71a.7\]]zhe na/_'di ltar ngag thams cad ni dbang du gyur pa ste/_yul la gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/phyogs na gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/gang dbang du gyur cing yul la'ang mi gnas/_phyogs la'ang mi gnas pa de ni med pa'i phyir yang dag pa ste/_de'i phyir tshig thams cad kyang yang 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang yang lha sbyin gyis tshig smras pa dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pas tshig smras pa tshig de gnyis tha dad pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshig thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig ste/_tshig thams cad ni de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba'o/_/gang tshig 
[\[71b.2\]]gi rnam par rig par byas pa ste thams cad ni rnam par rig pa med pas rnam par rig par byas pa ste/_de bas na tshig thams cad yi ge mnyam pa'i phyir/_yi ge mtshungs pa'i phyir/_yi ge stong pa'i phyir tshig thams cad ni mtshungs pa'o/_/mnyam par gnas pas smras pa/_
[\[71b.3\]]'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i tha snyad du 'dogs pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad du 'dogs pa zhes ma gsungs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yi ge gang dag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i yi ge de dag nyid kyis 'phags pa 
[\[71b.4\]]ma yin pa rnams kyang tha snyad du 'dogs so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_ci yi ge de dag 'phags pa 'am 'phags pa ma yin pa zhes rtog gam/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_ji ltar yi ge de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du 'phags 
[\[71b.5\]]pa rnams ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/de dag la tha snyad med de/_'phags pa rnams ni yi ger 'du shes pas tha snyad du mi 'dogs so/_/chos su 'du shes pa ma yin/_chos ma yin par 'du shes pas ma yin/_bdag tu 'du shes pas ma yin/_
[\[71b.6\]]pha rol tu 'du shes pas ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sil snyan dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_dung dag ni rkyen gyis sgra 'byung yang de dag rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du 'phags pa rnams rkyen kun 'byung ba mthong ba'i phyir tha snyad du 'dogs pas chags par mi byed/_mngon par 
[\[71b.7\]]chags par mi byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dge slong dag 'dus te 'khod pas bya ba gnyis yod de/_chos kyi gtam bya ba dang /_'phags pa 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mi smra bar gyur pas gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs na/_de la 'jam dpal chos kyi gtam ni gang /_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa ni gang /_smras pa/_gtam gang gis sangs rgyas 'khrug par mi byed/_chos 'khrug par mi byed/_dge 'dun 'khrug par mi byed pa 
[\[72a.2\]]'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mos pa dang /_chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mos pa dang /_dge 'dun la 'dus ma byas su mos pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtsams te gtam 
[\[72a.3\]]brjod pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/yang chos thams cad la mi dran zhing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/gang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la brtsams te gtam brjod pa ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/gang mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshungs par yang mi byed/_mi mtshungs 
[\[72a.4\]]par yang mi byed pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar 'gyur ro/_/gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la brtsams te gtam brjod pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/gang lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi brtson par mi byed pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gang dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga 
[\[72a.5\]]la brtsams te gtam brjod pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/gang su la yang dad pas chos gang la yang dad par yang mi byed cing chos thams cad la yang blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/dran pa dang rtse gcig pa dang /_
[\[72a.6\]]rlom sems med pa la gnas shing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag par mos pa dang /_spros pa'i gnas thams cad la mi rten pa'i rkyen du gyur pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/gang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la brtsams te gtam brjod pa 'di ni chos kyi 
[\[72a.7\]]gtam mo/_/gang btang snyoms pas sgro btags pa med pa 'thob cing bsal ba yang med/_bzhag pa yang med par gnas pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las brtsams te gtam rjod par byed pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/gang 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]gzings lta bur rtogs nas chos la yang mi rten/_chos ma yin pa la yang mi rten par gnas pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos 'di dag smra ba dang /_'chad pa dang /_ston pa dang /_'dogs pa dang /_
[\[72b.2\]]'jug par byed pa dang /_'grel ba dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed cing yang dag par ji lta bur ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/gang 'di ltar chos kyis mngon sum du gyur la lus las logs shig na'ang chos mi mthong /_chos las logs shig na'ang 
[\[72b.3\]]lus mi mthong ngo /_/ji nas gnyis su yang mi mthong /_gnyis su med par yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ste/_de ltar mthong na mngon sum du ye shes mthong ba yang mi mthong ste/_gang mi mthong ba 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu gang bdag tu sgro 
[\[72b.4\]]'dogs pa dang /_pha rol tu sgro 'dogs pa dang /_chos su sgro 'dogs pa dang /_chos ma yin pa sgro 'dogs pas gtam mi brjod pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam mo/_/gang brjod du med pa'i chos nyid thob pas yi ge dang /_skad dang /_sgra dang /_dbyangs thams cad dang bral ba mi g.yo ba thob pa 
[\[72b.5\]]dben pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems kyis nye bar bsgrub pa la gnas pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang su dag sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas/_gtam brjod pa de dag ni chos kyi gtam brjod pa'o/_/gang la la mnyam 
[\[72b.6\]]par ma bzhag cing ma g.yengs pa de dag ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa la gnas pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar 
[\[72b.7\]]na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la chos kyi gtam dang /_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin par shes pa la mkhas pa yang med/_rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yang ma yin no/_/'jam dpal su dag 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]chos smra ba yin/_su dag 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa la gnas pa yin zhes gang yang dag par smra bas smra na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad 
[\[73a.2\]]kyi dbang po la mkhas shing rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu mnyam par gnas pas ji ltar bshad pa de de bzhin te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs so/_/de nas 
[\[73a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du bzung ste/_dge slong 'dus te 'khod pa rnams kyis bya ba gnyis yod de/_chos kyi gtam brjod par bya/_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa la 
[\[73a.4\]]gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gnas 'di la nyan thos rnams mi nus na de ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la chos kyi gtam brjod cig_/yang na 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pas gnas par byos shig ces don 'di nye bar bstan/_bcom ldan 
[\[73a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/_nyan thos rnams ma thos par chos kyi gtam brjod dam/_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa rtse gcig pas gnas sam/_gsol pa/_de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis 
[\[73a.6\]]'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la chos kyi gtam yang med/_'phags pa mi smra ba'ang med par rig par bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab 'byor sems can rnams kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang 
[\[73a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa de dag gnas brtan gyis shes sam gang dag la de lta bu'i gtam brjod par bya ba de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i gtam bstan par bya ba de la gnas brtan gyi ye shes 'jug gam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gnas 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]brtan rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la lta zhing /_bdag gi sems dang pha rol gyi sems su sgrib par mi 'gyur ba sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog gam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de 
[\[73b.2\]]ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong so so ci rigs su sman pa ston pas chos kyi gtam brjod do/_/ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang 
[\[73b.3\]]rab tu mkhyen te/_btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar 'di la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor sems can 'dod chags spyod pa gang dag sdug pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis rnam par 'grol zhing mi sdug pa'i rnam 
[\[73b.4\]]pas rnam par mi 'grol ba'ang yod de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can zhe sdang la spyod pa gang skyon mthong bas rnam par grol bar 'gyur la byams pas rnam par 'grol bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu 
[\[73b.5\]]mkhyen to/_/sems can gti mug spyod pa gang dag smad pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur la/_chos bstan pas rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can cha mnyam par spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pas kyang rnam par mi 
[\[73b.6\]]'grol/_mi sdug pa'i rnam pas kyang mi 'grol/_byams pas kyang mi 'grol/_skyon gyis kyang mi 'grol/_chos bstan pas kyang mi 'grol/_smad pas kyang rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de/_de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ci nas mnyam pa nyid kyis dbang po'i khams 
[\[73b.7\]]las rnam par grol ba de lta de lta bur chos ston te/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos smra ba'i mchog yin pa dang /_bsam gtan pa'i mchog yin pa dang /_mi smra bar gyur pa la dga' ba'i 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]mchog yin par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gal te nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos brjod par mi nus/_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa la gnas 
[\[74a.2\]]par mi nus na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang la la yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang ji ltar chos kyi gtam rjod par byed cing /_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa la gnas pa yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mngon du bzhugs pa 
[\[74a.3\]]mkhyen na de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen gyis 'di la zhus shig_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa g.yeng ba med pa'i sems zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_byang 
[\[74a.4\]]chub sems dpa' gang dag gis ting nge 'dzin de thob pa de dag thams cad yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu gang spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_chos 
[\[74a.5\]]kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan pa 'di ni chos kyi gtam zhes bya'o/_/gang 'du shes dang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang chos kyi gtam dang 'phags 
[\[74a.6\]]pa mi smra bar gyur pa la brtsams te lung bstan kyang nga'i spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba bskal pa grangs med pa bas ches 
[\[74a.7\]]grangs med pa/_rgya che ba tshad med pa nas bskal pa snyan pa rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mthong na dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu 'od zer zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten rig pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[74b.2\]]mthong na dga' ba rin po che thams cad rab tu bkram pa/_'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba shin tu lo legs pa nyams dga' ba/_lha dang mis kun tu gang bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de spos thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas/_reg na shing bal ltar 'jam pa/_gos 
[\[74b.3\]]ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/_rin po che sna bdun gyis mnyam par brgyan par gyur to/_/mthong na dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag bzhi yod de/_re re la yang gling chen po dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/grong khyer chen po de dag thams cad kyang rin 
[\[74b.4\]]po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du byas pa yin te/_grong khyer chen po re re na yang grong dang /_ri khrod pa dang /_yul 'khor dang /_grong rdal lnga brgyas bskor bar gyur to/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs thams cad na yang srog chags mang po brgya 
[\[74b.5\]]stong gnas te/_mi de dag gi mig sngar ci snang ba de dag thams cad kyang sdug cing yid du 'ong ba snang ste/_yid du mi 'ong ba mi snang ngo /_/mi de dag kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong na dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/sangs 
[\[74b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams der 'ongs pa de dag kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams mthong na dga' ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan la de tsam du dga' bar mi 'dzin to/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer de theg pa gsum la brtsams 
[\[74b.7\]]te sems can rnams la chos ston te/_phal cher ni rigs kyi bu khyed 'di ltar gnas pa gnyis kyis gnas par byos shig_/chos kyi gtam brjod cig_/yang na 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa nye bar zhi ba la gnas par byos shig ces rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston to//_//
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bam po lnga pa/_rigs kyi bu yang de'i tshe steng gi phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang /_khyad par blo gros gnyis 'ongs nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od zer de bzhin gshegs 
[\[75a.2\]]pa ga la ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa des snang ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/ci'i phyir snang 
[\[75a.3\]]ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin de thob pa de mtshan ma dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir snang ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/chos thams 
[\[75a.4\]]cad sngon gyi mtha' nas yongs su dag pa'o/_/chos thams cad phyi ma'i mtha' nas yongs su dag pa'o/_/chos thams cad da ltar byung ba'i mtha' nas yongs su dag pa ste/_'di ni dus gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang yongs su dag pa 'di ni nam du yang yongs su 
[\[75a.5\]]ma dag par mi 'gyur te/_yongs su dag pa gang gis rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa 'di ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/_de'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de gang zhe na/_chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang 
[\[75a.6\]]bzhin can te dmigs pa dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin can te rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin can te/_blang ba med pa/_dor ba med pa/_bsam pa med pa/_nus pa med pa shin tu ngo 
[\[75a.7\]]bo nyid dang bral ba yin te/_de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/_de'i phyir sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' bla gab med pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yang kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/rigs 
[\[75b.2\]]kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la sprin gyi phung po'am/_du ba'am/_rdul dag byung ste/_des nam mkha' mi mdzes shing lham me lhang nger mi 'gyur mod kyi de dag gis nam mkha'i rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te nam mkha' kun nas nyon mongs su 
[\[75b.3\]]zin na shin tu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bas na de'i phyir nam mkha' zhes rab tu dbye'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skyed mod kyi de dag 
[\[75b.4\]]gis sems kyi rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur na ni shin tu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bas na de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bas rnam par grol lo/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[75b.5\]]'di ni snang ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'o/_/zhes de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis la rab tu bstan to/_/de gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin de thos nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la chos kyi snang ba thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75b.6\]]kun tu 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'jug pa ni thos na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnas gang gis gnas par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[75b.7\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das des rigs kyi bu de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la khyod chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston cig_/yang na 'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa la gnas par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba thos te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas skyed mos tshal zhig gang na yod pa der song ste/_der phyin nas rang gis sprul pa'i khang bu brtsegs 
[\[76a.2\]]pa'i nang du 'dug go/_/de gnyis de ni 'dug pa der tshangs pa chen po 'od zer bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan 
[\[76a.3\]]gsum bskor ba byas te byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad du 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyis bya ba gnyis yod de/_chos kyi gtam bstan par bya'o/_/yang na 'phags 
[\[76a.4\]]pa mi smra bar gyur pas gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs na/_de la chos kyi gtam ni gang yin/_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa ni gang yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis tshangs pa 'od zer bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa de'i phyir dri 
[\[76a.5\]]ba lung bstan pa 'di las cung zad cig bshad kyis nyon cig dang /_'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon sum ste pha rol gyi mchog brnyes so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis 'khor de'i nang na 'di lta ste/_chos kyi gtam dang /_'phags pa mi smra 
[\[76a.6\]]bar gyur pa la brtsams nas don gyi tshig 'di nyid rgyas par bstan te/_de'i tshe tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis po de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/tshangs pa 'od zer bzang pos kyang ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba mngon du gyur te rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar 
[\[76a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa de gnyis dris pa gnyis po 'di lta ste chos kyi gtam dang /_'phags pa mi smra bar gyur pa yang dag par ston cing 'dug ste/_de gnyis kyis lo stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gi bar du don gyi tshig 'di gnyis gtan la 'bebs shing 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]lan ldon par gyur te/_gcig gi yang mthar ma phyin/_gnyis po'i yang mthar ma phyin to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs nas de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu mchog go/_/smra bas rtsod par ma byed cig_/smra bas rtsod pa ma skyed 
[\[76b.2\]]cig_/smra ba thams cad ni brag ca dang mtshungs te/_sgra ji 'dra ba de bzhin du sgra brnyan yang de bzhin no/_/khyod kyi spobs pa so so'i yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa khong du chud do/_/khyed 'dod na dris pa 'di'i don bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang 
[\[76b.3\]]lan ldon zhing khyed kyi spobs pa'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur mod kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni nye bar zhi ba yin te/_zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/_nye bar zhi ba/_yi ge med pa'i don to/_/don ni brjod du med pa ste/_ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam du don med pa'o/_/don la rton pa yi ge la ma rton 
[\[76b.4\]]cig ces de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa des bskul bar rig nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar 'dod na byang chub sems dpa' dag bskal pa brgya stong ngam/_de las lhag par yang spobs pas bstan pa ston par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[76b.5\]]bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis byung ba gzhan yin par 'dzin pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/mnyam par gnas pa khyod kyang de'i tshe de'i 
[\[76b.6\]]dus na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs pa chen po khyad par sems 'di ni tshangs pa 'od zer bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pas 'di skad ces 
[\[76b.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 'di mngon par brtson pa de bgyid pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni don chen po 'thob par 'gyur te/_mngon par mi brtson pa rnams la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong gis kyang ci zhig bgyi/_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mngon par brtson pa ni byang chub lags so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson pa mngon par brtson pa 
[\[77a.2\]]zhes bya/_smras pa/_byang chub sems dpas ji ltar brtson par byas pas mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba ste 'di ni mngon par brtson pa'o/_/smras pa/_yang ji ltar mngon par brtson pas mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang chos gang la yang rnam par 
[\[77a.3\]]mi rtog na de ltar mngon par brtson pas mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na mngon par rtogs pa mngon par rtogs pa yin/_smras pa/_mnyam pa nyid gang gis chos thams cad mnyam par mthong ba ni de ltar na mngon par rtogs pa mngon par rtogs pa 
[\[77a.4\]]yin no/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid mthong bar rung ngam/_smras pa/_mi rung ngo /_/smras pa/_gal te mi rung na mi mnyam par 'gyur te/_mnyam par mi rung ngo /_/khyad par sems kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal gang mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mi mthong ba 'di ni mngon 
[\[77a.5\]]par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_tshangs pa ci'i phyir mi mthong /_smras pa/_gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir mi mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal mi mthong ba ni yang dag par mthong ba yin no/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa sus 'jig rten gyi mnyam pa nyid mthong /_smras pa/_de 
[\[77a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pas so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar gzigs/_smras pa/_ji ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan du ma mdzad pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan du ma mdzad pa'o/_/'jam dpal phung po lnga'i de bzhin 
[\[77a.7\]]nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa 'di ni 'jig rten la yang dag par gzigs pa'o/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa 'jig rten gang gis rab tu phye smras pa/_zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye'o/_/smras pa/_gal te 'jig rten zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin na tshangs pa ci 'jig 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]rten gyi mtshan nyid de zad par 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'o na nga ji ltar 'jig rten zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal gang shin tu zad pa de ni zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[77b.2\]]na/_gang zad pa de ni zad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas zad pa'i chos can du ma gsungs sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal zad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nam yang zad par mi 'gyur te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus 
[\[77b.3\]]byas zad pa'i chos can no zhes gsungs so/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa gang gis 'dus byas kyi grangs su 'gro/_smras pa/_'jam dpal zad pa'i chos nyid kyis 'dus byas so zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa 'dus byas ci la gnas/_smras pa/_'dus ma 
[\[77b.4\]]byas kyi rang bzhin la gnas so/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la tha dad du bya ba ni tha snyad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tha snyad kyis 'di ni 'dus byas 
[\[77b.5\]]so/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas so zhes bstan to/_/yang 'dus byas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid kyang de yin te/_chos nyid la tha dad du bya ba med do/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa chos nyid ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal chos 
[\[77b.6\]]nyid ces bya ba ni 'dus ma byas dang bye brag med par gyur pa'i chos rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/smras pa/_tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]zhes bya ba'i don ci/_smras pa/_pha rol rnam par rig par bya ba'i ched du bstan pas na 'di ni de'i phyir tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[77b.7\]]thams cad ni lhag par byed pas sgro 'dogs pa yin te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sgro mi 'dogs shing lhag par yang mi mdzad la ston pas na de ni lhag pa'i tshig ces bya'o/_/yang 'jam dpal tshig thams cad tshig ma yin pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni brjod du med pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no/_/smras pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar rab tu dbye/_smras pa/_gzugs su yang ma yin/_mtshan du yang ma yin/_chos nyid du yang rab tu mi dbye'o/_/smras 
[\[78a.2\]]pa/_ji gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos las tha dad du rab tu dbye'am/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de las kyang ma yin/_gzhan las kyang ma yin te/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rab tu dbye'o/_/'di ltar 
[\[78a.3\]]de bzhin nyid kyis rab tu bstan cing chud za bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu dbye'o/_/smras pa/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[78a.4\]]du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par rtogs te/_de phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[78a.5\]]rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/mkhas pa de dag gzugs gzhig phyir/_/byang chub tu ni ma zhugs te/_/gzugs bzhin byang chub de bzhin zhes/_/mkhas pa dag ni de ltar 
[\[78a.6\]]'jug_/de bzhin nyid kyis phye bas na/_/gzugs ltar byang chub de bzhin te/_/mkhas mchog de dag byang chub la/_/yongs su dbye bar mi 'jug go/_/byang chub don ni dbyer med de/_/don la byang chub mi dmigs so/_/don dam 'di la gang brtson pa/_/de dag byang chub nyid la zhugs/_/
[\[78a.7\]]phung po dang ni khams rnams dang /_/skye mched dag la byang chub tshol/_/byang chub de yi rang bzhin te/_/de dag gud na byang chub med/_/chos rnams rab dang tha ma dang /_/bar ma'ang nam zhig mi 'dzin cing /_/gang yang 'dor bar mi byed pa/_/de tshe byang chub yang dag zhugs/_/nam zhig chos dang 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]chos ma yin/_/gnyis su de dag khas mi len/_/gnyis su gyur pa'ang ma yin pa/_/de dag byang chub rab tu zhugs/_/'dus ma byas ni gnyis su med/_/'dus byas dag ni gnyis yod na/_/'di gnyis mtha' ste rnam par spang /_/byang chub spyad pa de dag spyod/_/so so'i skye las rab 
[\[78b.2\]]'das la/_/mi 'gyur ba la'ang mi gnas shing /_/'bras bu'ang ma thob 'phags pa rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten sbyin 'os yin/_/'jig rten chos rnams kun lta zhing /_/'jig rten na yang pad mo bzhin/_/spyod pa mchog la spyod pa ni/_/de dag byang chub zhugs pa yin/_/gang la 
[\[78b.3\]]'jig rten spyod pa der/_/de dag spyod par byed mod kyi/_/gang la 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/_/de la mkhas pa de dag grol/_/de dag 'khor bar nyon mi mongs/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/zhan pa med cing zhum med pa/_/de dag byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/ji bzhin mkhas 
[\[78b.4\]]shing brtag par bgyi/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul yang rtogs/_/de dag chos dang chos min du/_/'di la mkhas pa mi rtog go/_/byang chub spyod pa rab spyod cing /_/de dag chos rnams 'jig mi byed/_/gang yang skyed par mi byed de/_/'di ni byang chub mtshan nyid do/_/chos rnams thams cad 
[\[78b.5\]]mtshan nyid med/_/nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa ste/_/mkhas pa de dag nam du yang /_/mtshan gzhi mtshan gzhi med mi snyam/_/spyod pa mkhas par gyur pa yin/_/thabs kyi pha rol rab song zhing /_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yang /_/mkhas pa dag ni rdzogs par byed/_/rtag tu 
[\[78b.6\]]dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing /_/mngon pa nyid la rab tu gnas/_/chos la rlom sems mi byed pa/_/'di ni nga yi chos yin te/_/sangs rgyas dag ni skyes kyang rung /_/'on te 'dren pa ma skyes kyang /_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa ste/_/de dag chos nyid de mi 'dor/_/chos rnams kun la mngon sum 
[\[78b.7\]]ste/_/chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa/_/de bzhin nyid la rab gnas shing /_/de dag brtan pa shin tu sten/_/bdud kyi zab mo spyod pa yi/_/gting yang rtag tu rig mi 'gyur/_/'di ltar de dag chos rnams la/_/ma lus par ni mi 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rab tshol na/_/yang dag zhugs 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]pa'i spyod yul min/_/ye shes de yang yul gnas dang /_/phyogs la gnas pa mi thob bo/_/sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de/_/chos dang chos la chags mi byed/_/byang chub tu ni gang gzhol ba/_/de bzhin de dag chags mi byed/_/sbyin pas mngon par rtag tu 
[\[79a.2\]]'phags/_/sems dul dul la rab tu dga'/_/de dag ma lus gtong ba na/_/zhen pa'i sems ni yong med do/_/chos ni gtong bar mi nus te/_/gzung bar yang ni mi nus so/_/de ltar chos rnams thams cad la/_/bdag gi dngos po yod ma yin/_/chos rnams thams cad ma mchis 
[\[79a.3\]]shing /_/grol ba'ang med par gang gis shes/_/gang la lta ba med pa ste/_/de ni sbyin bdag chen po yin/_/nga dang nga yir lta ba gang /_/de la de dag yong med de/_/de phyir de dag gtong ba na/_/dngos po ci la'ang rten mi 'gyur/_/sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyang /_/byang chub la 
[\[79a.4\]]ni sngo bar byed/_/byang chub la ni sbyin pa yi/_/gnyis su 'du shes mi bskyed do/_/'du byed med pa'i tshul khrims la/_/rtag par shin tu gnas par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims la yang bdag gnas shes/_/de dag la ni rlom sems med/_/tshul khrims dag ni ma byas shing /_/ma skyes par 
[\[79a.5\]]yang mkhas pas shes/_/de phyir de yi tshul khrims ni/_/rab dag dri med nam mkha' bzhin/_/lus ni gzugs brnyan nyid dang 'dra/_/ngag ni brag ca ji bzhin te/_/sems kyang sgyu ma 'drar rig nas/_/de dag tshul khrims mi snyems so/_/de dag zhi zhing rab tu zhi/_/nye bar zhi zhing 
[\[79a.6\]]mnyam par gzhag_/sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing /_/rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol song /_/ngang tshul ngan dang tshul khrims ni/_/gnyis su bya ba de la med/_/chos kyi dbyings ni yongs shes nas/_/de yi tshul khrims zag pa med/_/bzod pa'i pha rol rab phyin cing /_/nyes byas thams cad 
[\[79a.7\]]bzod par byed/_/de ltar sems can thams cad la/_/de yi 'du shes mnyam par 'jug_/chos rnams thams cad mi gnas te/_/skad cig 'joms pas 'jig par 'gyur/_/'di la gang yang gshe ba med/_/'di la gang yang phyag 'tshal med/_/lus rnams gshags shing bcad na 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]yang /_/de yi sems la 'khrug mi 'byung /_/lus kyi nang ngam phyi rol na/_/sems ni shin tu mi gnas so/_/khams bzhi las ni byung ba yi/_/lus 'di nyid ni dgra dang mtshungs/_/yang dag yongs su rtogs pa yi/_/mkhas pa de dag bdag mi snyems/_/de ltar mngon sum gyur pas 
[\[79b.2\]]na/_/de dag bzod par smra ba yin/_/de yi sems ni sun dbyung bar/_/ma lus skye bos mi nus so/_/de dag brtson 'grus che rtsom ste/_/mthu brtan 'jigs pa med pa dag_/lus dang sems rnams rig nas ni/_/de dag la ni gnas mi 'gyur/_/'khor ba yi ni thog ma yi/_/mtha' nas 
[\[79b.3\]]bzung ste ma skyes so/_/sems can cig gi don phyir yang /_/stobs po che dag go cha gyon/_/chos ni gang yang mi skye ste/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med mod kyi/_/byis pa phyin ci log pa'i phyir/_/sngon gyi mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/dbyings 'di rtag tu gnas pa ste/_/chos kyi dbyings ni bsam 
[\[79b.4\]]mi khyab/_/de ltar yang dag rab shes na/_/'di la skye med 'jig pa med/_/chos kyi chos ni 'di rnams ni/_/sems can 'di dag mi shes te/_/de phyir de yi phyin ci log_/spang ba'i phyir ni de dag brtson/_/sems can rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/ji lta bur yang yong ma snyems/_/go cha 
[\[79b.5\]]dag kyang mi 'dor te/_/brtson 'grus dag gi khyad par ltos/_/ji ltar sgyu ma smig rgyu ltar/_/chos rnams la ni rab tu 'byed/_/'di la snying po mi rnyed de/_/nam mkha' la ni lta ba bzhin/_/med pa'i yongs su rtogs pa yi/_/skye bo mi mkhas nyon mongs 'gyur/_/gang gi mya ngan 'da' ba yi/_/rig 
[\[79b.6\]]pa dag ni 'di la bshad/_/de yi brtson 'grus de phyir te/_/dngos po gzhig phyir ma yin no/_/dngos dang dngos med mi rtag phyir/_/de dag gi ni brtson 'grus bskyed/_/dben pa dag tu rtag gnas shing /_/nyon mongs med par rtog par rig_/'khor ba la ni skrag pa'i yid/_/'dris pa med 
[\[79b.7\]]cing yid mi ston/_/dgon par spyod par brtan pa dag_/mkhas pa rtag tu bse ru bzhin/_/shes par btsan pa rig pa dag_/de dag mngon shes rtogs par rig_/dgon pa bzhin du grong de bzhin/_/mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas pas/_/spyod dang spyod lam mi rtogs te/_/de dag rtag tu 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]mnyam par bzhag_/nam zhig mnyam par bzhag pa'i chos/_/nye bar zhi ba zag med la/_/mos shing rnam par grol ba na/_/de phyir mnyam par bzhag ces gsungs/_/mnyam par byed cing mnyam par 'gro/_/mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas nas/_/mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal mi 
[\[80a.2\]]byed/_/de phyir mnyam par bzhag ces gsungs/_/byang chub sems las rnam pa kun/_/sems las de dag rmongs mi 'gyur/_/sems can dag kyang yongs smin byed/_/de dag mnyam par bzhag ces gsungs/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 
[\[80a.3\]]dran/_/gzugs la 'dod chags bral ba thob/_/de phyir mnyam par bzhag ces gsungs/_/chos kyi chos nyid ji lta bar/_/de dag chos rnams sgom mod kyi/_/dran pa yid la byed pas min/_/de phyir mnyam par bzhag ces gsungs/_/dge 'dun dran pa sgom byed de/_/dge 'dun nyid kyang 
[\[80a.4\]]'dus ma byas/_/tshad dang bral ba zhi ba yi/_/mkhas pa dag ni bsam gtan sgom/_/lus can dag gi phyogs bcu na/_/zhing dang sangs rgyas rnams mthong ste/_/de dag mig dang gzugs la yang /_/gnyis su 'du shes mi 'jug go/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa/_/ji 
[\[80a.5\]]snyed yod pa nyan mod kyi/_/de dag sgra dang rna ba la/_/gnyis su 'du shes mi 'jug go/_/de dag sems can rnams kyi sems/_/sems gcig gis ni rab shes kyang /_/de dag sems sam sems can la/_/rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/bye ba 
[\[80a.6\]]lta bu'i dran gyur kyang /_/de dag sngon nam phyi ma zhes/_/spros pa 'di yang mi 'byung ngo /_/zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong dang /_/bsam mi khyab par 'phrul gyis 'gro/_/lus la'ang med cing sems la'ang med/_/de las gud na'ang yod ma yin/_/chos rnams rab tu dbye bar shes/_/spobs 
[\[80a.7\]]pa dag la rtogs par rig_/chos kyi dbyings rnams bstan pa dag_/bskal pa bye bar smra bar byed/_/shes rab kyi yang pha rol phyin/_/phung po dag la mkhas par bslab/_/blang med spros pa med pa yi/_/chos mchog dag ni rjod par byed/_/de dag rkyen la mkhas pa ste/_/mtha' gnyis 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dag ni spangs pa yin/_/de dag nyon mongs rgyu rnams kyang /_/sdig pa med par dag par shes/_/rkyen la lhag par mos pa la/_/lta ba dag ni yod ma yin/_/'di ltar chos rnams thams cad ni/_/rkyen las rag lus dngos po med/_/bdag tu lta dang sangs rgyas lta/_/stong par lta ba 
[\[80b.2\]]gang yin dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang 'khor bar lta/_/thams cad de la yongs med do/_/shes rab rang bzhin shes nas ni/_/snang bar gyur ma thag tu yang /_/de dag mun bral chags med cing /_/byang chub spyod la spyod par 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po'i theg pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas theg pa bsam mi 
[\[80b.3\]]khyab/_/sems can gyi ni go skabs 'byed/_/theg pa chen po bla na med/_/theg pa ji snyed ci yod pa/_/'di ni de yi mchog tu dgongs/_/de phyir theg pa chen po las/_/theg pa thams cad rab tu dbye/_/theg pa gzhan du chung ngu ste/_/thams cad kyi ni go skabs med/_/theg pa chen po 'di la 
[\[80b.4\]]ni/_/lus can kun gyi go skabs shod/_/theg pa chen po nam mkha' ltar/_/dri ma med la gang zhugs pa/_/de dag lus can thams cad la/_/ser sna byed pa yod med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' tshad med cing /_/gzugs med bstan du med pa ltar/_/de bzhin theg pa chen po 'di/_/tshad 
[\[80b.5\]]med sgrib pa med pa'o/_/gal te sems can thams cad kyang /_/theg pa dam pa 'dod 'gyur na/_/thams cad kyi yang go skabs yod/_/theg pa'i khyad par dag la ltos/_/theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang /_/de la gang rnams gnas pa yin/_/de dag gi ni bsngags pa'i mtha'/_/bskal pa 
[\[80b.6\]]bye bar bshad mi nus/_/tshig bzhi pa yi tshigs bcad tsam/_/mdo sde 'di las gang 'dzin pa/_/de dag gis ni mi khom spangs/_/mkhas pa de dag dal ba thob/_/gang dag mdo sde 'dir dga' ba/_/de dag phyin chad ngan song du/_/'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/_/de dag lha dang mir 'gyur 
[\[80b.7\]]ro/_/phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang nyan pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub tu/_/shin tu gzhol bar ngas lung bstan/_/de yi lag na chos yod de/_/de dag dam pa'i chos la gnas/_/chos 'di la ni gnas nas kyang /_/de dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/gang gis 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]mdo sde 'di bzung ba/_/de dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_/bskal pa mtha' yas 'khor ba las/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag spong /_/gang gis tshul 'di bzung ba dag_/de dag dpa' bo nus pa ste/_/bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'joms/_/brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab 
[\[81a.2\]]che/_/mdo sde 'di la gang dga' ba/_/nga ni bzung la gnas pa'i tshe/_/mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan ltar/_/de tshe de dag lung bstan to/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang smra ba/_/de ni sangs rgyas skyob pa yi/_/'jig rten sgrol ba ma byung tshe/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_/yang tshigs su 
[\[81a.3\]]bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu lnga stong byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/dge slong stong lhag tsam len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/srog chags sum khri nyis stong chos rnams 
[\[81a.4\]]la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na gang byang chub kyi phyir smon pa ni log par lta ba la smon pa lags 
[\[81a.5\]]so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni log pa lags te/_de lta bas na byang chub la dmigs par bgyid cing /_dmigs pa la smon pa de dag gis 'bad pa ni log pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/_
[\[81a.6\]]gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams la mi gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mi gnas pa lags pas de la smon pa bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig bdag gis nam mkha' thob par bgyi'o/_/
[\[81a.7\]]zhes nam mkha' la smon na des nam mkha' thob par 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang byang chub nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la smon pa de dag ni nam mkha' la smon pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]byang chub ni smon pa ma mchis pa/_dus gsum las 'das pa/_nye bar mi mchi ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'du shes gnyis su bgyis nas byang chub kyang gzhan la 'khor ba yang gzhan no/_/byang chub kyang gzhan la lta bar gyur pa yang gzhan no/_/byang chub 
[\[81b.2\]]kyang gzhan la mya ngan las 'das pa yang gzhan no zhes smon par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni byang chub la spyod pa ma lags so/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyod 
[\[81b.3\]]na byang chub la spyod pa yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad la yang spyod la chos gang la yang mi spyod na byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub la spyod de/_tshangs pa spyad pa yul las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub tu spyod do/_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[81b.4\]]dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa'i yul las 'das pa byang chub la spyod/_smras pa/_dmigs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral zhing mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang bral ba de ltar na spyad pa'i yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa yin no/_/smras pa/_
[\[81b.5\]]'jam dpal yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba ci la bsam/_smras pa/_mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa byang chub ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas ji ltar na byang chub tu 'jug par bya/_smras pa/_byang chub 
[\[81b.6\]]ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/smras pa/_byang chub ji lta bu yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa byang chub de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpas dus gsum yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag 
[\[81b.7\]]pas byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug par bya'o/_/'das pa ji lta ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa ji lta ba dang /_da ltar byung ba ji lta ba dang /_ma byung ba ji lta ba dang /_ma byung ba gang yin pa de la rab tu dbye ba med de/_gang de ltar rab tu zhugs pa de gang la yang zhugs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]rab tu 'jug pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya/_smras pa/_thams cad shes par gyur pa'i ye shes de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal kun 
[\[82a.2\]]shes pa gang yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa kun shes pa gang la dngos po med cing kun shes pa la kun shes pa med pa de ni kun shes pa ste/_dngos po ji lta ba de bzhin du de'i kun shes pa yang med do/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir dngos po med/_smras pa/_dngos po ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis dben te/_de'i 
[\[82a.3\]]ming dang rang bzhin dben la dngos po yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/gal te dngos po yang gzhan la byang chub kyang gzhan du zin na 'di ltar 'di la byang chub ji lta bar dngos po yang de bzhin no/_/de lta bas na 'di la sems can yang gud na med la de rnam pa gzhan du yang rtogs 
[\[82a.4\]]par mi 'gyur te/_gzhan du na bdag gi mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid dang /_byang chub kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gi mnyam pa nyid rig par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub rtogs par 'gyur te/_gzhan du ma yin pas na de'i phyir de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/bdag ni rtag tu bdag 
[\[82a.5\]]med pa yin te/_de'i phyir de la rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/ji ltar na nam mkha' la rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar 
[\[82a.6\]]chos 'di dag rab tu phye ba las na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bden par gsungs pa'o/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang rab tu ma phye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid kyang ma dmigs na gang rab tu dbye ba lta ci smos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal ji 
[\[82a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag ni 'dus byas so/_/chos 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas so/_/chos 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/chos 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o zhes chos rnams rnam par mi mkhyen tam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_sus kyang nam mkha' 'di 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rab tu phye ba'am/_shes par gyur pa yod dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang nam mkha' zhes bya ba de skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/_smras pa de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa de bzhin du chos gang yang rung ba'i rnam par rig par byed pa 
[\[82b.2\]]de yang nam mkha' rnam par rig par byed pa'o/_/chos ni skye ba'am 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_chos thams cad kyi rnam par rig par byed pa ni rnam par rig par byed pa med pa'o/_/chos des gang kun shes par byas pa de dag kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur bas na rnam par rig par byed pa med pas 
[\[82b.3\]]kun shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnam par rig par byed pa de ji 'dra ba de bzhin du de'i kun shes pa yang de 'dra ste/_de'i phyir chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas zhes bya ste de bzhin nyid ni mi gnas pa'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi 
[\[82b.4\]]bdag po tshangs pa yang 'khor de nyid du tshogs nas 'dug par gyur te/_de dag lha'i me tog de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor nas tshig 'di skad 'dzer to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di la mos pa de dag 
[\[82b.5\]]ni bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba lags te/_gang chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mi skrag mi dngang zhing shin tu dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[82b.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa phyogs gang du byung ba de sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/gang du chos kyi tshul zab mo 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de dag de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[82b.7\]]yongs su longs spyad pa'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_'chag sa gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ba der chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar blta'o/_/der bdud rnams rgyu ba ma mchis/_dmigs pa la mngon par chags pa 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]rnams kyi rgyu ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa'i rnams kyi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chos kyi snang 
[\[83a.2\]]ba thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshangs pa 'di la bdag cag gis rang gi sha dang khrag gis kyang lan mi lon no/_/bcom ldan 'das gang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i chos smra ba de la bdag cag ston 
[\[83a.3\]]par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de'i drung du bdag cag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchi ste/_rigs kyi bu de lha de dag gis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/_klog gam/_ston tam/_kha ton byed na lha'i bu brgya 
[\[83a.4\]]stong phrag du ma chos nyan du mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyed ji skad zer ba de de bzhin no/_/grogs po dag gal 
[\[83a.5\]]te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i cha gcig bzhag pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba cha gcig bzhag pa dang /_de gnyis ni gang 'di chos kyi rnam grangs nyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cha 'di mchog go/_/stong 
[\[83a.6\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog gi gal te chu bo gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i cha gcig bzhag pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cha gcig bzhag pa dang /_de gnyis ni 
[\[83a.7\]]gang 'di chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cha 'di mchog go/_/grogs po dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_gzugs 'dod pa dang /_longs spyod 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'dod pa dang /_g.yog 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug 'dod pa dang /_lha'i phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa dang /_mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa dang /_brjod pa 'dod pa dang /_thos pa 'dod pa dang /_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_brtan 
[\[83b.2\]]pa dang /_shes rab 'dod pa dang /_spobs pa 'dod pa dang /_gzungs 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'dod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_ye shes 'dod pa dang /_byang chub 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[83b.3\]]lag 'dod pa dang /_cho ga 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad bde ba thob par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_mos par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag 
[\[83b.4\]]par bya/_gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/grogs po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na mnyan pa tsam gyis kyang gang des yongs su ma bzung bar gyur pa'i phun sum tshogs pa de ngas ma mthong ngo /_/grogs po dag mos par bya/_go bar bya ste/_slob dpon nam mkhan po 
[\[83b.5\]]gang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan tam/_bzung na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gang gis de la lan blan par sla ba de lta bu ngas ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos te/_'jig rten gyi zang zing gis de sbyang bar sla ba ma yin no/_/chos 'di dag ni 'jig 
[\[83b.6\]]rten gyis ma gos pa ste/_'jig rten gyi zang zing gis sbyang bar sla ba ma yin no/_/chos 'di ni zang zing med pa ste/_'jig rten gyi zang zing gis sbyang bar sla ba ma yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lan blan pa ni chos kyi nan tan ma gtogs par gzhan med de/_log pa'i nan tan gyis ma yin 
[\[83b.7\]]no/_/gang 'di la zhugs pa de dag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus par byas so/_/de dag gis lan blan pa dag byas so/_/de dang de dag ni bu lon med par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms za'o/_/de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig la nan tan du byed pa'o/_de dang de dag 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]ni chu bo las rgal ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni dgon pa las shin tu rgal ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sgreng ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni seng ge ltar 'jigs shing skrag pa dang bral ba'o/_/
[\[84a.2\]]de dang de dag ni bal glang ltar cang shes pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni glang po che ltar sems rab tu zhi ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni khyu mchog ltar pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni sman pa ste/_sems can thams cad nad thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o/_/
[\[84a.3\]]de dang de dag ni chos zab mo bstan pa la mi dngang ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni sbyin pa phun sum tshogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag cing zhi ba dang /_zhi gnas dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni bzod pa'i stobs 
[\[84a.4\]]dang ldan zhing ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni brtson 'grus che zhing bskal pa grangs med par tshogs mu med pa'i mthar gtugs pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni bsam gtan phun sum tshogs shing dran pa dang ldan zhing sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni shes rab 
[\[84a.5\]]chen po chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni bsod nams chen po ste bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni gzi brjid chen po ste nyi ma dang zla ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa thob pa'o/_/de dang de dag 
[\[84a.6\]]ni mthu chen po thob cing stobs bcu'i shugs 'dzin pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni sprin chen po ltar chos mngon par sgrog pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni chos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni gnas te mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong du 
[\[84a.7\]]zhugs pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas gtses pa rnams kyi mgon no/_/de dang de dag ni sgron ma ste mun pa mun nag dang bral ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni bdud kyis skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs so/_/de dang de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi rten to/_/de dang de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]la dbang bskur ba'o/_/de dang de dag ni chos kyi mig thob bo/_/de dag gis chos kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ngo /_/de dag gis chos thams cad stong par shes so/_/de dag ni snying rje chen po la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/de dag ni byams pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'o/_/de dag ni sems can 
[\[84b.2\]]thams cad mi gtong ba'o/_/de dag ni theg pa dman pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa'o/_/de dag ni theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa'o/_/de dag gis ni phyin ci log spangs so/_/de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la nye ba'o/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa la zhugs pa'o/_/de dag ni 
[\[84b.3\]]byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa'o/_/de dag gis bdud kyi sde rnams btul lo/_/de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud do/_/de dag ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag gang chos 'di la nan 
[\[84b.4\]]tan du byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi bsngags pa ngas bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las 'das par bshad kyang chos 'di la nan tan byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor
