[\[84b.5\]]de nyid du lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi nan tan chos kyi nan tan zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na chos kyi nan tan zhes bgyi/_bcom 
[\[84b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu chos kyi nan tan zhes bya ba ni gang chos thams cad la nan tan med pa 'di ni chos kyi nan tan no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang chos rnams la nan tan du mi byed de/_de chos thams cad mi byed rnam par mi byed do/_/gang mi byed rnam par mi byed pa 'di ni chos 
[\[84b.7\]]kyi nan tan no/_/gang dge ba la'ang mi 'jug_/mi dge ba la'ang mi 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi nan tan no/_/de bzhin du bsdus te/_'jig rten pa la'ang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa la ma yin/_zag pa dang bcas pa la ma yin/_zag pa med pa la ma yin/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]pa la ma yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa la ma yin/_'dus byas la ma yin/_'dus ma byas la ma yin/_'khor ba la ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mi 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi nan tan zhes bya ste/_chos thams cad la nan tan du bya ba med pa 'di ni chos kyi nan tan no/_/
[\[85a.2\]]chos su 'du shes pa la chos kyi nan tan med de/_chos 'di la nan tan bya'o zhes spro bar byed/_nan tan du mi bya'o zhes spro bar byed na ma zhugs pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i nan tan 'di ni chos kyi nan tan no/_/spros pa med pas gnyen po med pa 'di ni chos kyi nan tan 
[\[85a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag pa'i nan tan 'di la zhugs pa dang /_'jug par 'gyur ba de dag la shin tu log pa'i nan tan ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[85a.4\]]shin tu yang dag pa'i nan tan 'di lags te/_log pa'i lam du zhugs pa rnams la nan tan gang yang ma mchis so/_/yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams la chos kyi nan tan ma mchis so/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la ni mi mnyam pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i 
[\[85a.5\]]slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mnyam pa khyad par ma mchis pa'o/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod nan tan 'di la zhugs sam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis nan tan la gnyis su 
[\[85a.6\]]bshad par gyur na bdag kyang nan tan 'di la nan tan du byed do/_/nan tan ni gnyis su med pa ste/_de la gang nan tan byed pa dang /_gang la nan tan byed pa de yang med do/_/gang yang nan tan du byed pa de med de/_'on kyang tshangs pa bdag ni lhag par mi byed pa dang sgro mi 'dogs pa'i 
[\[85a.7\]]phyir nan tan 'di la zhugs so/_/chos nyid ji lta bar chos kyi nan tan yang de bzhin te/_de ni de bzhin nyid la de ltar zhugs na zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pas smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni sngon ngas ma mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis kyang 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]sngon bdag ma mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni blta'o zhe'am/_mi lta'o zhes rtog pa'am/_rnam par rtog pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa bdag sngon mthong ngo zhe'am/_sngon ma mthong ngo zhes bdag kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu sngon ma 
[\[85b.2\]]mthong ba mthong ba su smras pa/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni 'phags pa'i nges par 'jug pa sngon ma mthong ngo /_/tshangs pa nam yang dag par nges par zhugs pa de ni sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo /_/nges pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas shes pa ma yin/_rna ba dang /_sna 
[\[85b.3\]]dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba ma yin te/_de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/mig gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba dang /_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba dang /_sna'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba dang /_lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba dang /_lus kyi de 
[\[85b.4\]]bzhin nyid ji lta ba dang /_yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du blta ste/_gang de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag par mthong ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ded dpon nor bu rin po che'i gling du phyin 
[\[85b.5\]]pa'i mig sngar ni nor bu rin po che 'ba' zhig gda'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rin po che dang ldan pa rnams ci dang ci spobs pa de dag gis de thams cad chos rin po che nyid du spobs so/_/de nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su gsal 
[\[85b.6\]]bar bgyid par spobs so/_/'di ltar de dag la bdag tu mngon par chags pa ma mchis/_chos su mngon par chags pa ma mchis/_sems can du mngon par chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de'i slad du ji ltar ma log pa dang phyin ci ma log par spobs pa de de ltar spobs 
[\[85b.7\]]so/_/ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yang spyod pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la yang de lta ba ma mchis pa de ltar spobs so/_/ji ltar ma mos pa rnams kyang mos par bgyid la mos pa rnams kyang rnam par 'grol ba de de ltar spobs so/_/mngon pa'i 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]nga rgyal can rnams kyang tshar bcad par 'gyur la/_nga rgyal ma mchis pa kun 'tshal ba lan ldon pa de ltar spobs so/_/ji ltar bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa de ltar spobs so/_/gang de ltar nyan pa de dag kyang bdud kyi las las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dge 
[\[86a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes pa rnams chab mi 'tshal ba dang /_nyon mongs pa skyes pa rnams spong ba dang /_ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa de ltar spobs so/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha ma bgos pa rnams go cha 'tshal ba dang /_go cha 
[\[86a.3\]]bgos pa rnams mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar spobs so/_/ji ltar dam pa'i chos mi 'chad cing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyid pa de ltar spobs so/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[86a.4\]]bu'i spobs pas ni mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad gzhom par nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das wa ni seng ge'i sgra bzod par yang mi nus na rab tu sgrog par lta ga la nus te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis bla na med pa seng ge'i 
[\[86a.5\]]sgra bzod par mi nus so/_/de nas lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka seng ge'i sgra seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ji tsam gyis na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu chos gang la yang mngon par ma chags par brjod pa de dag seng ge'i sgra 
[\[86a.6\]]yin no/_/gang de lta bu la mngon par chags par brjod pa de dag ni seng ge'i sgra ma yin te wa'i sgra'o/_/gang lta ba kun tu slong ba ston pa de dag la seng ge'i sgra med do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod seng ge'i sgra ji lta bu yin pa spobs par gyis shig_/smras 
[\[86a.7\]]pa/_kau shi ka gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mngon par ma chags par ston na chos ngan pa gzhan lta ci smos te/_de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i nan tan ni seng ge'i sgra ste/_de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/_/'di ni mgo gcig tu bstan pa yin te/_de'i phyir 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/_/'di ni mi skrag par bstan pa ste/_de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/_/kau shi ka gang chos thams cad mi skye ba dang /_mi 'gog pa dang /_mi 'thob par sgom pa'i phyir chos ston pa de dag gi seng ge'i sgra yin te/_gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[86b.2\]]ba dang /_kun tu sbyor ba dang 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa de dag la seng ge'i sgra med do/_/kau shi ka seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_mgo gcig tu bstan pa/_chos thams cad gang zag med pa/_bdag med pa yin no/_/kau shi ka seng ge'i sgra seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni 'di lta 
[\[86b.3\]]ste/_mgo gcig tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yongs su ston pa ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir tshig smra ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas su 
[\[86b.4\]]gyur cig ces byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i tshig smra ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/longs spyod rung ba la chog shes par smra ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/kau shi ka seng ge'i sgra seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dgon par gnas pa dang /_yang dag par len pa dang /_gtong ba sngon du 'gro ba 
[\[86b.5\]]ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi 'dor ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/brtson pa mi 'dor ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/nyon mongs pa spong ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o/_/shes rab kyis shin tu brtags pa ni 
[\[86b.6\]]seng ge'i sgra'o/_/seng ge'i sgra bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/sil snyan brgya stong du ma ma brdungs par sgra 'byin to/_/'jig rten rnams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/lha'i bu brgya stong a la la zhes 
[\[86b.7\]]sgra 'byin cing tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/e ma'o deng 'dir lha'i bus seng ge'i sgra 'di bsgrags pas 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /_chos nyid kyis 'di ltar 'gyur te/_nam sangs rgyas 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_mthing ga dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu zhal nas byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa khyab par byas 
[\[87a.2\]]nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te phyir log nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to//_//bam po drug pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 
[\[87a.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/ye shes kun mchog pha rol phyin cing thub pa kun mkhyen kun zil gnon/_/'di la dus gsum sems can spyod pa sna tshogs ci mchis khyod kyis mkhyen/_/gang de shin tu grol ba'i blo yul gang yang de dag bsam pa rnams/_/
[\[87a.4\]]lha yi gtso bo kun mkhyen 'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu ni lung bstan gsol/_/nyan thos rang rgyal dgra bcom dri med de dag gis yang spyod yul min/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab cing mtha' bral khyod la chags pa med/_/khyod kyis sems can spyod pa sems can gang la ci 
[\[87a.5\]]'dra'i gtam brjod mkhyen/_/smra mchog thub dka' tshig dbang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni bstan par gsol/_/'od 'di shin tu yid 'ong sdug pa dri med rab tu rnam par mdzes/_/nyi zla'i 'od dang de bzhin tshangs pa dbang po'i gzi yang zil gyis gnon/_/de bzhin khor yug khrag khrig 
[\[87a.6\]]ri rab dag kyang shin tu snang bgyis na/_/ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad de yi rgyu ni rab tu bstan par gsol/_/'dod chags zhe sdang dregs la sogs pa zug rngu bral zhing rab tu zhi/_/'jig rten lha mi lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams byams pas bdag po khyod zhal lta/_/bde gshegs 
[\[87a.7\]]bltas kyang mi ngoms lus ni rab tu sim zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan thub pa bdag cag rnams la gsungs/_/khyod kyis chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur rtag tu byed med gsog nyid dang /_/glog dang sprin 'dra sgyu ma lta bur gsob nyid dbu ba lta bu dang /_/rmi 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]lam mthong dang char pa stong 'dra nam mkha' chu zla lta bur mkhyen/_/dge ba 'dzum mdzad 'di rgyu rnar snyan gsung ni rab tu brjod par mdzod/_/'dzin dang rtog dang rnam rtog kun dang bral bas stong pa nyid la mos/_/bdag po shes bya kun la rtog bral rtag tu mtshan ma med la dgyes/_/khyod ni 
[\[87b.2\]]srid pa gsum 'dir gang la'ang mi smon bsam gtan ting 'dzin dgyes/_/gang gi slad du 'dzum pa bstan mdzad 'dren pa 'di ni lung bstan gsol/_/skad la mi chags sgra dang dbyangs dang yi ge dag la'ang de bzhin te/_/'jig rten du yang chos ston blo gtsang bdag dang chos la'ang 
[\[87b.3\]]gnas mi mdzad/_/'dus pa so sor bde gshegs bdag la tha dad chos ston snyam du 'dzin/_/ye shes rdzu 'phrul dbang po stobs mchog rgyas pa shes rab mtshungs med gsungs/_/khyod ni sdug bsngal kun sel na rga 'chi 'joms sman pa'i mchog lags te/_/khyod ni dpa' bo 
[\[87b.4\]]bdud kyi stobs 'joms mthu bo che yi mthu dang ldan/_/khyod ni skyob pa dpung gnyen 'jig rten mgon skyabs sgron ma snang mdzad pa/_/lha min lha dang klus mchod 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang 'dir bstan gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par 
[\[87b.5\]]sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa khyod kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i lha'i bu 'di mthong ngam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa phyir mi ldog pa lha'i bu 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis na 'jig rten 
[\[87b.6\]]gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya bar bskal pa tshangs pas bstod pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[87b.7\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang bai dUr+ya dang /_'dzam 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bu chu bo'i gser dang /_rin po che gnyis kyi gzhir 'gyur ro/_/de'i byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun 'ba' zhig 'byung ste bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing dpa' bo sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bza' ba dang /_btung ba yang bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor cing 
[\[88a.2\]]dga' ldan gyi longs spyod dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de tshe dpag tu med cing ltung ba med pa'i chos ston par 'gyur/_khyad par sems kyis smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa bdag ni de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[88a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du lung bstan to/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings ni lung mi bstan to/_/smras pa/_ji ltar de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings lung mi bstan pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lung bstan pa yang de ltar blta'o/_/
[\[88a.4\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu de 'ang da khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pas na khyod sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa ni don med pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa gang gnas med pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la gnas 
[\[88a.5\]]pa'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de ltar gang la gnas pa med pa de ni tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa gang khams gsum la mi gnas pa de ni tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o/_/tshangs pa gang yang khams gsum la gnas pa de ni tshangs par spyad pa la 
[\[88a.6\]]gnas pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang tshangs pa gang bdag la mi gnas/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag la mi gnas pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin te/_tshangs pa mdor na gang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o/_/smras pa/_
[\[88a.7\]]lha'i bu tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_smras pa/_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu gnas pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu lam la rab tu gnas pa yang ci la rab tu gnas 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa lam la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab tu gnas pa med pa dang /_len pa med pa de ni lam la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar bsgom pa na lam 
[\[88b.2\]]sgom pa yin/_smras pa/_tshangs pa ji nas kyang dngos po dang dngos po med par mi ltung ba dang /_chos gang yang dngos por yang mi byed/_dngos po med par yang mi byed par sgom pa ste/_de ltar bsgom na lam sgom pa la brtson pa yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gis lam bsgom par 
[\[88b.3\]]bya'o/_/smras pa/_tshangs pa mthong bas ma yin/_thos pas ma yin/_dran pas ma yin/_rnam par rig pas ma yin/_thob pas ma yin/_mngon du byas pas ma yin te/_gang chos thams cad la mi sgom pa 'di ni lam sgom pa'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[88b.4\]]dpa' brtson 'grus kyi go cha sra ba bgos pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang la yang gcig pa'am tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi go cha sra ba bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/gang chos kyi 
[\[88b.5\]]dbyings ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos gang la yang 'byed par mi byed sbyor bar mi byed de/_chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba mi mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mchog go/_/gang chos thams cad la bsal ba dang 
[\[88b.6\]]bzhag pa med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/_/tshangs pa gang la lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi rtsom pa med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas tshangs pa khyad par sems la bka' stsal 
[\[88b.7\]]pa/_tshangs pa lha'i bu 'di ji skad ston pa de de bzhin no/_/'di ni de'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mchog ste/_gang lus kyi rtsom pa yang med/_ngag gi rtsom pa med/_yid kyi rtsom pa yang med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mchog go/_/tshangs pa ngas mngon par shes pa 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'das pa'i dus na sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad yang dag par blang ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/_/de bzhin du bla ma rnams la ldang ba dang /_
[\[89a.2\]]rim gro bya ba dang /_dgon par gnas pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la kun tu 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams kyang nga lung ma bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi rtsom pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 
[\[89a.3\]]phyir ro/_/tshangs pa nam nga lha'i bu 'dis ji skad du bstan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa de'i 'og tu nga de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[89a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/tshangs pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i sa myur du thob par 'dod pas brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la rtsom pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di la brtsam par bya'o/_/gsol 
[\[89a.5\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das rtsom pa ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang 
[\[89a.6\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_'das pa'i sems ni zad/_ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin/_da ltar byung ba la ni gnas pa med cing mi dmigs te/_gang zad pa de ni dmigs su med do/_/gang ma byin pa de ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin du gang da ltar byung ba de yang 
[\[89a.7\]]chos nyid kyis mi gnas so/_/chos nyid gang yin pa de yang ma skyes pa'o/_/gang ma skyes pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/gang 'das pa'ang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni rang bzhin 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]no/_/rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa ste/_tshangs pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu 'di ni lung bstan pa myur du thob par byed do/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni chos thams cad gtong ba med pa'i 
[\[89b.2\]]sbyin pa la mos so/_/chos thams cad srung ba med pa'i tshul khrims la mos so/_/chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i bzod pa la mos so/_/chos thams cad rtsom pa med pa'i brtson 'grus la mos so/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mos so/_/
[\[89b.3\]]chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'o zhes shes rab la mos so/_/de de ltar mos pas lhag par mi byed/_bri bar mi byed/_byed pa ma yin/_rnam par byed pa ma yin no/_/sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la de'ang rnam par smin pa la mi re bas so/_/tshul khrims kyang srung la de'ang 
[\[89b.4\]]sgro btags pa med pas so/_/bzod pa yang sgom la de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis so/_/brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la de'ang yongs su grub pa med pas so/_/bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la de yang gnas pa med pas so/_/shes rab kyang sgom la de yang mtshan ma 
[\[89b.5\]]med pas so/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni bya ba thams cad kyang ston la bya bas kyang mi gos so/_/de mi gos pas chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid thob cing rnyed pas kyang mi 'phrogs/_/rnyed pa med pas kyang ma yin/_snyan pas kyang ma 
[\[89b.6\]]yin/_mi snyan pas kyang ma yin/_smad pas kyang ma yin/_bstod pas kyang ma yin/_sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin/_bde bas kyang mi 'phrogs so/_/de 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad las rnam par 'das te/_gnyis su dmigs pa'i sems dang bral zhing gnyis su med pa'i 
[\[89b.7\]]chos rtogs pa'i phyir khengs par yang mi byed/_'dud par yang mi byed/_sdud par yang mi byed/_khong khro ba yang mi byed/_gnod par yang mi byed/_kun nas gnod par yang mi byed/_rlom sems su yang mi byed/_bag med par yang mi byed/_kun nas bag med par yang mi byed 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]do/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lta ba gnyis su ltung ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du snying rje chen po skyed nas ched du bsam nas srid pa nye bar len te/_tshangs pa gang 'di bdag med pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob pas sems can thams cad la 
[\[90a.2\]]snying rje chen po bskyed de/_skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mchog yin no/_/brtson 'grus brtsam pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 
[\[90a.3\]]'das kyis thams cad ming gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas 'khor der tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'dug par gyur pa 
[\[90a.4\]]des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gang klu chen po de dag ni char 'bebs na rgya mtsho chen por 'bebs te/_sa phyogs gzhan du ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa klu chen po dang mtshungs pa 'di 
[\[90a.5\]]dag kyang chos kyi char 'di 'dra ba 'di skyes bu dam pa mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dag gi sems kyi rgyud la 'bebs te/_sems can gzhan dag la ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung ji skad zer ba de bzhin yin mod kyi klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la 
[\[90a.6\]]ni gang gi phyir 'dzam bu gling 'dir char pa mi 'bebs par 'gyur ba'i ser sna med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dzam bu gling gi phyogs kyis char pa'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam de dag mi bzod do/_/'od srung gal te klu chen po de dag gis 'dzam bu gling 'dir char phab par gyur na des 
[\[90a.7\]]'dzam bu gling 'di grong dang /_grong khyer dang bcas/_ri dang brag dang ri bor bcas/_khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa 'di lta ste/_rdza ma'i chus rgya shug gi lo ma bteg pa bzhin du bteg nas khyer bar 'gyur te/_de bas na klu chen po de dag 'dzam bu gling 'dir char pa mi 'bebs so/_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la ni gang gi phyir sems can de dag gzhan la chos kyi char pa chen po mi 'bebs par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ser sna med mod kyi 'on kyang 'di dag chos 'di lta bu dag gi snod du ma gyur te/_de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag rgya mtsho lta bu'i blo 
[\[90b.2\]]mchog dang ldan pa de dag la chos kyi char pa chen po 'bebs so/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na char pa'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam bab pa de dag gis kyang rgya mtsho chen po bri ba yang med/_gang ba yang med do/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa brgyad chos nyan tam 
[\[90b.3\]]'chad kyang chos gang yang bri ba'am gang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po der gling chen po bzhi'i klung sna tshogs nas gang chu 'bab pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag rnam grangs 
[\[90b.4\]]sna tshogs su chos bstan pa bshad pa dag thos ma thag tu 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig tu mos par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dag pa/_gtsang ba dri ma med pa/_gsal ba/_rnyog pa med pa yin te/_chu rnyog pa can mi 'dzin to/_/'od srung de bzhin 
[\[90b.5\]]du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang dag pa/_gtsang ba/_dri ma med pa/_gsal ba ste/_gnod sems dang /_zhe sdang dang /_khro ba dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa thams cad mi 'dzin to/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'o/_/de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag 
[\[90b.6\]]kyang chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gting dpag dka'o/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu tshad med cing rin po che'i tshogs dpag tu med pa'o/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang shes rab tshad med cing 
[\[90b.7\]]chos rin po che'i tshogs dpag tu med do/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbyings so/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs kyis chos rin po che tshad med pa'i dbyings so/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che kha cig rin thang yod pa dang /_kha cig rin thang med pa dang /_kha cig mching bu lta bu dang rnam pa gsum 'byung ste/_'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa na yang nyan thos kyi theg 
[\[91a.2\]]pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_gang 'og ma theg pa chen po la sems kyi rgyud rnam par 'grol lo/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can gcig gi ched du mi gnas so/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sems can gcig gi don du 
[\[91a.3\]]byang chub tu sems mi skyed do/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni mthar gyis gzhol/_mthar gyis 'bab/_mthar gyis bab pa'o/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bab/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[91a.4\]]pa nyid du bab pa'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/ser sna dang /_ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems dang /_gnod sems 
[\[91a.5\]]dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_skyes bur lta ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_bskal pas sreg par gyur pa'i tshe/_
[\[91a.6\]]klung dang /_chu bran dang /_chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing bu dang /_mtsho thams cad sngar skam par 'gyur te/_phyis rgya mtsho chen po zad cing bskams par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de bzhin du dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe nyi tshe bar spyod pa la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dam pa'i 
[\[91a.7\]]chos sngar nub par 'gyur te/_phyis skyes bu dam pa blo gros rgya mtsho lta bu sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi lag nas dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur te/_yang 'od srung skyes bu dam pa de dag ni srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gtong bar mi byed 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]na/_'od srung skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag gi lag nas dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yod dam/_de dag gi dam pa'i chos nub par khyod kyis mi blta'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po nor bu rin po che rin po che thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba rdo rje tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che 
[\[91b.2\]]chen po zhig yod de/_de nyi ma bdun shar nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'od zer byung yang rin po che de tshig par mi 'gyur te/_gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na rgya mtsho chen po yod pa der nor bu rin po che de der 'pho bar 'gyur te/_'od srung gang nor 
[\[91b.3\]]bu rin po che de rgya mtsho chen po las gzhan du ma 'phos pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshig par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_de ni gnas med do/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_'jig rten 
[\[91b.4\]]gnas par dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bdun byung ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mu stegs can gyi gnas dang /_sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang /_log pa'i sbyor ba dang /_gcig la gcig 'tshe ba'i sbyor ba dang /_lta 
[\[91b.5\]]bar gyur pa'i thib po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms par byed pa dang /_ma thob cing mngon par ma rtogs pa ste/_dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bdun po de dag 'jig rten gnas par byung ba de na sems can rnams snod ma yin par shes nas skyes bu dam pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'pho bar 
[\[91b.6\]]'gyur te/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'bar ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po la brten cing sems can tshad med pa dag gnas so/_/'od srung 
[\[91b.7\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la brten cing sems can tshad med pa dag phun sum tshogs pa gsum la gnas so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]mtsho chen po ni sems can dag gis btung bar mi nus so/_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag gis gang chos bstan pa de dag kyang pha rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyis btung bar mi nus so/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na sems can gnas pa 
[\[92a.2\]]de dag ni chu gzhan mi tshol gyi de nyid la 'thung ngo /_/'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi ngor lta bas chos kyi ro mi 'thung gi/_rang byung gi ye shes kyi chos kyi ro 'thung ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[92a.3\]]'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i gting ngam tshad gzung ba ni nus kyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis skyes bu dam pa de dag gi gting ngam tshad gzung ba ni mi nus te/_de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag sems nam 
[\[92a.4\]]mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi gting ngam tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 
[\[92a.5\]]'jig rten gyi skyes bu dam pa blo gros mchog rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa de dag gi gting ngam tshad gzung ba ni mi nus so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/ji ltar chog mi shes par chu chen gter/_/'bab chu thams cad kun gyi chu tshol ba/_/de 
[\[92a.6\]]bzhin de rnams 'di la chos tshol kyang /_/rtag par chos kyis chog par 'gyur ba med/_/ji ltar ji snyed chu mang rab bsdus kyang /_/'di la rgya mtsho 'gribs shing gang 'gyur med/_/dam pa'i chos thos nas kyang chos kyi dbyings/_/shin tu 'phel shing 'grib pa mthong ba med/_/ji ltar dri med rgya 
[\[92a.7\]]mtsho chu sdud kyang /_/rnyog pa can gyi 'bab chu der mi 'bab/_/de bzhin thub mkhas spyad pa spyod pa yang /_/de dag rnam dag nyon mongs mi sdud do/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po lus 'chang bas/_/zab cing gting yangs pas na mi dpogs pa/_/de bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho ye shes kyang /_/pha rol rgol ba 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]rnams kyis dpag mi nus/_/ji ltar rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'bab chu rnams/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang ro gcig 'gyur/_/de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs chos thos nas/_/de dag rnam par grol bar ro gcig 'gyur/_/ji ltar chu 'dzin rgya mtsho chen po ni/_/skye bo gcig gi don phyir mi 
[\[92b.2\]]gnas te/_/de bzhin byang chub tu yang zhugs pa dag_/de dag 'gro ba kun la phan phyir zhugs/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho rin chen dbyings yin zhing /_/de la gnas nas nor bu rin chen 'byung /_/de bzhin rin chen 'byung gnas sems can mchog_/de dag las ni rin chen gsum 'dir 'byung /_/ji ltar rnam 
[\[92b.3\]]par mi rtog rgya mtsho na/_/rtag par rin chen rnam pa gsum 'byung ste/_/de bzhin de dag chos rnams ston pa yang /_/theg pa gsum gyis sems can dag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'bab pa dang ni 'gram nyid nas/_/rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis gzhol ba ltar/_/de bzhin sems can mchog rnams 
[\[92b.4\]]kun mkhyen gzhol/_/sems can rab tu dgrol phyir rtag tu brtson/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho ro dang mi gnas te/_/de dag gi ni ma 'dres chos 'di yin/_/de bzhin byang chub mchog la zhugs pa yang /_/dman pa'i theg pa dang ni gnas mi byed/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho las byung rin chen ni/_/rin chen sdud ces 
[\[92b.5\]]bya ba sra bsngags pa/_/sreg pa'i bskal pa byung yang mi tshig ste/_/de yang 'jig rten 'jig tshe gzhan du 'gro/_/de bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos 'jig tshe/_/brtson 'grus mchog ldan de dag 'bad cing 'dzin/_/snod min 'jig rten chos min 'dod rig nas/_/mkhas pa rgyal ba gzhan gyi 
[\[92b.6\]]drung du 'gro/_/nam zhig sreg pa'i bskal pa byung gyur te/_/chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka skam par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho 'dir ni phyis nas skam par 'gyur/_/stong gsum chen po 'di yang rab tu 'jig_/nyi tshe'i spyod la nye bar gnas pa yi/_/'di la mchog tu bya ba'i chos nus pa/_/de tshe 'dir ni 
[\[92b.7\]]sems can mchog chos 'di/_/lus dang srog kyang bor nas srung bar byed/_/bde gshegs 'das na'ang rtag par bag med pas/_/de dag rnams la chos 'di mi 'jig go/_/de ltar de rnams bsam pa'ang rnam par dag_/chos la gnas shing spyod pa rtag par spyod/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]sems can tshad med gnas/_/sems can gcig gi don du mi 'jug pa/_/de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad rnam grol phyir/_/grags pa chen po 'di dag rab tu 'jug_/'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho ji snyed pa/_/ma lus par ni tshad rnams shes rung yang /_/rgyal ba de 
[\[93a.2\]]dag kun gyi spyod pa ni/_/dgra bcom rang rgyal dag gis shes mi nus/_/ma lus phyogs kyi nam mkha'i dbyings rnams kyang /_/mchog rnams kyi ni tshad gzung nus srid kyi/_/nam mkha' bas kyang lhag pa de dag gi/_/ye shes tshad ni nams kyang gzung mi nus/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 
[\[93a.3\]]'grus brtul brtan zhing /_/gang dag 'jig rten ma lus dgrol ba'i phyir/_/rgya che yangs pa'i sems rab gzhol byas pa/_/'od srung de dang mtshungs med ga la lhag_/de dag rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtsho 'dra/_/de dag bsod nams yin la bsod nams zhing /_/de dag dpyad pa'i rgyal 
[\[93a.4\]]po sman pa'i mchog_/sems can yun ring na ba thar bar byed/_/de dag gnas yin skyabs dang dpung gnyen te/_/skyob pa sgron ma de bzhin 'od byed pa/_/skye bo ldongs pa rnams kyi mig skyed pa/_/de thob pas na de dag bdud rtsi thob/_/de dang de dag chos kyi rgyal mchog 'bar/_/de rnams brgya 
[\[93a.5\]]byin don mang sems pa ste/_/tshangs pa bsam gtan bzhi la gnas pa yin/_/de dag tshangs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/de dag ded dpon mkhas pa 'dren pa ste/_/log pa'i lam du gnas la lam ston pa/_/de dang de dag bdud 'joms dpa' bo ste/_/sems can dam pa byang chub snying 
[\[93a.6\]]por gnas/_/de dag chos dkar tshad med zla ba bzhin/_/de dag 'od zer mngon 'phags nyi ma 'dra/_/sprin lta bur yang tshad med blo sgrogs shing /_/'jig rten gsum na bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs/_/de dag seng ge lta bur 'jigs skyon med/_/glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba'i sems/_/de dag ri 
[\[93a.7\]]rab ri bo 'dra mtshungs te/_/de dag pha rol rgol bas mi thub bo/_/de dag rnam par dang ba chu bzhin te/_/rtag tu bsnyen par dka' ba me dang 'dra/_/de dag rlung ltar rtag tu chags med cing /_/sa dang 'dra bar tha ba rab tu spangs/_/gnod sems nga rgyal tha ba phrag dog bral/_/de dag rtsi yi shing ltar 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]rtog pa med/_/'jig rten chos rnams brgyad pos ma gos shing /_/de dag tshul khrims rnam dag pad ma bzhin/_/de dag u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar/_/dge zhing bskal pa bye bar sgra thos dka'/_/de dag rkang gnyis gtso la byas pa gzo/_/de dag sangs rgyas rigs la gnas par brtson/_/
[\[93b.2\]]de dag snying rje che zhing brtul zhugs brtan/_/byams la gnas dang dga' la mngon par 'phags/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la btang snyoms zhing /_/rtag tu rgyal ba dag gi nor rnams tshol/_/de dang de dag sbyin pas khyad par song /_/ye shes tshul khrims la yang rab tu gnas/_/de dag bzod 
[\[93b.3\]]pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu dpa'/_/brtson 'grus rags shing rtag tu mthu dang ldan/_/de dag bsam gtan mngon par shes la mkhas/_/de dag tshad med zhing du 'phrul gyis 'gro/_/thub pa dam mchog la yang chos nyan cing /_/ji ltar thos pa dag kyang ston par byed/_/ji ltar 'di mos rnam 
[\[93b.4\]]par 'grol ba yang /_/skye bo dag gi spyod pa de dag shes/_/ji ltar mos pa mkhas shing rtogs pa ste/_/nan tan snying por byed cing mu stegs thob/_/'di rnams tshogs pa las ni 'di skye zhes/_/de dang de dag chos kun rab tu shes/_/de dag rkyen la mkhas shing rtog pa ste/_/mtha' gnyis lta 
[\[93b.5\]]ba spangs shing mnyam la dga'/_/chos 'di gang nas 'ongs shing gar 'gro zhing /_/de dag chos la tshul bzhin rnam par lta/_/chos kun 'ong ba ma yin byung ba yin/_/gnas pa chos nyid mtshungs par rab tu shes/_/ji lta ji ltar 'dus byas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mthong /_/de lta de ltar snying rje can du 'gyur/_/
[\[93b.6\]]mi bden nyon mongs skye bo sdug bsngal te/_/de dag thar bar bya phyir spyad pa spyod/_/nga dang nga yi zhes ni rnam brtag nas/_/byis pa mi mnyam pa la brtson pas spyod/_/chos de yang dag ma yin shes nas ni/_/lta ba spangs pa'i phyir ni chos la spyod/_/bdag med bdag tu mi sdug sdug par te/_/sdug 
[\[93b.7\]]bsngal bde bar mi rtag rtag par yang /_/sems log so so'i skye bo rnams la ni/_/'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' yang yod ma yin/_/de dag log pa'i sbyor ba de shes nas/_/'di la sems can med dang gang zag med/_/gang la bdag sdug rtag bde med pa yin/_/yang dag sbyor ba la yang rnam par 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]sgom/_/'od srung de yi yon tan 'di brjod pa/_/sa yi rdul phran ji bzhin phyogs tsam ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' de yi spyod yul gang /_/de dag ye shes bsngags pa mtha' yas so/_/stong gsum 'jig rten mchod pa ci yod pa/_/kun gyis byang chub sems dpa' de la 
[\[94a.2\]]mchod/_/de las lhag par yang ni mchod 'os te/_/rgyal ba'i thugs sras dag ni phyir mi ldog_/gang rnams sangs rgyas 'gyur bar brtson ldan pa/_/de dag gis ni nga dang ma byon dang /_/gang yang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyal ba dang /_/ma lus phyogs bzhugs rim gror byas par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[94a.3\]]nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la rab tu spyod pa dang /_rgyas par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[94a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba thob shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[94a.5\]]byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bstan tam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di la brjod pa med pas na chos thams cad byin gyis ma brlabs pa ste/_de ni nub par mi 'gyur 
[\[94a.6\]]zhing bsrung bar bya ba ma yin no/_/tshangs pa gang chos gang la yang byin gyis brlabs par 'dod pa de ni nam mkha' byin gyis brlabs par 'dod do/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang yang khas len na de ni chos smra ba de ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[94a.7\]]smra ba thams cad las phyir ldog pa ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa ma yin no/_/tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'di snyam du 'khor 'dir chos bstan to snyam du sems na de dag la chos thos pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thos pa med pa ni chos thob pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o/_/zhes bya ba ci las bsams te de skad zer/_smras pa/_tshangs pa mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyis thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa ste/_gang skye mched de dag ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos 
[\[94b.2\]]la mi 'dzin pa de dag ni chos thos pa'o/_/de nas 'khor de nas lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dge slong stong phrag lnga dang /_dge slong ma sum brgya dang /_dge bsnyen brgyad brgya dang /_dge bsnyen ma brgyad brgya de dag thams cad kyis 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas 
[\[94b.3\]]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob ste/_tshig kyang 'di skad du 'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[94b.4\]]khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa thos pa med pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/smras pa/_khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar shes/_smras pa/_ji ltar shes pa med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa de ltar ro/_/smras pa/_khyed kyis chos gang rab tu thob pas bzod 
[\[94b.5\]]pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/smras pa/_chos thams cad rab tu thob pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya/_smras pa/_rtogs par bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis so/_/smras pa/_chos bstan pa 'di khyed kyi mngon sum yin nam/_smras pa/_tshangs pa chos 
[\[94b.6\]]thams cad bdag dang gzhan med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin no/_/de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'dus par gyur pa des tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chung ngu na nyan par 'gyur ba de dag gal te 
[\[94b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas lung ma bstan kyang kho bos de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bras bu dang sa bon chud mi gzon pa'o/_/'phags pa yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]yongs su bzung ba'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bskyed pa'o/_/bdud dang phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa'o/_/bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/dang ba skye bar byed pa'o/_/dad pa dang ldan pa rnams dga' zhing mgu bar byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[95a.2\]]thams cad kyis shin tu yongs su gzung ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par bsrungs pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gcig tu nges pa ste phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la mi slu ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam 
[\[95a.3\]]grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bden pa'i 'byung gnas so/_/chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'gyod pa rnams sel bar byed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[95a.4\]]'di ni thar bar 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par thos pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gzungs 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par bzung ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par rab tu bstan pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos 'dod pa 
[\[95a.5\]]rnams kyis legs par bsrung ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir grangs med pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni pha rol gyi rgol ba dmigs pa can gyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sbyin par 'os pa rnams dang 'thun pa'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[95a.6\]]rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lta ba ngan pa dang bral bas shes rab skyed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gti mug 'joms par byed pas ye shes bskyed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yi ge'i tshig nges pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig 
[\[95a.7\]]go/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bru 'brel bas legs par bstan pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don dam pa yang dag par ston pas don yang dag par bskyed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos brjod pa rnams kyis yongs su ma btang ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes pa 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma bor ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nor 'dod pa rnams kyi gter ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni kun tu gdungs pa rnams yongs su gdung ba med par byed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid skyed pa'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[95b.2\]]rnam grangs 'di ni le lo can rnams kyi brtson 'grus skyed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni brjed ngas pa rnams kyi bsam gtan bskyed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes rab 'chal ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'o/_/tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[95b.3\]]thams cad shin tu legs par gnas so/_/de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags pa bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bu de la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom 
[\[95b.4\]]ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag las sngon chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa lha'i bu 'dis sangs rgyas bye 
[\[95b.5\]]ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/_tshangs pa lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[95b.6\]]ro/_/gang yang de'i bar du sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag thams cad la yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_bkur stir byed par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[95b.7\]]dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za gang dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod pa rab tu thob pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang bdag ni byang chub mi 'tshal/_mi smon/_mngon par mi dga'/_mngon par ma chags/_mi dmigs/_mi sems/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog na/_ci'i slad du 
[\[96a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu la la zhig gis rtswa dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dag mer bcug nas 'di skad du rtswa dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dag ma 
[\[96a.3\]]tshig ces smras na/_de de'i dbang gis mi 'tshig pa yin no/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/_mngon par ma chags/_mi dmigs/_mi 'dod/_mi smon/_mi sems/_rnam par mi rtog kyang sangs rgyas thams cad lung ston te/_lha'i bu 'on 
[\[96a.4\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/_mngon par ma chags/_mi dmigs/_mi 'dod/_mi smon/_mi sems/_rnam par mi rtog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lung ston to/_/de nas 'khor der lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[96a.5\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/_mngon par ma chags/_mi dmigs/_mi 'tshal/_mi smon/_mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan/_de 
[\[96a.6\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi phyogs na steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[96a.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/_mngon par ma chags/_mi dmigs/_mi 'dod/_mi smon/_mi sems/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes legs par gsungs pa 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'di ni ngo mtshar te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis steng gi phyogs na sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bdag cag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[96b.2\]]pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la 'dzam bu gling 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa dang /_yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa 
[\[96b.3\]]dag gi rna lam du gda' bar 'gyur ba dang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang /_de dag la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis yongs su bzung zhing 
[\[96b.4\]]go cha chen po bgos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi nyams par byin gyis brlabs par gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa dang /_yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[96b.5\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad kyis nyon cig_/rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi 
[\[96b.6\]]bu mo chos smra ba de lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum rnams kyis yongs su srung ba rab tu thob ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag lam mam/_lam log par song ngam/_gtsug 
[\[96b.7\]]lag khang du song ngam/_gnas khang du song ngam/_'chag pa la zhugs sam/_'khor gyi nang du song yang rung ste srung bar byed do/_/spobs pa skyed par byed/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te/_de la pha rol gyi rgol ba'am/_phas kyi dgra glags tshol 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bdag gis glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dran zhing shes bzhin du ldang bar 'gyur/_'chag par 'gyur/_'dug par 'gyur/_nyal bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ud d+hu re/_d+hu d+hu re/_man te/_
[\[97a.2\]]tsa ti ma/_go tsa re/_shI la li/_hi li mi li/_thi li/_thi mi li/_hu lu hu lu hu lu/_e bad te/_be ta Te/_kha kha re/_kha re/_kha ra ke/_A san ne/_dza ga ti/_ma hi le/_ma nu Sha/_ta ne ma na se bar gan d+he/_sarba ru ti/_ra bA ba ga te/_sin d+hu le/_na mo bud d+he b+h+yaH/_tsa di ra tre/_
[\[97a.3\]]na mo d+harmA ya ni rga ta ni/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_bA hi ta pA pe/_byu pa shAn+tA ni/_sarba pA pA ni mai tri me/_sarba bud+d+heb+h+yaHsa t+ya nir de sha brah+ma pa tho/_ma hA r-iShi b+hiH/_pra shAsta ta tra tiSh+Tha na ti/_sarba b+hu ta grA ha/_na maH_sarba bud+d+he b+h+yaH_sid+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/_'jam dpal rig pa dang 
[\[97a.4\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson pa/_rtag tu shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_mi rgod pa/_khengs pa med pa/_sems ma g.yengs pa/_kun du spyod pa gtsang ba/[ {]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang bral ba/_chog shes pa/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon 
[\[97a.5\]]par dga' ba/_'du 'dzi nyung ba/_lus dang sems dben pa/_byams pa dang snying rje la mngon par dga' ba/_chos la dga' zhing mos pa/_bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas pa/_mi slu ba/_nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson 
[\[97a.6\]]pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba/_rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sems mnyam pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa/_'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa/_sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sems 
[\[97a.7\]]mnyam pa/_'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba/_lus dang srog 'dor ba dang /_dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba/_spyod pa dang cho ga phun sum tshogs pa/_tshul khrims dang sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba/_bzod pa dang des pa mang ba/_ngan du zer ba bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/_brtson 'grus 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]brtsams pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la brtson pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_khro gnyer dang bral ba/_gsong por smra ba/_nga rgyal bcom pa/_des pa/_'grogs na bde ba/_de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos 'jam dpal sngags 
[\[97b.2\]]kyi tshig 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar na chos smra ba de tshe 'di nyid la stobs bskyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_mi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_mdo 
[\[97b.3\]]sde'i tshul khong du chud pas rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_sdom pa dang /_spyod pa mi gtong bas dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas thos pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_thos pa 
[\[97b.4\]]thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab mo'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs 
[\[97b.5\]]pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa ste/_'jam dpal spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos smra ba gang rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu 'don pa de ni stobs bskyed pa de bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i 
[\[97b.6\]]tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi skrag cing ba spu langs par gyur te/_g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[97b.7\]]bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par bgyid pa ste/_gnyen bshes dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba dang chos ston pa gang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa de dag la 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/_/de dag grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_ljongs sam/_ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas kyang rung /_khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi 
[\[98a.2\]]stobs dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o/_/bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_spro ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_gzhan gyis gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi gtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs 
[\[98a.3\]]gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_grul bum gyis glags mi rnyed do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag la 
[\[98a.4\]]bu dang gnyen bshes dang /_/bran dang 'khor rnams ci mchis pa/_/de dang bdag cag grogs bcas pas/_/bdag po de dag rim gro bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_/chos las skyes pa chos 
[\[98a.5\]]kyi sprul/_/khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu/_/zhugs pa de dag rim gro bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di/_/gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams/_/de dag phyogs bcu rnams su yang /_/
[\[98a.6\]]bdag gis kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa/_/de la ci 'dra 'os pa yi/_/de 'dra'i mchod par bgyi ba ni/_/sems can kun gyis mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po 
[\[98a.7\]]chen po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba des rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs gsol nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs las bdag nyid kyis/_/chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi/_/pha rol la yang bstan par bgyi/_/bdag gi bsam pa de 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]'dra'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag sems dang /_/sngon gyi spyad pa ci 'dra mkhyen/_/ji ltar bdag gi sems 'dud pa/_/bdag ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren gyur/_/sangs rgyas dpag med skyob pa la/_/bdag gis gdugs 'di phul ba yis/_/bdag ni thub pa khyod 'dra bar/_/spyi 
[\[98b.2\]]gtsug bltar yang mi gda' 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa yang /_/bdag gi byams pas bltas pa yis/_/yongs su dag pa'i mig thob ste/_/rgyal ba ma pham blta bar bgyi/_/ye shes pha rol phyin pa yi/_/ston pas de nas lung bstan te/_/khyod ni 'di nas phyi dus na/_/dga' 
[\[98b.3\]]ldan du yang skye bar 'gyur/_/dga' ldan nas ni shi 'phos nas/_/rgyal ba byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni/_/mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/khyod ni rab tu byung nas kyang /_/tshangs par spyad pa rab spyad de/_/bskal pa bzang 'dir gang byung ba/_/
[\[98b.4\]]bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur/_/thams cad la yang mchod byas te/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas ni/_/bskal pa bye ba drug cu na/_/de nas khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa/_/rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la/_/khyod ni chos 
[\[98b.5\]]rnams ston par 'gyur/_/tshe yi tshad ni bskal par 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos kyang /_/ma 'dres bskal pa phyed du gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[98b.6\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bsnyen bkur dang rim gro yang bgyi'o/_/gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/_klog pa der ci nas kyang chos smra ba de'i stobs dang mthu dang chos kyi mtshams 
[\[98b.7\]]sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos nyan du mchi'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu sbed byed ces bya ba des do shal rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/thub pa bdag 'dir mngon sum 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]ste/_/ji ltar khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/_/de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi/_/ye shes tshol bas bsgrub par bgyi/_/khyod kyis sngon chad ma stsal cing /_/yongs su ma btang ci ma mchis/_/bdog pa thams cad gtong ba yi/_/bdag kyang rjes su bslab par bgyi/_/khyod kyi mdo sde 'di 
[\[99a.2\]]yang ni/_/'jig rten mgon las mngon du blangs/_/yang dang yang du bshad par bgyi/_/bdag po khyod la bgyis par gzo/_/mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/_/de dag bdag gi ston pa 'dra/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas chos 'tshal bas/_/de la rtag tu rim gro bgyid/_/dam pa'i chos rnams yongs su 
[\[99a.3\]]bsrung /_/mgon po nyan thos mi nus te/_/phyi dus 'jig pa chen po'i tshe/_/bdag gis yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/_/mgon po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol/_/lha rnams the tsom gcad du gsol/_/thub pa khyu mchog khyod 'dra bar/_/ji srid yun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/kun mkhyen ye shes 
[\[99a.4\]]mkhas pa yi/_/bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan/_/nga ni ci 'dra de 'dra bar/_/khyod kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba phrag stong dang /_/bskal pa bye ba brgya yi tshe/_/'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/ming ni ye shes 'byung zhes bya/_/byang chub zhi ba thob nas kyang /_/bdud 
[\[99a.5\]]rnams rab tu btul nas ni/_/sems can bye ba brgya stong rnams/_/byang chub la yang 'god par 'gyur/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan la gnas pa yang btang ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[99a.6\]]mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par ston pa de la chos nyan du mchi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa ni 'di las skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro bgyi bar spro'o/_/de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[99a.7\]]gyis rim gro bgyi ba dang mchod par 'os pa lags so/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma/_/gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/skye bo kun gyi 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]mchod rten de/_/gal te mdo sde 'di la ni/_/sems can gcig 'ga' btsud na yang /_/'gro ba'i mgon po bdag spro'o/_/chos smra ba ni de dag la/_/khri stan gang la de mchis te/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab ston par/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du/_/me tog dgram par bdag spro'o/_/
[\[99b.2\]]gang gi lag nas mdo sde 'di/_/phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur/_/de la a la la zhes ni/_/legs smras legs zhes brjod par bgyi/_/gang na mdo sde 'di mchis par/_/me yi phung pos gang ba yi/_/bye ba snyed kyi zhing rgal nas/_/skyo mi 'tshal bar mchi bar bgyi/_/rin chen phung 
[\[99b.3\]]po ri rab tsam/_/dga' bzhin du ni phul nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas kyi yang lam sbyong ba/_/mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bur mngon par 'dus byas pas bdud 
[\[99b.4\]]sdig to can dpung gi stobs bzhi dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dpung dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[99b.5\]]pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te/_gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ljongs kyi phyogs der chos nyan pa dang /_chos smra ba dag la bdud kyi las mi bgyid pa'i steng du bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar yang bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 
[\[99b.6\]]gser gyi kha dog lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par mdzad de 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam 
[\[99b.7\]]grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so/_/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid du 'dzam bu gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' mgu rangs yid bde bar gyur 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]nas spos thams cad dang /_phreng ba thams cad dang /_byug pa thams cad dang /_me tog thams cad dang /_phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas tshig kyang 'di skad ces/_e ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas 
[\[100a.2\]]pa dang rgyas par gyur cig ces 'dzer to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[100a.3\]]kun dga' bo de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir khyod la yongs su gtad do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_gzhan dag la 
[\[100a.4\]]ston tam/_yi ger bris pa la mchod pa bgyid na de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 
[\[100a.5\]]bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_bzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang /_klog pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/_/kun dga' bo gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[100a.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te/_mchod na des tshe 'di nyid la gter 'thob pa bcu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang /_lha'i rna ba rab tu thob pas chos nyan pa'i gter dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rab 
[\[100a.7\]]tu thob pas dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang /_rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod kyi gter dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas gzugs kyi gter dang /_g.yog mi phyed pas g.yog gi gter dang /_gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]gter dang /_spobs pa rab tu thob pas dran pa'i gter dang /_pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang /_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi gter ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[100b.2\]]sa ya khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub la rab tu zhugs so/_/sems can tshad med pa yang len pa med par rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[100b.3\]]dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci/_'di ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang 
[\[100b.4\]]zung shig_/sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[100b.5\]]nur gyur pa dang /_tshangs pa khyad par sems dang /_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[100b.6\]]dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[100b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /_d+harma pA la dang /_dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de d+harma tA shI la dang /_par zhus kyi lo tsA ba ban+de de ben dra rak+Shi ta dang /_ku mA ra rak+Shi ta la sogs pas zhus shing gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]{D161}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su bi krAn+ta tsin+ta de ba pu tra pa ri pr-Its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[101a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[101a.3\]]dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_de las gzhan pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i 'khor mang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lus ngan la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po 
[\[101a.4\]]rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams 
[\[101a.5\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs 
[\[101a.6\]]ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_/rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de dag la sogs pa 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[101a.7\]]cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rab rtsal sems kyang 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 
[\[101b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus 
[\[101b.3\]]brtan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[101b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[101b.5\]]thos pas don la rton pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra 
[\[101b.6\]]ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[101b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas 
[\[102a.2\]]pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas pa dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i slad du snrel zhir bsgrub pa 
[\[102a.3\]]la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams 
[\[102a.4\]]lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dag thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags/_
[\[102a.5\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[102a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[102a.7\]]chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la rmas pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]mtsho lta bu rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[102b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab rtsal sems legs so 
[\[102b.3\]]legs so/_/lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas go cha bgos pa/_brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa/_ded 
[\[102b.4\]]dpon chen po/_sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa/_sems can dpag tu med pa thams cad thang bde ba la rab tu 'god pa la mkhas pa/_yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so/_/lha'i bu 
[\[102b.5\]]de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar 
[\[102b.6\]]'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe 
[\[102b.7\]]na/_thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes rab dang /_snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrub pa'i byams pa dang /_don dang chos kyis mngon par bsgrub pa'i spobs pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dag ste/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_thabs la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi/_/mngon sum shes rab 
[\[103a.2\]]rtogs par khong du chud gyur cing /_/thams cad skyabs phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la/_/gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par sgrub par byed gyur la/_/don dang chos la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ba yi/_/so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la/_/byang chub lam 
[\[103a.3\]]la mngon shes dag gis rnam rtse na/_/des ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[103a.4\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam pa dag pa'i brtul ba dang /_byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 
[\[103a.5\]]brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu gnas pa med gyur cing /_/bsam pa rnyog pa med cing yongs su dag gyur la/_/sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa grags ldan zhing /_/sangs 
[\[103a.6\]]rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yang mi skyo/_/gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad par de yod pa/_/de ni byang chub lam du mngon 'byung brtan 'gyur zhing /_/byang chub yan lag lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin gyur la/_/ring po mi thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 
[\[103a.7\]]'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms par byed pa dang /_sems can gang 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug pa dang /_sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs su bsngo ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[103b.2\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mkhas pa gang dag shes rab pha rol phyin 'doms shing /_/byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin 'jug byed pa/_/gang dag byang chub zhugs pas dus gsum yi rang zhing /_/yid dang ma bral sprul 'dra byang chub 'dod byed pa/_/dge 
[\[103b.3\]]ba gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rten par byed pa yin/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_shes pas byis 
[\[103b.4\]]pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing /_nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed pa dang /_chos thams cad rkyen las rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang /_stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing /_sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan 
[\[103b.5\]]pa dang /_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye mched drug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_shes pas las byed de dag nga rgyal yod min zhing /_/brten la mkhas pa yin zhing de dag lta med la/_/
[\[103b.6\]]stong nyid spyod yul de dag sems can mi gtong zhing /_/chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nang gnas pa ni/_/chos mchog bzhi po de la shin tu rab gnas pa/_/shes pas pha rol phyin cing chags med spyod pa yin/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[103b.7\]]chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang /_tshul gcig la 'jug pas thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de dag thos tshol ngoms med tshul bzhin rtogs byed cing /_/de mnyam ston 
[\[104a.2\]]cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa tshol mi byed/_/nyon mongs sprin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur blta/_/chos nyid tha dad mi byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug_/che bdag chos bzhi de brten khyad par thob 'gyur zhing /_/shes rab sgron 'dras mun bsal zla ltar 'jig rten rgyu/_/lha'i 
[\[104a.3\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i spobs pa 
[\[104a.4\]]thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bdag med pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_thos kun chud mi za bar 'gyur 
[\[104a.5\]]ba'i gzungs thob cing /_/de dag spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed/_/snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag med ston byed cing /_/mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos bdud kyis mi nyams la/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de dag gis 'jug na/_/
[\[104a.6\]]'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa med/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na thos pas thams cad mi 'dzin pas thos pa dang mi ldan zhing /_sgrub pa nyams pa'i 
[\[104a.7\]]byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /_yi ge dang /_sgra dang /_skad dang /_tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brag ca dang mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /_don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir/_thos pa yongs su tshol zhing dga' dgur bya 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang /_brjod du med pa'i don la 'jug cing /_brjod pa'i don ma yin pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la mi rtog pas/_/byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams/_/srid gsum 
[\[104b.2\]]sgra skad dbyangs dang tshig lam gang yod pa/_/brag ca 'dra bar de las don ldan sgra thos nas/_/don nyid rtogs shing dga' mgur nyes kun phyir mi 'jug_/chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du med/_/'di ni don dang sgra skad thos par gyur pa las/_/'gro
