[\[104b.3\]]ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la ston pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bre mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang /_skye bo phal po che 
[\[104b.4\]]'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_'du 'dzi thams cad la dben par gzhol ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang tshe skye bo mang po'i dbus su 
[\[104b.5\]]son gyur pa/_/der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya/_/skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom par bya/_/des ni bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi/_/gtong la yi rangs byas nas 
[\[104b.6\]]byang chub bsngo bya zhing /_/gang tshe 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/_/der ni dben par gzhol bar rab tu 'dod par bya/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa 
[\[104b.7\]]bzhin du smra ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_thos pa bsgrub pa snying por byed pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]ces bya ste/_nyam nga gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems mi gtong /_/de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed/_/bka' blo bde 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug_/de 
[\[105a.2\]]ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan smras bzhin byed 'gyur zhing /_/rtag brtson mi 'dor rjes 'thun bdag med ci yang med/_/rtag tu snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing /_/de ltar chos smra de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags/_/lha'i bu byang chub 
[\[105a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag nyid bsgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_bdag nyid dul ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_grol 
[\[105a.4\]]ba dang /_btul ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_dgrol ba dang /_gdul ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang /_bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[105a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing /_sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god par byed pa dang /_bdag nyid chos 'dod cing /_chos 'dod pas gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad 
[\[105a.6\]]ces bya ste/_bsgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston la/_/dul bsrung legs btul shin tu mya ngan 'das gnas kyang /_/gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan 'das/_/ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor bar 'dzud/_/de dag byang 
[\[105a.7\]]chub sems la bsam pa nges gyur cing /_/theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed/_/rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing /_/sems can rnams la de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i gnas pa dang /_rtag par rgyun du rab tu dben par gnas pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa dang /_lus dang sems mnyam pa nyid 
[\[105b.2\]]du shes pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing /_/dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la/_/shes pas zab mo'i bzod las nges pa thob gyur cing /_/mkha' dang 
[\[105b.3\]]mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa ste/_/de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jig pa med pa rnams/_/mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing /_/de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dra la/_/sems can mang po rnams kyang yongs su smin byed 
[\[105b.4\]]'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud thams cad kyis thub pa dka' ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /_sems can thams cad mi gtong 
[\[105b.5\]]ba'i snying rje chen po dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_thabs la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mtshan med stong pas nges pa'i 
[\[105b.6\]]bsam gtan bzhi bsgom zhing /_/sems can yongs su skyabs phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan/_/dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod brtson 'grus thob gyur cing /_/kun tu thabs ldan pha rol phyin pa drug la 'jug_/de ltar spyod mkhas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs 
[\[105b.7\]]pa/_/de dag bdud bzhi dag las yang dag 'das gyur cing /_/bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba mgon med rnams/_/mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na blos 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa la 
[\[106a.2\]]sems kyis nges par rtogs par byed pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang /_/rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' gyur la/_/rtag tu yid byung chos la bsam pa zhugs gyur cing /_/
[\[106a.3\]]sems kyis nges par rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa'i/_/mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan pa rab gnas pa/_/blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing /_/chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag sgrub byed pa/_/de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting 
[\[106a.4\]]dpag dka' ba yin/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_rnyed pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_bde bas khengs pa med pa dang /_ma 
[\[106a.5\]]rnyed pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_smad pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa med pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang /_phung po yongs su shes pa srung zhing dben par lta ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_
[\[106a.6\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rnyed dang snyan dang bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang /_/de dag la ni nam yang khengs par 'gyur ba med/_/ma rnyed mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang /_/de dag pad ma bzhin du chags med 'jig rten spyod/_/sems can smin par 
[\[106a.7\]]bya phyir phung po yongs spyod cing /_/phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra ya ma brlar shes pa/_/sems can phan bde'i don du 'jig rten spyod byed kyang /_/'jig rten chos kyis mi gos tshul khrims spos ngad ldan/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag la bdag med pa dang /_sems can la sems can med pa dang /_chos dben pa dang /_shes pa chags pa med pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di 
[\[106b.2\]]skad ces bya ste/_bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing /_/sems can sems can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la/_/chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing /_/mkha' la lag bzhin shes rab chags pa yod min pa'i/_/dpa' 
[\[106b.3\]]rnams zab mo dag la yongs su spyod byed la/_/spyad pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing /_/'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang rnam par bral gyur pas/_/sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[106b.4\]]po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos ston pas dbang po rnams la mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang /_shes rab rno ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang 
[\[106b.5\]]ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur cing /_/shes pas so so yang dag rig pa mi zad gyur/_/rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni/_/yang dag bsags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur pa/_/sems can rnams 
[\[106b.6\]]kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas/_/de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs su ston par byed/_/de dag bstan pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin te/_/de phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang 
[\[106b.7\]]ldan na 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing /_lta ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams thar bar byed pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rnam par 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bsam bzhin du skye ba len pa dang /_thabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyi nges par byung ba ste/_chos bzhi 
[\[107a.2\]]po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas bcing grol byed cing /_/mtshan med gnas shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed/_/smon pa med la gnas shing sems can smin bya'i phyir/_/bsam bzhin skye zhing gang du 'dod pa der 
[\[107a.3\]]skye 'gyur/_/shes rab thabs kyis nges byung rnam thar sgor gnas kyang /_/'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni dus min thob mi byed/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas 
[\[107a.4\]]pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang /_chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyis 
[\[107a.5\]]chos thams cad la nem nur med pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur cing /_/de dag rnams kyis sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong mi 'gyur/_/nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab byung bar/_/
[\[107a.6\]]shes nas de las snrel zhir kun tu ston mi byed/_chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/ma skyes ma 'gag ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin/_/de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin/_/lha'i 
[\[107a.7\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang /_mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang /_shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]pa mi spong ba dang bral ba'i rgyu sgom pa mi spong ba ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/longs spyod che rgyu sbyin pa mi spong de'i 'bras de/_/mtho ris skye rgyu tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras de/_/shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras de/_/rnam grol rig 
[\[107b.2\]]rgyu sgom par byed cing de 'bras de/_/rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas pa de dag ni/_/byang chub snying por dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan spyod/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams 
[\[107b.3\]]yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang /_rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang /_ma rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing /_bdag tu lta bar mi byed pa dang /_ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gag par lta zhing srid pa 'gog par yang mi byed pa ste/_
[\[107b.4\]]chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_nam yang rtag par mi lta chad par ltung mi byed/_/des ni chos rnams rkyen byung byed pa po dang ni/_/tshor ba po med rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes/_/ma rig rtsa las rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba/_/rgyal ba kun 
[\[107b.5\]]gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang ni/_/rkyen zad de phyir phyin cad skye mi 'gyur zhes gsungs/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang 
[\[107b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsags pa la skyo ba med pa dang /_'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa'i thabs 
[\[107b.7\]]kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing /_nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten/_/dge ba sogs shing 'dod pas yongs su skyo ba med/_/'khor ba'i 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshol zhing /_/sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[108a.2\]]longs spyod mi zad pa dang /_chos ston pa mi zad pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /_sems sa ltar mnyam pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing /_/rtag tu chos kyi mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba 
[\[108a.3\]]yin/_/de dag mngon shes lnga po mi zad rtag mi g.yo/_/rtag tu dran ldan bsam pa sa dang 'dra ba yin/_/mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing /_/mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa/_/de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsho 'gyur zhing /_/byang 
[\[108a.4\]]chub mchog phyir myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi gnas pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[108a.5\]]bzhis bsdus pa dang /_bden pa bzhi shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas byed cing /_/bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' byed la/_/bden 
[\[108a.6\]]pa bzhi po dag la 'jigs med dpa' bo rnams/_/'gro bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur/_/so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing /_/'chang dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la/_/pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bde bas mgu byed na/_/de phyir de 
[\[108a.7\]]dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /_
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang /_dben pa la dga' shing dbang po bsrung ba dang /_bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol 
[\[108b.2\]]son/_/tshul 'chos med cing rtag tu des la brtul zhugs bzang /_/nags dang nags 'dab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la/_/dran ldan bdag bde mi ltos kha na ma tho ste/_/gang la rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yod pa/_/de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson 
[\[108b.3\]]'grus zhing /_/de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la/_/de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir ni yid gzhol 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smad pa med pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[108b.4\]]dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/_bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de dag dad dang ldan la brtul ba brtan 
[\[108b.5\]]ldan zhing /_/de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa yin/_/'gro ba kun la byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing /_/byang chub ched du yongs su bsngo la mkhas pa ste/_/de phyir dge ba kun la smas pa yod min zhing /_/zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkha' la skar ma yi/_
[\[108b.6\]]tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa dag_/yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du 
[\[108b.7\]]byed pa dang /_sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang /_blo rab tu gnas pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mkhas pa de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/de dag sgrub pa snying por byed 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]cing blo rab gnas/_/gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag ston byed pa/_/de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed cing /_/dam bcas rnams 
[\[109a.2\]]la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ye shes kyi stobs can 
[\[109a.3\]]rnams yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang /_sems la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba ma yin pa dang /_gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang /_'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams yin te/_chos bzhi 
[\[109a.4\]]po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro/_/shes rab stobs kyis blun spangs lta rnams kun du bral/_/sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur la/_/spobs pa brtan par gyur cing 
[\[109a.5\]]gzungs kyis 'khrugs pa med/_/de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te/_/de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/_
[\[109a.6\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_nga rgyal med pa dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_'dun pa drag po ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_nga rgyal med cing bla mar gus pas gnas gyur la/_/kun nas bag yod byang chub mchog la 
[\[109a.7\]]'dun drag cing /_/bsam pa thag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la/_/slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/_/mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing /_/tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i mkhas pas brtan pa rnams/_/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud/_/de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'dud/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing /_yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa 
[\[109b.2\]]rnams yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par brtse ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang /_dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan 
[\[109b.3\]]zhing dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas brtse/_/bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i spobs dang ldan/_/brtson 'grus thogs med mi dge 
[\[109b.4\]]bag chags kun spongs shing /_/dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste/_/chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa/_/de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i yon tan ldan/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi rnams las 
[\[109b.5\]]srog chags sa ya nyis 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi 
[\[109b.6\]]mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing /_'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to/_/lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu phab 
[\[109b.7\]]cing /_lha'i sil snyan dag gi sgra yang byung bar gyur to/_/klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang /_klu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab po/_/lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang bcom 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang /_a la la chos/_a la la chos/_a la la chos zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so/_/de 
[\[110a.2\]]nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa bstan par bka' stsal gyis/_'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum cu 
[\[110a.3\]]rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub 
[\[110a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[110a.5\]]chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[110a.6\]]chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub 
[\[110a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi 
[\[110b.2\]]chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams 
[\[110b.3\]]cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 
[\[110b.4\]]'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phye na mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa 
[\[110b.5\]]dang bral ba rnams yin no/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad 
[\[110b.6\]]brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/_'jam 
[\[110b.7\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams 
[\[111a.2\]]cad la rten par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 
[\[111a.3\]]la chos smra ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no/_/
[\[111a.4\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams 
[\[111a.5\]]cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub 
[\[111a.6\]]par dka' ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[111a.7\]]dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[111b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub 
[\[111b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[111b.4\]]lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[111b.5\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed par de lta na 
[\[111b.6\]]lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin/_'jam 
[\[111b.7\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[112a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la/_mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub 
[\[112a.3\]]pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[112a.4\]]chen po rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i 
[\[112a.5\]]rnam pa dang bral zhing /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[112a.6\]]dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/_'jam 
[\[112a.7\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtogs pa nyid byang 
[\[112b.2\]]chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing 
[\[112b.3\]]bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed/_lta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[112b.4\]]chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi 
[\[112b.5\]]tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang 
[\[112b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[112b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang ba de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/
[\[113a.2\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang 
[\[113a.3\]]len par mi byed/_spong bar mi byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod 
[\[113a.4\]]pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[113a.5\]]chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub 
[\[113a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed par mi byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[113a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na/_byang 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[113b.2\]]bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing /_tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams 
[\[113b.3\]]yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing /_yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[113b.4\]]rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang bsgrub par mi byed/_chos 'ga' yang sel bar mi byed pa de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin 
[\[113b.5\]]no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos lung bstan pa la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par 
[\[113b.6\]]dag go/_/srog chags 'bum lhag tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir/_lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/thams cad dang 
[\[113b.7\]]ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yi rangs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag cig gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]spobs pa mi chod pa yang thob par gyur cig ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras te legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin to//_//
[\[114a.2\]]bam po gnyis pa/_de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di skad du khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam zhes zer ba ni/_lha'i bu 
[\[114a.3\]]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/_chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ltar mi snang ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni mngon 
[\[114a.4\]]par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa 
[\[114a.5\]]yin no/_/chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba 
[\[114a.6\]]med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni brtag cing sel ba dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir mi 
[\[114a.7\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang /_rlom sems med pa dang /_ma brtags pa dang /_rnam par ma brtags pa dang /_rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang /_kun tu ma bstan pa yin no/_/chos 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]'di ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas pa med par gnas pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i 
[\[114b.2\]]phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtag pa med pa yin 
[\[114b.3\]]no/_/chos 'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa med 
[\[114b.4\]]pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyir mi rten pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni mi rten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni gtan 
[\[114b.5\]]mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni mtshan 
[\[114b.6\]]nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni gzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no/_/chos 'di ni gzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa med pa yin no/_/chos 'di ni mi phyed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir nam mkha'i 
[\[114b.7\]]mtshan nyid lta bu yin na/_lha'i bu chos de lta bu la chos kyi dgab pa de lta bu zhig yod/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgab pa ni kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu legs so legs so/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]te/_chos 'di'i dgab pa ni gang la lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyis rtul ba med pa de lta bu yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 'di ni gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pas/_de ni sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[115a.2\]]dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan ma rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/sgra dang /_skad dang /_dbyangs dang /_tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par 
[\[115a.3\]]byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas/_dge 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/nyon mongs pa gtan spang ba rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/skye ba la rten pas lha rjes 
[\[115a.4\]]su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/sems can la brten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes 
[\[115a.5\]]rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/sems la nges par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/the tsom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/
[\[115a.6\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar 
[\[115a.7\]]gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]po lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/lta ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam 
[\[115b.2\]]sgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/kun 'byung ba la sgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/'gag par zad pa 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems 
[\[115b.3\]]rnyog pa can yin no/_/lam la sgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin te/_lha'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa gang 
[\[115b.4\]]dag yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag go/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal nam mkha' la sems cung zad kyang yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la sems med pa bzhin 
[\[115b.5\]]du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste/_gang gi sems de 'dra ba de ni sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gnas de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba 
[\[115b.6\]]yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/_'jam dpal 
[\[115b.7\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_bdag dang /_bdag med par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/stong pa zhes bya 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]ba dang /_gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_brag ca dang /_chu zla dang /_smig rgyu dang /_
[\[116a.2\]]sprul pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa dag gi chos rnam par 'jog par byed/_mtshon par byed/_'jug par byed/_ston par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/de ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed pa dang /_rnam 
[\[116a.3\]]par byang ba la skyon med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no/_/'khor ba la skyon du lta bar byed pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/_lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis lhag par byed pa dag yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_
[\[116a.4\]]'jam dpal ji ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing /_nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te/_gnas kyang 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la/_skye ba med pa skyed par yang mi 
[\[116a.5\]]byed cing /_sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi byed la/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing /_chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga 
[\[116a.6\]]rgyal med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu nyi khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri 
[\[116a.7\]]nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/khyim 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yod pa dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[116b.2\]]pa la dris shig_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge 
[\[116b.3\]]slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang /_mtha' med pa dang /_gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_'jam dpal ci 
[\[116b.4\]]las bsams te de skad smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/_mtha' ni ngar 'dzin pa yin/_gnas ni khams gsum pa yin/_'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin/_mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/_de la des lus ni rtsa ba med 
[\[116b.5\]]par shes/_ngar 'dzin pa ni mtha' med par shes/_khams gsum ni gnas med par shes/_nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrugs par shes/_bsam gtan rnams ni gnyis su med par shes pas na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po kho bos de las bsams nas dge slong rnam 
[\[116b.6\]]par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang /_mtha' med pa dang /_gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[116b.7\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang chags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing /_nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]cad la mngon sum du byed kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no/_/maud gal 
[\[117a.2\]]gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang ma thob/_'dus ma byas kyang ma thob la/_slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams 
[\[117a.3\]]kyang 'dul bar byed na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub 
[\[117a.4\]]sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/_pha rol dang tshu rol dang bral bar byed cing /_byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang mi spong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang zhing /_bya ba thams cad kyang ston par byed na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa 
[\[117a.5\]]med par gnas pa yin no/_/byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thams cad kyis spobs par byed cing /_'du byed thams 
[\[117a.6\]]cad mi rtag go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/_bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge ston pa rnams kyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos ston pa yin no/_/nam grus smras pa/_
[\[117a.7\]]'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa nam gru gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la/_sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]la snying rje chen po bskyed de/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du spyod par byed cing /_bsam gtan la gnas pa las g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no/_/nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[117b.2\]]'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan dul ba nyid du yang shes par byed cing ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang bral la/_ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed cing /_
[\[117b.3\]]de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par yang byed la byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no/_/ma 'gags pas smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[117b.4\]]btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed la/_gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa 
[\[117b.5\]]yin no/_/ba ku las smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrung ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yul med par lta na de tsam gyis 
[\[117b.6\]]na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrung ba yin no/_/sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/_mtshams med pa dang 
[\[117b.7\]]mnyam par lta bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no/_/kA t+yA'i bu chen pos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po gang gi tshe 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing /_tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/_ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang /_rnam par byang ba len par mi byed pa 
[\[118a.2\]]de ltar ston par byed pa dang /_chos nyid gnas pa las kyang mi g.yo la gnas thams cad la yang mi rten pa de ltar ston par byed na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/gsus po che chen pos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na 
[\[118a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag rig pa thob pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i don gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang /_ming 
[\[118a.4\]]dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang /_brag ca dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston par byed na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no/_/sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_
[\[118a.5\]]'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_tshul 
[\[118a.6\]]khrims 'chal pa'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' 
[\[118a.7\]]bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs par nyan par byed cing thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtogs par byed la/_ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin par byed cing /_ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad bstan pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag cag la ni chos de dag las 'ga' tsam 
[\[118b.2\]]yang med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na khyed cag nyan thos chen po mchog tu gyur pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ram/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gnag rjes las brten na rdzing bu mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang 
[\[118b.3\]]mchog yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po las brten na 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las brten na byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bus de ni nyan thos mngon pa'i nga rgyal med 
[\[118b.4\]]pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te/_legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin te/_nyan thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad 
[\[118b.5\]]smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang sangs rgyas la brten nas nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin la/_nga rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na/_de'i phyir 
[\[118b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na/_byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[118b.7\]]de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pa rjod par byed cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bsngags pa ma yin par rjod par byed pa dang /_ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur snyam nas bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos rjod par byed cing /_'di la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/
[\[119a.2\]]snyam nas theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la stod par byed pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur 
[\[119a.3\]]ram/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gis nor bu mching bu'i bsngags pa ma yin par rjod cing /_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na de yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras 
[\[119a.4\]]pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis 'khor los sgyur 
[\[119a.5\]]ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa rjod cing khams kyi rgyal po la de lta ma yin na/_de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam mam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la stod par byed 
[\[119a.6\]]cing nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yang smad pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi tshig de ni legs par smras te/_'jam dpal theg 
[\[119a.7\]]pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas ni theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal theg pa thams cad ni de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/_/lha'i 
[\[119b.2\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du zin na ni byang chub 
[\[119b.3\]]sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas go cha gyon par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig la rten/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rten to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[119b.4\]]lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ci la rten/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni rtsa ba med pa'i gnas la rten pa yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[119b.5\]]phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang /_mngon par skabs yod pa dang /_nam mkha' la rten pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[119b.6\]]chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na/_lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'o na ci 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[119b.7\]]dang /_gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin te/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa ni sangs 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]rgyas yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis rnam grangs 
[\[120a.2\]]kyis ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar rtogs par thugs su chud/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sems can med pa'i rnam pa dang stong pa nyid 
[\[120a.3\]]kyis rnam pas so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed na ni de stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa dang rtsol 
[\[120a.4\]]ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhes ma gsungs sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa 
[\[120a.5\]]nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ji zhig la gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa la gnas pa ma 
[\[120a.6\]]yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/_lus dang sems la gnas pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de yang stong pas na/_stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus 
[\[120a.7\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa yin pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas par mdzad do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su med pa nyid yin gyi/_de la gnas pa gzhan med de/_de'i gnas 
[\[120b.2\]]pa gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang gnyis su med pa nyid yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gnyis zhes bya ba ni gang /_gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'dod chags dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de ni gnyis so/_
[\[120b.3\]]'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/zhe sdang dang /_zhe sdang med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/_/zhe sdang gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/gti mug dang /_gti mug med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/_/gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon 
[\[120b.4\]]mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/_/nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/bdag dang bdag med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/_/bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[120b.5\]]lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin no/_/bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir gzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang /_gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid dang /_gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin 
[\[120b.6\]]zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/de ni gzod ma nyid nas gsal zhing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/
[\[120b.7\]]de ni spros pa dang bral ba dang /_de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang /_de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/de ni blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pa dag go/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal rang bzhin shes pa dag gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag go/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[121a.2\]]mtshan nyid gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[121a.3\]]dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing /_gzhan gyi dad pas yang dang yang du mi 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/_de ni dad pas byin pa spyod par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[121a.4\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal dge slong gang /_dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de la ji skad ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni des na 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 
[\[121a.5\]]'dus ma byas pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur/_
[\[121a.6\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob nas sems can rnams skyob par mi byed cing nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so skye bo'i sa yin la/_'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyi sa yin na/_'o na 
[\[121a.7\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing /_so so skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la yang mi gnas/_'dus ma byas la yang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa yin pas 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang /_'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pa yin te/_de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas 
[\[121b.2\]]la mi gnas la/_'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas ni 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_tshan po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par gyur la/_de nas mda' de nam mkha' la mi gnas par 'dug cing sa la yang mi ltung na/_lha'i bu de la dka' ba cung 
[\[121b.3\]]zad yod dam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal dka'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing /_'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/_'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung zhing /_'dus byas 
[\[121b.4\]]thob pa rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ni ches dka' ba yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig pa 'dus byas sam/_'on te 'dus ma byas sam/_gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig pa ni 'dus 
[\[121b.5\]]byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jig pa 'byung la/_'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jig pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal nyon 
[\[121b.6\]]mongs pa med pas 'jig pa ci yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jig pa yod la/_byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na/_de ni nyan thos su 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[121b.7\]]sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing /_thabs kyi shes pas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems 
[\[122a.2\]]dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/_'dus byas la sbyor bar byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/_'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang 
[\[122a.3\]]chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas la gnas te/_bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing /_thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[122a.4\]]byang chub kyi sems la gnas te dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed cing /_snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la 
[\[122a.5\]]gnas te bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing /_thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te chos ston par byed cing /_/
[\[122a.6\]]snying rje chen po la gnas te/_zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te/_mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su spyad pa'i las byed cing /_mya ngan las 'das 
[\[122a.7\]]pa la gnas te/_'khor ba yongs su spyad pa'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing /_'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byed pa dang /_chos la lta 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]bas snang bar byed cing /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang /_thams cad dang rjes su 'brel zhing zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang /_'bar bar byed cing /_'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs su sbyong bar 
[\[122b.2\]]byed cing /_nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing /_nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing /_chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang /_bdud kyi lcags 
[\[122b.3\]]kyu shes par byed cing /_chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang /_shes pas 'jug par byed cing /_thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang /_'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing /_'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba la 
[\[122b.4\]]mngon par dga' bar byed cing /_chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/
[\[122b.5\]]lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni spobs pa thogs pa med pa skyes so/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu 
[\[122b.6\]]las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so/_/gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[122b.7\]]'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/_'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /_zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]yang chos ston par byed la/_zhe sdang spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /_gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/_gti mug spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed la/_nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon du yang mi byed 
[\[123a.2\]]pa de tsam gyis na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la stong pa nyid ston par yang byed la/_stong pa nyid mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang 
[\[123a.3\]]byed la/_mtshan ma med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la/_smon pa med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dngos po 
[\[123a.4\]]med pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang /_'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la/_'gog pa mngon du yang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin 
[\[123a.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_
[\[123a.6\]]brjed ngas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_bems po dang /_lug ltar lkugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji las bsams 
[\[123a.7\]]te de skad smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do/_/lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_
[\[123b.2\]]tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rab dang /_shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas/_rnam par grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed de/_lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des/_gang tshul khrims las yang 
[\[123b.3\]]dag par 'da' ba de/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni/_nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs 
[\[123b.4\]]pa yin pas/_de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/_gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi rtul bar mi byed cing /_ngag dang /_sems kyis rtul 
[\[123b.5\]]bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la/_gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/_rmi lam na yang sa gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas/_de ni brjed ngas pa yin 
[\[123b.6\]]la/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed ngas pa de ni/_theg pa chen po la mnyam par bzhag pa yin pas/_de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no/_/lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_lam dang /_mig yor 
[\[123b.7\]]dang /_lug ltar lkugs pa dang 'dra bar/_rang bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/_gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang /_ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang /_lug ltar lkugs pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]sgrub par byed pa yin te/_de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang /_lam 
[\[124a.2\]]gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing /_lam gyi bya ba yang sgrub par byed pa dang /_lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[124a.3\]]can thams cad dang /_chos thams cad btsal yang mi rnyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang /_'bras bu yod pa bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[124a.4\]]dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/_nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed la lam 
[\[124a.5\]]des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[124a.6\]]don du mi gnyer ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 
[\[124a.7\]]de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang /_lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]lam la gnas pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas/_sems 
[\[124b.2\]]can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/_bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar 
[\[124b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang /_'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang /_nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba ston par byed kyang /_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'byung 
[\[124b.4\]]ba med par shes shing /_skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la yongs su spyod par byed kyang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched yongs su shes par bya 
[\[124b.5\]]ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams la chos ston kyang /_yongs su shes pa de dag yongs su shes par mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par sgrub par byed cing /_sems rnam par 
[\[124b.6\]]g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang /_nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang /_bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang /_bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang /_bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug 
[\[124b.7\]]pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang /_sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas na/_de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod byang chub 
[\[125a\]]
