[\[125a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu bsam pa yongs su dag cing /_nang dang /_phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang /_rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang /_
[\[125a.2\]]sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa la spyod pa dang /_sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang /_sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang /_rmas pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang /_lus dang sems dben pa nyid kyis brtson 
[\[125a.3\]]'grus la spyod pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang /_spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang /_sems can la bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin par rab tu zhi ba 
[\[125a.4\]]nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang /_mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang /_gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal 
[\[125a.5\]]ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang /_phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang /_'du shes yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang /_phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes 
[\[125a.6\]]pa la spyod pa dang /_ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gog pa shes pa la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang /_'bras bu yongs su shes pa nyid kyis rgyu 
[\[125a.7\]]shes pa la spyod pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang /_du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang /_brjod du med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]dang /_ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang /_sgra brag ca dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang /_tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye 
[\[125b.2\]]shes la rton pa la spyod pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa stong pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa la spyod pa dang /_gang zag yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton pa la spyod pa dang /_las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir spyod pa dang /_
[\[125b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang /_sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa la spyod pa dang /_mi phyed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang /_
[\[125b.4\]]mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang /_bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa la spyod pa dang /_tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod pa dang /_thams cad rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang /_rnam 
[\[125b.5\]]par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang /_rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang /_bdag mi sbed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_sems rang bzhin med 
[\[125b.6\]]pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang /_khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la spyod pa dang /_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud 
[\[125b.7\]]tshar bcad pa la spyod pa dang /_spyod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa la spyod pa ste/_lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin te/_lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas 
[\[126a.2\]]rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang /_gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /_dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang /_gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[126a.3\]]rgyas ma yin pa dang /_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang /_ston pa ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o/_/lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[126a.4\]]gang so so skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang /_'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang /_zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang /_gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang /_gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub 
[\[126a.5\]]sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 
[\[126a.6\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_ston pa dang /_so so skye bo'i chos can dang /_'dod chags kyi chos can dang /_
[\[126a.7\]]zhe sdang gi chos can dang /_gti mug gi chos can dang /_'khor ba'i chos can dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang /_chags pa thams cad 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]la dad par byed kyang de la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa skyed cing 'dzin par byed pa dang /_chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams thar par byed pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol 
[\[126b.2\]]bar byed pa dang /_'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/_
[\[126b.3\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin par byed pa dang /_kun 'dzin par byed pa dang /_chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang /_chos la gnas kyi nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang /_
[\[126b.4\]]chos kyi stobs can yin gyi nga rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang /_chos smra ba yin gyi 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang /_chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang /_chos smra 
[\[126b.5\]]ba yin gyi chos ma yin par mi smra ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /_nor bdun dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[126b.6\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /_chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[126b.7\]]gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang /_lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang /_sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam des nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang /_
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtogs pa brgyad la gnas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag 
[\[127a.2\]]pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su 
[\[127a.3\]]dad pa rnams rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang /_'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad kyang gcod par byed la 'khor ba mi gcod pa dang /_ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang /_
[\[127a.4\]]mtshams bcad pa dang /_lha dang mi la gzhol ba dang /_bden pa ston par byed pa dang /_rlom sems su mi ltung ba dang /_the tsom dang bral ba dang /_nges pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang /_so so skye bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam 
[\[127a.5\]]la rab tu gnas pa dang /_'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang /_'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa dang /_'dus byas la snang ba dang /_'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang /_phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun la 
[\[127a.6\]]yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong 
[\[127a.7\]]ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du 'ong ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro bar ston par byed pa dang /_chos nyid la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med par mthong ba dang /_'ong yang nyon mongs 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]pa med pas 'ong ba dang /_rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba mnyam pa nyid mi spong ba dang /_bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /_nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang /_byang chub kyi lhag pa'i 
[\[127b.2\]]bsam pa sra zhing mi phyed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang /_
[\[127b.3\]]phyin ci log rnams dang /_sgrib pa rnams su yang mi 'ong ba dang /_'dun pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang /_'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_byas pa nges par ma gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong 
[\[127b.4\]]ba dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang /_rga shi med pa la thob pa dang /_mthar gnas pa dang /_byas pa nges pa dang /_lung bstan pa thob pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_rnam pa med pa thob pa dang /_shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na lha'i bu byang 
[\[127b.5\]]chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la 
[\[127b.6\]]chos ston pa dang /_sdang ba med cing zhe sdang gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems 
[\[127b.7\]]ma btang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang pad ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang /_shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang /_
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang /_nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gir med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med 
[\[128a.2\]]pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med par gnas par byed pa dang /_sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_tshu rol dang pha rol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang /_tshu rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang /_
[\[128a.3\]]gzhan gyis sems can gzhan thar bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[128a.4\]]can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul rnams la spyod par mi byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang /_rgyu dang /_rkyen dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_
[\[128a.5\]]rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med par sgrogs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyus nye bar 'gro bar rtsoms shig ces sgrogs 
[\[128a.6\]]par byed pa dang /_sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_thos pas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang /_sgrogs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi chad pa yongs su shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa thob pa dang /_don dang tshig dang yig 'bru mi zad pa 
[\[128a.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa dang /_shes par ston par byed pa dang /_so so ci rigs par chos ston par byed pa dang /_zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gang zag med 
[\[128b.2\]]pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /_des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 
[\[128b.3\]]phyogs dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang /_tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang /_mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang /_de rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang /_sa ngan pa dag 
[\[128b.4\]]las sems skyo bar byed pa dang /_nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang /_theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na 
[\[128b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang /_ming mngon par 
[\[128b.6\]]rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang /_mchog dang /_bar ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang /_rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang /_skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyi sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang /_
[\[128b.7\]]sems can gyi dbang po dang /_mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang /_'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa 
[\[129a.2\]]dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi sems can 
[\[129a.3\]]med pa dang /_sems can yongs su thar bar byed pa dang /_sems can gyi gnas dang /_'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang /_spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang /_de na yang yin la de na yang ma yin pa dang /_'di na yang yin la 'di na 
[\[129a.4\]]yang ma yin pa dang /_gnyis ka las dag pa dang /_mun pa dang bral ba dang /_rtag tu gsal ba dang /_mun pa med pa dang /_mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[129a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang /_chu bo las rgal ba dang /_srid pa mthong ba dang /_
[\[129a.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi khur dang /_srid pa 'joms pa dang /_srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang /_bdud bcom pa dang /_khur bor ba dang /_srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_bya ba shes pa dang /_srid pa'i 'dod chags bsal ba dang /_lus dang sems sgom pa 
[\[129a.7\]]dang /_tshul khrims dang /_shes rab bsgoms pa dang /_srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang /_srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang /_sems can la bsam pa ma btang ba dang /_srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang /_chu lon dang zam pa legs par byas pa dang /_mi gnas pas 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]legs par mthong ba dang /_rtag tu sgom pa la yid kyis brtson pa dang /_sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang /_srid pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar rlog par byed pa dang /_srid pas rnam par rtse 
[\[129b.2\]]ba la mkhas pa dang /_srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams kyis mchod pa de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/_'jam dpal 
[\[129b.3\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang /_phyin ci log rnams dang /_sgrib pa rnams dang /_chod pa rnams dang /_
[\[129b.4\]]kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang mnyam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas 
[\[129b.5\]]mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang /_slob pa'i chos rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam 
[\[129b.6\]]pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang /_chos thams cad gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang /_
[\[129b.7\]]yod pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]ston pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa dang /_rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yos pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /_bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[130a.2\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa dang /_ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang /_gling dang /_dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[130a.3\]]the tsom dang bral ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong gis phyag byas pa dang /_yang dag par smra ba dang /_khams gsum pas phyag byas pa dang /_sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing khengs pa 
[\[130a.4\]]med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_dgod pa dang /_bshung ba dang /_khro ba dang /_skyo ba dang /_bsdigs pa thams cad dang /_rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gyi rang bzhin legs par 
[\[130a.5\]]mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba dang /_'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo'i chos can yin/_'jam 
[\[130a.6\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi so so skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la shes pas so so skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo'i chos can yin no/_/lha'i 
[\[130a.7\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang /_sems 
[\[130b.2\]]can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang 
[\[130b.3\]]gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang bar byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_'du byed thams cad la skyon du yang 'du shes la nyon mongs pa rnams 
[\[130b.4\]]dang 'du byed rnams spong bar yang mi byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyun gcod par mi byed pa dang /_snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyed par byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin 
[\[130b.5\]]par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang /_sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang /_'chi 'pho'i thabs thams cad dang /_'khor ba sun 'byin par 
[\[130b.6\]]byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas de la 
[\[130b.7\]]gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de/_shes par mi byed/_rnam par shes par mi byed/_kun tu shes par mi byed/_len par mi byed/_spong bar mi byed/_'byung bar mi byed/_'jig par mi byed/_g.yo bar mi byed/_rlom sems 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]su mi byed/_skyod par mi byed cing /_chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can 
[\[131a.2\]]yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la de nyid las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang /_bdud thams cad dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_
[\[131a.3\]]sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phral zhing spyod pa rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang /_don 'thun par byed pa dang /_mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_phyir zlog par byed pa dang /_byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par 
[\[131a.4\]]byed pa dang /_'khor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang /_'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas pa yang mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[131a.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa 
[\[131a.6\]]dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang /_sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum gyis 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[131a.7\]]'das pa la yang spyod par byed la/_gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang /_
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_rjes su snying brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/srog chags 
[\[131b.2\]]drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni 
[\[131b.3\]]mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur to/_/srog chags sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[131b.4\]]gyur pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/_
[\[131b.5\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang tshe sems ni chags med pa/_/bla med byang chub sems yin te/_/sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni/_/
[\[131b.6\]]byang chub tu ni yongs bsngo zhing /_/byang chub sems las rab rtas pa/_/de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/sems can thams cad bdag med cing /_/mi bden ya ma brla gsog tu/_/gang tshe shes pas shes byed pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/gang phyir sems can thams 
[\[131b.7\]]cad dag_/byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing /_/bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pa/_/de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag_/gtan du mthong bar mi byed cing /_/'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/nang dang yang na phyi rol dag_/
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]thams cad yongs su gtong byed cing /_/sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba/_/de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/zhi zhing rab zhi gtsang dag cing /_/tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la/_/lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/tshul 
[\[132a.2\]]khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed la/_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims sngo byed pa/_/de phyir thabs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad rab stong zhing /_/bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la/_/lus dang sems kyis ma smas pa/_/de ni 
[\[132a.3\]]shes rab pha rol phyin/_/lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing /_/ngag dang sems kyis ma yin la/_/chos rnams kun la dben gyur pa/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/sems can kun gyi khro ba dang /_/gsod dang 'ching ba bzod byed cing /_/sems can de dag mi spong ba/_/
[\[132a.4\]]de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/_/sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/bsam gtan bde ba rab spangs nas/_/grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa/_/de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/_/tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/_/'thun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing /_/spros pa'i lta ba rgyun 
[\[132a.5\]]bcad pa/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin/_/gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas/_/de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing /_/sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa/_/de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no/_/sangs rgyas gzugs med mkha' 'dra bar/_/chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing /_/
[\[132a.6\]]de tshe gzugs la zhen med pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing /_/sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la/_/'dren kun mchod du 'jug byed pa/_/de phyir thabs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing /_/mkha' dang 
[\[132a.7\]]mnyam pas mnyam gyur la/_/chos 'ga'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/_/lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing /_/'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pa/_/de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no/_/chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/_/
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing /_/de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba/_/de ni shes rab sgo yin no/_/gang gi chos nyid ci 'dra ba/_/sems can de 'drar shes byed cing /_/de ltar rtog par byed pa'i mtha'/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/chos kun 'chi 'pho yod 
[\[132b.2\]]min zhing /_/skye ba med par shes byed la/_/mi 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/mkhas pas 'dod dang gzugs rnams su/_/bsam bzhin du ni skye byed pa/_/de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin/_/dgon 
[\[132b.3\]]pa gnas rab gnas byed cing /_/nyon mongs med la rab gnas la/_/bsam gtan rnam thar rten byed pa/_/de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yin/_/grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni/_/song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing /_/mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i/_/mkhas 
[\[132b.4\]]pa thabs la mkhas pa yin/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad las/_/skrag cing 'du 'dzi bsten med la/_/bdag nyid dul zhing zhi gyur pa/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/'gro ba dag na 'dus chen dang /_/tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed pa/_/kun na snang ba de dag 
[\[132b.5\]]ni/_/thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin/_/brtan pa chags med spyod byed cing /_/yi ge don gnyer mi byed la/_/brjod med nges don don gnyer ba/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na/_/snang zhing chos rnams ston byed la/_/dkon 
[\[132b.6\]]mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa/_/de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/_/mngon shes shes la mkhas gyur cing /_/zhi zhing dul la zag pa med/_/gdeg med gzhag pa yod min pa/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing /_/zhing rnams bye 
[\[132b.7\]]bar 'gro byed la/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mang mchod pa/_/de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin/_/phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shing /_/nyon mongs dngos med shes byed nas/_/de dag bdud kun zhi gyur pa/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/bdud rnams thams cad ston byed cing /_/
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la/_/de las sems can thar byed pa/_/de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no/_/stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang /_/smon par byed pa yod min pa'i/_/rnam thar sgo la ston byed pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin/_/chags med sdang ba 
[\[133a.2\]]yod min zhing /_/rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang /_/blang med dor ba yod min pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing /_/stong nyid rab tu sten gyur la/_/kun gyi pha rol son gyur pa/_/mnyam nyid 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/
[\[133a.3\]]zag med brtul ba ma yin pa/_/de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing /_/'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni/_/sems can kun gyi grogs su 'gyur/_/bsod nams tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i/_/mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin/_/shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yi/_/
[\[133a.4\]]yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni/_/shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' ste/_/des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung /_/thabs dang mi ldan shes rab kyis/_/ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba med/_/shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni/_/mkhas pa rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/_/shes rab 
[\[133a.5\]]dang ni thabs shes pa/_/de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cing /_/gnyis ka zung du 'jug 'gyur na/_/des ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/gang dag bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags shing /_/ye shes pha rol phyin 'gyur te/_/de ni chos rnams chos nyid do/_/
[\[133a.6\]]de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/_/chos dbyings dbyer med dga' byed cing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'i/_/rdul med byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[133a.7\]]dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi yul ni rang gi yul dben pa nyid do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtha' gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong pa nyid yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi gnas gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas 
[\[133b.2\]]ni chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi sgo gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi sgo ni kun nas sgo yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi rtsom pa gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[133b.3\]]lha'i bu byang chub kyi rtsom pa ni sems can thams cad bdag med pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub ci dang mnyam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub ni chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mnyam mo/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang 
[\[133b.4\]]chub kyi bgrod pa gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yin no/_/byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni 'gro ba med par 'gro ba dang /_rgyu ba med par 'gro ba yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang 
[\[133b.5\]]chub gang gi rgyu 'thun pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub ni snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal snying rje chen po gang gi rgyu 'thun pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu snying rje chen po ni sems can thams 
[\[133b.6\]]cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub ga las btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs pa las btsal bar bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[133b.7\]]dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ga las btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te 'phags pa'i lam gnyis su gyur pa zhig yin na ni/_'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/_lha'i bu 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyis su gyur pa 
[\[134a.2\]]med pa ste/_nyon mongs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe btsal na nyon mongs pa rnams mi rnyed cing 'khor ba yang 
[\[134a.3\]]mi rnyed/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi rnyed pa de ltar na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu 
[\[134a.4\]]rtsa gnyis dang /_phyin ci log bzhi dang /_sgrib pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la sbyor ba yin pas 
[\[134a.5\]]sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang /_phyin ci log dang /_sgrib pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams ma gtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang /_phyin ci 
[\[134a.6\]]log dang /_sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa de dag nyid tshol bar byed de/_de tshol bar byed na sems can yang mi rnyed/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi rnyed do/_/ma rnyed na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_lha'i bu rnam grangs des na nyon mongs pa tshol 
[\[134a.7\]]ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin la/_sems can tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_nyon mongs pa tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal rnam par thar 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]pa'i sgo gsum po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar mi nus la/_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yang btsal bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu de la ni sems dang /_yid 
[\[134b.2\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur la gang la sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal lam ji ltar mngon par rtogs par bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[134b.3\]]bu yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i lta ba yang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no/_/yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtog pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag gang dang mnyam pa 
[\[134b.4\]]log pa'i ngag kyang de dang mnyam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i las kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i 'tsho ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtsol 
[\[134b.5\]]ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i dran pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa 
[\[134b.6\]]yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba dang log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid dang mnyam pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang 
[\[134b.7\]]dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu nam mkha' dang nam mkha' la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]dang /_dben pa nyid la yang tha dad du bya ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba gang las rab tu phye ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu tha dad du bya ba ni mtshan ma dang /_dmigs pa dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[135a.2\]]spros pa las rab tu phye ba yin te/_mtshan ma dang /_dmigs pa dang /_'du shes dang /_spros pa gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni tha dad du bya ba med do/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha 
[\[135a.3\]]dad du bya ba yod kyi rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba med pa de bzhin du/_lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings yongs su ma shes pa la ni chos thams cad tha dad du bya ba yod kyi chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa la ni chos tha dad du bya ba med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[135a.4\]]dpal ci chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su shes par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin la/_chos kyi dbyings kyis ni 
[\[135a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i chos de dag la gnyis su med par shes pa de dag gang yin pa de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/_sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes 
[\[135a.6\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i snang ba la gzugs thams cad snang yang gzugs de dag ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du/_lha'i bu byang chub 
[\[135a.7\]]sems dpas rang gis smras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas chos thams cad mthong yang chos de dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na yin no/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgo smos pas go ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bu mgo smos pas go ba'i rang gi lta bas sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa byed na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spros pas go ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang 
[\[135b.2\]]gzhan du mi byed la/_bdag med pa yang gzhan du mi byed na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bkri ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'ga' yang khrid par mi byed na'o/_/lha'i bus 
[\[135b.3\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas lhur len pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa'i gnas las g.yo bar mi byed na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis byang chub 
[\[135b.4\]]sems dpa' tshogs gsum po nges pa nyid dang /_ma nges pa nyid dang /_log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dag la snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji lta bu yin/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[135b.5\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o/_/ma nges pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la'o/_/log pa nyid du nges pa ni de las sems can bsgral ba bya ba la'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis byang 
[\[135b.6\]]chub sems dpa' mi khom pa thob cing khom pa ma thob pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'o na ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa thob pa rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed cing 
[\[135b.7\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khom pa thob pa de dag kyang yal bar 'jog par byed/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang rnam par grol ba'i tshogs de dag ni khom pa thob pa yin pas de la ni byang chub sems dpar mi snang ngo /_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]khyod mi khom pa thob pa yin nam/_'on te khom pa thob pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni khom pa thob pa yang ma yin/_mi khom pa thob pa yang ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir/_'jam dpal gyis smras 
[\[136a.2\]]pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni thob yang ma yin/_yang dag par thob pa yang ma yin/_khom pa yang ma yin/_mi khom pa yang ma yin la/_khom pa dang mi khom pa la chags par yang mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni bdud 
[\[136a.3\]]kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcod do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni phung po yongs su shes pa yang med/_nyon mongs pa sel ba yang med/_bdud las yang dag par 'das pa yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_
[\[136a.4\]]'jam dpal nye bar sbyar bas gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar 'di la mu stegs can thams cad kyi spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi tog btsugs so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[136a.5\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu snang ba med pa dang mun pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[136a.6\]]dpal chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig byas/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag la snang ba yang med la mun pa yang med pa de dag chos kyi snang bar byas so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 
[\[136a.7\]]mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba rnams so/_/lha'i 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas thar pa tshol bar mi byed pa dang /_gang dag 
[\[136b.2\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par grol ba mnyam par 'gyur ba dag ste/_de dag gis ni 'ching ba ma dmigs pas rnam par 'khrug pa yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad 
[\[136b.3\]]pa na srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang ci ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag brnyes pa de bzhin du thob par 
[\[136b.4\]]gyur cig ces kyang smras so/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam 
[\[136b.5\]]par grol lo/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/srog chags dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma nyi khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam 
[\[136b.6\]]par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bdun khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba 
[\[136b.7\]]dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o kun nas yongs grol ba'i/_/dmigs med chos ni legs par bshad/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/_/shin du legs par bshad par byas/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa de dag gis lha dang mi'i mchod pa dag byas te/_steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang 
[\[137a.2\]]phab/_rin po che'i char dag kyang phab/_gos kyi char dag kyang phab/_bdug spos kyi char dag dang /_spos chu'i char dag dang /_phye ma'i char dag kyang phab bo/_/lha rnams kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu gsil bar gyur to/_/dge 
[\[137a.3\]]bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas so/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad 
[\[137a.4\]]ces/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyid pa de dag la ni rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi 
[\[137a.5\]]rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs par ma mchis lags so/_/de dag la ni 'phags pa'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang ma mchis lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni 
[\[137a.6\]]dge sbyong gi tshul ma mchis lags so/_/de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag la ni thob pa yang ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan 
[\[137a.7\]]par bgyid pa dang /_thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang /_len par bgyid pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_'dzin par bgyid pa dang /_klog par bgyid pa dang /_yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa dang /_snod 'tshal bar bgyid nas gzhan dag la yang ston par bgyid pa dang /_skyo ba ma 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]mchis pa'i yid kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang /_rjes su ston par bgyid pa dang /_'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag kyang nan tan gyis sgrub tu stsol ba dang /_nyams par mi bgyid pa de dag ni sems can dam pa dang /_sems can chen po 
[\[137b.2\]]dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_gting rnyed pa dang /_log par ltung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang /_ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[137b.3\]]gnyen rnams la shin tu gus pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa gzo zhing bgyis pa tshor ba lags shing /_de dag ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du 
[\[137b.4\]]zhugs pa lags te/_skyes bu dam pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang mchis lags so/_/de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mchis lags so/_/de dag la ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang /_khom pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes kyang gsol to/_/
[\[137b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyis 
[\[137b.6\]]stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[137b.7\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'di na gnas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pa nyis stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs so sor thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis ni 
[\[138a.2\]]gzungs dri ma med pa so sor thob par gyur to/_/de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' byams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang /_ston pa dang /_'dzin pa dag_
[\[138a.3\]]klog par yang 'gyur te/_de dag ni byams pa khyod nyid kyis byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo 
[\[138a.4\]]sde 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang ba dang /_tha na lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang /_rna lam du grags par bgyid pa de dag bsod nams ji 
[\[138a.5\]]tsam skyed par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/_/byams 
[\[138a.6\]]pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/byams pa nan gyis dper na lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las lha'am mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[138a.7\]]ma snyed cig la bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa de bas ni gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi ger bris te 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]ston par byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring por mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/_/byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas spong bar mi byed cing mos par 
[\[138b.2\]]byed pa dang /_tha na glegs bam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung ston to/_/byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di ni ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang /_'bras bu yod par lung ston par byed na gang dag mos pa 
[\[138b.3\]]dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[138b.4\]]'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dre bar byed pa dang /_phebs par smra bar byed par 'gyur te/_de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_
[\[138b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la ston par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos 
[\[138b.6\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyis kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston cig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_'di 
[\[138b.7\]]ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jam dpal gyis bstan pa chos thams cad rnam par gtan 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]la dbab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[139a.2\]]gyur pas chos bstan pa mang du thos lags na ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye ste rgya cher bstan pa de lta bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung lags so/_/bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa sngon ma myong lags te/_de lta 
[\[139a.3\]]lags pas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyis chos kyi 
[\[139a.4\]]rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag bde 'gror mchi bar bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po 
[\[139a.5\]]de dag gis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa gzhi chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos 
[\[139a.6\]]par gyur cing /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_spro ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos 
[\[139a.7\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dag byas shing /_steng gi bar snang las me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]phab/_lha'i sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs dag kyang rab tu gsil cing blangs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces nga dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so zhes go bar mdzad do/_/
[\[139b.2\]]de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas te rang rang gi 
[\[139b.3\]]gnas su dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[139b.4\]]'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[139b.5\]{D162}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya shrI ba su pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[139b.6\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig ces bya ba/_bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/_
[\[139b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig 'das shing gshegs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshong dpon gyi bu 
[\[140a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa 'das shing gshegs te/_dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[140a.3\]]rgyas ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshong dpon gyi bu de bzhin 
[\[140a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/_/tshong dpon gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med/_grangs 
[\[140a.5\]]med pa da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/_dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar mi brgya'am/_mi stong ngam/_mi 'bum 
[\[140a.6\]]gyis sngon 'bad de btsal bas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'bad de btsal na ci'i slad du/_de mi thob/_mi rtogs kyis de'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[140a.7\]]ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la de ltar legs par bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshong dpon gyi bu legs so 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]legs so/_/khyod kyis rtog pa mdzes so/_/spobs pa dge'o/_/tshong dpon gyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bya ba dang /_ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad 
[\[140b.2\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te tshong dpon gyi bu dpal gyi dbyig bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshong dpon gyi bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni nyin gcig bzhin du snying 
[\[140b.3\]]thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba mi gtang bar bya'o/_/tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid 
[\[140b.4\]]la byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i yi dam mi gtang bar bya'o/_/tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/_sems can 
[\[140b.5\]]thams cad kyis bsams nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum gyis mi stong bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum bskal pa du mar gnas par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa 
[\[140b.6\]]mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la bskal pa du mar chos bstan par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la ci nus pa dang /_ci lcogs pa dang /_ji ltar 
[\[140b.7\]]gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin du theg pa gsum la byang chub tu sems bskyed par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur zhing [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis byang chub gsum thob par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi 
[\[141a.2\]]gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ngan 'gror skyes pa thams cad ngan 'gro thams cad nas gdon par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i 
[\[141a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'jig pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa spong bar 'gyur ba dus gsum 
[\[141a.4\]]du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[141a.5\]]cad la dus gsum du rjes su yi rang ba mi gtang bar bya'o/_/tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid las byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa 
[\[141a.6\]]dang /_bdag nyid sdig pa'i spyod pa la rnam par smod pa dang /_sdig pa spyod pa la bshung ba dang /_sdig pa las nges par 'byung ba dang /_dge ba thams cad 'dod pa dang /_dge ba thams cad blang ba dang /_tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur bya bar 
[\[141a.7\]]gsol ba gdab pa dang /_gcig tu nges par rnam par dag pa'i dge ba'i spyad pa spyod par gsol ba gdab pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par gsol 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ba gdab pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /_bskal pa du mar chos bstan par gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o/_/tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni pha ma la gnod pa med pa dang /_bu dang /_chung 
[\[141b.2\]]ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_rgan rabs la gnod pa med par ji ltar mos pa dang /_ci nus par dus dus su sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i 
[\[141b.3\]]byang chub sems dpas ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la gnas zhing 'dug pa dang /_brtan por 'dug pa dang /_mi lhod par 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/gal te bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la slob mi nus na yang /_des bzhi'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_de'i nang nas bslab 
[\[141b.4\]]pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la yang bslab par bya'o/_/gal te bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la slob kyang mi nus na de sdig pa'i las mi dge ba gang dang gang kun tu spyod pa de la zhen pa ma yin pa dang /_drag po ma yin pa'i sems dang /_mi dga' ba zhen pa dang /_lhod pa dang /_yang 
[\[141b.5\]]ba'i sems dang /_don gyi dbang dang /_dgos pa'i dbang gis spyad par bya ste/_des mi dge ba bcu'i las khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang /_dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pas kun tu spyad par mi bya'o/_/kun tu spyad par 
[\[141b.6\]]'dod pa na yang rnam par smad par bya/_rnam par bshung bar bya'o/_/spyod cing 'dug pa na yang rnam par smad par bya/_rnam par bshung bar bya'o/_/spyad zin pa na yang rnam par smad par bya/_rnam par bshung bar bya/_so sor bshags par bya/_nges par 'byung bar bya'o/_/
[\[141b.7\]]legs pa dge ba ci yang rung ba zhig_/kun tu spyod pa na yang des ni de la sems zhen pa dang /_drag po'i sems dang /_tshim pa dang /_mgu ba dang /_lhod pa ma yin pa dang /_yang ba ma yin pa dang /_bar chad med pa dang /_dad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_mchog 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]tu dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyis kun tu spyad par bya'o/_/kun tu spyod par 'dod pa na yang snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dang /_dgrol ba'i 
[\[142a.2\]]phyir dang /_dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /_yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 
[\[142a.3\]]bya'o/_/des dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad la yang snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas mngon par bsdus te bzlums nas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/rjes su yi 
[\[142a.4\]]rang ba'i mchog dang /_phul dang /_gtso bo dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa dang /_dam pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes 
[\[142a.5\]]su yi rang bar bya'o/_/rjes su yi rangs nas kyang dge ba kun tu spyad pa de yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/_/phul nas kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya zhing /_sems 
[\[142a.6\]]can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dang /_dgrol ba'i phyir dang /_dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /_yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par bya ba'i phyir nyin gcig 
[\[142a.7\]]bzhin du dus gsum du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/des ka shi ka'i gos dang /_tsan dan dang /_a ga ru'i bdug pa la sogs pa dang /_yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong ngam/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' mgur spyod 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]dam/_lam du 'gro ba'am/_'du byed dam/_bya ba thams cad byed pa na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa dang /_dad pa dang /_don du gnyer ba dang /_smon pa de 'ba' zhig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su dran par bya'o/_/yid la bya'o/_/
[\[142b.2\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/lan mang du bya'o/_/de ltar byas na de sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la sems lhod par 'gyur/_yang bar 'gyur/_chung bar 'gyur/_srab par 'gyur/_gsog tu 'gyur ro/_/legs par dge ba'i las kun tu spyod pa rnams la ni sems 
[\[142b.3\]]zhen par 'gyur/_drag par 'gyur/_mi lhod par 'gyur/_mi yang bar 'gyur/_mi chung bar 'gyur ro/_/de sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la lhod par 'gyur/_yang bar 'gyur/_chung bar 'gyur/_srab par 'gyur/_gsog tu 'gyur/_med par 'gyur ba 
[\[142b.4\]]dang /_legs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la sems zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i 'gro ba gang dang phrad pa dag tu chung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'khu ba dang /_gsod pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa rnams legs par spang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[142b.5\]]khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can mtha' yas mu med pa rnams kyis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa dus mtha' yas par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_mi sdug pa 
[\[142b.6\]]dang phrad pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang /_'dod pas phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi sdug bsngal 
[\[142b.7\]]gcad par bya ba dang /_dgag par bya ba dang /_rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_byams pa'i sems su gyur pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i sems su gyur pa dang /_go cha chen po bgos pa dang /_theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos pa 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi gdung mi 'chad par nges par byed pa'i phyir sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba dang /_chung bar 'gyur ba nas srab pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/legs pa dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams 
[\[143a.2\]]ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba nas dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa sogs shing sgom pa yang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sra ba dang /_brtan pa dang /_rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro/_/tshong dpon gyi bu de lta na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]
[\[143a.3\]]'di lta bus mthar gyis srid pa 'di dang /_srid pa phyi ma dang /_srid pa lan grangs gzhan dag la sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'grib par byed pa dang /_chung ngur byed pa nas gsog tu byed pa'i bar dang /_legs pa dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba nas dpag tu med pa'i bar du 
[\[143a.4\]]'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yang sogs shing sgom par byed de/_legs pa dge ba kun tu spyad pa rnams yongs su smin pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe yul da ra da 
[\[143a.5\]]nas da ra da'i rgyal po sin du gi ri zhes bya ba'i bu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bA rA Na sIr song nas de bcom ldan 'das dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas da ra da'i rgyal po sin du gi ri'i bu stan las langs te/_
[\[143a.6\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis legs par bka' stsal to/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[143a.7\]]pa khyod kyis legs par bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyi gsol ba 'debs shing snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la bgyis te/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du gsol ba 'debs shing brjod pa gang lags pa de tsam yang 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing yang dag par rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_sogs par 'gyur/_grangs ma mchis par bgyid/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yang sogs shing sgom pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs 
[\[143b.2\]]par 'gyur zhing sra ba dang /_brtan pa dang /_rdo rje lta bur 'gyur na gong du rtsol zhing brtson pa mi gtong ba lta ci smos lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la bgyid de/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas sems can thams cad bsgral 
[\[143b.3\]]ba dang /_dgrol bar bgyi ba dang /_dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyi ba'i slad du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs

[\[143b.6\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig dang /_da ra da'i rgyal po'i bu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[143b.7\]]mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//

[\[144a.1\]{D163}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+na dzA lI pa ri pr-Its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[144a.2\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can na/_spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang /_skye 
[\[144a.3\]]ba gnyis kyis thogs pa rnams dang /_skye ba gsum gyis thogs pa rnams dang /_skye ba bzhis thogs pa rnams dang /_skye ba lngas thogs pa rnams dang /_skye ba bcus thogs pa rnams dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_skye ba stong gi bar rnams kyis thogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[144a.4\]]sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu dang /_lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po

[\[147b.1\]]thams cad chos dkar po la yang dag par bskul/_lhas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas kyang bsam par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byin gyis rlob par mdzad/_nams kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_

[\[147b.4\]]sems pa ni spobs pa legs shing dpyod pa bzang ngo /_/de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dra ba can sems rtse gcig tu 
[\[147b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu 'di nas shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_gzhon nu 'di lta ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[147b.6\]]snyed du gyur la/_de dag thams cad kyang rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur cing /_de nas skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bas de dag la rdul phra mo'i rdul cig khyer te/_ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthas gtugs pa de dag rdul phra mo'i rdul 
[\[147b.7\]]gyis yongs su gang ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'das nas rdul phra mo'i rdul gcig 'jog na/_gzhon nu rnam grangs de dang grangs de'i gzhis yun ring po 'das pas rdul phra mo'i rdul gyi phung po chen po'i mtha' de dag zad pa'am/_
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gtugs par 'gyur ram/_gzhon nu de ci snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes bu des rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bzhag pa'am ma bzhag pa de dag bsam pa'am/_bgrang ba'am/_gzhal ba'am/_nye bar brtag par sla'am/_gsol 
[\[148a.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gang zhig dpe 'di bshad pa la yang dag pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni shes pa'i phung po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags so/_/gzhon nu 'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes bu 
[\[148a.3\]]des rdul phra mo'i rdul de dag bzhag gam/_'on te ma bzhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung nas/_srid pa'i rtse mo la thug gi bar gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/_skyes bu gnyis pa zhig byung 
[\[148a.4\]]bas de dag las rdul phra mo'i rdul gcig khyer te/_ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi rdul phra mo'i rdul de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'das nas rdul phra mo'i rdul gcig 'jog na/_gzhon nu rnam grangs des na yun ring po 'das pas rdul phra mo'i 
[\[148a.5\]]rdul bsags pa'i phung po chen po de 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu rnam grangs des na skyes bu phyi ma des grangs med pa brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa dgur bsgyur ba 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mu 
[\[148a.6\]]tig can no/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems 
[\[148a.7\]]dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po de'i mtshan 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]la som nyi mi za zhing ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de'i tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rgyal srid la yang sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang mchod pa dpag tu med pa byed par 'gyur/_tshangs 
[\[148b.2\]]par spyod par yang 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa lnga yang rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu gzungs brgya 'khyil ba zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/_de 
[\[148b.3\]]snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba nyid du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed par 'gyur/_de'i sems shin tu rmongs pa med cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur/_sred med kyi bu'i lus ltar mkhregs pa'i lus su 'gyur/_lus dbyibs gcig la spi dza bzhi par 
[\[148b.4\]]'gyur/_de'i lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus brgyan cing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs su yang 'gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang spong zhing dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[148b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/_/thos nas som nyi mi za zhing /_/ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches pa/_/de ni yon gnas 'os pa yin/_/rtag tu 'khor 
[\[148b.6\]]los sgyur ba yi/_/rgyal srid 'thob cing sangs rgyas mthong /_/mthong nas dpag tu med pa dang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byed/_/rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/mngon par shes rnams rtogs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthong nas brgya 'khyil ba'i/_/
