[\[148b.7\]]gzungs kyang de yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de snyed sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/de snyed bskal pa bye ba ru/_/'khor ba dag ni spangs par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/_/tshogs dang dge 'dun dag la brjod/_/de 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]yi sems ni mi rmongs shing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rgyu byed do/_/rtag tu sred med bu 'dra zhing /_/lus dbyibs gcig la spi dza bzhi/_/lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang 'gyur/_/gang zhig mtshan ni thos nas 
[\[149a.2\]]su/_/yan lag lnga yis phyag byas na/_/rtag tu tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan zhing /_/mi khom pa yang spangs par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/_/thos nas som nyi mi za ba/_/de ni byang chub la mi 'gong /_/de ni nams kyang som nyi med/_/gang zhig 
[\[149a.3\]]nyin dang mtshan bdun du/_/tshang bar rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa mtha' yas pa'i/_/mig ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/mi de yi ni sha yi mig_/lha yi mig tu rnam sbyong ste/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas mang po 
[\[149a.4\]]mthong bar 'gyur/_/thams cad la ni mchod byed cing /_/thams cad las ni thos pa 'dzin/_/mig gis thams cad mthong nas su/_/mi rnams thams cad dbugs 'byin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa/_/sngon chad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/
[\[149a.5\]]bsnyen bkur sangs rgyas dag la byas/_/de dag thams cad rjes dran 'gyur/_/srog chags gang rnams mdun dag tu/_/mtshan ni bstan par byas gyur na/_/sems can gzhan gyis de mthong zhing /_/nges par byang chub 'gyur ba yin/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad 
[\[149a.6\]]bskyed pas/_/mi khom thams cad rnam par spangs/_/rtsod dang 'gyed pa byas pas ni/_/mi khom rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/thub pa chen po de yi mtshan/_/sems can gcig cig thos byas na/_/rtsod pa dang ni 'gyed pa yang /_/yid la byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[149a.7\]]mnar med pa yi las/_/bskal pa gnas par 'gyur ba dag_/klad nad tsam zhig bskyed nas su/_/las kun rnam par smin mi 'gyur/_/de la mes ni mi tshig cing /_/chu yi nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/_/de la rgyal po rab khros kyang /_/myur ba nyid du zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig thub 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/_/nams kyang long ba zhar ba dang /_/theng dang sgur dang lus nyams dang /_/nad ni mang por mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dri za [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/grul bum srin po mi rnams ni/_/sdig can ma rungs pa rnams dag_/mi de la ni gnod mi byed/_/gang 
[\[149b.2\]]zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/_/'byung po dri za gnod sbyin rnams/_/klu dang lha rnams thams cad kyi/_/yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/'dir ni skyob pa'i mtshan thos pa/_/shin tu bsags pa dam pa'i dbyangs/_/ting 'dzin myur du thob par 'gyur/_/yon tan 
[\[149b.3\]]bye ba rab tu sgrogs/_/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/_/thos nas som nyi mi za ba/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag tu/_/de yi byang chub 'di 'dzin to/_/thub pa chen po'i mtshan thos pa/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das rnams kyis/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul/_/
[\[149b.4\]]'dzin cing yang dag rab tu ston/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis legs gsungs pa'i/_/chos de rnams ni des 'dzin to/_/bkod pa mchog ni des byed cing /_/sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen bkur byed/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_/sangs rgyas bye ba des myur mthong /_/
[\[149b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/_/chos rnams de dag 'dzin par byed/_/skyob pa de yi mtshan thos pa/_/srog chags bye ba nan tan gyis/_/'dul bar byed cing rab tu 'god/_/thams cad byang chub phyir 'jog go/_/nga yis mthong la'ang yid ches pa/_/skyob pa 
[\[149b.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rab tu bstan pa 'dzin 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen la gang dad pa/_/ngas mthong ba la'ang de yid ches/_/'ching ba rnams las des rnams 'grol/_/klong las rgal cing 'jigs pa 
[\[149b.7\]]med/_/gang zhig dam pa'i chos spong ba/_/de ni bdud kyi sde yin no/_/'gro ba lnga ru 'gro ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi ba spu gang /_/de ni ston pa'i pus mo yi/_/lha nga gcig gis ba spur sdud/_/skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/ba spu gcig gi khung bu nas/_/ji ltar 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de snyed 'od zer 'byin par mdzad/_/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon 'di yi/_/'od zer mtha' yas la yid ches/_/tshe gcig gis ni sangs rgyas rnams/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal po mdo sde 'di/_/
[\[150a.2\]]bshad pa gang zhig thos gyur nas/_/nams kyang yid gnyis mi za ba/_/de ni nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/yangs pa can du mdo sde 'di/_/bshad pa'i tshe na sus thos pa/_/de ni phyi ma'i dus su des/_/gzhan la yang dag rab tu ston/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye ma dag_/mi gang 
[\[150a.3\]]gis ni mang brjod pa/_/de snyed 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/'od zer gcig gis khyab par byed/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad dag_/bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mi mchod pa/_/gser rnams kyis ni bkang nas su/_/'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/_/'di yi 
[\[150a.4\]]mtshan ni thos nas su/_/dga' ba bzang po skyes gyur te/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes brjod pa/_/de yi bsod nams bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten mgon ni thams cad la/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal ba/_/de yi bsod nams phung po ni/_/tshad ni bshad par mi 
[\[150a.5\]]nus so/_/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/_/thos nas som nyi mi za ba/_/de yi lus ni 'od zer gyis/_/khyab cing rin po che ltar 'gyur/_/gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/_/de ni rnam par 'das gyur nas/_/lha yi tsan dan dmar po yi/_/dri zhim kha nas 
[\[150a.6\]]rab tu 'byung /_/skyob pa sems can snying po yi/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos pa/_/ba spu'i khung nas 'od zer dag_/bkye bas lus kyang mdzes par 'gyur/_/tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/_/thos pa mang por 'gyur ba ste/_/kun dga' sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba'i/_/
[\[150a.7\]]dpag tu med pa'i thos pa'ang 'dzin/_/'jig rten snang byed des mthong nas/_/gzhal gyis mi lang dga' ba 'thob/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/_/tshe rabs dag ni dran par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i thugs sras mthong nas kyang /_/gzhal gyis mi lang dga' ba 'thob/_/
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]spos dang me tog byug rnams kyis/_/mchod pa dag ni rgya chen byed/_/'jig rten mgon po de yi mtshan/_/brjod pa 'dzin par mi byed de/_/bdud kyi phyogs dang sngon kyang ni/_/mu stegs gyur pa ma gtogs so/_/nga yis tshul 'di bshad pa na/_/sngon ni 
[\[150b.2\]]gang gis 'di thos pa/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag tu/_/de yi lag tu mdo sde 'thob/_/de yis mdo sde dam pa 'di/_/bshad pa dag ni sus thos pa/_/sngon ni mchod cing bkur sti byas/_/de yi lag tu 'di 'thob bo/_/gang gis smon lam btab pa ni/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi 
[\[150b.3\]]tshe dag tu/_/chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa yi/_/mdo 'di lag tu 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig sems ni rtse gcig gis/_/sangs rgyas grangs med bkur sti bas/_/mdo 'di la ni gang dad pa/_/de bas bsod nams 'di mang 'gyur/_/rtag tu gzugs bzang 
[\[150b.4\]]bsod nams ldan/_/shin tu 'jigs med longs spyod ldan/_/dran dang ldan zhing mtshan rnams kyis/_/mngon par brgyan pa dag tu 'gyur/_/de lta bas na mdo sde 'di/_/thos nas phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/bzung zhing yang dag bstan pa dang /_/gzhan dag la yang bstan 
[\[150b.5\]]par gyis/_/gang gis sangs rgyas 'khor los sgyur/_/'bum phrag dag la bkur byas pas/_/phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/_/des mthong ba la som nyi med/_/gang gis sngon ni 'jig rten mgon/_/grangs med pa la bsnyen bkur bas/_/de yi 'jig rten mgon 'di yi/_/
[\[150b.6\]]thos shing mthong la'ang yid ches so/_/gang zhig mtshan 'di thos nas su/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs byed pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/bstan pa dang ni dam chos bsrung /_/gang zhig byang chub bstan spangs na/_/bskal pa bye ba dag tu ni/_/lug ltar 
[\[150b.7\]]lkugs shing mig nyams la/_/mig med pa dag tu yang 'gyur/_/gang zhig lag pa gcig gis ni/_/mchod rten grangs med bshig byas pas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/_/khyad chos sdig par 'di 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na nga smra ba/_/phyi ma'i dus tshe 'di rnyed nas/_/
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]sangs rgyas ye shes bla med la/_/som nyi za bar ma byed cig_/mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di thos nas/_/me tog spos dang 'phan rnams dang /_/gdugs dang phye ma gos rnams kyis/_/gus par byas te mchod par gyis/_/der ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/
[\[151a.2\]]phyag mnyen shin tu 'jam pa yis/_/lits+tsha bI yi mgo bo la/_/yang dang yang du byug pa mdzad/_/de yi rjes la lha rnams kyis/_/sgra skad chen po phyung gyur cing /_/lha yi me tog ku su ma/_/yid 'ong gtor cing zhing 'di bkang /_/lha rnams mkha' la 'dug nas su/_/glu dbyangs 
[\[151a.3\]]dpag tu med pa len/_/tshangs pa dag ni bye ba yis/_/tsan dan dmar po'i char phab po/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di/_/gsungs tshe dra ba can thos te/_/sems ni rangs shing yid dga' nas/_/de bzhin gshegs la tshig gsol ba/_/phyi ma'i dus su bdag gis 
[\[151a.4\]]ni/_/dge slong bgyis la mi 'jigs par/_/grong dang grong khyer rnams dag tu/_/mdo sde 'di ni bshad par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas bka' bzhin bdag bgyid de/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la dpal gyis gsungs/_/dpag tshad bye bar mchis nas su/_/'di yi tshul ni bshad par 
[\[151a.5\]]bgyi/_/lha kun dang ni klu rnams dang /_/yang na mi'am ci dang ni/_/mi ma yin rnams mgron gnyer te/_/chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bgyi/_/bla na med pa'i mdo sde 'di/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa na/_/lha ma yin tshogs dga' gyur nas/_/me tog dpag tu med pa 
[\[151a.6\]]'thor/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing 'di dag_/mi mchog shAkya seng ge yi/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i spu gcig gis/_/zhing rnams thams cad snang bar mdzad/_/sems can snying po'i bdag nyid can/_/ston pa yi ni ljags phyung nas/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed dag gi/_/zhing 
[\[151a.7\]]rnams bye ba khebs par mdzad/_/de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/_/zhing rnams bye ba khebs mdzad de/_/gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can/_/dpa' bo dang ni lits+tsha bI/_/bye ba drug cu tsam dag ni/_/lhan cig lhags la bka' stsol cig_/de nas der ni ston pa yis/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]de dag chos la gzud par mdzad/_/bde ba thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan ni thogs pa med/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag med de/_/sangs rgyas chos la the tshom spong /_/sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med de/_/dus gsum rnams la'ang 'jug 
[\[151b.2\]]par mdzad/_/chos rnams kun la mnga' brnyes pas/_/sangs rgyas la ni mi mkhyen med/_/phung po rnams ni med pa'o zhes/_/mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad/_/khams bzhi dag ni gsog dang 'dra/_/gang du'ang sgra la chags pa med/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /_/
[\[151b.3\]]sems pa dang ni 'du byed dang /_/rnam shes phung po'i snying po ni/_/med pa dag tu shes par gyis/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa bzhin/_/de ltar phung po rnams phye na/_/myur du gzungs rnams 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/shin tu rmongs pa med par 'gyur/_/chos rnams 
[\[151b.4\]]dag ni gsob dang 'dra/_/thams cad stong zhing bdag med do/_/rtsod pa med cing rmongs med pa/_/de skad de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/gzhon nu lho phyogs logs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu las nyis gyur gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas 
[\[151b.5\]]kyi zhing bcu gnyis 'das pa na de na zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[151b.6\]]chos kyang ston to/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas 
[\[151b.7\]]mthong ba la yang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu 'od zer rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa khrir 'jug pa 'thob par 'gyur/_gzungs kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa drug cu po rgya 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa nas rin po che'i mdzod kyi gzungs la thug pa'i bar la 'jug pa 'thob cing byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de dag la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas bye ba gshegs 
[\[152a.2\]]nas zhal ston par mdzad de/_phyogs thams cad nas kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gsung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_byang chub ma thob kyi bar du de'i chos kyi tshul de 'jig par mi 'gyur/_las 
[\[152a.3\]]dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas bzung nas bskal pa lnga brgyar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[152a.4\]]mi yi dbang po 'jig rten mgon/_/skyob pa yi ni mtshan thos pa/_/bskal pa lnga brgya tham pa yi/_/'khor ba dag ni bzlog par 'gyur/_/'chi bdag gi dus tshe yang /_/sangs rgyas bye ba ston par mdzad/_/mthong nas dbang pos phyag 'tshal te/_/chos kyang nyan cing 
[\[152a.5\]]'dzin par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa/_/spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na/_/de yis bstan pa'i chos gang dag_/bskal pa bye bar chud mi gson/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan bsgrags pas/_/rin chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin/_/stong phrag bdun cu de 
[\[152a.6\]]tshe 'thob/_/yon tan bye bar sgrogs par 'gyur/_/gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/_/ting 'dzin grangs med bye ba dang /_/de bzhin sa ya drug cu dag_/de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur/_/de bas mnyam bzhag dpa' bo yis/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/
[\[152a.7\]]sems can mang po stong rnams dag_/byang chub mchog la 'jog par byed/_/byang chub ma rdzogs bar du ni/_/nam yang 'dod la mi bsten te/_/sems can gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi/_/mtshan bstan rnams ni zlog par byed/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]thos nas/_/srog chags kun la 'di ston pa/_/nams kyang mi khom mi 'gyur zhing /_/de yi dal ba rnyed mi dka'/_/shin du bzung ba sangs rgyas dag_/'byung ba mnyes par byas pas ni/_/nga yi mi khom gang bsten pa/_/de dag thams cad spang bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dren 
[\[152b.2\]]pa mkhyen pa bzhin/_/gzhon nu gal te khyod shes na/_/ston pa'i mtshan ni bzung nas su/_/phyogs kun tu ni rab tu sgrogs/_/de bas gzhon nu gzhan dag la/_/mtshan 'di rab tu bstan byas na/_/yang dag byang chub 'di bzung zhing /_/'jig rten gyi ni mgon du 'gyur/_/
[\[152b.3\]]gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas/_/g.yeng ba med par 'di bzung ste/_/song nas gzhan dag la ston pa/_/de ni byang chub mngon du bsrung /_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/gzhan dag la ni rab ston na/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul/_/bstan pa 'di 
[\[152b.4\]]dag srung bar byed/_/gzhon nu nub phyogs logs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu de las sum 'gyur gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bkra ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[152b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin 
[\[152b.6\]]gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i dus 'og du chos lnga 'dzin par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_lus zhig nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid dang /_
[\[152b.7\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs te/_de yang stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang /_byang chub thob kyi bar du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob pa ste/_chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]nyid tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig mi yi khyu mchog skyob pa'i mtshan/_/thos nas som nyi med cing dad bskyed nas/_/de yi chos lnga de dag 'dzin 'gyur zhing /_/byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'jig mi 'gyur/_/gser gyi mdog 'dra'i gzugs 
[\[153a.2\]]dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dam mchog mkhas/_/bsod nams ldan pa sred med bu 'dra zhing /_/dam chos 'khor lo bar chad med par bskor/_/bsod nams ldan pa bu stong yod 'gyur te/_/dpa' zhing rtul phod pha rol tshogs 'joms la/_/yan 
[\[153a.3\]]lag mchog gi gzugs ldan mtshan gyis brgyan/_/mthu stobs che ba rgyal po gtso nyid 'dra/_/rgyal po'i chung ma gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes pa/_/gser gyi mdog 'dra mang po stong yod 'gyur/_/phyi nas nyal zhing sngar ni ldang byed de/_/rgyal po gtso la nams kyang skyo mi 
[\[153a.4\]]byed/_/rgyal phran gang dag de yi yul gnas shing /_/gang dag blon po khyim bdag gtso bo kun/_/rgyal po de mthong nams kyang skyo mi byed/_/de bas de ni bsod nams dam mchog ldan/_/mkhas mchog lha rnams kyis kyang thub par dka'/_/mi yi 'jig rten dag na 
[\[153a.5\]]gnod sbyin klu/_/de yi yul na sems can gang gnas pa/_/de yis thams cad byang chub snying por 'jog_/rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu lo legs dang /_/de yi rgyal srid bde zhing sangs rgyas 'byung /_/de dag la ni mchod pa dam pa byed/_/rgyal po bdag yul 
[\[153a.6\]]nams kyang sdang sems med/_/sangs rgyas mtshan mchog thos nas mkhas pa gang /_/som nyi za zhing mi dga' su zhig yod/_/mdo sde dam pa de ring ngas bshad pa'i/_/chos mchog 'di yis de la phan 'dogs 'gyur/_/gzhan du gang gis sngon gyi rgyal rnams kyis/_/
[\[153a.7\]]chos spangs gyur pa'am bdud kyis zin pa'am/_/sems can snying po rgyal ba mchog dag ni/_/sngon chad spyod tshe khyad du bsad ma gtogs/_/gzhon nu gang zhig rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_/lits+tsha bI bkod dga' ba 'di dag dang /_/shAkya seng ge nga ni ma mthong ba/_/de dag 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]sangs rgyas mtshan thos som nyi za/_/gzhon nu byang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu de las sum 'gyur gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[153b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la 
[\[153b.3\]]la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za zhing ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de'i tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[153b.4\]]mthong bar 'gyur/_de snyed kyi bskal pa bye bar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur/_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur/_dbyangs snyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/_bla na med 
[\[153b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za zhing the tshom mi skye la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na/_de tshe 'das pa'i 
[\[153b.6\]]'og tu bud med kyi dbang po rnam par spangs par 'gyur zhing skyes pa'i dbang po 'thob par 'gyur/_sems can mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par 'gyur/_dbyangs snyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/_bla na med 
[\[153b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig rkang gnyis dam pa de yi mtshan/_/thos nas nams kyang som nyi mi za ba/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye ma 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]snyed/_/des spangs mya ngan med pa'i skyes par 'gyur/_/gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas du ma dag_/mthong nas de dag la ni mchod par byed/_/de snyed sangs rgyas de yi tshe gcig gis/_/sangs rgyas mchod nas rgyal ba mya ngan 'da'/_/byang chub dam pa spyod 
[\[154a.2\]]mchog spyod pa na/_/gang gis skyes bu khyu mchog mtshan thos nas/_/nams kyang som nyi med cing 'dzin byed na/_/de 'dra'i khyad par de yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis rkang gnyis mtshan mchog gtso bo 'di/_/thos nas nams kyang som nyi mi za ba/_/rang byung ye 
[\[154a.3\]]shes sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur zhing /_/mkhas pas dbyangs snyan ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub dam pa spyad mchog spyod pa na/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid skyes pa'i dbang po thob/_/yon tan kun dang ldan zhing mdzes pa ste/_/de 'dra'i khyad par de yis thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[154a.4\]]phyogs rnams kun ni rab tu snang byed cing /_/sa ya mtha' yas zhing du song nas su/_/'jig rten spyod pa thub pa che mthong nas/_/mya ngan bral te byang chub phyis rig 'gyur/_/thub dbang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_/de yi mtshan 'dir thos nas rdzu 'phrul mchog_/de 'dra'i 
[\[154a.5\]]khyad par dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub 'dod pa gzhan yang thob pa ni/_/dri bral byang chub 'dun pa bskyed nas su/_/rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di gzhan la'ang sgrogs par byed/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal ba ltar/_/de yi yon tan dag kyang de 'drar 'gyur/_/sems 
[\[154a.6\]]can mang po du ma bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub mchog la mkhas pa de yis 'jog_/zla ba mkha' la gnas pa'i gzhal med khang /_/'od zer mang po bsags pas mdzes pa ltar/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa/_/de yi lus kyang de 'dra'i rnam pas mdzes/_/
[\[154a.7\]]mkhas pa gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan thos nas/_/som nyi za zhing mi dga' su zhig yod/_/byang chub spyad mchog dam pa spyod pa na/_/chos 'di dag gis de la phan 'dogs 'gyur/_/thub pa chen po 'jig rten spyod mchog pas/_/mkhas pa de ni phongs pa myong mi 'gyur/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu'i rnam pa de bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgur bsgyur ba 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan mchog gi bdag po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba 
[\[154b.2\]]mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba mkhas pa'i gzi brjid 
[\[154b.3\]]dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du tshang ba dag mthong bar 'gyur/_shar 
[\[154b.4\]]phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin phyogs thams cad du yang de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du tshang ba dag mthong bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kun du 'dzin par 'gyur/_byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas 
[\[154b.5\]]grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcur 'khor ba las phyir phyogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[154b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig 'jig rten 'di na sangs rgyas kyi/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan mchog thob gyur pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas bye ba khri rnams la/_/myur du mchod pa bla med rab tu byed/_/mtha' yas dri med khyad par 
[\[154b.7\]]mchod byas shing /_/srid pa kun tu sangs rgyas che rnams kyi/_/nyi ma mdzad pa'i spyad pa spyod nas su/_/phyis ni byang chub dran dbang des reg 'gyur/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed rnam par 'dren/_/mang po dag ni tshe gcig gis mchod de/_/kun nas 'od zer ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_/
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]phyis ni byang chub mya ngan med reg 'gyur/_/byang chub dri med byang chub che thob nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor/_/sems can sangs rgyas byang chub mchog bzhag nas/_/char chus me bsad ltar ni mya ngan 'da'/_/rkang gnyis 'dren pa mi 
[\[155a.2\]]'dul kha lo sgyur/_/bsod nams zhing ste bsod nams phung po gcig_/de la mi yis dad pa tsam bskyed na/_/skad cig gis ni mi khom thams cad spong /_/gang zhig bde bar gshegs kyi mtshan 'don pa/_/mi lus rnyed pa dal ba gcig thob nas/_/mtha' yas 
[\[155a.3\]]rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs bzhugs la/_/mi yi mkhas pa bsod nams rab tu byed/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ni stong phrag brgya tsam du/_/goms byed de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa thob/_/lha yi mig thob ji ltar nga yis ni/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong me tog gis/_/gtor 
[\[155a.4\]]ba byas nas bzod pa thob gyur pa/_/de 'dra'i bzod pa dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad thub pa yi/_/mtshan ni thos nas su zhig lung mi nod/_/gzhan du gang zhig mu stegs can gyur pa'am/_/phrag dog dag gis nyams pa'i mi ma gtogs/_/
[\[155a.5\]]'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon sum du/_/'di 'dra'i mdo sde bshad pa sus thos pa/_/de ni phyi dus dag tu 'di 'dzin cing /_/gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston par byed/_/gzhon nu steng gi phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu de las gang 
[\[155a.6\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus grangs med pas yang dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te 
[\[155a.7\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pas yang dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na/_de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu nams kyang brtson 'grus dman par mi 'gyur/_nams kyang 'dod pa la sten par mi 'gyur/_nams kyang ma'i sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/_pha'i sdug bsngal dang /_gnyen gyi sdug bsngal dang /_spun 
[\[155b.2\]]gyi sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/_sring mo'i sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/_nams kyang mdza' bo dang /_bshes gnyen dang /_blon po dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/_nams kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[155b.3\]]cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par mi 'gyur/_nams kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug mang bar mi 'gyur/_nams kyang nad mang bar mi 'gyur/_nams kyang mya ngan mang bar mi 'gyur/_bde ba mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/_byang chub la thug gi bar du yon 
[\[155b.4\]]tan mtha' yas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/_/thos nas som nyi mi za ba/_/nams kyang 
[\[155b.5\]]pha ma gnyen 'dun gyi/_/tshogs kyi sdug bsngal mi mthong ngo /_/steng gi phyogs na rkang gnyis mchog_/'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa bzhugs/_/srid gsum gsal bar mdzad nas su/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan thos 
[\[155b.6\]]nas/_/de ni gzhan rnams rab bstan na/_/rtag tu sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/_/mtshan dag gis ni brgyan par 'gyur/_/gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin na/_/de ni shes rab mi nyams shing /_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/byang chub sems dpa' la yang mchod/_/sangs 
[\[155b.7\]]rgyas kyi ni mtshan bstan pas/_/phyis ni byang chub spyod pa na/_/sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/shes rab can gyis rtag mchod 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mtshan de gang thos nas/_/gzhan rnams la yang rab ston na/_/de 'dra'i bsod nams phung po yi/_/tshad ni 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bshad par mi nus so/_/de ltar mtshan 'di thos pa ni/_/phyi dus dag ni mang por yang /_/bla med sangs rgyas ye shes la/_/der ni som nyi za mi byed/_/gang gis rdzogs sangs rgyas mthong nas/_/bkur sti rim gro byas pa ni/_/phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 
[\[156a.2\]]'di/_/de yi lag tu 'thob par 'gyur/_/nga ni byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/bskor dang dra ba can sus mthong /_/des ni mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/de la som nyi za mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med de/_/sangs rgyas chos la the tsom spangs/_/'di ltar sngon 
[\[156a.3\]]gyi spyod pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba mang brgyar spyad/_/lag pa rkang pa gtong ba dang /_/rna ba sna dang mgo bo dang /_/bu pho bu mo yul 'khor dag_/byin la yid ni mi dga' med/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos pa/_/phyi ma'i dus na rnyed nas ni/_/gzhan dag la yang ston byed na/_/
[\[156a.4\]]de ni mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/_/mngon rdzogs byang chub 'dod gang gis/_/nam yang 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/bstan la som nyi ma za cig_/de ltar mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/g.yo sgyu med pa'i mis zung la/_/'chag pa dag tu'ang yang dang 
[\[156a.5\]]yang /_/mdo sde 'di ni brjod par bgyi/_/brjod byas zla ba gsum dag tu/_/tshang bar shin tu yang brjod na/_/chos rnams thams cad 'dzin byed pa'i/_/gzungs kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/de nas lits+tsha bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs 
[\[156a.6\]]par rig nas rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu gser gyis brgyan pa zung gcig bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das kyi sku thams cad kyi/_ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 
[\[156a.7\]]zer dag byung ste/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na de bzhin 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sems can gang dag 'dus pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mthong ba dang /_de'i tshe gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'khor bzhi po la snang bar gyur pa/_de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[156b.2\]]mngon par 'du mdzad pas mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lits+tsha bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_'di ltar gzhal gyis mi 
[\[156b.3\]]lang ba/_'di ltar thug pa med pa/_'di ltar tshad med pa/_'di ltar brjod kyis mi lang ba de dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[156b.4\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang mi rnams kyi ming gi tshogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan ches mang ste/_re re la yang mtshan gyi tshogs grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod de/_'di ltar shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab tu zhi ba'i 
[\[156b.5\]]dpal dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ces bya ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang /_
[\[156b.6\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan ji 
[\[156b.7\]]lta bar de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i mtshan yang de dang 'dra bar mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs te/_de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig pa yang grangs ma mchis la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa yang bzhugs so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis 
[\[157a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas pa de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/de nas lits+tsha bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can mgu zhing dga' la 
[\[157a.3\]]yi rangs/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba skyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to/_/lha bye ba 
[\[157a.4\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag nam mkha' la 'khod nas/_lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi phye ma rnams gtor to/_/tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang lha'i tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_
[\[157a.5\]]mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen pos gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/lha bye ba 
[\[157a.6\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang rin po che'i gdugs stong phul lo/_/lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ngus te/_gnas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag rjes su dran no/_/'di lta 
[\[157a.7\]]ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang cho 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu bstan to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bye ba brgya phrag du ma yi/_/lha rnams kho ra khor yug nas/_/tsan dan dmar po zhib mo yis/_/rdzogs sangs 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]rgyas la 'thor bar byed/_/brgya byin bye ba phrag stong dag_/mkha' la gnas nas 'dzam bu yi/_/chu bo'i gser phye mang po yis/_/de bzhin gshegs la 'thor bar byed/_/tshangs pa bye ba nyer lhags nas/_/tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma yis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la 
[\[157b.2\]]'thor byed cing /_/sgra dbyangs snyan pa kun du sgrogs/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od rig nas/_/nam mkha' la ni lha 'khod do/_/glu dbyangs dpag tu med pa len/_/mkha' la ras kyis g.yob par byed/_/nam mkha' la ni lha 'khod de/_/pad ma brgya phrag stong blangs nas/_/
[\[157b.3\]]'jig rten gsal la ston byed cing /_/rgyal mtshan la sogs mchod pa byed/_/zla med rgyal mchog thub dbang la/_/rab tu yid dgas phyag 'tshal zhing /_/bstod byed nor bu rin chen dang /_/mu tig rgyan phreng 'thor bar byed/_/mi ni bye ba 'bum tham pa/_/rgyal mchog 
[\[157b.4\]]zla med pa la mchod/_/sngon gyi gnas brgya rjes dran zhing /_/thub mchog bla med mgos phyag 'tshal/_/de nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pas/_/chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs te/_/de yis sgras ni zhing rab mang /_/bye ba dag tu go bar byas/_/de yi tshe na sems can ni/_/bye ba grangs 
[\[157b.5\]]med kun nas lhags/_/de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla med bkod/_/de tshe gzhon nu dga' gyur nas/_/tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po yi/_/gdan 'bul rin chen phye ma yis/_/gzhon nu sangs rgyas gtso la mchod/_/nor bu rin chen 'od 
[\[157b.6\]]gcig ni/_/'jig rten stong du gtong bar byed/_/rin chen gcig las 'od zer ni/_/stong phrag bye bar gtong bar byed/_/de bzhin rin chen ma lus las/_/'od zer dag ni byung bar gyur/_/de dag gis ni de yi tshe/_/yangs pa can yang snang bar byas/_/rin chen rnam pa de snyed 
[\[157b.7\]]kyis/_/sangs rgyas gtso la mchod byed cing /_/rin po che yi phung po yang /_/thub pa che la 'bul bar byed/_/gdugs ni gang dag mu khyud byas/_/mu tig phreng gis yongs brgyan pa/_/re re la yang mu khyud can/_/stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/_/'di 'dra'i legs pa de yis ni/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]thub pa che la mchod pa byas/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/_/gseng thags kyi ni gos phul lo/_/byang chub shing dag sprul nas su/_/de'i drung seng ge'i khri bshams la/_/stong phrag bye ba nyi shu lnga/_/de rnams la ni 'khod gyur pa/_/lo ni bye ba 
[\[158a.2\]]grangs snyed par/_/bgrang ba dag tu mi chod pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni/_/bye ba brgya phrag lhags par gyur/_/shar gyi phyogs nas bzung nas su/_/lho phyogs nub phyogs byang phyogs dang /_/'og dang steng dang de bzhin du/_/phyogs dag gi yang mtshams nas 
[\[158a.3\]]lhags/_/ji tsam mig gis mthong ba'i bar/_/de srid 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/gser gyi mdog 'dra'i 'od kyis gang /_/ston pa gang na bzhugs pa dang /_/chos ni gang na 'bar ba der/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad nas/_/
[\[158a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' nye bar lhags/_/de ltar mtha' yas dpag tu med/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa ni/_/rin chen dra ba lits+tsha bI/_/gzhon nu de yi tshe na byas/_/de nas bdag nyid chen po pa/_/lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis/_/mdun du mi mchog shAkya yi/_/seng ges 
[\[158a.5\]]dbugs ni 'byin par mdzad/_/nga yi mdun du 'dug nas su/_/khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i mchod byas pa/_/gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/_/de snyed mchod pa dag gis mchod/_/rin chen dra ba can gyi phyir/_/mdo sde bshad pa sus rig pa/_/byang chub las ni mi ldog ste/_/sangs 
[\[158a.6\]]rgyas smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i/_/bsod nams phung po'i tshad dag ni/_/'di snyed sogs par 'gyur ro zhes/_/de ltar bshad par mi nus so/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sa dang chu/_/me dang rlung gi tshad dag ni/_/'di tsam zhes ni bshad par 
[\[158a.7\]]nus/_/bsod nams phung po bshad mi nus/_/dge slong ngam ni dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen 'am ni dge bsnyen ma/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/lha dang klu dang lto 'phye che/_/sems can thams cad nyer lhags pas/_/de yi gzi brjid mi bzod de/_/me ni bsil bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/de yi gzi 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]brjid nyams pa med/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/sems can kun gyis bsten bya zhing /_/byang chub sems la'ang mchod pa byed/_/gang zhig stobs dang ldan pa'i mis/_/bye ba stong du bshad pa yi/_/skra rtses stong gi 'jig rten khams/_/
[\[158b.2\]]bskal pa bye ba bzung ba bas/_/gang zhig phyi ma'i dus dag tu/_/sangs rgyas byang chub gleng gzhi ni/_/'di 'dra'i rnam pas thos nas su/_/gzhan dag la yang ston byed na/_/gang zhig sngar ni rab bsgrags pa/_/'di yi ngo mtshar chen po yi/_/brgya dang grangs dang bgrang ba dang /_/
[\[158b.3\]]dper yang 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/_/'di 'dra'i rnam pa seng ge'i sgra/_/bstan pa bla med thos gyur kyang /_/'gal med don med 'gyur bar 'ong /_/'jig rten mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od mdzad gang gis 'dir mthong ba/_/phyi ma'i dus su des thos 
[\[158b.4\]]nas/_/zhe sa gus par byed par 'gyur/_/gal te zhing rnams bye ba na/_/sems can gang dag 'khod de dag_/sangs rgyas ye shes ldan gyur la/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/bskal pa du ma brgya dag tu/_/rim gro dag ni byed pa dang /_/ji ltar stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams/_/
[\[158b.5\]]de snyed dag gi gtsug lag khang mchog ni/_/dbul bya lha yi tsan dan dag las byas/_/lha yi gtsug lag khang mchog re re la'ang /_/bye ba phrag stong dag gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byas/_/bye ba phrag stong dag gi khang [{]bzangs kyang [,]bzang yang [}]/_/dbul bya lha yi rin chen dag las byas/_/
[\[158b.6\]]re re'i khri dag bshams nas rim gro pa/_/bye ba phrag brgya shin tu tshang bar bkod/_/mkhas pas de ni rin chen dra ba dag_/blangs nas de tshe khri de brgyan pa rnams/_/gang gA'i bye snyed bskal pa bye ba brgyar/_/thub chen 'jig rten spyod pa bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[158b.7\]]gcig la 'bul bya dbul ba dang /_/ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das kyi mchod rten byas/_/ji ltar stong chen 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/sangs rgyas gcig gi mchod rten byas pa ni/_/rin chen rang bzhin lha yi sgo stong ldan/_/shin tu 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]legs par srid pa'i rtse srid mtho/_/ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/gdugs ni mchod rten gcig la 'bul bar byed/_/de tshe re re gdugs la mu tig gi/_/rgyan phreng bye ba rnams kyang shin tu bkram/_/ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/bye 
[\[159a.2\]]ba'i 'phan dang rin chen sna tshogs kyi/_/rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag brgya gang gA yi/_/bye snyed mchod rten dag la 'bul bar byed/_/snang ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen gcig gi/_/mchod rten gcig la sil snyan bye ba stong /_/dkrol cing gus pa'i mi ni sa ya dag_/bye ba phrag 
[\[159a.3\]]stong tshang ba 'bul bar byed/_/me tog gdugs brgya du ma mchod rten la 'bul ba/_/thub pa che la de 'dra'i mchod pa nyin gcig bzhin/_/gang gA'i bye snyed bskal pa stong du byed pa bas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di las tshigs bcad gcig thos nas/_/som nyi med cing 'dun pa skyed 
[\[159a.4\]]byed la/_/rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di dag kyang rjod byed na/_/de bas bsod nams 'di ni bla med mchog_/mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ming thos shing /_/tshul khrims skyon med mtshan 'di 'dzin pa dang /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas la ni mchod byed pa/_/des ni gang gA'i bye snyed 
[\[159a.5\]]sangs rgyas mthong /_/thub chen rkang gnyis mchog gyur de dag la/_/mchod pa dam pa'ang yid kyis byas nas ni/_/rtag tu myos med chos kyang ston byed cing /_/bskal pa bye ba de ni rmongs med 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon pos mdo mchog rgyal po 'di/_/ston pa'i tshe na gang 
[\[159a.6\]]gis sngon mthong ba/_/rgyal ba mchog las 'di ni thos gyur nas/_/phyi ma'i dus su de ni dga' bas 'dzin/_/dri nga phyi sa'i bum pa mis 'dor ltar/_/'dod pa skyon du bgrang ba spong byed cing /_/mkhas pa nges 'byung zhi la mngon dga' ste/_/rtag tu myos med dgon pa sten par byed/_/yangs 
[\[159a.7\]]pa'i grong khyer mchog tu gnas nas su/_/der ni bshad tshe gang gis nga mthong zhing /_/dra ba'ang nga la mchod byed mthong ba ni/_/phyi ma'i dus su mdo mchog 'di 'dzin to/_/nga'i bu gang zhig rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing /_/byang chub zhi ba spyod mchog spyod pa na/_/sems can rnams ni rtag tu 'dul byed pa/_/
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]phyi ma'i dus su mdo mchog 'di 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa gzhal med dpag med kyi/_/spyad pa spyod tshe gang gis rim gro dang /_/de bzhin mchod pa mchog dag byed pa ni/_/de ni phyi dus rgyal mchog chos 'dzin to/_/gang zhig bskal pa bye bar tshangs spyod cing /_/'jig rten 
[\[159b.2\]]mtha' yas don ni sngar spyad pa/_/gang zhig phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 'di/_/thos pa'i bsod nams grangs su 'gyur ma yin/_/sangs rgyas 'khrugs med yang na tshe dpag med/_/sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag med de dag 'dir/_/sems can snying po gang gis mthong 'dod pa/_/mdo sde 
[\[159b.3\]]mdzes pa dpag med bzung bar gyis/_/tshe dpag med dang mi 'khrugs dri med 'od/_/seng ge dang ni tog dang de bzhin du/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas de kun mthong 'dod pa/_/phyi ma'i dus su rgyal mchog chos zung shig_/sangs rgyas byams pa dang ni dri med 'od/_/bdag nyid chen po dang ni 
[\[159b.4\]]seng ge tog_/rab snang gtso bo de bzhin mthong 'dod pa/_/de ni phyi dus rgyal mchog chos zung shig_/'di 'dra'i mdo sde khyad par 'phags mchog dag_/rin chen dra ba can la nga yis bshad/_/phyi ma'i dus su de tshe khyod kyis ni/_/bag med gnas la 'dug par ma byed cig_/phyi ma'i dus 
[\[159b.5\]]kyi tshe ru gyur pa na/_/tshul khrims skyon med rtag tu bag byos dang /_/de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_/rgyal ba 'od zer mtha' yas can gyi zhing /_/rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams/_/steng gi 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_/
[\[159b.6\]]myur ba nyid du sangs rgyas byams pa mthong /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lits+tsha bI gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu dang /_dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu dang /_lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams yi rangs 
[\[159b.7\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/_zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]{D164}]@##//_//rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+na tsan dra pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rin chen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[160a.2\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri la 'di lta ste/_byang 
[\[160a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub 
[\[160a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag 
[\[160a.5\]]na rin po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' sdug dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[160a.6\]]dgu khri dang /_lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa g.yog 'khor tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du 
[\[160a.7\]]ma dang bcas pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang /_klu'i rgyal po kun du grags dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu 'bum phrag du ma dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang /_khab spu 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]can dang /_rtsi sman dang /_bong bu dang /_de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/_sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen 
[\[160b.2\]]por bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba glang po che'i lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan cing gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/_dril bu g.yer kha dpyangs pa/_gser gyis spras pa'i dar gyi lda ldi 
[\[160b.3\]]mang pos mdzes par byas pa/_bdug pas bdugs pa/_me tog sil mas gtor ba/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/_gdugs dang ra bas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/_stegs bu bdun gyis kho ra khor yug dag bskor ba la zhon nas rgyal po'i 
[\[160b.4\]]'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_sems can thams cad la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing song ba las gzhon nu rin chen zla bas thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dad par bya ba/_dbang po dul 
[\[160b.5\]]ba/_thugs dul ba/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog_/dul ba dang zhi ba dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_gtso bo chen po/_dbang po bsrungs pa/_dbang po thul ba/_mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[160b.6\]]cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku gser gyi mchod sdong ltar 'phags la dpal gyi mchog gis lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ste gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sems dad par gyur to/_/sems dad par gyur nas glang po che'i steng nas 
[\[160b.7\]]skyen par babs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das la zhe sa dang bcas/_gus pa dang bcas pas 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[161a.2\]]mo dad pa can gang dag gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu po dag gi mtshan thos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_
[\[161a.3\]]bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu legs so legs so/_/gzhon nu khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la 
[\[161a.4\]]phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[161a.5\]]rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/_gzhon nu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di zhu bar sems pa legs so/_/gzhon nu khyod kyi zhu ba bzang ste spobs pa dge'o/_/de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[161a.6\]]yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/sems rtse gcig tu rna ba blags te sems sdus la soms shig dang /_don de ngas khyod la bshad do/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[161a.7\]]ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig 'das pa na yod ce na/_gzhon nu dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du bye mas yongs su gang 
[\[161b.2\]]bar gyur la/_de nas mi la la zhig gis bye ma de'i sa 'bru re re nas blangs shing shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer bye ma 'bru re 'jog par byed pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis bye ma de thams cad shar phyogs su yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par gyur kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi tshad dam 
[\[161b.3\]]mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams de yang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis legs par 
[\[161b.4\]]brgyan pa/_gser gyi sa gzhir 'dug cing /_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_rin po che'i shing ljon pas brgyan pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams med pa/_rtswa dang /_shing skam dang /_tsher ma dang /_rdo dang /_
[\[161b.5\]]gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dag med pa/_ngam grog dang g.yang sa med pa/_me tog sil ma dag bkram pa yin te/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 
[\[161b.6\]]kyis bskor cing /_byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu 
[\[161b.7\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku/_gser legs par btsos shing legs par dul ba lta bu rin po che'i rgyan legs par bkod pa bzhin du 'khor gyi nang na mdzes par bzhugs shing /_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to/_/'di 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]skad ces kyang ston te/_'di ltar sa'i khams ni med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang /_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[162a.2\]]shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to/_/gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu 
[\[162a.3\]]lon no/_/gzhon nu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mo dang /_mtshan mo'i ming yang med de/_'dzam bu'i gling gi rtsi ba'i thabs 'dis dper bya ba ni ma gtogs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad kyang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis snang bar 'dug go/_/
[\[162a.4\]]gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa des chos bstan pa re res kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la 'god par mdzad do/_/bzod pa dang po dang /_bzod pa gnyis pa dang /_bzod pa gsum pa la ni de'i nyis 'gyur 'god par 
[\[162a.5\]]mdzad do/_/gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gang dag sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can 
[\[162a.6\]]dag gi lus la 'od kyis reg pa de dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[162a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_lag mthil ltar mnyam pa zhes bya ba 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la thog mar dge ba/_bar 
[\[162b.2\]]du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to/_/zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de tsan dan dpal zhes bya zhe na/_gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[162b.3\]]de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsigs pas yongs su khyab pas na/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan tsan dan dpal zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[162b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po 
[\[162b.5\]]zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_ji ltar gong du bstan pa bzhin no/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la 
[\[162b.6\]]gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing /_byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to/_/'di skad ces kyang chos ston to/_/zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya 
[\[162b.7\]]ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing 'od de 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]yang nyams su myong ngo /_/gzhon nu 'di nas byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khrug med ces bya ba zhig yod de/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba 
[\[163a.2\]]nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa 
[\[163a.3\]]la chos ston to/_/zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan 
[\[163a.4\]]thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal mtshan lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das 
[\[163a.5\]]pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_lag mthil ltar mnyam pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba zhes bya zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs 
[\[163a.6\]]pa de'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de zla ba snang ba zhes bya'o/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas 
[\[163a.7\]]yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa 
[\[163b.2\]]zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i mchod sdong zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis 
[\[163b.3\]]bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing 'jig 
[\[163b.4\]]rten na rin po che ltar mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par 
[\[163b.5\]]gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra dang ldan zhes bya zhe na 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_stong pa 
[\[163b.6\]]nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi sgra dang /_rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i sgra rnams dang ldan 
[\[163b.7\]]no/_/gzhon nu 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra de lta bu dag dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra dang ldan zhes bya'o/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_de'i mtshan thos na bla na med 
[\[164a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing me tog ltar mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 
[\[164a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[164a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen pos rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya 
[\[164a.5\]]ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang tshul 
[\[164a.6\]]thams cad la mkhas shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu 'di nas 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/
[\[164a.7\]]gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_ri med cing khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po med de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri zhes bya ba'i ming yang 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]ye med pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub 
[\[164b.2\]]sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi 
[\[164b.3\]]ldog par 'gyur zhing nye bar len pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par yang rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med/_dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal 
[\[164b.4\]]du med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig 'das pa na yod ce na/_gzhon nu 'di lta ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[164b.5\]]srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du bye mas yongs su gang bar gyur la/_de nas mi la la zhig gis bye ma de las 'bru re re nas blangs shing steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer bye ma 'bru re re 'jog par byed pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis bye ma de thams cad steng gi phyogs su yongs su zad cing 
[\[164b.6\]]yongs su gtugs par gyur kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi tshad dam mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams de yang lag mthil ltar 
[\[164b.7\]]mnyam par gyur pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis legs par brgyan pa/_gser gyi sa gzhir 'dug cing mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_rin po che'i shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi tshogs 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]rnams med pa/_rtswa dang /_shing skam dang /_tsher ma dang /_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dag med pa/_ngam grog dang /_g.yang sa med pa/_me tog gi sil ma dag bkram pa yin te/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[165a.2\]]rgyas nor dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med 
[\[165a.3\]]pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku gser legs par btsos shing legs par dul ba lta bu rin po che'i rgyan legs par bkod pa bzhin du 'khor gyi nang na mdzes par bzhugs shing thog mar dge ba/_
[\[165a.4\]]bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to/_/'di skad ces kyang ston te/_'di ltar sa'i khams med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang /_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[165a.5\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing chos rin po che bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu de 
[\[165a.6\]]ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa dang /_yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam 
[\[165a.7\]]par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]ches grangs med pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i bskal pa zhig byung ste/_der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[165b.2\]]pa/_skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung ste/_der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu po 'di dag thams 
[\[165b.3\]]cad lhan cig tu 'thun par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_zas dang /_skom dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi rnam pa dpag tu med grangs med pas bcom 
[\[165b.4\]]ldan 'das de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas thams cad kyis lhan cig tu 'thun par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_thams cad kyis nyi ma gcig tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[165b.5\]]de dag gis rim gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/_byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[165b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad kyang mnyam mo/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma 
[\[165b.7\]]gcig tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ni ngo mtshar lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sku tshe'i tshad de tsam du ring ba gzhes lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[166a.2\]]'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad 'di la de bzhin du 'dzin cing yid ches la spong bar mi bgyid/_'dor bar mi bgyid pa de la bsod nams ji tsam skye bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[166a.3\]]gzhon nu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu po rnams lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[166a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin pa byin te/_de lta bur bskal pa grangs med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis mtshan 'di rnams dang /_sku tshe'i tshad 'di rnams thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin cing yid ches la spong bar 
[\[166a.5\]]mi byed/_smod par mi byed de/_mos par byed cing 'thun par byed na bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/_stong gi cha dang /_dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[166a.6\]]pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dpal ldan legs dang /_dga' ldan dang /_lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i 
[\[166a.7\]]phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang /_tsan dan gyi phye mas gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_rjod par bgyid pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis sug pa na mchis pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur 
[\[166b.2\]]ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi dbang du mchis par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying 
[\[166b.3\]]po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_phung po med pa bcom ldan 'das/_/khyod kyis legs gsungs dpag tu med/_/bdag dang lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams/_/khyod kyis 'di la yi rang ngo /_/'jig rten mgon po 'das pa na/_/gang 
[\[166b.4\]]dag da dung ma byon dang /_/phyogs rnams ma lus gang bzhugs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchis/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul gcig pa/_/chos dang dge 'dun zhi ba'i mchog_/yon tan legs par bsam mi khyab/_/dge 'dun la yang skyabs su mchis/_/
[\[166b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/_/gang dag bzod la rab gnas shing /_/gang dag gzungs la gnas pa dang /_/gang dag mtshungs med stong nyid tshul/_/mtshan nyid kyi ni mdo sde dang /_/byang chub rgyur 'gyur sde snod dang /_/'thun par 'jug pa'i mdo sde la/_/
[\[166b.6\]]legs bslabs byang chub sems rnams ltar/_/thub pa bdag ni byang chub kyi/_/spyad pa spyod cing slob par 'tshal/_/rang byung de dag ji bzhin du/_/zhing gi bkod pa rnam dag dang /_/spyod dang spyod yul ting 'dzin dang /_/de dag gi ni yon tan dang /_/drang srong mchog rnams sku tshe'i 
[\[166b.7\]]tshad/_/gsungs pa gang lags rdzogs par bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang /_rin chen zla ba gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi/_/mtshan ni gang zhig 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]'dzin byed pa/_/ma 'ongs dus na de dag kun/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/nga yis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/drang srong mchog bzhugs de dag ltar/_/de dag tshe yang bskal pa ni/_/bye ba bsam yas snyed du 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyob pa de dag gi_/
[\[167a.2\]]mtshan 'di dag ni 'dzin 'di la/_/me dang chom rkun dug rnams dang /_/mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshan 'di dag ni 'dzin byed na/_/chu chen dag gis de mi 'chi/_/rgyal po'i gnod pas ma yin te/_/de ni nams kyang chos mi spong /_/mtshan 
[\[167a.3\]]mo thun tshod dang po dang /_/gung dang tha ma'ang de bzhin te/_/dus gsum dag tu mtshan sgrogs dang /_/drang srong mchog ni de dag gi/_/mtshan rnams snga dro sgrogs byed cing /_/nyi ma'i gung la sgrogs byed dang /_/mkhas pa nub kar sgrogs byed pa/_/rmi lam bzang po 
[\[167a.4\]]mthong bar 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams bzung nas de 'og tu/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/sngon chad sdig pa ci bsags pa/_/mi dge thams cad bshags par bya/_/de yis lus ngag yid kyi las/_/mi dge gang dag byas gyur na/_/mtshan rnams bzung 
[\[167a.5\]]nas de 'og tu/_/nyes byas de yang bshags par bya/_/yan lag lnga yis gtugs nas ni/_/rgyal rnams byang chub sngon rol du/_/dus gsum dge ba ci bsags pa/_/de kun rjes su yi rang bya/_/'jig rten rtsa lag rnams kyis ni/_/byang chub brnyes 
[\[167a.6\]]nas chos gsungs dang /_/lus can gang dag 'jig rten gyi/_/mgon po rnams la mchod byed pa/_/de la rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/_/nyin mtshan dus gsum yi rang bya/_/des na bdag gzhan don byed pa'i/_/pha rol phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur/_/bcom 
[\[167a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rin chen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pid+yA ka ra sid+ha 
[\[167b.2\]]dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D165}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya k+she mang ka ra pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya 
[\[167b.3\]]ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas na/_shAkya rnams kyi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga 
[\[167b.4\]]brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe shAkya'i bu bde byed ces bya ba ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[167b.5\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas shAkya'i bu bde byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na 
[\[167b.6\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_tshegs chung ngus kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sgrub par bgyid/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar bgyid/_rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gum pa'i 
[\[167b.7\]]dus bgyid par 'gyur/_skyes nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad rnam par spangs shing khom pa 'byor pa thob par 'gyur/_gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur/_spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur/_phyir mi ldog 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]pa'i chos dang ldan zhing stong pa nyid la lhag par mos par yang 'gyur/_rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/_khyim na gnas kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[168a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i bu gzhon nu bde byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo 
[\[168a.3\]]phal po che'i don dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/_legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ji skad smos pa'i 
[\[168a.4\]]yon tan de dag rjes su 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing bzod pa la gnas pa de pha rol gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang /_brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang /_mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang mi 'dru ba dang /_khros 
[\[168a.5\]]kyang slar mi khro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing ji skad smras pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[168a.6\]]ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu spyos kyang gshe bar mi byed la/_/gnod byas gzhan la de ni gnod mi byed/_/de ni mi lus spang ba byas nas kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' yon 
[\[168a.7\]]tan de dag 'thob/_/sdig pa'i tshig rnams rtag tu srung byed cing /_/sdig pa'i sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro la/_/sdig las log ste 'bras bu de thob nas/_/ye shes mchog nyid myur du thob par 'gyur/_/skye bo gang dag 'tshog rung dga' byed cing /_/khro gtum gnod par sems pa'i 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]sems ldan rnams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su spangs nas su/_/mi mkhas de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad ldan/_/de lta bas na gzhan la mi 'tshog cing /_/rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams la dbyug pa spangs/_/sems can kun la phan zhing snying brtser ldan/_/des 'dir ye shes 
[\[168b.2\]]dam pa myur du 'thob/_/skye bo rmongs pa khros pas zil non pa/_/'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan las de ring ste/_/de ni log lta rnams kyis ngan 'dzin yin/_/de lta bas na mkhas mis dkrug mi bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir mi khro zhing /_/bden pa rjes srung gzhan la 
[\[168b.3\]]mi gnod pa/_/spyad pa dkon pa 'di dag rdzogs byas nas/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mdzes phun sum tshogs/_/mi mkhas rtag tu phung zhing sdang sems ldan/_/pha ma la yang 'di na gus mi byed/_/kun nas nyon mongs rtsa ba rab gnas pa/_/skyes bu tha ma'i nyes pa 'di 
[\[168b.4\]]rnams yin/_/de bas rtag tu bzod pa kho na bsten/_/dge slong chos smra ba la bsten par bya/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtong ste/_/de la byang chub mchog ni dka' ba med/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[168b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing ji skad smos pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang rjes su 'thob bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang /_chos 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[168b.6\]]chos ston pa yin/_bud med yongs su spong zhing bud med la sten par mi byed pa yin/_sbyin pa'i bdag po dang /_kun bged pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_kun bged pa la dga' ba dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid yongs su spong ba yin/_stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /_stong pa nyid la 
[\[168b.7\]]gnas pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems can gang dag chos ni 'dod pa dang /_/chos kyi don du brtson 'grus bskyed pa dkon/_/gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/_/de dag ye shes dam pa thob par 
[\[169a.2\]]'gyur/_/gzhan las thos nas yang dag 'dzin byed cing /_/pha rol don du gnyer la chos ston la/_/shes ldan de dag 'khor du zhum pa med/_/bla med byang chub mchog la reg par 'gyur/_/log par ltung rgyu bud med rnam par spangs/_/rgyal sras rtag tu tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/_/
[\[169a.3\]]tshangs par spyod la brtan par de gnas shing /_/'khor lo bla med dam pa skor bar byed/_/bud med rnams la mtshan ma 'ga' yod de/_/'di ltar sdug bsngal nyam thag skem par 'gyur/_/de dag bsten na zhi ba med pa ste/_/de bas yongs su spongs la byang chub spyod/_/de nas shAkya'i 
[\[169a.4\]]bu bde byed bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rang gi lus las rgyan bkrol te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i 
[\[169a.5\]]drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu 'dug par gyur nas/_rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa de nas mi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rgyan rnams 'thor zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
