[\[210b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong gis bzod pa thob bo/_/srog chags 'bum phrag bcu gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/
[\[210b.3\]]lha dang klu 'bum dag kyang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa na sangs rgyas 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ma yin/_gang dag gis bzung ba nas kun chub par byed pa'i bar du gyur pa 
[\[210b.4\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag ni ring por mi thogs par rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[210b.5\]]'di ni ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i 
[\[210b.6\]]rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus 
[\[210b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]{D168}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_bi ma la pra b+ha pa ri pr-its+tshA/_bod skad du/_dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[211a.2\]]gi yul thams cad srung ma rnams kyi lag tu so sor gtad pa na/_bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs nas lha thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir 'od zer btang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed ma thag tu lha'i rgyal po thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa bcom 
[\[211a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po kun tu rgyal la bos te bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dag nga'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bzhin gyis la rim gro byos shig_/nga yongs su mya ngan 
[\[211a.4\]]las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na/_li yul zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir ngas khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/_/rgyal po rnam thos bu khyod dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po kun tu rgyal/_/klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang /_/blo rab brtan pa'i lha yi bu/_/nga 
[\[211a.5\]]yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/_/yul 'di rgyal ba'i dbang po yis/_/'dul ba yin gyi gzhan gyis min/_/gang dag ngas ni ma btul ba'i/_/sems can de dag li yul 'khor/_/sangs rgyas lung bstan grong khyer du/_/so sor skye ba len par 'gyur/_/nga yi sangs rgyas 
[\[211a.6\]]byang chub phyir/_/sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_/smon lam chen po rab mang ba/_/btab par gyur pa gang yin pa'i/_/bsod nams kyi ni tshogs de yis/_/yul 'di nga yi phyag mtshan gyur/_/zhi bar mya ngan nga 'das na/_/khyed rnams la ni gtad par bya/_/gang tshe 
[\[211a.7\]]nga yi byams pa'i sa/_/li yul 'di ni byung ba na/_/'gu ma ti ra gnas mdzes der/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten du/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/de tshe 'dir ni 'dul bar 'gyur/_/yul 'di yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/_/nga yis khyed la 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]byin pa yin/_/de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus/_/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa ni/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'/_/gcig tu rung ba ma lags te/_/mchog rab rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/_/las 'di shin tu dka' ba lags/_/ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs 
[\[211b.2\]]bzhin du/_/yul dang ljongs rnams 'khrug pa mchis/_/khyod kyis dam chos bshad na yang /_/yongs su bsrung bar dkon lags na/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe/_/lha yis bor ba'i yul dag tu/_/lha la sogs pa srung ba rnams/_/bka' bzhin mi nyan ji zhig smos/_/
[\[211b.3\]]bdag cag rnams la thugs rjes mdzod/_/gang zhig thos na lha rnams kun/_/khyod kyi bka' bzhin bgyid 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i chos ni bshad par gsol/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnams kyi bka'/_/de ni sa steng gcog tu med/_/skye bo gang du ma byung ba'i/_/las ni shin 
[\[211b.4\]]tu dka' lags na/_/bcom ldan der ni bdag cag gis/_/ji ltar yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni dus gsum gzigs/_/kun mkhyen ye shes spyan dang ldan/_/rgyal ba skyes mchog de yi phyir/_/las 'di bdag cag mchis kyis 'tshal/_/de 
[\[211b.5\]]phyir gtad pa mnod par bgyi/_/rgyal bas sngar ni bka' stsal pa'i/_/las ni ji ltar bgyid 'gyur ba/_/de ltar byin gyis brlab par gsol/_/rgyal bas lung bstan grong khyer du/_/rgyal bas sngon ni lung bstan pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/_/gzugs 
[\[211b.6\]]bzang sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/_/dge slong brgya phrag gsum dag dang /_/dge slong ma ni nyis brgya 'byung /_/sdig pa'i las rnams gang dag gis/_/sngon ni smon lam btab gyur cing /_/sdig byed phyogs ni lnga brgya po/_/de dag rnams kyang 'byung 'gyur te/_/dge byed la ni 
[\[211b.7\]]bgegs bya'i phyir/_/yul 'di dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge byed mdza' bo de dag kyang /_/li yul dag tu skye ba len/_/rgyal bas lung bstan yul dag tu/_/legs pa rnams ni byed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar yul 'dir bdag cag rnams/_/legs par 'gyur dang 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bdag cag gis/_/ci nas gzung ba'i thabs 'tshal bar/_/bcom ldan bdag cag dam pa gsol/_/de la bcom ldan gsungs pa ni/_/dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byas/_/gnod sbyin dbang po dus kun tu/_/yul ni yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_/byang 
[\[212a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang 'di/_/nga yi tshig gis gzung bar gyis/_/yul de 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/_/lha yi skyed mos tshal mchog bzhin/_/dge 'dun kun dga' ra bas rgyas/_/dri gtsang khang gis mdzes par byas/_/der ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams kyang /_/
[\[212a.3\]]bde ba can dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dge slong ma yis gang /_/de dag theg pa mchog kyang ston/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang der/_/mi rnams skyes pa gang yin pa/_/dge ba yi ni las byed cing /_/byang chub phyir ni sngo bar byed/_/ci srid thub pa'i dbang po 
[\[212a.4\]]yis/_/bstan pa yul der gnas pa dang /_/mchod par byed pa de srid du/_/yul dag kyang ni gnas par 'gyur/_/bstan pa dag la ma mchod na/_/srung ma rnams ni 'khrug par 'gyur/_/yul yang yal bar 'dor ba dang /_/'khrug pa'i sems kyis 'gro bar 
[\[212a.5\]]'gyur/_/srung ma dag ni song ba dang /_/yul 'di lha yis bor ba der/_/nad dang mu ges nyen pa dang /_/rgyal po dag kyang tshe thung 'gyur/_/srung ma kun tu khros pa yis/_/dpung rnams kyang ni med par byed/_/rgyal ba dam pa mchog gis lha rnams la de skad ces bka' 
[\[212a.6\]]stsal nas/_de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das dpal 'od zer lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_smin mtshams kyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams byung ngo /_/'od zer de dag las kyang 'od zer tshad med grangs med pa byung bar 
[\[212a.7\]]gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der tshig tu brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste/_/lha'i lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gnod pa nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam zhes bya ba'i 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]bar du 'dri'o/_/'di skad ces kyang smras te/_sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir ngas bskal pa mang por dka' ba byas so/_/dam pa'i chos bsdu ba'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su btang ba byas te/_sbyin pa mang po byin no/_/sdug bsngal shin tu mang po byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis 
[\[212b.2\]]ma myong ba dag nyams su myong ste/_des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su thob par gyur to/_/da ni nga yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus dang skabs su bab nas/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi yul rnams yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir srung ma rnams kyi lag tu 
[\[212b.3\]]byin no/_/lha rnams mya ngan nga 'das nas/_/lo brgya lon pa de yi tshe/_/ming ni li yul zhes bya ba/_/rab tu 'byor pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams kyi/_/'dul ba'i phyir ni chad kyu ste/_/rtog ge pa dang 
[\[212b.4\]]bral ba yin/_/bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal sras rnams/_/li yul 'khor gyi grong khyer der/_/skye ba dag kyang len 'gyur zhing /_/mig dang 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams ni smin bya dang /_/chos kyang mnyan par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub spyod pa bzang 
[\[212b.5\]]po dag_/de tshe de kun spyod par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la dgongs/_/nyi ma'i snying po mdo sde che/_/mdo sde mchog ni bshad pa na/_/snying rjes non pa'i sems kyis su/_/yul der bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/gzungs sngags rnams dang 'od zer dag_/
[\[212b.6\]]ji ltar sngon ni skur ba bzhin/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad nas/_/yul 'khor 'dir ni skyes kyi rnams/_/rgyal mchog rnams kyis skur bar mdzod/_/bstan pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/bdag la dgyes pas skur bar mdzod/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/_/'od zer 
[\[212b.7\]]de dag btang ba na/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams song nas ni/_/de nyid du ni slar yang 'ongs/_/de nas de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa li yul yongs su bskyang bar bzhed pa'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir skyes su 'od zer dag kyang btang /_gzungs sngags dag kyang bskur te/_'di skad ces kyang gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis 'od zer dag kyang gtong /_gzungs sngags dag kyang byang chub 
[\[213a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi lag tu bskur ba de dag gi mtshan ni 'di zhes bya/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming yang 'di zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mu stegs thams cad 'dzud pa la dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshig gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[213a.3\]]gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/_tad+ya thA/_ba ra ba ra/_kA sha a ra/_tsakra ko She/_gu h+ya ka bA re swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'dis li yul gyi lha dang mi rnams la lha rnams dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i chos la dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[213a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ba ra tri ka bu li/_sha si ri pa hA re bA re swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'dis ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos la zhugs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i tog gi gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[213a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rang gi yid la gsal ba'i tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshig la phyag 
[\[213a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_hwA kya ra te/_ho ho ho ho/_phA ru ra ra/_a bi ba ra/_ma bi ba ra/_Na ru he swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa ni ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur la/_sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba sngon gyi tshe rabs su ji lta bur gyur pa dang /_tshe rabs phyi ma la 
[\[213a.7\]]cir 'gyur ba yang shes par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bu sdug rgyal ba'i chos 'phel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha dang mi'i chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha ra s+thi ta/_ta tha tA badzri bi sa re ta tha tA swA hA/_gzungs sngags 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]'dis ni gzungs thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a ba hi/_sarba ta thA ga ta b+hU ta ko Ti b+ha ti b+ha ti/_pa Di ra Di swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'dis ni de bzhin 
[\[213b.2\]]gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ta tha tA pu De dra ba ne/_sarbi sa ra D+ri/_gu h+ya man tra ta tha tA d+ha na swA hA/_gzungs sngags 
[\[213b.3\]]'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba chen po mdzad par 'gyur zhing /_sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang nad rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[213b.4\]]tad+ya thA/_rad dA ga te/_ba gri ba ti ta Di b+ha ti tsan+d+re swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed de/_su 'di 'dzin pa'i lus dang /_sems kyi sdug bsngal rnams zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[213b.5\]]thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_b+hi na re ri bi/_sa ma sa tsa ga ba/_dar+sha na rash+mi/_sa man ta dar+sha ra ni swA hA/_gzungs sngags 
[\[213b.6\]]'dis ni byang chub sems dpas bya ba thams cad shes par gyur to/_/'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang rgyu chen po rnams mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis gzungs sngags 'di dag yul kun du bsrung ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[213b.7\]]shAkya thub pa la skyes su bskur ro/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dang po thugs bskyed pa nas/_byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_chos la gus par 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su dgongs so/_/de nas rang gi don dang lha la sogs pa'i don gyi phyir de dag la yul gtams shing gtad do/_/tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha thams cad kyi gzungs sngags 'di yang brjod par bya'o/_/na mo brah+ma ne/_na maH
[\[214a.2\]]sarba de bA nA na/_tad+ya thA/_bra h+ma na in dre/_de ba tA pra tiSh+Thi te/_a shwa s+thA ne/_ba ra in dre/_swa pa ra pa ri/_ha rak+shiM ma ba in dre/_san ta thA sma ra ba ra ha re/_a ma b+ha kum+b+ha ka krI grI shrI/_A lang kA ra/_sarba de ba/_grA ma swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'dis lha dang /_mi rnams rgyal 
[\[214a.3\]]ba thob par 'gyur zhing /_dgras kyang de la gnod par mi byed la/_dbang phyug thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/li yul du gang la la rgyal por 'gyur ba de 'di snyam du/_li yul 'di ni skye bo dang /_mi dang /_mi mang pos gang zhing nor dang /_'bru mang po rgyas pa yin te/_
[\[214a.4\]]yul thams cad kyi mchog dam pa yin pas/_gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'ong bar mi nus so snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe rgyal po des dgon pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[214a.5\]]'khor thams cad du dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_yul gyi mi thams cad sngar bshad pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams klog tu gzhug par bya'o/_/'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_kun chub par byed du gzhug go/_/dge 
[\[214a.6\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_yul na gnas pa'i mi de dag la yang phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams dang /_kha zas dang /_btung ba sna tshogs dang /_mchod pa'i las sna tshogs 
[\[214a.7\]]dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror bya'o/_/btsun par bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na li yul de gnod pa thams cad med pa dang /_phyir rgol ba'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dpung gis rgyal po de'i li yul gzhig par mi nus so/_/de nas yang 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rang rang gi mtshan dang /_'od zer dang /_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bskur ro/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang /_'jig rten 
[\[214b.2\]]skyong ba bzhi dang /_lha'i bu kun du rgyal ba la sogs pa/_gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang /_go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten mchod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri po de dag dang /_klu'i rgyal po gdon la 
[\[214b.3\]]snyems pa la sogs pa khri brgyad stong po gang yin pa de dag gi lag tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas/_bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag mtshan du gyur pa li yul dang thub 
[\[214b.4\]]pa drang srong chen po'i gnas su gyur pa go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten de dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun de dag la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_'tshe ba med par bya ba dang /_'bye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa li yul na gnas pa de 
[\[214b.5\]]yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gtad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di dag dang /_'od zer 'di dag dang /_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag snying rjes non pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang /_gsol ba chen po btab pas skyes su bskur nas/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas 
[\[214b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bka' mnyan te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po de dag dang /_klu'i rgyal po de dag dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa byang chub sems 
[\[214b.7\]]dpa' de dag dang /_'khor de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/_li yul de dang /_thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de dag bsrung ba'i phyir mnos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang /_'od zer de dag 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]dang /_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag kyang yul bsrung ba'i phyir mnos so/_/'od zer de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi lus la gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[215a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bas rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' la rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215a.3\]]pa mtshon cha rab tu 'jil ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan brgya pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rnam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rnam 
[\[215a.4\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bdud rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_zhi bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_lo ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_ka zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_me zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_
[\[215a.5\]]gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_thogs med sbyin zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_yid dang 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bar chad med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rims 
[\[215a.6\]]med rgyal mtshan bye ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'khrugs med gnas zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_tog gi blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_grong khyer du 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dpa' bo'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer 
[\[215a.7\]]dang /_rdo rje'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bsod nams kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bsam gtan gyi tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_me lce dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]'od zer dang /_zhi gnas kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_nor bu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dpa' bo'i rin chen zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_nyi ma snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_ye shes 
[\[215b.2\]]'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_snang ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'jig rten snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_snying rje'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_shes rab 
[\[215b.3\]]kyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_me zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'jig rten gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rab rib kyi rnam pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'jig rten gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_
[\[215b.4\]]'od chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_ko ka ra zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_a'i tshul du byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dzad tsha ra ya zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dpa' bo byed pa'i dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'od chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'od 
[\[215b.5\]]mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rgyal mtshan blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'bad pa mtho ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bden pa can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rab sgrogs 
[\[215b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dpa' ba'i rgyal mo zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_
[\[215b.7\]]mtho ris su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_zhi ba'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bsam gtan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dga' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'dam bu lta bu'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]dang /_mig snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_klu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_klung gi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_skyes bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'bar ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_me zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_pad ma'i 
[\[216a.2\]]'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dbang po'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'dri ba'i tshul zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dbang po la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_sa'i rgyal mtshan ston pa 
[\[216a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bden pa'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dngar ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_dbang po la brten pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_yid la 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rab tu 'gro mdzes 
[\[216a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'phral ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_legs 'bar zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'dri bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_nyi ma 'khor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_ye shes kyi chu 
[\[216a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bden pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rdo rje rgyal mtshan 
[\[216a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_rdo rje la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_bsod nams kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_lce'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_yid dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_lo ka hA 
[\[216a.7\]]ra/_shud d+hA ka ru s+thi ti pu Sh+ya ba/_ka ru le swA hA/_sdig pa gcod par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shud d+ha ma ti/_ad tsam b+he bu lo tsa re/_a kra ma te/_tsu ra ka re pu swA hA/_dga' byed snying rje zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_in dra/_in dri/_ba dre/_ba de bi phu re swA hA/_rdo rje blo gros zhes 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_Tha ke ba ke_/dzA dzam b+he/_b+h+ra ma dz+wa re swA hA/_pad ma 'dul zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shu ra/_ra re be a lo ke_/ko sha gA re swA hA/_bye bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_tsa le bi ta thA/_a n+yo n+ya/_pradz+nyA kA re swA hA/_sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dzi dzi re/_hA 
[\[216b.2\]]rA hA le/_le le pradz+nyA kA re swA hA/_'gog pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_badzre shrI ka re/_sa ra sa ra/_a dz+nyA mA dz+nye/_na ri re kI/_na ri/_sang ngi dz+nyA kA re phu swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a pu rI bi ba re/_sa da re/_ma kha ka re swA hA/_bden pa la gnas 
[\[216b.3\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dz+yo ti dz+yo ti/_badzre a/_a k+Sha man tra be/_pra ga A be/_badzri mA ba/_ka ka su re swA hA/_gzungs sngags kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal mo zhes bya ste/_gzungs sngags 'di ni pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zhi bar byed pa dang /_dge ba'i tshogs yongs su 
[\[216b.4\]]rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_di shA ka re/_s+tha kA rai/_in dra ba te/_ba prA tau sa prA u s+thA te swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni mu ge med par byed pa dang /_dbul ba med par byed pa'o/_/dam pa gang 'dod pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur te/_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan 
[\[216b.5\]]bzhi mtshan lan bzhi ste/_dus brgyad du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod byas na gter ram/_yang nor gang sa'i 'og tu sbas pa gzhan thob par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_oM he mo he dzam b+ha ya/_ma sha man tra kA/_da ma kA re la b+hA kA re/_bi kA re sa di dz+nyA kA re/_da ka di a d+hA ka/_pra 
[\[216b.6\]]sha ma na phu a ka na pra ma ne phu swA hA/_nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang /_bud med du skye ba las thar bar byed pa dang /_bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ste/_brtul zhugs bya mi dgos par/_ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du/_dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/
[\[216b.7\]]bud med gang la la mo mtshan gyi nad yod pa de la ni nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ka ka/_ko sha phu ma ma/_ra ra ra ra/_sta re phu/_sa ka re phu swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni gnod pa byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed par bshad de/_brtul 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]zhugs bya mi dgos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gi mtshan sngar smos pa dang /_gang dag gis gzungs sngags bshad pa de dag ni/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_grogs su gyur pa sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[217a.2\]]de dag gi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan li yul 'dir/_skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba blangs te/_sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag gis 
[\[217a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i li yul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_gzungs sngags de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag skyes su bskur te/_sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyis zhus nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan 
[\[217a.4\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /_li yul yongs su bskyang ba dang /_bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las skyes de dag blangs nas 'dir khyer te 'ongs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs 
[\[217a.5\]]na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa'i yul 'di ci nas 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bstan pa yang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_'dir lhags nas skye ba blangs so/_/gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa byung na de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de 
[\[217a.6\]]dag dang /_gzungs sngags de dag dang /_'od zer sngar bshad pa de dag bris te grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su btsugs la/_dmag gi ru mtshon la yang bris te bzhag nas/_mi rnams kyang klog tu bcug cing 'chang du bcug na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang /_mu ges 
[\[217a.7\]]'jigs pa dang /_las 'byang bar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyis ji lta bur bsams pa bzhin du phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can nad pa rnams la yang skyabs byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang la sdig pa'i las 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]shin tu lci ba dag yod na yang /_des zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /_gzungs sngags dang /_'od zer rnams bzlas brjod bya zhing /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dran par bya'o/_/gang na sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/_sangs 
[\[217b.2\]]rgyas kyi sku gzugs bzhugs pa de'i spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa de myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_'od zer de dag kyang de'i steng du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong na yang bzlas brjod bya'o/_/yang na zhag 
[\[217b.3\]]bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o/_/su yang rung ste gnod pa byung ba'am/_nad pa'am/_ji lta bur 'dod pa las bzlas brjod bya ba'am/_yang na bklag par bya'o/_/ci ste klog mi nus na de'i tshe skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/_mdud pa byas nas btags na gnod pa 
[\[217b.4\]]thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gang gi sgo dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /_gzungs sngags dang /_'od zer rnams bris te bzhag na grong khyer de gzhan gyi dmag tshogs kyis gzhom par mi nus so/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa la ni sha spang mi dgos so/_/
[\[217b.5\]]dngos po gzhan yang spang mi dgos so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu gang dag sangs rgyas kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba de dag shin tu dgongs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa de dag la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu dag bag tsha bar 
[\[217b.6\]]ma byed cig_/khyod kyi don gyi phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba mang po dang /_chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i dri gtsang khang la sogs pa sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten yul der 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du yul de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas kyi bar du yul de ma 
[\[217b.7\]]lus par gzhig nus pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_dngar ldan zhes bya ba yid du 'ong ba dang /_phag gis mtshon pa'i grong khyer dang /_grong khyer rnying pa de dag gsum yang ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas shing /_dge 'dun thams cad la mchod pa dang /_
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ka pi la na yod kyi bar du de dag 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rgyal ba'i sras thams cad la bos te bsgo ba/_kye grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha 
[\[218a.2\]]la sogs pa yul de yongs su skyong ba gang yin pa de dag gis chos dang mi ldan pa'i rgyal pos yul de gzhig pa na yal bar ma dor cig_/la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma mnyan te/_'jig pa'i tshe yul btang bar gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[218a.3\]]las bskal pa mang por bar chad du 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzungs sngags 'di bshad do/_/tad+ya thA/_kA le/_a kA le/_ni k+sh+ra me b+ha pra be shA/_A kA li kra me/_a ni sh+k+ra me/_a bra be shA/_pa re sa me pa ri sa mi ti/_sa sa se/_a sa sa se/_sa ku te/_ba ru re/_pa ru re/_a 
[\[218a.4\]]ga me/_a sa ma mo te/_sid d+he sid d+hA ya/_na mo bai ro tsa nA ya swA hA/_pha Da De Ne sba te/_A sA te/_su man ne/_sa ru ste/_sid d+he/_sid d+hA ya swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis li yul gyi rgyal por gyur pa la dris nas/_'di ni 
[\[218a.5\]]khyed kyi skyes yin no/_/ji ltar khyod kyis byas pa dang /_khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi phyir lus dang srog btang bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyi las de lta bu yin te/_khyod kyis legs par byas pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe yul du dgra chen po'i 'jigs pa 
[\[218a.6\]]byung bar gyur na de'i tshe mdo sde 'di bklag par bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/'on te 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur te/_sa ha pa ti yang grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/yul bsrung ba'i phyir mdo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te rgyal po'i pho brang du bcang bar bya'o/_/rgyal 
[\[218a.7\]]po'i pho brang gi phyi rol dang /_grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su yang de bzhin du bris te gzhag par bya'o/_/lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du yang gzhag par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe mang du bklags sam/_bslabs sam/_
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]bcangs na de'i tshe yul der yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras nas/_bar snang la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog gi char ni phab/_lha'i sil snyan rnams 
[\[218b.2\]]ni dkrol/_lha'i rnga bo che rnams ni brdungs te/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/_/gang gi tshe yul der gzungs sngags de dag dang /_'od zer de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag 'ong bar gyur pa de'i tshe bdag 
[\[218b.3\]]cag kyang ji ltar sngon bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i thad du 'ongs pa bzhin du phyi bzhin 'ong bar bya'o/_/rgyal po de la yang yul bsrung ba'i phyir bdag cag gis gzungs sngags sbyin par bya ste/_dam pa ci slong ba de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhig bud 
[\[218b.4\]]med kyi gzugs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa zhes bya ba na 'dug pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i mngon sum du smon lam btab ste/_ci 
[\[218b.5\]]nas kyang bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchis la/_der bcom ldan 'das de las dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos par gyur cig_/der bdag gis sems can thams cad la phan pa 
[\[218b.6\]]dang /_bde ba dang /_nad las thar bar bgyid par gyur cig_/ces de skad du smon lam btab nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas shi 'phos nas/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang du btsun mo dam pa'i bu mor skyes te dri ma 
[\[218b.7\]]med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de nyid 'khor de'i nang na 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lags pa na li 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]yul yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du bdag gis kyang bkas gtad pa mnod par 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs pa'i 'od zer btang ba rnams gang gi tshe/_bdag gi steng du gnas par 'gyur ba na/_gzungs gang gis gzungs 
[\[219a.2\]]thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs de yang bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyis thob par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe li yul du 'jigs pa chen po byung bar gyur pa na/_de'i tshe yul yongs su bsrung ba dang /_bstan pa yang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bdag 
[\[219a.3\]]la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par gyur cig_/thabs kyang ston par gyur cig_/lha rnams kyang dam pa stsol bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du bdag der mi'i bud med gzhan 'dra bar bud med de tha mal pa'i gzugs su snang bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[219a.4\]]'od zer de dag gi steng du gnas pa yang thob par gyur cig_/sems can gnod pas nyen pa rnams dang /_nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs sngags de dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/
[\[219a.5\]]gang gi tshe rgyal po chen po de dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang /_gang gi tshe gdong dmar gyis li yul gyi yul 'khor khyer ba na yang der bdag bud med kyi skye ba len par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos pad ma 
[\[219a.6\]]dkar po gsungs pa gang lags pa de yang bdag 'dzin par gyur cig_/mdo sde 'di las gzungs sngags 'byung ba rnams kyang rtogs par gyur cig_/sems can 'dul ba'i slad du sgra thams cad la rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang rtogs par gyur cig_/dam 
[\[219a.7\]]pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par gyur cig_/li yul gyi srung ma gang lags pa'i lha rnams la yang chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_mchod pa'i las bgyid par gyur cig_/theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]chos pad ma dkar po 'di dang /_lha gang dag gis mdo sde 'di bstan cing mnos pa de dag kyang bdag gi dbang du gyur cig_/de nas srung ma rnam thos kyi bu dang /_srin mo lam bkon ti srin mo thams cad dang /_grogs mo dang bcas pa dang /_'phrog ma bu dang 'khor du 
[\[219b.2\]]bcas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi tshig thos nas/_stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang gi tshe lha mo 'di li yul du skye ba len par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag cag kyang grogs bgyid pa'i slad du srung ma bgyid 
[\[219b.3\]]cing theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po dang /_li yul gyi yul 'khor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtad pa khyod kyis mnos so zhes dran par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lha mo de'i dam bcas pa 'di thos nas 'di skad 
[\[219b.4\]]ces gsol to/_/gang gi tshe lha mo 'di li yul bsrung ba'i slad du skye ba len par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang yul bsrungs pa dang /_bsams pa bzhin du 'byor bar bgyi ba'i slad du grogs bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od stan 
[\[219b.5\]]las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la dam pa gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad la bu 
[\[219b.6\]]gcig pa bzhin du sems par gyur cig_/brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom pa de thams cad grub par gyur cig_/lus brtan pa dang /_sems brtan pa dang /_sems can gyi don bgyid pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_yul gyi slad du sems 
[\[219b.7\]]mngon par brtson par gyur cig_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i mdo sdes sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang thob par gyur cig ces smras so/_/lha mos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de skad ces smras pa/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dang /_lha 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi steng du lha'i me tog gi char bab bo/_/de'i tshe lha mo dri med 'od/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mdzes pa/_/li yul du ni skyes shig ces/_/rgyal ba'i spyan sngar smon lam btab/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yi/_/bstan pa ji srid 
[\[220a.2\]]gnas pa'i bar/_/de srid bar du bdag kyang der/_/rtag tu skye ba 'dzin gyur cig_/rgyal ba'i spyan sngar gang gi tshe/_/lha mos smon lam btab pa na/_/sangs rgyas zhing bzhugs rgyal rnams kyis/_/de tshe legs zhes bya ba byin/_/lha mo yul gyi srung ma la/_/rgyal 
[\[220a.3\]]ba rnams kyis legs byin pa/_/rnam thos bu dang gnod sbyin dbang /_/kun tu rgyal gyis de bzhin thos/_/de tshe rnam thos bu la sogs/_/lha rnams gang dag der 'dus pas/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshig gis gsol/_/li yul yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_/lha rab dam 
[\[220a.4\]]pa 'thun gyur pa/_/bdag cag gis ni yul yang bzung /_/gang tshe gser gyi rigs dag dang /_/skar rdo'i yul ni mdzes gyur pa/_/li ni dbang bar gyur pa na/_/gser gyi dpya ni 'jal bar 'gyur/_/de tshe lha mos gsol pa ni/_/skar rdo dang ni gser gyi rigs/_/
[\[220a.5\]]lha rnams kyis ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/rgyal ba skyes mchog stsol bar mdzod/_/sa 'dir sngon gyi tshe rabs su/_/gang tshe bdag ni dge bsnyen ma/_/ming ni hu shar gyur pa na/_/yul 'di gnyis ni bdag gi lags/_/de yi 'khor du rgyal byung ba/_/u rgyan bdag po dbang 
[\[220a.6\]]phyug go/_/rgyal po stan las langs nas kyang /_/pus mo gnyis ni sa la btsugs/_/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba ni/_/gang gi tshe na li yul zhes/_/bya ba de ni 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/yongs su rgyas shing skye bo gang /_/de tshe skar rdo'i yul dag tu/_/stobs chen rgyal por bdag gyur nas/_/
[\[220a.7\]]der ni li yi bdag po dang /_/rtag tu gnyen ni bgyid pa dang /_/bdag gi yul de bsrung ba'i phyir/_/bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bgyi/_/de yi tshe ni dri med 'od/_/lha mos smon lam 'di skad btab/_/gang tshe yul gyi dang po 'dir/_/sum pa mang po 'ong ba dang /_/
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gang tshe yul 'dir rgya dang ni/_/'a zha dang ni sum pa rnams/_/'phags skyes po yi dmag bzhin du/_/yul der 'ong bar gyur pa na/_/de tshe yul 'dir skye bo'i phyir/_/bdag gis skye ba blang bar bgyi/_/bdag gis skye ba der blangs pas/_/sum pa la sogs ldog gyur 
[\[220b.2\]]cig_/li yul na ni gnas rnams kyis/_/sngon ni gang du las bgyis pa/_/der ni bdag kyang dga' bzhin du/_/bdag gis su ni las rnams bgyis/_/der ni sngon gyi rgyal po gang /_/blon po khyim bdag yul mi dang /_/bdag la sdug par gyur pa dang /_/de dag 
[\[220b.3\]]dang ni bral bar 'gyur/_/de tshe bdag ni gcig pu sdug_/mi gtsang ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/_/der ni skyo bar gyur pa na/_/sngon gyi smon lam dran gyur cig_/de tshe de yi 'khor du ni/_/ka spa ra yi bdag po rgyal/_/des ni lha mo dri med 'od/_/smras pa thos par gyur 
[\[220b.4\]]nas kyang /_/rgyal po stan las langs nas ni/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig kyang smras/_/bdag ni tshe rabs snga mar ni/_/mi bzad las byas gang yin pas/_/shAkya rnams ni brlag pa'i phyir/_/bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes dang /_/mdzes pa'i yul du lhan cig dong /_/las 
[\[220b.5\]]'di rnam smin mi bzad pa/_/tshe 'di la ni mi myong bar/_/bdag ni 'di skad smon lam 'debs/_/gang gi tshe na sum pa dang /_'a zha dag der dong ba dang /_bdag gis sngon shAkya'i yul du 'phags skyes po'i g.yul ngor las byas pa gang yin pa de/_gang gi tshe lha mo 'di 
[\[220b.6\]]skyo ba chen por gyur pa na/_de'i tshe bdag 'di'i phar gyur la/_bdag gi phyir 'di skyo bar gyur cing /_dang por gzungs thob pa bzhin du/_des bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa 'khor de nyid kyi nang na 
[\[220b.7\]]'dug pa des smon lam btab pa de'i tshe bdag kyang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mar gyur la/_bdag gis 'phags skyes po'i dmag slar ldog la sdig pa'i las chen po 'di lta bu byas te ci bya zhes gyod btab pa'i dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa des na li yul der bdag 'chi 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]ba'i dus la ma bab kyi bar du/_bdag gis li yul de nyid du mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas/_gang gi tshe yul der 'a zha dang sum pa 'ong ba de'i tshe bdag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/lha mo dri ma med pa'i 
[\[221a.2\]]'od de'i ming po rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu gang yin pa de yang shin tu nga rgyal che zhing rgyags pas g.yul 'gyed pa blta ba'i phyir shAkya'i g.yul der rgyal po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla la 'ongs nas/_des kyang g.yul der mi bsad pa la sogs pa'i sdig byas te/_
[\[221a.3\]]gang gi tshe der sems can mang po shi ba mthong ba de'i tshe/_des sangs rgyas mthong nas 'gyod pa chen po dang skyo bar gyur cing /_de'i tshe des lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la smras pa/_nga ni khyod kyi ming po shin tu sdug pa yin pas ngas dmag de'i nang du sdig pa'i las byas pa 
[\[221a.4\]]khyod kyis thos nas rjes su yid rangs par gyur te/_khyod kyi yid kyis mi dge ba thob par gyur pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na khyod kyi yul du sum pa'i dmag 'ong bar gyur te/_de'i tshe da ltar ji lta ba bzhin du der nga khyod kyi sdug pa'i ming por gyur la/_khyod 
[\[221a.5\]]kyis gcig pu lung med par mi gtsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang /_khyod kyis thog ma kho nar gzungs thob par 'gyur bzhin du/_de'i tshe nga yang khyod kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar gyur nas gnod sbyin 
[\[221a.6\]]gyi dbang po rnam thos kyi bu'i g.yog byed pa'i gnod sbyin A dzu la zhes bya bar gyur la des rtag tu khyod bsrung zhing ngas rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa de dag dang /_gnod sbyin gzhan de dag dang /_lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu lha'i rgyal po de dag la dran par bskul te/_gang 
[\[221a.7\]]gi tshe khyod la dgongs pa de'i tshe 'ongs nas ci 'dod pa sgrub par gyur cig ces smras so/_/der lha mo de nyid kyi nu mo tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa des smon lam btab pa/_bdag gi ming po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla la sdig pa'i las byas pa bdag gis thos nas 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]dga' bar gyur pa'i las des na der yang khyod kyi nu mor gyur la gang gi tshe las de'i rnam par smin pas bdag mya ngan gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe khyod de lta bur skyo bar gyur pas na/_bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed nas chos gang gis 'bras bu dang po thob ste/_
[\[221b.2\]]sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos thos nas de'i tshe sngon dang phyi ma'i las rnams dran par gyur cig ces byas so/_/der lha mo de'i ming po tha [{]chungs su [,]chung du [}]gyur cing /_dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa phyin cad de'i ming por gyur pa de'i sngon gyi las kyis sems 
[\[221b.3\]]can rnams skrag par byed pa des sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'debs pa yang mthong la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab nas li yul gyi yul 'khor yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir mnos pa yang mthong ngo /_/de nas lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi 
[\[221b.4\]]ming po tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bus bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngon bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/_dus thams cad du skyes par gyur nas rgyal srid kyi 
[\[221b.5\]]bgyi ba mang po yang bgyis so/_/bdag gi sring mo 'di yang bud med kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags te/_'dis li yul yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sug par blangs pa de ni las chen po mchis kyi 'tshal ba lags te/_bud med kyi bsam pa ni 
[\[221b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag gi steng du 'od zer btang ba de lta bur bdag la byin gyis brlab par gsol/_ci nas kyang yul bsrung ba'i slad du grogs bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gi rigs kyis yun ring 
[\[221b.7\]]por li yul du yul 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyang stsal bar gsol/_skye ba blangs te 'bras bu thob nas gum pa'i 'og tu yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur cig_/gang gi tshe li yul du sum pa'am/_gdong dmar rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag skar 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]rdo'i yul gyi rgyal por gyur te/_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de'i ming por gyur/_li yul dar bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag de'i grogs bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu des de skad ces gsol nas/_smon lam yang btab de'i tshe bcom 
[\[222a.2\]]ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char phab ste/_lha'i sil snyan rnams dkrol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa/_ngas thog ma sems 
[\[222a.3\]]bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bsod nams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mang po mdzad mdzad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po de dag dang /_cho 
[\[222a.4\]]'phrul de dag ngas gcig tu bsdus te gcig tu brtul bas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'dis yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir lag tu blangs pa'i li yul gyi yul 'khor rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/_
[\[222a.5\]]phyogs gang du li yul dang /_thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs der bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das der bzhugs bzhin du dpal thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[222a.6\]]nas/_ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer btang ngo /_/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang gnas gcig na 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang du li yul 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs de na skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs 
[\[222a.7\]]par mthong ngo /_/thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas ri glang ru zhes bya ba de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na grogs su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang 'od zer de dag btang ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]'das nyid ni gang du go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i bar snang la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang dang gang dag tu dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /_dgon pa'i gnas dang /_dri gtsang khang dang /_mchod rten 
[\[222b.2\]]chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i nang gi pad ma'i steng de dang de dag la 'khod do/_/de nas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad thugs su chud par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags chos 
[\[222b.3\]]kyi spyi bo zhes bya ba 'di bshad do/_/tad+ya thA/_ba ba ra/_pra t+ya ba ba ra/_pradz+nyAb ba ra/_bud d+ha ba ba ra/_sad d+harma ba ba ra/_shu rA ba ba ra/_sarba d+harma skan d+ha ba ba ra/_badzra pA Ni ba ba ra/_tiSh+Tha ta ba ba ra swA hA/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 
[\[222b.4\]]sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis thos so/_/ri glang ru'i zom na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dri ma 
[\[222b.5\]]med pa'i 'od dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'dis nga'i las gyis la/_li yul gyi yul 'khor khyod la gtad pas/_yongs su bsrung bar gyis shig_/de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sdes 'di skad 
[\[222b.6\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das li yul gtad pa 'di bdag cag gis mnod par 'tshal lo//_//dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i don gyi phyir 
[\[222b.7\]]gzungs sngags gzhan bshad pa/_tad+ya thA/_ni rdzi te/_brdzi te/_brdzi te/_b+ha Thi te d+harma skan d+ha a ba ra dzi te/_in dra brdzi te/_phu swA hA/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po la sogs pa gang dag la lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sngon sangs rgyas nyid du thog ma sems 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]bskyed pa de dag kyang der gshegs so/_/gzhon nu rdo rje sdes kyang yon phul lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de las sngon sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob po/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od 
[\[223a.2\]]kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba der byang chub thob par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bud med du grags pa zhes bya bar/_de bzhin 
[\[223a.3\]]gshegs pa chos kyi sgra sgrogs phyag na rin chen mdzod bsnams zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe lha mo de la de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa de'i tshe/_de lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer btang ste/_gang gi tshe lha mo 
[\[223a.4\]]dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis lung bstan pa de thob pa de'i tshe der byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi tshig ces bya bar gyur te/_de phyin cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang lung bstan to/_/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub 
[\[223a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang byang chub gang la khyod gnas pa de ni shin tu dkon pa yin no zhes smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i thad du 'od zer gtong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gsung gcig 
[\[223a.6\]]tu 'thun par gzungs sngags bshad pa/_tad+ya thA/_tA thA tA/_lo kA gra/_ta thA ga ta/_ka ba pa bi/_ka ra dzi/_b+hu ta ko Ti/_bi bi dra dra kha sha ra/_sas sas sas sas/_b+ha d+ha pra b+ha/_ba pa da ka ra na sa/_ba ra na ba ba ba ba/_a sa tsa ru na na/_tsa pa ba ra Nan/_ka ka ko Ta rA dzA na/_
[\[223a.7\]]bya ka ra Na sa b+ha dra/_ka ra Na swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni lung ston pa zhes bya ste/_gzungs sngags 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/_mtshan lan 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]gsum nyin lan gsum du bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob pa/_de'i tshe des bzod pa chen po thob par gyur 
[\[223b.2\]]te/_de'i tshe des smon lam btab pa/_ji srid du li yul du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag bud med kyi gzugs su snang bar gyur te/_smon lam btab pa des na de'i tshe bdag skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mor skye ba len par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de 
[\[223b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgra sgrogs phyag na rin chen mdzod bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di gnyis su brjod pa ni bud med du 
[\[223b.4\]]skye ba las thar bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa'i dam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i las rnams kyang bshags par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[223b.5\]]pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sad+yA the dan/_da da da da/_pradz+nyA ke sa/_pradz+nyA ke re/_pa ra pradz+nyA/_pra ta ha ta swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog ces bya ste/_chos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi ris 
[\[223b.6\]]kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa la bar chad byed mi nus shing glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/dran pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sems kyang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe lha 
[\[223b.7\]]mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis der skye ba blangs te skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mor gyur nas gser gyi yul gang du bdag gi pha ma gum pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bdag skyo bar gyur pa der bdag 'gro bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i grong khyer skyong ba'i rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag khyed kyi khyim thab tu gyur la/_bdag gi khyim na khyod bud med kyi lus kyis las de dag byed cing bdag gis kyang der bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[224a.2\]]dang /_khyod kyi yul gyi phyir dang /_sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa'i bar gyi las ci byed pa de dag thams cad bdag gi khyim du byed cing dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad kyang dran par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de na grong khyer skyong ba de'i bur gyur pa zhig yod pa des smras pa/_gang gi 
[\[224a.3\]]tshe sngon khyod dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe bdag khyod kyi bur gyur cig ces bdag gis smon lam btab nas/_de phyin cad tshe rabs thams cad du khyod ni bdag gi mar gyur la/_bdag ni khyod kyi bur gyur to/_/gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi yul du smon lam chen po'i 
[\[224a.4\]]dbang gis las byed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa chen po byung ba de'i tshe yang ci nas kyang bdag der sems can thams cad gnod pa las thar bar bya ba'i phyir grogs su 'gyur ba dang /_yul de na rgyal po med par yang bdag gis chos bzhin du skyong ba dang /_
[\[224a.5\]]bdag gzhan gyis bkol bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur gyi bar du bdag khyod kyi bur 'gyur zhing /_khyod kyang bdag gi mar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba'i rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med cig 
[\[224a.6\]]'dug pa nga rgyal gyis shin tu khengs shing rgyags la/_'dod chags kyi sems dang shin tu ldan pa des smon lam btab pa/_bdag kyang khyod kyi nu mor gyur te/_gzhon nu'i tshe bdag gis skyes bu mang po dag dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phyir bgad pa dang /_rtsas pa gang 
[\[224a.7\]]yin pa'i bdag gi las de dag thams cad byang bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/'khor de'i nang na skyes pa gzhan zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa des rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med de la smras pa/_gang khyod kyis nga'i phyir gsang ba'i don gyi dam bcas 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa de ni ngas mi gtong zhes byas nas/_de'i tshe mi des smon lam btab pa/_gang gi tshe ma 'ongs pa na rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med 'di lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang lhan cig tu li yul na gnas shing las chen po byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag gis las 'di gshegs te 'khor 
[\[224b.2\]]ba nas 'byung ba 'thob par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i ming po byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gser 
[\[224b.3\]]gyi rigs su chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por gyur te/_yul rtas par bgyi ba'i slad du lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi grogs su gyur la/_li yul gyi yul 'khor rtas par bgyi ba'i slad du gser gyi yul gang du dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya ba gnas par gyur pa der nor sa'i 
[\[224b.4\]]'og tu bzhag pa dang /_mi shi ba rnams kyi dur khrod na yod pa gang yin pa dang /_dge bsnyen ma hu sha'i nor du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gis btsal te/_gser la sogs pa nor mang po rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/_/lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di yang 
[\[224b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar li yul gyi slad du nor rnams dbul bar bgyid do/_/gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tshe yang lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_'byung po gang su dag nor de la bgegs byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/yul de'i srung 
[\[224b.6\]]mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ci nas nor de rnyed par 'gyur bar rang nyid grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi gser gyi ri gang du dge bsnyen ma hu sha byung bar gyur pa der bud med gzhan zhig byung ste/_des sbyin pa mang po byin la tshul khrims ni des ma bsrungs te/_
[\[224b.7\]]des 'di skad du bdag gis sbyin pa dag byin pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa des na bdag gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo dam par gyur la/_ci nas kyang li yul de rtas par bya ba'i phyir nor sbyin par byed pa de lta bur bdag grogs su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de'i 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ming po gzhon nu rdo rje sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang gi tshe dmag gi dpung chen po de dag phan tshun 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag skar rdo'i rgyal por gyur nas/_gang gi tshe gdong dmar dag dmag 'dren pa de'i tshe/_bdag 
[\[225a.2\]]gi gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po las nor blangs te/_li yul rtas par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bzhin du stsol bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de'i tshe na rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gzhan zhig lha mo de'i grogs mor gyur pa sa dang po thob pa gang yin pa de'i 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 
[\[225a.3\]]'dug pa des smon lam btab pa/_bdag li yul du tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du rgyal po'i btsun mo dam par gyur cig gang gi tshe dmag gi dpung chen po gang yin pa de dag li yul du g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe ni bdag rgya yul du skye ba len par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe 
[\[225a.4\]]gzhon nu rdo rje sde 'di li'i rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ni bdag de'i btsun mo dam par gyur nas/_bdag cag gnyis kas li yul slar rtas par bgyi ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams dang /_dgon pa'i gnas rnams dang /_mchod rten chen po dang /_dri gtsang khang 
[\[225a.5\]]dang /_gdong dmar rnams kyis bsregs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bdag cag gnyis kyis slar gsar du bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so/_/gang gi tshe de dag gis 'khor gyi nang du smon lam btab pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[225a.6\]]snyoms par zhugs so/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_lha'i bu blo gros rab tu brtan pa dang /_lha mo 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od rnams kyang de'i tshe sangs rgyas yid la byed 
[\[225a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su li yul de bsrung ba'i slad du 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]mnod par 'tshal te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du sug las thams cad 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus pa gang yin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[225b.2\]]'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi char phab nas rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par 'os pa rnams kyang bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na rnam thos 
[\[225b.3\]]kyi bu dang /_kun tu rgyal la sogs pa gang dag gi lag tu yul de bsrung ba'i phyir gtad pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yul bsrung ba'i phyir khyed kyi lag tu yang dang yang du gtad do/_/gang gi tshe gdong dmar dag gis yul bzung ste/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[225b.4\]]ba dang /_dri gtsang khang dang /_mchod rten chen po rnams 'jig par byed cing sreg par byed de/_de dag gis ci nas kyang nga'i bstan pa gzhig par bya ba'i phyir smon lam log par btab pas ring po mi thogs par der dmag sde gnyis po de dag phan tshun 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe 
[\[225b.5\]]lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ming po gzhon nu rdo rje sde nyid gser gyi rigs kyi yul der song nas/_gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras te/_dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa'i mdo bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa yod de/_li yul nas 'ongs 
[\[225b.6\]]pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lha rnams kyis gsungs pa yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi bka' ni gcog tu rung ba ma yin no/_/gdong dmar gyis li yul gyi yul 'khor khyer ba'i dus la ni da bab ste rgya ni gser gyi 
[\[225b.7\]]rigs kyi yul du 'ong bar 'dod do/_/gang gi tshe phan tshun g.yul 'gyed par byed pa de ni 'jigs pa chen po yin te/_gang gi tshe gdong dmar rnams skrag par gyur pa de'i tshe gser gyi rigs kyi yul du 'gro bar chas so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa ni 'di 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]yin te/_gang gi tshe gser gyi rigs kyi yul gdong dmar mi gtong la/_rgyang la gnod pa byed du mi 'ong ba de'i tshe gser gyi rigs kyi yul du mdo 'di phrin yig tu khyer la/_gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226a.2\]]dang /_lha rnams kyis bka' stsal pa yin te/_lha dang mi rnams kyis 'gal bar byar mi rung ba yin gyis/_bdag gis li yul gyi glud sbyin pa dang skar rdo'i don gyi phyir nga la nor mang po byin cig ces smros la/_gang gi tshe nor thob par gyur pa de'i tshe thog mar li yul du 
[\[226a.3\]]nor rdzongs la gdong dmar la skur cig li yul pa rnams la yang der sbyin par bya ste/_gang gi tshe li yul du skyes bskur ba na/_der thog mar skar rdor yang bskur bar byas nas/_mi'i yul chos bzhin du bya'o/_/de'i tshe 'di skad du nga ni gdong dmar rnams kyi bran mi byed de/_
[\[226a.4\]]ngas li yul gzung gis nga la nor byin cig dang /_de dag gis dmag gi dpung chen po yang der 'ong bar mi nus so zhes smros shig_/gang gi tshe de'i dmag li yul du 'ong na der ma 'ongs shig dang yul de ci ri ba'i rin ngas sbyin no/_/ci ste yul blu ba'i phyir/_phrin yig 'di bzhin 
[\[226a.5\]]du byed par 'gyur na bdag cag gis li yul thams cad bsdus te 'dum par bya'o zhes byas na rdzi bar mi nus te 'di la the tsom mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sde la de skad ces bstan nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[226a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer rnams gtong zhing byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong ba gang yin pa de dag dang /_lha la sogs pa 'khor der 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bdag cag gis kyang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de la gang gi tshe 
[\[226a.7\]]yul der gnod pa byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe dran par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags dang gzungs sngags gang yid la byas na gzungs sngags chen po gzhan rnams rtogs par 'gyur ba de sbyin par bya'o/_/'on kyang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/_de la 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]gnas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa rnams mthong zhing de dag gis chos bshad pa yang thos par 'gyur la/_lha rnams kyang dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'od zer gtong ba gang 
[\[226b.2\]]yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di skad ces gsungs so/_/khyod kyis yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/_/li yul mnos pa gang yin pa/_/rgyal mchog gis ni bka' stsal bzhin/_/shes rab chen pos de bzhin byos/_/sa 
[\[226b.3\]]steng gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i/_/gsang sngags kyang ni sbyin par bya/_/gang gi tshe na li yul der/_/gnod 'byung dus la bab pa na/_/de tshe nged kyis dgongs par bya/_/de 'dra'i shes rab dag kyang sbyin/_/de tshe tshangs pa la sogs lha/_/sa steng dbang phyug sum cu gnyis/_/
[\[226b.4\]]mgrin gcig 'thun par smras pa ni/_/klu rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dang /_/de bzhin 'byung po lha ma yin/_/mi ma yin dang mi rnams kyis/_/'tshe bar mi 'gyur gang yin pa'i/_/gzungs sngags nged kyis sbyin par bya/_/tad+ya thA/_in dra dad ta tri shu la ha sha sarba pA sha b+han d+ha ne/_
[\[226b.5\]]ni tsin dA ne/_dra dra dra dra/_dza dza dza dza/_bud tI ra/_ni tsin na de/_tA la hi li/_a shwa s+thA ne/_na ni ne ni/_pu pu pu pu/_in dra yu gi na/_bi sha bi sha bi sha bi sha swA hA/_'di ni rta gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags yin te/_gzungs sngags 'dis ni rangs byed kyi srin po 
[\[226b.6\]]rnams thub la/_srid sgrub kyis kyang sgra mi snyan pa rnams thub par gyur to/_/de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams dang /_'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rig sngags 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags sam/_rta'i mgo la btags sam/_
[\[226b.7\]]rang gi mgul du btags kyang rung ste/_gang dang gang du g.yul 'gyed du 'gro ba de gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/_lha la bya ba bzhin du gtsang mas bcang bar bya'o/_/li yul gyi bdag po rgyal po des kyang ras la 'dus pa chen po'i ri mo bris 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]te/_rgyal po'i pho brang gtsang mar byas te/_thams cad du gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs kyi snod kyis bdugs te/_me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas la/_der 
[\[227a.2\]]g.yog gi bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang ji ltar rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams spangs pa bzhin du spang bar bya zhing gtsang mas gos dang /_zas dang skom gtsang mar byas te/_'dus pa chen po'i ri mo'i gzugs rgyal po'i gdan la bzhugs nas 
[\[227a.3\]]de'i mdun du sa gzhi skyong nul gyis legs par byugs pa la dkyil 'khor bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyang khrus legs par byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la/_g.yog de rnams kyang de bzhin du byed du gzhug go/_/gang gi tshes gzhi dag par byed pa de'i tshe/_thog mar ba'i rnam 
[\[227a.4\]]lngas rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad chag chag gdab bo/_/yang na spos thams cad kyi chus gdab bo/_/de nas dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa gru bzhi lham par byas la/_der kha zas ro sum brgya pa dang /_'bru mar dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i mar me sum brgya drug cu dang /_
[\[227a.5\]]gdugs stong nyis brgya sum cu dang /_ba dan stong nyis brgya sum cu dang /_bum pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_bum pa chen po bzhi dang /_rnga bo che bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/gzungs sngags 'di yang dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/sil snyan mang po dkrol 
[\[227a.6\]]zhing rol mo'i sgra mang po yang bsgrag par bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la bstod pa gdon cing gzungs sngags 'di yang bzlas brjod bya ste/_sgrub pa po ngas sgrub pa'i zla gang lha thams cad kyi bstod pa sna tshogs shes pa gzhag par bya'o/_/
[\[227a.7\]]las 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du byas nas mjug brtul te zhag bdun pa'i nyin par khrus bya'o/_/las 'di ni ji ltar sngar smos pa de bzhin du tshes lnga la bya'o/_/sgrub pa po nyid kyang dkyil 'khor gyi drung du 'dug par bya'o/_/me'i thab khung ni gnyis te/_gcig ni sgrub pa po'i 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]phyir bya'o/_/gcig ni sgrub pa'i zla ba'i phyir byas la/_der las kyis sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/rtswa dUr ba'i sbyin sreg kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/gur gum gyi chus dkyil 'khor 
[\[227b.2\]]gser gyi kha dog bzhin du gyur gyi bar du chag chag mang du gdab par bya'o/_/sbyin sreg gi mar ni dri zhim pos bsgos pas sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor skyong nul gyis mdzes par byugs la/_gang gi tshe bzlas brjod rtsom pa na rnga bo che rdung zhing rol mo'i sgra rnams bsgrags te/_
[\[227b.3\]]dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas la thog ma tshes lnga'i nyi ma nub ka'i dus skabs su las 'di brtsam zhing gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya'o/_/yang na tshes drug gam bdun la brtsam par bya'o/_/nang par gyi dus skabs su thog mar me lha spyan drangs la/_ji ltar sngar 
[\[227b.4\]]bstan pa bzhin du rtswa dUr ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/ro'i kha zas de dag kyang phyir phyung la gsar pa gzhan gzhag par bya ste/_zhag gsum mam/_zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg zin pa'i rjes la ro'i kha zas de gsar pa rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su 
[\[227b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang /_dam pa'i chos dang /_sku gdung yang gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor der gdugs bcu dang /_rgyal mtshan bcu dang /_ba dan bcu dang /_rnga bo che bcu dang /_dril bu bcu dang /_me tog gi phreng ba sum brgya drug cu dang /_mar me sum 
[\[227b.6\]]brgya drug cu rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/las de ltar byas pa'i rjes la dkyil 'khor de nyid du tshes brgyad la brtsams te/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga rgyas par brtsam zhing bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags 
[\[227b.7\]]kyi las de dag gis las chen po rtsom mam/_yang na g.yul chen po'i nang du 'gro bar 'dod dam/_yang na rgyal po chen po'i dbang phyug gi bdag po thob par 'dod na rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags 'di ji ltar 'di las cho ga rgyas pa sngar smos pa de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]nas/_de'i tshe lha rnams dam pa dang /_dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed do/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga rgyas pas bzlas brjod bya bar rtsom pa na dkyil 'khor de nyid du snga ma'i lugs bzhin du byas na/_de'i tshe sangs 
[\[228a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'od zer btang zhing gzungs sngags bskur ba gang yin pa de dag gi thugs las skyes pas sku byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lha mang po dang thabs cig tu der gshegs nas dam pa yang stsol bar mdzad 
[\[228a.3\]]de las 'di ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'grub pa yin no/_/gzungs sngags 'di'i las 'di dag cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i las rnams ni gang gi tshe las chen po rtsom mam/_yang na dgra mthong nas g.yul du 'gro ba de'i tshe bzlas brjod byas te/_ya lad la bzlas brjod 
[\[228a.4\]]byas na bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra sta la bzlas brjod byas sam/_gzhu la bzlas brjod byas sam/_mda' la bzlas brjod byas te/_dkyil 'khor der gur gum la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dmag mi thams cad dang /_
[\[228a.5\]]rta thams cad kyi dpral bar thig le byas la grong khyer gyi sgo rnams sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_rgyal po'i khab kyi sgo rnams su gur gum des bskus na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/_'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang 
[\[228a.6\]]lha rnams kyis gzungs sngags gzhan byin te/_na mo brah+ma ma ne/_na ma sarba de ba nAn/_tad+ya thA/_brah+ma ma na/_in dri de ba nAn/_pra ti sh+Thi te/_a shwas+thA ne/_ba ra in+de sa ta ba pha sma ba/_ha re/_A ma b+ha ku pa ga ga kri shrI li ka ra/_sarba de ba grA bA swA hA/_'di ni chol ba'i 
[\[228a.7\]]gzungs sngags yin te/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor der bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gur gum la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi skabs su sngar bshad pa'i las de dag thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur te/_lan bdun bzlas 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]brjod byed pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga ni sngar bshad pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe dmag gi nang du 'gro ba na de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dang /_rta gnas kyi gsang sngags lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas na sngar bshad pa'i 'od zer dang /_gzungs sngags rnams dang bcas par dmag 
[\[228b.2\]]dpon gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags shing lus la yang bcang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rta gnas kyi rig sngags kyi bzlas brjod rtsom pa de'i tshe/_zhag bdun gyi bar du lha'i gnas su 'gro ba bzhin du gtsang sbra byas te/_spong ba rnams 'di ltar bya'o/_/tshes bcu 
[\[228b.3\]]gsum la rtsom na ni kun spang bar bya'o/_/tshes bcu bzhi la rtsom na ni sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la rtsom na ni 'bras chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/_'bras kyi 'o thug gam/_'bras chan dang mar bza' bar bya ste/_chu btung bar mi bya'o/_/de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[228b.4\]]'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di byin no/_/na ma shrI su bar+Nota ta ma pra ba b+ha sa s+ya/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_bud ba d+harme/_a sang ga pra ti/_ba se/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_dra be shrI sa re sa re/_bi sarbe duH_kha shrI laM ka ra sarba dur pra b+ha se ba ra khri tiSh+Thi ti swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di gang du 
[\[228b.5\]]rta gnas kyi rig sngags bzlas brjod byed pa der brjod par bya ste/_dngos grub gang 'dod pa dang /_las gzhan gang byed kyang rung /_yang na gter 'dod na yang gzungs sngags 'di lan sum cu rtsa gsum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la sogs pa/_rgyal 
[\[228b.6\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gnod sbyin nam/_'byung po ji snyed mchis pa de dag bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis gzungs sngags 'di bshad par 'tshal te/_'byung po dang /_rims dang nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa 
[\[228b.7\]]dang /_gzhan yang skyes pa'am/_byis pa rnams kyi nad gang ci yang rung ba dag la lan gsum bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yang na mdud pa gsum bgyis te btags na 'byung pos btang ba'i nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi bu btsas nas mi 'tsho ba des ni bdag nyid kyis bsgrub 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]par bya ste/_bu rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang grub pa stsal bar gsol/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/_
[\[229a.2\]]gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so/_/tad+ya thA/_bad ku dri/_ba dza la phu swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[229a.3\]]gsungs te/_gang gi sna nas khrag 'byung ba dang /_gang gi lus la rma byung ba dang /_yang na gzhi gzhan las gyur te/_bud med rnams kyi lus las khrag 'dzag cing 'byung ba la skud pa dmar po la sngags la spyi bor gdags par byas te/_rma la ni byug par yang bya'o/_/ji 
[\[229a.4\]]ste rims sam/_'byung pos btang ba'i nad dam/_skrangs par gyur na de la skud pa la sngags nas mdud pa bcu byas te mgul du gdags so/_/gang la 'khru ba'am/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba yod pa de la ni skud pa ser po la mdud pa bcu byas te rked pa la 
[\[229a.5\]]gdags so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do/_/na mo rad na tra yA ya/_na mo ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bod+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa re sa re/_bi sa re bi sa re bi sha na sha ni ye swA hA/_'byung 
[\[229a.6\]]pos btang ba'i nad thams cad dang rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ste/_gang gi tshe nad pa shi la thug par gyur te/_mdangs phrog pas srog gi phyed 'phrogs pa de la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_bod+ha bod+ha/_Ar+ya ba lo ki te sha ra/_ra sh+mi pra b+ha 
[\[229a.7\]]se b+hu ta dzam b+he/_phu phu phu phu/_ka ru le phu swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di rims nad thams cad dang /_'byung po'i gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba la lan gsum brjod la skud pa la mdud pa gsum bor te gdags so/_/bzlas brjod ni zan zos pa'i 'og tu bya'o/_/gzungs 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so/_/na mo a sti ka rA dza ka ri bud d+ha s+ya/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_tad+ya thA ang ga re/_mang ga re phu ba tsa ga re/_phu badzra/_phu bud d+ha rA dze phu h+ya re te phu dri pa re phu swA hA/_dug gi gsang sngags 
[\[229b.2\]]yin te/_gang gis dug 'thungs sam/_phol mig byung ngam/_rma red pa la kha zas sam/_yang na chu'am/_sman nam/_sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis gzungs sngags bshad 
[\[229b.3\]]de/_sngar gang gi yon tan gsungs pa de dag gi mtshan mas bshad pa'i gzungs sngags bdag cag gis stsal bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shA na ta mu khi bi mu khi bi ma le/_bi mu khe/_Da D+ha kha mu la swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni 'byung po'i rims thams cad dang /_nad 
[\[229b.4\]]bzhi'i rims rnams dang /_nad 'go ba zhi bar bgyid pa ste/_gzungs sngags 'di ni 'byung po rnams kyis 'gal bar bgyir mi rung ba lags so/_/gang gi tshe rta gnas kyi rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyid pa na thog mar gsang sngags 'di dag gis skud pa gdags par 
[\[229b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchi ba'i tshe yang der mtshams 'dzin pa 'di dag bzhag par bgyi ste/_gzungs sngags re re yang lan gsum gsum brjod la mdud pa gsum bor te/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bdug pa thams cad kyis bdug par bya'o/_/dkyil 
[\[229b.6\]]'khor gyi mdun der byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs bris pa bzhag la du ru ka'am/_a ga ru nag po'i bdug pa bsreg par bgyi'o/_/lha rnams la ni sra rtsi pog dang /_gu gul gyi bdug pa bsreg par bya ste/_de'i tshe 'di skad 
[\[229b.7\]]smon lam gdab par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yul gyi yul 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir las su bka' stsal pa dang /_ji ltar lha rnams kyis bdag gi grogs su bgyi'o zhes dam bcas pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]stsal pa dang /_lha rnams kyis dam bcas pa bzhin du bdag gi las 'di de bzhin du des grub cing mthar phyin par gyur cig ces bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs 
[\[230a.2\]]pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag bshad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs 
[\[230a.3\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang bral ba drang srong chen por grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ka ra ba ra/_i ri ba ra/_sa su ra ma ma ra/_ba ba ra/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_d+harma a 
[\[230a.4\]]d+hiSh+Thi te/_sang ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/_brah+ma a ng+hiSh+Thi te/_sha kra a ng+hiSh+Thi te/_badzra pA Ni gu h+ya ga a ng+hiSh+Thite/_bid t+yA d+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba de pa a ng+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i gsang ba'i ye shes chen po'i mdo las gsungs te/_nad thams cad dang /_'jigs 
[\[230a.5\]]pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod pa thams cad gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_badzra ka ra/_da ra ma ra/_sa ra ba ta r+ya/_a Sha Sha/_bi bi su kha ka rA swA hA/_
[\[230a.6\]]gzungs sngags 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/s+yAd+ya the dan/_de ba tsa ra pa da mA ra/_maN Da la sa mA se de ba nA nA/_bud d+ha de ba nA nA/_puN+yA ka ra/_sarba par+Sha kar+ya/_pradz+nyA nA nA/_A ha ra mi ka ra sid d+ha na swA hA/_dbang 
[\[230a.7\]]bskur ba'i phyir 'khor thams cad kyis smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_tshad tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/_ka ra hu ru ra/_k+She ho ra ra/_da da da da/_ka rak+Sha swA hA/_ji ltar bdud kyi dpung gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan las bskyod ma nus pa de bzhin du gsang sngags 'dis gzhon nu 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]rdo rje sde nyid kyis dam bcas pa las sus kyang bskyod pa'am/_bzlog par mi nus so/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/_dmod pas phog pa'i lha mo dang bud med 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis bud 
[\[230b.2\]]med du skye ba las thar bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bcom ldan 'das las mnos la/_bdag cag la byin cig dang /_bdag cag gis khyod las gzungs sngags gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[230b.3\]]gzungs sngags gsol nas byin no/_/tad+ya thA/_dza lo ka man ta pa/_sarba b+hu ya sra ka ra swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ci sus brjod pa ni bud med du skye ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_sarba b+hu d+ha nAn/_sarba de ga ma ra/_gan pa sha ra ra swA hA/_sangs rgyas 
[\[230b.4\]]thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad de/_'dis ni bar chad byed par mi nus so/_/de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gzungs sngags gang gis shes rab 'thob par
