[\[252a.6\]]bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/gang gi tshe ba bdag sum pa der 'ongs te/_mchod rten chen po rnams dang /_dri gtsang khang mang po dang /_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba bzang po rnams bsreg par 'gyur bar lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[252a.7\]]dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras te/_sring mo sdug pa gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa de na nga khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur te/_der 'u bu cag gnyis kyis byang chub kyi phyir dang /_sems 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis shig_/sring mo sdug pa ji ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_rdo rje sde dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' 
[\[252b.2\]]mnos pa dran par gyis shig_/gzungs sngags de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang /_'od zer gang dag khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dir mthong ba de dag sangs rgyas par bshad kyis/_khyod kyis zung la bris te/_de ming po'i 
[\[252b.3\]]thad du khyer cig_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas de dag gis 'od zer btang ba yang /_li yul 'di bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin la bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir der skye ba 
[\[252b.4\]]len par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phal po che de dag gi sku gdung mang po gnas pa de dag lha mo de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/_mchod pa'i phyir sems can de dag la bged par byed do/_/yul der lha mo de 
[\[252b.5\]]snying rje skye bar 'gyur te/_ci nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar byed do/_/de nas grong khyer gyi nang du khang pa shin tu mdzes par bya ste/_grong khyer de na mi ji snyed gnas pa de dag der ci nas bsod nams byed par 'gyur zhing 'dzin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_rtse bar byed 
[\[252b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas spyod pa de la 'jug par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis li yul gyi phyir chos yang dag par bgro ba mdzad ce na/_li yul bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin pa dang /_bskal pa bzang po'i 
[\[252b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pa dang /_ri glang mgo dang /_go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten du bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ba dang /_li yul byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe nu bo khyod kyis bya ba'i dus la bab bo/_/rab nges kyang 
[\[253a.2\]]sems can la phan pa'i phyir shes bzhin du yang skye ba len par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'dir 'od zer btang nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyes bskur te/_skyes de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[253a.3\]]dbang phyug gis 'dir khyer te 'ongs nas/_sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang byung ngo /_/gzungs sngags de dag dang 'od zer de dag kyang li yul gyi don du sangs rgyas kyis bzhes nas de dag gi grogs su 'gyur 
[\[253a.4\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang ci nas li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas shi 'phos nas der skye ba len par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe li yul du gnod pa byung na de'i tshe sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan dang /_gzungs 
[\[253a.5\]]sngags de dag dang /_'od zer gyi ming de dag bris te/_grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su bzhag la/_dmag gi nang du yang bris te/_rgyal mtshan la gdags so/_/yang na ming de dag 'dzin du gzhug cing bklag pa dang bcang bar bya'o/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_
[\[253a.6\]]mu ge rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i phyogs 'phel bar bya ba dang /_sdig pa 'byang bar bya ba dang /_nad las thar bar bya ba rnams la yang phan par byed pa yin no/_/gang la sdig pa lci ba yod na des zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[253a.7\]]rgyas rnams la rim gro byas te/_sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_'od zer de dag kyang de'i steng du gnas par 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la yang bzlas brjod bya'o/_/yang na nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bklag par bya'o/_/gang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'am/_nad pa'am/_yang na ji lta bur 'dod kyang rung ste bzlas brjod bya'o/_/yang na 
[\[253b.2\]]bklag par bya'o/_/ci ste mi klog na yang skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas nas btags na sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gang gi sgo la btags na grong khyer der dgra 'ong mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[253b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde bcom ldan 'das kyis las su bskos pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur pa na phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi yul du khyer la phrin 
[\[253b.4\]]yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la bstan par bya ste/_mi mang po'i mig sngar ni bstan par mi bya'o/_/yul de'i glud kyang khyer la kha cig ni der bskur bar bya'o/_/kha cig ni skar rdor gzhag par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 
[\[253b.5\]]sngon byung ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya 
[\[253b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya 
[\[253b.7\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs nas smin mtshams kyi gseb nas snang ba chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]byung ngo /_/'od zer de las kyang 'od zer bcu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ngo /_/song nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med par 'phros so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa'i zhing de dag 
[\[254a.2\]]thams cad du ji ltar li yul du rdo rje gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyir sngar bshad pa bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de dag byung ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas dgongs pa 'thun par rdo rje'i 
[\[254a.3\]]dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so/_/tad+ya thA/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_sarba a lang kA ra/_ba ra ga ta/_d+harma tsa kra/_ba ra ga ta/_ma ra sai n+ya pa ra ga ta/_a bi Sha ya pa ra gA tA/_a bi d+yA pra t+yA ya/_b+ha ba pra t+yA 
[\[254a.4\]]ya/_ni rud d+ha pra t+yA ya/_ta thA ga ta/_ma ra Na ha ra/_bud d+h+ya sad t+ye na/_nA ga sad t+ye na/_a su ra sad t+ye na/_sarba ba ra sad t+ye na/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/_gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis 
[\[254a.5\]]thos pa de'i mod la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe li yul gyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos 'di gsungs pa de'i tshe/_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni sangs 
[\[254a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen pa lags te/_bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal 
[\[254a.7\]]po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma'i don bgyi ba dang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po don du gnyer ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du smon lam gdab pa'i slad du 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]mchis te/_dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mjal ba slan chad lung bstan pa thob ste/_de'i tshe der smon lam btab pas/_gang du khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur cig ces 
[\[254b.2\]]bgyis nas/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa zhes bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[254b.3\]]'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i thad du mchis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams ni chags shing zhen la sdang zhing nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dang 'gying ba ste/_de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan tshun 
[\[254b.4\]]las chen po nyams su len par byed de/_de dag gi sdig pa rnams tshe rabs kun tu sel bar byed do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de'i tshe bdag gis smon lam btab pa ji lta bu'i tshul dang thabs kyis der gzhan dag mchi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyis nas/_de'i 
[\[254b.5\]]tshe tshe rabs snga ma la bdag gi mar gyur pa de'i don bgyi ba dang /_ci nas ngan song du mi mchi bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba blangs so/_/sngon gyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa dang /_gzhon nu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rnam par thar pa bdag la dris 
[\[254b.6\]]pa slan chad bdag gis mi'i nang du mi'i skye ba blangs te/_bdag gis sems can dag dang 'dod chags spyad nas mi gzhan gyis bdag la kho mo yang glen mar mthong ngo /_/sems can rnams yongs su grol ba'i slad du bud med kyi nang du mi bzad pa'i skye ba mang po dag blangs te/_rgyal 
[\[254b.7\]]mo dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo dang /_bud med phal dang /_smad 'tshong ma dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_bud med dbul mo dag tu gyur te/_bud med du skyes pa rnams kyi don bgyid pa dang /_bud med rnams yongs su grol bar bgyid do/_/rang gi las kyi dbang gis ji ltar 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'dod pa'i 'dod chags spyad kyang sems can de dag mgu bar ma nus te/_tshe rabs du mar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gyi don gyi slad du sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ste/_bud med du skye bas shin tu skyo bar gyur na 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[255a.2\]]kyis sug las chen por bka' stsal te/_tshe rabs grangs ma mchis par bdag gis sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mnyes par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa'i slad du bdag gis smon lam chen po btab pa/_sems 
[\[255a.3\]]can thams cad la phan pa'i slad du tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bdag la sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad bdag gis bzod par bgyi'o/_/yul de srungs shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de na da dung mi yang ma mchis/_yul 
[\[255a.4\]]yang ma byung mod kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang 'khor der 'dus pa lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad las dam 
[\[255a.5\]]pa blang bar bgyi'o/_/ji srid du bdag tshe rabs de dag tu skye ba na bdag la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang gi gzhir mthong na yang bdag la sdig par ma gyur cig_/ci rigs par skye ba'i dus 'tshal bar gyur la 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe li yul 
[\[255a.6\]]thog ma 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa na/_de'i tshe yul bgyid pa'i slad du der bdag thog mar rgyal por gyur cig_/li yul du nam rgyal po de dag gi ming chags shing rgyal rabs thog mar byung ba na tshe rabs bdun du rgyal po byed par gyur cig_/grong khyer dngar ldan zhes 
[\[255a.7\]]bgyi ba yang bgyi'o/_/bal po se'u tshal du ni sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten chen po bgyi'o/_/yul rta 'jug tu ni chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i mchod rten bgyi'o/_/'gum ti rar ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o/_/rtsa rma ba na ra yang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]ba chen po bgyi'o/_/pa ya di kar ni dri gtsang khang chen po dang /_mchod rten chen po bgyi ste/_ji srid du bdag rgyal srid la gnas pa de srid du las chen po dag bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po shi 'phos par gyur pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na bzhugs 
[\[255b.2\]]pa'i lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag de na mchi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dran par gyur cig_/de nas slar yang li yul 'dir skye ba len cing ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bud med kyi gzugs su gyur te/_yang skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mo rab nges zhes 
[\[255b.3\]]bya bar gyur nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs sngags ji snyed gsungs pa dang bdag gis rtogs pa gang lags pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad de'i tshe bdag gis dran par gyur cig_/mdo sde 'di yang shin tu dran par gyur te/_ci nas thams 
[\[255b.4\]]cad rgyas par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe dmag sde gnyis 'thab par 'gyur ba dang /_li yul gyi don gyi phyir las su bya ba yod par gyur pa dang /_gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur nas li yul gyi phyir glud 'jal ba'i dus la 
[\[255b.5\]]bab pa de'i tshe bdag rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /_'khor de'i nang du ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa'i lha de dag thams cad grogs su gyur te/_mdo 'di dang /_gzungs sngags rnams bshad pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams 
[\[255b.6\]]cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad bdag gis tshe rabs thams cad du dran par gyur cig ces byas so/_/gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa de'i tshe/_des ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ste/_ci nas mdo 'di la sus kyang gnod pa byed mi nus par 
[\[255b.7\]]gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po'i mdo dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i klong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba thob ste/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang gi tshe khyod las rtsom pa de'i tshe 'od zer de dag steng du gnas par gyur te/_
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]de'i tshe gang gis mdo 'di dran par 'gyur zhing shin tu nyams su len par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa de'i rang 
[\[256a.2\]]bzhin gang gis gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba dang /_sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dran par byed do/_/lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od des kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs 
[\[256a.3\]]sngags ji ltar rtogs pa de de bzhin du rtogs par byed do/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bas kyang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur te/_gzhan gyis bar chad byed mi nus so/_/de dag gi las ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la rta gnas kyi rig sngags gang gis sdig pa rnams 'byang bar 'gyur bar 
[\[256a.4\]]yang brjod par bya ste/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na lo bdun gyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rnams 
[\[256a.5\]]kyis lha'i me tog gi char phab ste/_lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis kyang sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las thos pa'i gzungs sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/_/na maHsarba a t+yud ga ta/_badzra maN Da lod ta ma s+ya/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_ka na kA b+ha/_sad 
[\[256a.6\]]t+ya s+ya/_bo d+hi sa twa s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_bud d+ha sad t+ye na/_da sa bi ri/_de na ha ya ri/_ku rtsi ru pra ti pa da ri pa b+ha ba tu/_tsi tu ma tu ga la ra ya ka da ma pa tu/_sa pa dza ma sa ra ta swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni lha rnams chad pas gcod pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya ste/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas 
[\[256a.7\]]la rtswa dUr ba brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na gang ci byed kyang rung ste lha rnams kyis gzhigs par mi nus so/_/dkyil 'khor zlum por byas te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor nas gang du brjod pa der 'byung pos gnod pa byed mi nus so/_/byad stems 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]byed par yang mi nus so/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do/_/tad+ya thA/_sarba de ba nan/_sarba baR+Sha na na/_ni rdzi ta brdzi te/_skan d+ha na tsa ban/_nad ta ma na pa na ga sa ra/_da da tsa tsa pa pa/_tsa da mi ma/_b+has+thi mi/_dan Da ka ra na ha ra/_sa ba ra/_de ba ma ra 
[\[256b.2\]]swA hA/_sa ba pa bar+Sha ka ra na swA hA/_'khor thams cad kyis bshad pa'i gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/_mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas skud pa de bsregs na khyim der byad stems kyis mi tshugs la 'byung po'i nad rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_rA ti thA ka ra/_
[\[256b.3\]]de ba ba phu dzi dzi ri ku dzid ti phu swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di lkog ma na ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas g.yag rnga la mdud pa bdun bor te/_gdags par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_sarba bud d+ha da ma ba Sha ka ra ba ba ra tsa tsa ra sa sa ra swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di lus la nad byung ba thams cad la lan bdun bzlas 
[\[256b.4\]]brjod byas nas skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te gdags so/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde yul skar rdo nas li yul du mchi ba de'i tshe gzungs sngags gang gis shul du dpa' bo'i las bgyid par 
[\[256b.5\]]'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bdag cag gis stsal bar 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_de bu bu de de bi bi sa sa/_ba ba ra ti ka ra swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_sha ra ka ra bA/_dzrad tshe ba ra/_shad tra tra/_na dzi swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di 'gron du 'gro ba rnams kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_khrus byas la lag par blugs 
[\[256b.6\]]nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_phyogs bzhir 'thor ram/_bdag nyid kyis 'thungs na de la dgras gnod pa byed par mi nus te/_dpa' bo'i las kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_de bzhin du rnam thos kyi bu dang /_
[\[256b.7\]]dbang phyug chen po dang /_kun tu rgyal ba dang /_'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis kyang gzhon nu rdo rje sde de la ci nas dgra rnams kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par gzungs sngags 'di dag sbyin no/_/na mo badzra d+h+wa dze s+ya/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_badzra 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bi bi bi bi ma ma sa ka/_su ma te/_ad d+ha re/_ad dz+wa le/_bA da ni swA hA/_na mo ma he shwa ra s+ya/_na mo bai shra ma Na s+ya/_na maHsan tsa ya s+ya/_na mo ha ri ta ye ba su pu tra/_ba ri bA rA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa sa sa sa/_hA hA hA hA/_pri ya pri ya pri ya pri ya/_pud tra pud tra pud tra pud tra/_bar 
[\[257a.2\]]dad ta ka ra/_ts+tshan d+ha mu le bid twe sha na kA rA swA hA/_dbang phyug chen po dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_kun tu rgyal ba dang /_'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sug las chen por 
[\[257a.3\]]bskos pa'i gzungs sngags gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa de dag bdag cag gis bshad par 'tshal lo/_/lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go char 'gyur ba gang lags pa des chad pas gcad par bgyi ba de yang bdag cag gis 
[\[257a.4\]]bshad par bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe dgra'am su yang rung bdag sdig pa'i las rtsom pa na gzungs sngags bshad pa 'di gnyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/_skud pa sngon po la mdud pa bdun bor nas bsregs la mi de'i ming nas brjod na gnod pa byed mi nus so/_/bdag cag gis yid 
[\[257a.5\]]dam dang por bcas pa bzhin du ste gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas 'khor der ji snyed 'dus pa'i lha dang /_
[\[257a.6\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad 
[\[257a.7\]]kyis kyang dam bcas te/_de ltar ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig_/bdag cag thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha ci nas kyang li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur bar thams cad sems 'thun pas lhan 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]cig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_ci nas li yul 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe yul gzhan nas li yul du rab tu byung ba rnams 'ongs pa na der ci nas rim gro med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yul gzhan nas 
[\[257b.2\]]der sems can bros pa de dag der gnas 'thob par 'gyur zhing gdong dmar gyis bsregs pa gang yin pa'i mchod rten chen po de dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de dag 'chos pa'i grogs byed par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir li yul gyi glud 'jal ba dang /_rgya dang phan tshun du bag 
[\[257b.3\]]ma gtong ba dang len par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde gnyis la li yul gtad nas/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod li yul gyi rgyal po 
[\[257b.4\]]byed pa dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis grogs byed par 'gyur gyis/_mdo 'di las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis thams cad gyis shig_/gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi rigs kyi yul du phyir log pa de'i tshe rgya'i dmag li yul du 'ongs so zhes de skad thos pa dang /_the tshom ma 
[\[257b.5\]]byed par li yul du song la der pho nya btang na der 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/_li yul dang gu zan gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de la phrin yig ni nga dang gnyen du byos la yul nga la byin cig ces springs shig_/de nas de'i tshe khyod ni li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/dbang po'i go cha ni 
[\[257b.6\]]skar rdo'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/_de yang khyod ci nas li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/skar rdo'i yul du gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tshe khyod kyis ji nas kyang gnod pa byed du ma gzhug cig_/dbang po'i go cha dang yang thog mar dum par gyis shig_/las 'di dag 
[\[257b.7\]]byed pa'i grogs su 'gyur ro/_/skar rdo ba ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/a ku na zhes bya ba dpa' bo zhig yod de/_de sngon ye shes grags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na des dar ma ti ra zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang byas so/_/de bas na khyod kyis a kun tshol 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]shig dang yul gzung ba'i phyir grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dang khyod sngon smon lam lhan cig tu btab pa'i phyir te/_a kun zhes bya ba'i mi de ni sngon rgyal por gyur te/_mi rgod rnams kyis chung ma brkus te/_phyir ma rnyed pa yin no/_/khyod ni rgyal po'i 
[\[258a.2\]]blon po chen po yin te/_dga' byed kyi phar gyur pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu rdo rje sde khyod ni li yul 'khor du rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_lo sum cu'i bar du rgyal 
[\[258a.3\]]srid 'dzin par 'gyur la/_dge bsnyen du gyur nas li yul gyi phyir lus yongs su gtong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod li yul du rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe mdo 'di 
[\[258a.4\]]zung shig_/'di la 'jug par gyis shig_/rgyas par gyis shig_/skar rdo'i yul du yang ming po la skur cig dang /_khyod kyi steng du 'od zer rnams gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis gzungs sngags rnams rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyed la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[258a.5\]]'das nyid gsung bar 'gyur zhing lha rnams kyang ji nas khyod kyi las byed nus par 'gyur ba de lta bu rgyas par smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nu sdug ji ltar bcom 
[\[258a.6\]]ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'u bu cag gnyis sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob nas/_der de skad du phyogs bcu na sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis skyabs byed par gyur cig_/de skad ces smon lam btab pa'i dus la 
[\[258a.7\]]de dran par gyis la/_da nga'i li yul 'di dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde la gtad pa 'di khyod kyis long shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_'jam dpal dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_sman gyi 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rgyal po dang /_rab sbyin dpa' bo dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon 'di'i phu bo dang /_grogs su gyur pa dang /_rtag tu 'grogs 'grogs pa ni 'di dag yin te/_sna tshogs kyi lha dang /_
[\[258b.2\]]dbang phyug gi lha dang /_ljon shing gi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /_snying rje'i dbang phyug dang /_gzungs kyi dbang phyug dang /_spong ba'i dbang phyug dang /_'od kyi dbang phyug dang /_dri'i dbang phyug dang /_tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dang /_'od gsal dang /_rigs kyi 
[\[258b.3\]]dbang phyug rnams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bos te bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed nga'i theg pa chen po'i mdo 'di dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 
[\[258b.4\]]yongs su zung shig_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba yin gyis mdo 'di dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od khyod la gtad do/_/gnod sbyin dbang po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[258b.5\]]kun tu rgyal dang /_lha'i bu blo gros brtan pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /_lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rgyal po rnams dang /_'khor der 'dus pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba de dag dang phyogs bcu 
[\[258b.6\]]nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la mdo 'di dang /_li yul dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad de/_yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas yongs su gtad do/_/de nas yang de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas ji skad bshad 
[\[258b.7\]]pa dang /_khyod kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du grogs gyis la ngas dgongs pa kun thams cad nas thams cad du mthar phyin par gyis la/_ci nas log par ma 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/ngas bskal pa mang por 'khor ba na dka' las shin tu mang po dang ldan pa dag byas pa lta bu ni byang 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ma byas so/_/nga'i yul 'khor der sems can ngas yongs su smin par ma byas pa de gang yin pa de dag phyis li yul 'khor du gnas par gyur te/_nga'i chos kyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa 
[\[259a.2\]]bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed thams cad la mdo 'di dang /_li yul dang gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad do/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[259a.3\]]cad dang /_lha thams cad dang /_'khor thams cad la mdo 'di dang /_li yul dang gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du lha'i me tog gi char phab bo/_/lha rnams kyis lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags so/_/lha'i rgyan gyi char yang phab bo/_/de bzhin du 'khor de 
[\[259a.4\]]dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'od zer shin tu mang po btang ngo /_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i 
[\[259a.5\]]sems can rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo /_/de na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste/_'khor thams cad dang /_
[\[259a.6\]]lha dang mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la mdo 'di klog pa dang /_sems pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_kun chub par 
[\[259a.7\]]bgyid pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na skye bo ji snyed gnas pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni/_su mdo 'di 'chang ba 'am/_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]kha ton du byed pa'am/_klog pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor na ji ltar 'bras bu gsum pa rtogs pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes nga smra'o/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[259b.2\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa ji snyed mchis pa rnams gang du mdo 'di brjod pa der ma mchis sam/_
[\[259b.3\]]gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la gzungs sngags ma stsal tam/_dam bcas pa 'di bskyud par gyur na/_bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku bslus par gyur cig_/mtshams ma mchis pa'i 
[\[259b.4\]]las bgyis pa'i sdig pa ji tsam mchis pa bdag cag gis bgyis par gyur cig_/de nas 'od zer de dag las/_tshig tu brjod pa 'di skad ces byung ste/_gang na mdo 'di brjod pa der bdag cag 'ong ngo zhes sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[259b.5\]]'khor de dag thams cad kyis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_mdo 'di'i ming ni chos kyi spyi bo zhes kyang bya/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po zhes kyang bya/_dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis 
[\[259b.6\]]zhus pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas chos gang bshad pa de dag thams cad ni mdo 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[259b.7\]]dang /_'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//theg pa chen po'i mdo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]{D169}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA yA no pa de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[260a.2\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/_bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/_spyod pa chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa/_sangs 
[\[260a.3\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas bstan pa mtha' yas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byin gyis brlabs pa/_chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa dga' 
[\[260a.4\]]ba rgya chen po skyed pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pas 'jug pa/_kun nas ma smad pa/_ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa de la ma chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa/_bskal pa mu med par mngon par bstod pa/_yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs 
[\[260a.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/_slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs ni mtha' yas/_chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i tshul ni shin tu 
[\[260a.6\]]mkhyen/_dbang po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba kun du 'joms pa la ni mkhas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad cing /_dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i 
[\[260a.7\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtshams sbyor ba 
[\[260b.2\]]thams cad kun du bcom pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/_mi dmigs pa'i chos las byung ba/_spyod lam mdzes pa/_phun sum tshogs pa/_sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 
[\[260b.3\]]la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_dpag tu med/_brjod du med pa dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang 
[\[260b.4\]]sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_chos mnyan cing yang dag par nod pa'i ngoms mi shes pa/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can 
[\[260b.5\]]thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa/_thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa/_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa las nye 
[\[260b.6\]]bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog lta zhes bya ba dang /_g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang /_rnam par gnon par dpa' ba dang /_yid gnyis kun du 'joms dang /_rnam par bsgrags ldan dang /_rnam 
[\[260b.7\]]par lta ba'i mig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa'i phung po dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med dpag tu med/_brjod du 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]med pa dag dang thabs cig ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par nges par byung ba/_sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo/_stobs dang 
[\[261a.2\]]mi 'jigs pa yongs su 'grub pa/_ye shes kyi 'byung gnas/_chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo la 'jug pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par nges pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/_mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud pa/_phyir mi 
[\[261a.3\]]ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/_theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba/_chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig ste/_'dres pa med pa la 'jug pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_dbang po la 'jug pa/_ston pa/_snying po dang ldan pa/_chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/_
[\[261a.4\]]bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa/_tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa/_nyon mongs pa dang /_lta bar song ba thams cad 'dul ba shes rab dang ye shes thogs pa med pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/_mnyam pa med cing mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[261a.5\]]yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs kyi ye shes ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/_byin gyi rlabs thogs pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa chos thams cad ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdon mi 
[\[261a.6\]]za bar ston pa/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad sogs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_
[\[261a.7\]]mos pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_shes rab mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/_nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang sems rab tu dben par shes pa theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba 'thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa brjod do/_/ston to rab tu ston to/_/'dzin du 'jug go/_/mos par mdzad do/_/len du 'jug go/_/shes par mdzad do/_/
[\[261b.2\]]rnam par shes par mdzad do/_/rab tu shes par mdzad do/_/rab tu 'jug go/_/rnam par 'grel to/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/gsal bar mdzad do/_/yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i don gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[261b.3\]]'di lta bu rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa na/_'khor de nyid du bu mo rin chen zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs te/_lag pa g.yas par mu tig gi se mo do thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[261b.4\]]bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can chen po 'di dag gis bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dus pa'i le'u 'di bas par chub par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_phyogs bcu rnams su yang rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams 
[\[261b.5\]]bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog gis mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des bdag gis mu tig gi se mo do 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lags te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[261b.6\]]dpa' thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su mu tig gi se mo do'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun du gnas shing bkod pa ci 'dra bas skyes bu dam pa de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba 
[\[261b.7\]]dag khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las kun du dga' zhing 'khor thams cad kyis bkod pa 'di mthong nas yi rangs par gyur cig_/de nas bu mo rin chen gyis mu tig gi se mo do de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bor ro/_/mu tig gi se mo do de bor ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]mthu dang bu mo rin chen gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su khang pa brtsegs pa chen po shin tu yangs pa rgya che ba rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_ngos 
[\[262a.2\]]mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba legs par grub pa gnas par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur cig_/byang chub kyi snying po 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bkod pa 
[\[262a.3\]]dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ji tsam du bdag cag gis bskal pa grangs ma mchis par smon lam 
[\[262a.4\]]mngon par 'dus bgyis par thams cad bu mo rin chen gyi skad cig gcig la bstan pa ni bu mo rin chen 'di bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs can lags te ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_
[\[262a.5\]]bu mo rin chen 'di bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs las nges par byung ba'o/_/skyes bu dam pa dag bu mo rin chen gyis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di yongs su blangs te/_de nas bu mo rin chen 'dis 
[\[262a.6\]]ji skad smras pa de ltar kun du gnas so/_/gal te bu mo rin chen gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni me tog gis rab tu gang bar kun du gnas par gyur cig ces smras na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du spos dang /_
[\[262a.7\]]phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos kyis rab tu gang bar kun du gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gal te bar snang 'di thams cad gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis brgyan par kun du gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/chus 'jig pa byung ba la me yis 'jig par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gal te me yis 'jig pa byung ba la chu yis 'jig par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i kha dog dang /_
[\[262b.2\]]gzugs su gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 
[\[262b.3\]]kha dog dang /_gzugs su gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdud re re la yang lag na mtshon thogs pa'i bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgya lhag pa la bdud dang /_bdud kyi ris thams cad kyi ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse 
[\[262b.4\]]gnyis pa dang /_mtshon cha sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tig gi se mo dor kun du gnas pa dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_ut+pa la dang /_pa ri sha ka dang /_tsam pa ka'i lda ldir kun du gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de 
[\[262b.5\]]bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'brog dgon par bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_kha zas med pa dag tu khyim bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'i grong khyer chen po kun du gnas shing /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_kha zas mang po byung bar gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[262b.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su kun du gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/'khor 'di thams cad nam mkha' la gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rigs 
[\[262b.7\]]kyi bu dag gal te bu mo rin chen gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston par 'jug pa ji snyed pa de bar snang 'di las lhag chad med cing mtha' dag rdzogs par rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par byung bar gyur 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gang bu mo rin chen gyi las de [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang don med pa ma yin no/_/de nas bu mo rin chen gyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di kun du 
[\[263a.2\]]bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/rin chen 'byung gnas ye shes rin chen mnga'/_/rin chen mchog ston yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/rgyal po'i rgyal po dgra dang shar gnyer gcod/_/byang chub yan 
[\[263a.3\]]lag rin chen nor bdun sbyin/_/rin chen 'od kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa/_/nor bu rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs 'od/_/rin chen dam pa rgyal ba rin chen tog_/bde gshegs khyod la rin chen rnams kyis mchod/_/rdo yi snying po sa snying nor bu gang /_/snang 'od dri med snying po nor bu dang /_/
[\[263a.4\]]rin po che dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/_/khyod kyi sku yi 'od kyis zil du rlag_/thub pa khyod kyi sku tshad brtag par ni/_/sa bcu'i bar la gnas pas mi dmigs so/_/'jig rten gtso khyod sa la bzhugs kyang go/_/rdzu 'phrul yon tan srid pa'i rtser gnas mthong /_/rgyal ba'i 'khor 
[\[263a.5\]]rnams thams cad re res kyang /_/rgyal ba rang rang mdun na bzhugs par shes/_/thams cad phyogs nas mngon sum mngon par yang /_/kun nas sgo nas mtshungs pa med pa mthong /_/la las bzhugs dang mnal dang 'chags pa dang /_/'khor rnams la las bde 
[\[263a.6\]]gshegs gsung ba dang /_/mi gsung bzhugs shing bsam gtan dgyes pa dang /_/mtshungs med khyod kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mthong /_/khyod kyi ba spu re nas 'od zer mchog_/gtang ma thag tu phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni pad ma'i 'byung gnas 'dra/_/
[\[263a.7\]]bsam pa ji bzhin yid kyang dga' bar mdzad/_/bden la gnas shing rtag tu bden la dgyes/_/bden pa lhur mdzad ci gsung de bzhin mdzod/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas don dang 'dul la mkhas/_/yon tan kun mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bu mo rin chen gyis 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te zhus nas zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang 
[\[263b.2\]]na/_bdag 'dus pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs la bka' mchid kyi rgyud 'ga' zhig brtsams te zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems 
[\[263b.3\]]rangs par bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye ba dang /_bu mo rin chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bden pa smra rnams gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[263b.4\]]rnams la bden par gsungs pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rnams gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos su gsungs pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[263b.5\]]don smra ba rnams gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don du gsungs pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba smra ba rnams gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' la 'dul bar gsungs 
[\[263b.6\]]pa ni gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_bu mo legs so/_/legs so/_/khyod kyi rtogs pa bzang ngo /_/dri ba tshul bzhin yin no/_/spobs pa dge'o/_/bu mo de bas na legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig 
[\[263b.7\]]dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bu mo rin chen gyis bcom ldan 'das legs so/_/zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo gsum po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ste/_gsum gang zhe 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]na/_gang sangs rgyas la mi slu ba dang /_bdag la mi slu ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mi slu ba'o/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad la slu ba ji lta bu zhe na/_bu mo gal te byang chub sems dpa' bla na 
[\[264a.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dod par byed cing smon te/_mngon par dga' ba de lta bu ni bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad la slu ba'o/_/
[\[264a.3\]]bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad la mi slu ba ci lta bu zhe na/_bu mo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bdud dang dmigs pa can thams cad kyis ji tsam du tshegs phyung zhing ji tsam du gnod par byas 
[\[264a.4\]]pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis tho btsams shing co dris te 'brel bar byed cing ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mtshon rtse gnyis pas phug pa dang /_ma thob pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_smad pa dang /_sdug bsngal bas kyang mi g.yo/_mi 'khrul/_rnam par 
[\[264a.5\]]mi 'khrul/_mi zhum/_sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/_kun du mi skrag_/kun du skrag par mi 'gyur/_yi mug par mi 'gyur/_'gyod par mi 'gyur bar thog ma'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang mi gtong zhing brtan par yang dag par 'dzin la/_byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang /_
[\[264a.6\]]'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang /_mgon dang /_dpung gnyen gyi sems bskyed pa dang /_mtshungs pa med cing 'dra ba med pa'i sems bskyed pa de las kyang mi nyams mi nur te/_theg pa 
[\[264a.7\]]gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems lan 'ga' yang mi skyed par sangs rgyas dran/_chos kyi 'khor lo la rton/_sems can thams cad mngon du byed/_stobs nye bar ston/_mthu skyed par byed/_rtsal gyis rnam par gnon/_brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_pha rol gyi tshig gis gnod par mi nus pa 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]de lta bu ni bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad la mi slu ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad la mi slu ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i mchog go/_/
[\[264b.2\]]de rnam pa bzhis sangs rgyas la mi slu ste/_brtan pa dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus rtul ba'o/_/de rnam pa bzhis bdag la mi slu ste/_bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_sgyu med pa'o/_/de rnam pa bzhis sems can thams cad mi 
[\[264b.3\]]slu ste/_sbyor ba dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_sdud pa ste/_bu mo gang 'di byang chub sems yongs su mi gtong zhing sngon dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa dang po'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni gang 
[\[264b.4\]]'di ngag bsdams pa dang /_ngag bsrungs pa dang /_ngag 'khrul pa med pa dang /_tshig bden pa ste/_de gcig pu yang rung /_skye bo mang po'i nang du gnas kyang rung /_tshig bden par smra ste/_de rgyal srid kyi phyir yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi smra/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[264b.5\]]rten gyi khams rin po ches rab tu bkang bas brid kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi smra ba'o/_/bu mo de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su dag pa ste/_rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngo tsha shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_yon tan gyi rnam 
[\[264b.6\]]pa dang /_khrel yod pa'i rnam pa dang /_des pa'i rnam pa dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa'i rnam pa dang /_ma smad pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang /_lhas rnam par rig pa'i rnam pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_ngan 'gro gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /_bde 'gro 'byed 
[\[264b.7\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pa'i skye bo mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /_mkhas pas mchod par 'os pa'i rnam pa dang /_nang dag pa'i rnam pa dang /_phyi rol legs par byas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang /_tshig mi brlang ba'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'jam pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang /_khyad par can gyi tshig gi rnam pa dang /_kha dri rab tu zhim pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang /_bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang /_slu ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_gdung ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba'i rnam pa 
[\[265a.2\]]dang /_bdag la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang /_gzhan la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[265a.3\]]bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i ngag rab tu 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/_bu mo 'di dag ni bden pa'i rnam pa yongs su dag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni gang dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub 
[\[265a.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la mos pa dag gi yin gyi/_ser sna can dag gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 
[\[265a.5\]]dag gi yin gyi/_ngang tshul ngan pa dag gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang tshul khrims yongs su dag par kun du snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i stobs rab tu 'thob pa dag gi yin gyi/_gnod sems can dag 
[\[265a.6\]]gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang bzod pa dang des par kun du snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag gi yin gyi/_le lo can dag gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[265a.7\]]thams cad brtson par kun du snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la rab tu gnas pa dag gi yin gyi sems g.yeng ba dag gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub par kun du 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa dag gi yin gyi shes rab 'chal pa dag gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang shes rab dang ye shes la kun du snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi 
[\[265b.2\]]phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong la yang de bzhin no/_/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dag gi yin gyi/_dge 
[\[265b.3\]]ba'i chos rnam par spangs pa dag gi ma yin te/_'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/_/gang dge ba'i chos thams cad la kun du snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang 'phags pa'i rnam pa'i bden pa de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par bya ste/_gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa 
[\[265b.4\]]dang /_kun 'byung ba spong ba dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam sgom pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal shes pa ni gang phung po rnams la rang bzhin gyis mi skye bar shes pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba spong ba ni srid pa gang gis phung po rnams yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i sred pa de 
[\[265b.5\]]shin tu mi 'byung zhing chags pa dang bral ba mngon par dga' ba med pa ste gang mngon par dga' ba med pa de ni gdod ma nas 'ong ba med pa'o/_/gang gdod ma nas 'ong ba med pa de ni chos nyid ma spangs pa'o/_/gang chos nyid ma spangs pa de nas kun 'byung ba spangs pa'o/_/de la 'gog pa shes 
[\[265b.6\]]pa ni gang mtshan ma dang dmigs pa shin tu zad cing 'gog pa ste/_gang 'gog pa'i tshe dngos po 'jig par 'gyur ba yang med la/_dngos po yod pa dang /_dngos po med pa mtshungs shing mnyam par gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gang mnyam par mthong ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[265b.7\]]de la lam ni gang mnyam par lta zhing mnyam par sbyor ba mi rtog pa mi mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa nyon mongs pa thams cad mi tshol ba bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_len pa med pa/_ma byas pa/_rnam par ma byas pa 'di ni lam zhes bya'o/_/'di la gang bden 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]pa shes pa'i ye shes dang /_sems can rnams yang dag par thob par byed kyang bdag mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khris bden pa shes pa yongs su bsgom pa'i 
[\[266a.2\]]bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/bu mo de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin zhe na gang gi tshe chos la rton par 'gyur ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos sems pa dang /_chos bsam pa dang /_chos spyod yul ba dang /_chos spyod pa dang /_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod 
[\[266a.3\]]pa dang /_chos la dga' bas dga' mos pa dang /_chos kyi dpung dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_chos kyi mtshon cha dang /_chos kyi go cha bgos pa dang /_chos kyi ya lad bgos pa dang /_chos kyi snang ba dang /_chos kyi mar me dang /_chos kyi dran pa dang /_chos kyi blo gros dang /_chos rtog 
[\[266a.4\]]pa dang /_chos dpyod pa dang /_chos la sbyor ba dang /_chos spyod par gyur pa dang /_chos kyis nyal ba dang /_chos kyi spyod lam dang /_chos bsrung ba dang /_chos kyi nor dang /_chos mi zad pa dang /_chos rgya che ba dang /_chos kyi bya ba byed pa dang /_chos kyi lus dang /_chos kyi ngag dang /_
[\[266a.5\]]chos kyi yid la byed pa mi gtong ba ste/_chos spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de ni chos smra ba yin te/_chos ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no/_/de la chos smra ba gang zhe na/_bden pa gang yin pa de bden par smra ba dang /_sangs rgyas la bsngags pa smra ba dang /_chos la srung bar smra ba dang /_dge 
[\[266a.6\]]'dun la bla ma dang sri zhu bya bar smra ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba bsnyad pa smra ba dang /_bsam pa mi 'dor ba smra ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa la dmigs pa smra ba dang /_sbyor ba mi nyams par smra ba dang /_'phags pa rnams kyi lta ba smra ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[266a.7\]]rnams la bsten pa smra ba dang /_nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang /_ri mo bya ba smra ba dang /_rtag tu bsngags pa smra ba dang /_chos ston pa na bsti stang du byas te mnyam pa smra ba dang /_chos kun du tshol bas mi ngoms pa smra ba dang /_chos ston pa la snyom las med pa smra ba dang /_slob dpon 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]chos 'chab pa med pa smra ba dang /_byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa shes pa dang /_byas pa chud mi gson pa smra ba dang /_lan la mi re ba smra ba dang /_dgon pa la skrag pa med pa smra ba dang /_'phags pa'i rigs ma nyams pa smra ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong ba smra ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i 
[\[266b.2\]]las kyi lam la 'jug pa smra ba dang /_sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba dang /_byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba smra ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi dbye ba smra ba dang /_bzod pa'i stobs smra ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi zhum pa med pa smra ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams kyi rab tu zhi ba smra ba dang /_shes rab kyi khong 
[\[266b.3\]]du chud pa smra ba dang /_thabs kyi yongs su gsal bar byed pa smra ba dang /_byams pa'i skyabs smra ba dang /_snying rje la 'jug pa smra ba dang /_dga' ba'i mchog tu dga' ba smra ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi gnyis dang bral ba smra ba dang /_bden pa rnams kyi rjes su 'thun pa smra ba dang /_so so yang 
[\[266b.4\]]dag par rig pa bsnyad pa smra ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi bskyed pa smra ba dang /_rton pa rnams kyi chos smra ba dang /_chos kyi mdo rnams kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi dran pa brjed pa med pa smra ba dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams kyi yang 
[\[266b.5\]]dag pa'i nan tan smra ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mngon par bskyed pa smra ba dang /_dbang po rnams kyi rno ba smra ba dang /_stobs rnams kyi mi rdzi ba smra ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rjes su rtogs pa smra ba dang /_lam gyi sgrol ba smra ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi 'jug pa smra 
[\[266b.6\]]ba dang /_lhag mthong gi de kho na shes pa smra ba dang /_rig pa dang rnam par grol ba yongs su gsal bar byed pa smra ba dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sa ji lta ba smra ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston pa smra ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su bsgrags pa smra ba dang /_rten 
[\[266b.7\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs dang 'thun pa smra ba dang /_stong pa nyid la skrag pa med pa smra ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa la bsnyad pa smra ba dang /_smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pa smra ba dang /_phung po rnams la sgyu mar bstan pa smra ba dang /_khams rnams la nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa nyid smra 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ba dang /_skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid smra ba dang /_nor bdun smra ba dang /_rjes su dran pa drug smra ba dang /_gus pa dang bcas pa smra ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar bya ba drug smra ba dang /_mngon par shes pa drug smra ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[267a.2\]]drug smra ba dang /_mig lnga smra ba dang /_don dam pa smra ba dang /_kun rdzob la 'jug pa smra ba dang /_legs par byas pa'i las smra ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par smra ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa tshad med pa smra ba'o/_/bu mo gzhan 
[\[267a.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba ni bdag tu smra ba ma yin/_sems can du smra ba ma yin/_srog tu smra ba ma yin/_gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/_chad par smra ba ma yin/_rtag par smra ba ma yin/_'byung bar lta ba smra ba ma yin/_'jig par lta ba smra ba ma yin/_mtha' khas len pa smra ba ma 
[\[267a.4\]]yin/_dbus la mngon par zhen pa smra ba ma yin/_mi 'thun pa smra ba ma yin/_'gal ba smra ba ma yin/_rtsod pa smra ba ma yin/_phyogs yongs su 'dzin pa smra ba ma yin/_dmigs pa smra ba ma yin/_lta ba kun nas dkris pa dang /_the tsom dang /_sgrib pa dang /_chod pa dang /_bag la 
[\[267a.5\]]nyal dang /_khong khro ba smra ba ma yin/_chos dang 'gal ba smra ba ma yin/_chos 'jig pa smra ba ma yin/_chos spong ba smra ba ma yin/_chos la mngon par rlom sems su byed pa smra ba ma yin/_chos la log par 'jug par smra ba ma yin te/_chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi rjes su 
[\[267a.6\]]'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa smra ba dang /_yang dag par smra ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa smra ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba ni chos thams cad snang ba dang 'brel bas phyir bskyar bar dka' ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba ni 
[\[267a.7\]]dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul bas stong pa nyid smra ba yin/_mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can pas mtshan ma med pa'i smra ba yin/_khams gsum dang ma 'dres pas smon pa med pa smra ba yin/_'dus byas kyi skyon mthong bas mngon par 'du mi byed pa smra ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos smra 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ba ni chos kyi don rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa smra ba yin no/_/bu mo chos zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa/_yi ge med pa/_bsnyad du med pa/_smrar med pa/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa rnam par rig pa ma yin pa/_rnam 
[\[267b.2\]]par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_rdul med pa/_rdul dang bral ba/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_mun pa med pa/_snang ba med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_'dzin pa ma yin pa/_'dzin pa dang bral 
[\[267b.3\]]ba yul med pa/_yul ma yin pa/_yul thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/_zhi ba grol ba blta dka' ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba/_rtog ge ma yin pa/_rtog ges mi chud pa/_'phags pa mkhas pas shes shing rtogs pa/_tshor ba med pa/_tshor ba thams cad kyi rgyun bcad pa/_
[\[267b.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du stong pa/_'chi 'pho med pa/_'pho bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa/_'pho ba med pa/_skye ba med pa/_phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa/_rgud pa ma yin pa/_'byung ba med pa/_'jig pa med pa/_mi srid pa/_'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/_'jig par mi 
[\[267b.5\]]'gyur ba/_bskyed pa ma yin pa/_gzhig pa ma yin pa/_mi rtogs pa/_kun du mi rtogs pa/_rnam par mi rtogs pa/_mtshan nyid dang snang ba ma yin pa/_mtshan nyid med par snang ba ma yin pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_kun gzhi med pa/_kun gzhi dang 
[\[267b.6\]]bral ba/_'dre ba med pa/_chags pa med pa/_bcings pa med pa/_grol ba med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_sbyor ba med pa/_zag pa med pa/_'dra ba med pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi bden pa dang mi rdzun pa/_bde ba med pa/_sdug 
[\[267b.7\]]bsngal med pa/_'du ba med pa/_'bral ba med pa/_ldan pa med pa/_mi ldan pa med pa/_ming med pa/_gzugs med pa/_sbyar ba med pa/_bsal ba med pa/_snying po med pa/_snying po med pa ma yin pa/_dbyer med pa/_dbyer med pa ma yin pa/_rdo rje ma yin pa/_'bigs pa'i 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]mtshan nyid ma yin pa/_de kho na de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa nyid/_ring ba ma yin pa/_nye ba ma yin pa/_kha dog med pa/_rtags med pa/_dbyibs med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_'di na ma yin pa/_pha bi na ma yin pa/_de las ma yin pa/_gzhan las ma yin pa/_
[\[268a.2\]]nang ma yin pa/_phyi ma yin pa/_gnyi ga ma yin pa/_gzhan ma yin pa/_gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin pa/_gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin pa/_mthong ba med pa thos pa med pa/_dran pa med pa/_brjed pa med pa/_shes pa med pa/_rnam par shes pa med pa/_
[\[268a.3\]]rnam par shes par bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_grangs med pa/_grangs med pa ma yin pa/_grangs thams cad dang bral ba ste/_bu mo 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/_/gang 'di 'dra ba'i chos skad dang /_brda sna tshogs kyis 'chad cing yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di 
[\[268a.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang chos smra ba ni smra ba thams cad las rnam par log pa yin no/_/chos smra ba ni su dang yang mi rtsod do/_/chos smra ba ni gzhan la shin tu rlom sems med do/_/chos smra ba ni ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas so/_/chos smra ba ni bslabs 
[\[268a.5\]]pa rnams la mi 'dud pa ma yin no/_/bdag bstod pa ma yin no/_/chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/zang zing gis ma sbags pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston to/_/gzhan dag la 'gyod pa mi skyed do/_/gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do/_/chos la khyad du gsod par mi byed do/_/
[\[268a.6\]]chos kyi bar chad mi byed do/_/chos smra ba ni byang chub kyi phyir mi 'dra bar chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/stong pa nyid las grol ba'i chos mi ston to/_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_ston pa med pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos mi ston to/_/chos kyi dbyings tha dad du mi byed do/_/de bzhin nyid 
[\[268a.7\]]las mi g.yo'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' las shin tu mi 'da'o/_/tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no/_/drang ba la rton pa ma yin no/_/gang zag la rton pa ma yin no/_/don dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/tshig 'bru dang 'gal ba ma yin 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]no/_/ye shes dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/nges pa'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/drang ba'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/chos nyid dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/gang zag dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/phyogs yongs su 'dzin par 
[\[268b.2\]]mi byed do/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/chos smra ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos gang gis kyang rnam par dag par mi shes so/_/ser sna'i nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims las nyams pa ma yin no/_/ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems can 
[\[268b.3\]]'dor ba ma yin no/_/khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_tha ba can ma yin no/_/le lo'i dri ma dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin no/_/chos smra ba ni byang chub kyi sems brjed pa ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi rtsa ba nyan pa chud gson pa ma yin no/_/gzhan la smod pa ma yin no/_/gang 
[\[268b.4\]]zag la sdang ba dang /_chos la sdang bar mi byed do/_/mdo sde dang mdo sde 'gal bar mi byed do/_/'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par mi byed do/_/chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/tshul bzhin sbyor ba'i chos gang la yang chos ma yin par mi mthong ngo /_/nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal 
[\[268b.5\]]'phel bar mi byed do/_/chos las nyams pa ma yin no/_/byas pa chud gson pa ma yin no/_/bag la nyal mi 'dzin to/_/bsti stang la rjes su chags pa ma yin no/_/bsti stang med pa la khong khro ba ma yin no/_/mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba la gnyis su 'du shes mi byed do/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 
[\[268b.6\]]chud mi gson to/_/chos smra ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi mos pa ma yin no/_/smras pa'i lan mi ster ba ma yin no/_/chos smra ba ni dgra med pa'o/_/'khrul pa mi tshol lo/_/lce gnyis med do/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems la tshul 'chos pa med do/_/chos 
[\[268b.7\]]la tshul 'chos pa med do/_/chos smra ba ni gzhan la nye bar bstan pa'i phyir dgon par gnas pa ma yin no/_/'thob par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa chung ba ltar ston pa ma yin no/_/'dod chen che bas sdig pa ma yin no/_/chos smra ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gzhan gyis byas pa mi ston to/_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]mi mnyam par len pa mi rtsom mo/_/nor bdun ma rung bar mi byed do/_/sha za ba ma yin no/_/pha'i rigs gcod pa ma yin no/_/gzhan gyi yon tan ma rung bar mi byed do/_/bdag gi yon tan brjod pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad yod par ston pa ma 
[\[269a.2\]]yin no/_/nga chos smra ba ni theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas mi ngoms te/_de'i phyir na chos smra ba zhes bya'o/_/bu mo de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin zhe na/_don zhes bya ba ni bsam pas bcos ma ma yin pa ni don to/_/sbyor bas dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[269a.3\]]thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa ni don to/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par ni don to/_/gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to/_/sbyin pas rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ni don to/_/sems can rnams bde ba myong bar byed pa ni don to/_/tshul 
[\[269a.4\]]khrims las nyams pa med pa ni don to/_/bzod pas ma rmas pa ni don to/_/brtson 'grus kyis dgos pa thams cad mthar 'byin pa ni don to/_/bsam gtan gyis nye bar zhi ba ni don to/_/shes rab kyis the tsom med pa ni don to/_/byams pas sems can thams cad la 
[\[269a.5\]]sems snyoms pa ni don to/_/snying rjes sems can thams cad kyi ci bya ba byed pa ni don to/_/dga' bas chos la dga' zhing mos pa ni don to/_/btang snyoms kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad mi 'byed pa ni don to/_/sbyin pas 'gyod pa med pa ni don to/_/snyan par 
[\[269a.6\]]smra bas khong khro ba med pa ni don to/_/don byed pas chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to/_/don 'thun pas sems can rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin 
[\[269a.7\]]par byed pa ni don to/_/'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba ni don to/_/chos thams cad bdag med pa ni don to/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba ni don to/_/tshig 'bru las don la rton pa ni don to/_/rnam par shes pa las ye shes la rton pa ni don to/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]mdo sde thams cad las nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa ni don to/_/srog dang gang zag gi sgra las chos nyid la rton pa ni don to/_/don so so yang dag par rig pas bstan pa mi zad pa ni don to/_/chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa 
[\[269b.2\]]ni don to/_/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas phung po ma lus pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ni don to/_/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas ci rigs par chos ston pa ni don to/_/sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa ni don to/_/tshul khrims kyi tshogs las 
[\[269b.3\]]smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to/_/thos pa'i tshogs las nan tan snying por byed pa ni don to/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs las mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to/_/ye shes kyi tshogs las sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma 
[\[269b.4\]]yin pa shes pa ni don to/_/zhi gnas kyi tshogs las sems las su rung ba ni don to/_/lhag mthong gi tshogs las rig pa dang rnam par grol ba ni don to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni don to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis 
[\[269b.5\]]dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed pa ni don to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis phyogs bcur bgrod pa ni don to/_/dbang po rnams kyis tshig rab tu 'byed pa ni don to/_/stobs rnams kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba ni don to/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos 
[\[269b.6\]]thams cad khong du chud pa ni don to/_/lam gyis chos thams cad mi 'khrugs pa ni don to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams las shin tu nyams pa med pa ni don to/_/de ltar na gang chos rnam pa 'di lta bu las don rab tu myong ba de ni 'di ltar don smra ba yin te/_don ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no/_/
[\[269b.7\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin no/_/bu mo gzhan yang dmigs par lta ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi don ni don te/_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du smra ba ni don smra ba yin no/_/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]don ni don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no/_/khams gsum pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang bral ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'i don ni don te/_byang chub sems dpa' smon pa med pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no/_/de bzhin du bsdus te 
[\[270a.2\]]'du byed thams cad kyi rgyun gcad pa'i phyir mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i don ni don to/_/skye ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'i don ni don to/_/skye ba nye bar len pa'i skye ba thams cad mi skye mi 'byung ba'i don ni don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba smra ba ni don smra ba yin 
[\[270a.3\]]no/_/sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_lam dang /_'gog pa'i don ni don to/_/'gog pa smra ba dang /_chos thams cad la gang zag med pa'i don ni don te/_gang zag med pa smra ba dang skad dang /_tshig thams cad brjod du med pa'i don ni don to/_brjod du med pa smra ba

[\[270a.5\]]ni don to/_/nan tan byed pa smra ba dang /_theg pa thams cad theg pa chen po'i don ni don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po smra ba ni don smra ba yin no/_/bu mo gzhan yang dbyer med pa'i don ni don to/_/sems can med pa'i don ni don to/_/ro gcig pa'i don ni don to/_/tha dad

[\[270a.7\]]'gro ba'i don ni don to/_/gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med pa'i don ni don to/_/mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i don ni don to/_/'dus ma byas pa'i don ni don to/_/sgro btags pa med pa'i don ni don to/_/rnam par rig pa med pa'i don ni don to/_/'khor gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i don ni 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]don to/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni don to/_/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i don ni don to/_/'gro ba med pa'i don ni don to/_/'jig pa med pa'i don ni don to/_/thun mong ma yin pa'i don ni don to/_/yongs su gdung ba med pa'i don ni don to/_/nye bar zhi ba'i

[\[270b.3\]]don to/_/mtha' dang mtha' med pa dang /_chad pa dang rtag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i don ni don to/_/yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang /_sgra dang /_tshig gi lam thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du nan tan bya ba dang /_khong du chud par bya ba'i don ni don to/_/sems dang /_yid 
[\[270b.4\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_spros pa la mi rgyu ba'i don ni don to/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i don ni don to/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de tha mi dad cing sna tshogs med pa'i don ni don to/_/stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[270b.5\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i don ni don to/_/don dam pa'i bden pa'i don ni don to/_/gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i don ni don to/_/rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/shin tu brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don

[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]nang nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/phyi rol du rgyu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/bden pa yang dag pa slu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad ci 
[\[271a.2\]]yang ma yin pa'i don ni don to/_/rdo rje ltar sra ba mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/legs par byas pa shin tu mthar gtugs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/thams cad kyi rjes su song ba khong du chud 
[\[271a.3\]]pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par zhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par ston 
[\[271a.4\]]pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab las nges par byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/nges pa'i tshig dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don 
[\[271a.5\]]to/_/brtags pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/yang dag pa'i shes pas lan 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/don thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang don 'di lta bu dang ldan pas don gang 
[\[271a.6\]]bstan pa de dag thams cad ni don bstan pa ste de'i phyir don smra ba zhes bya'o/_/bu mo de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba smra ba yin zhe na/_'dul ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnyis su gsungs te gnyis gang zhe na/_ltung ba 'dul ba dang /_nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'o/_/
[\[271a.7\]]de la ltung ba ni gang /_ltung ba 'dul ba ni gang zhe na/_ltung ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_ma rig pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_phyin ci log gi rtsa ba las byung ba/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]yod pa ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba/_sems can du mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_'gyod pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_'byung ba ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_the tshom gyi rtsa ba las byung ba/_zhen cing rmongs pa'i rtsa ba las byung 
[\[271b.2\]]ba/_shes rab nyam chung ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba ste/_'di ni ltung ba zhes bya'o/_/de la ltung ba 'dul ba gang zhe na/_the tshom med pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'byung ba ste/_ltung ba ni yul na mi gnas pa/_phyogs na mi gnas pa/_phung por ma gyur pa/_gzung ba med pa snang ba 
[\[271b.3\]]med pa'o/_/sems gang gis ltung bar gyur pa de yang zad pa dang bral ba/_rnam par gyur pa/_yul na mi gnas pa/_phyogs na mi gnas pa/_phung por ma gyur pa/_gzung ba med pa/_snang ba med pa'o/_/sems ji lta bar ltung ba yang de bzhin no/_/ltung ba ji lta bar chos 
[\[271b.4\]]thams cad kyang de bzhin te/_rtsa ba med do/_/mi gnas pa'o/_/gang sems som nyi med pa dang /_rnyog pa med pa dang /_yang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_shin tu byang ba dang /_bla ma'i tshig la mos pa dang /_gcig tu nges par the 
[\[271b.5\]]tshom med cing gcig tu yid ches pa 'di ni ltung ba 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa ni gang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ni gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_ma rig pa dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa'i yan 
[\[271b.6\]]lag bcu gnyis dang /_gang dag la 'dus byas 'jug pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa 'dul ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ni shin tu dul ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyis dul ba ste/_de la 'dod 
[\[271b.7\]]chags kun du rgyu ba med do/_/zhe sdang med do/_/gti mug med do/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pas dul ba ste/_de la nyon mongs pa thams cad kun du rgyu ba med do/_/chos thams cad ni smon pa med pas dul ba ste/_de la kun du rgyu ba thams cad kun du rgyu ba med do/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dul ba ste/_de la mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kun du rgyu ba med do/_/chos thams cad ni rkyen gyi kha na las pa ste/_de la lta bar song ba thams cad kun du rgyu ba med do/_/gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[272a.2\]]ba'i chos thams cad la nges pa dang /_yang dag pa kho na dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad nyon mongs pa ma yin pa dang /_shin tu zhi ba dang /_stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong pa nyid des nyon mongs pa thams cad stong par gang de ltar stong pa nyid khong du chud pa 
[\[272a.3\]]'di ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba zhes bya ste/_gang 'di skad smra ba 'di ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no/_/bdag 'dul ba'i phyir 'dul zhing gang bdag 'dul ba shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba shes pa'o/_/de la bdag 'dul ba gang zhe na/_gang bdag la bdag med par shes pa 
[\[272a.4\]]dang /_bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa dang /_bdag dben par shes pa dang /_bdag ji lta ba bzhin dang /_bdag mi 'khrugs pa dang /_bdag stong pa nyid dang /_bdag dngos po med pa nyid dang /_bdag de bzhin nyid dang /_bdag mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag rgod pa 
[\[272a.5\]]med pa dang /_bdag sgro btags pa med pa dang /_bdag rtag tu skye ba med par shes pa ste/_gang de ltar bdag shes pa ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa thams cad shes pa'o/_/ji ltar bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes phyin ci log pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa med pa la nyon 
[\[272a.6\]]mongs par 'du shes phyin ci log go/_/ji ltar bdag rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa med pa ste/_gang de ltar lhag mthong gis shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/de la 'das pa'i nyon mongs pa dul 
[\[272a.7\]]ba ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun du rgyu ba med cing yid la byed pa med pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'o/_/gang kun du rgyu ba med cing yid la byed pa med pa de ni 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]yin no/_/ji ltar sems gzugs can ma yin te/_nang na ma yin/_phyi rol na ma yin/_gnyis ka med pa la yang mi dmigs pa/_de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang gzugs can ma yin te/_nang na ma yin/_phyi rol na ma yin/_gnyis ka med par yang 
[\[272b.2\]]mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad ni gnod pa med pa'o/_/zhi ba med pa'o/_/bya ba med pa'o/_/rnam par bya ba med pa'o/_/byed pa med pa'o/_/rnam par byed pa med pa'o/_/gang de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams 'byung ba dang /_'jig
