[\[292b.5\]]bsgoms pa dang /_'khor gsum gyi gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi las ci yang mi brjod kyang /_de skad thams cad la sgra snyan dang /_'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi gsung 
[\[292b.6\]]sgra dang dbyangs ni don dang ldan pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_bden pa dang 'thun pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba/_yid 'byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'thun pa/_nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba/_'bras bu yod pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur gyur pa yin te/_bu mo 
[\[292b.7\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/_nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams mi byed de/_
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]de ye shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa ni 'khu ba dang /_g.yo dang /_gya gyu dang /_tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do/_/brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba dang bral zhing yang dag par lta ba yin/_byams pa dang /_snying rje la gnas te/_sems 
[\[293a.2\]]can thams cad la sems snyoms shing byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa yin no/_/de ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin gyi/_nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no/_/de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las 
[\[293a.3\]]thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/_de la de yod do/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /_brnag pa rnyog pa med pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems gcig gis 
[\[293a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no/_/sems 
[\[293a.5\]]can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no/_/lus thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir rang gi lus kyi chos nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[293a.6\]]lus kyi chos nyid kyi rang gi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no/_/rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'dul ba yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'dul ba yin no/_/sems 
[\[293a.7\]]can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur byin gyis rlob bo/_/de'i byin gyi rlabs de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud du bcas pa dang /_tshangs par bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]gis kyang g.yos pa dang /_bskyod par mi nus te/_bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ges chags pa med pa 
[\[293b.2\]]thos na mos shing yid ches te/_the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dngang la kun du mi dngang zhing mi skrag la kun du skrag par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag 
[\[293b.3\]]gi lus kyi las dang /_lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa/_chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra 
[\[293b.4\]]brjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /_dbyangs dang /_chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams 
[\[293b.5\]]cad dang /_zhing thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 
[\[293b.6\]]'byed pa la mos so/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing yid ches te/_the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dngang la kun tu mi dngang mi skrag la kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi 
[\[293b.7\]]khyab pa la yang mos so/_/sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/_de la de yod do/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /_tshe'i tshad tha dad pa [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du 
[\[294a.2\]]brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sems can rnams dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa byed pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong 
[\[294a.3\]]ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du 'das pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/_bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang /_bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang /_bskal pa gang dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji 
[\[294a.4\]]snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang /_gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /_gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang /_gang dag chung ba dag dang /_
[\[294a.5\]]gang dag cher gyur pa dag dang /_gang dag phra ba dag dang /_gang dag rags pa dag dang /_gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang /_gang dag spyi'u tshugs pa dag dang /_gang dag 'thun pa dag dang /_gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang /_
[\[294a.6\]]mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa la 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de lag mthil dang /_sor mo lnga 
[\[294a.7\]]mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/_bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na mos shing yid ches te/_the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[294b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus dang /_lus kyi las dang /_lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten 
[\[294b.3\]]gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /_dbyangs dang /_chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa/_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[294b.4\]]gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyis las su dus thams cad dang /_zhing thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[294b.5\]]kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la mos so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang dag par mos shing yid ches te/_the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dngang mi skrag skrag 
[\[294b.6\]]par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa yin no/_/sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de 
[\[294b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/_de la de yod do/_/snying rje chen po'i stobs dang /_smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /_tshe'i tshad tha dad pa [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprad pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sems can rnams 
[\[295a.2\]]dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /_sems can gyi las rnams dang /_sems can gyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/_bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang /_bskal 
[\[295a.3\]]pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa de dag [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang /_gang dag 
[\[295a.4\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /_gang dag rnam par dag pa dang /_gang dag chung ba dag dang /_gang dag cher gyur pa dag dang /_gang dag phra ba dag dang /_gang dag rags pa dag dang /_gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang /_gang dag spyi'u tshugs pa dag 
[\[295a.5\]]dang /_gang dag 'thun pa dag dang /_gang dag phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang /_mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de la de bzhin 
[\[295a.6\]]gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/_lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/_bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[295a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na mos shing yid ches te/_the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/_/da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang /_lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[295b.2\]]de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /_dbyangs dang /_chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/_/
[\[295b.3\]]da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang /_zhing thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi las 
[\[295b.4\]]kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/_rnam par 'byed pa la mos so/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing yid ches te/_the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur 
[\[295b.5\]]te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/_/sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/_da ltar byung ba'i dus la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[295b.6\]]pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/_de la de yod do/_/shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs la mkhas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[295b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /_tshe'i tshad tha dad pa [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sems can rnams dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /_
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]las rnams dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa thams cad de/_bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[296a.2\]]med pa dag dang /_bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung ba'i bskal pa de dag [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad 
[\[296a.3\]]pa dang /_gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /_gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang /_gang dag chung ba dag dang /_gang dag cher gyur pa dag dang /_gang dag phra ba dag dang /_gang dag rags pa dag dang /_gang dag rdul phra rab la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs 
[\[296a.4\]]pa dag dang /_gang dag spyi'u tshugs pa dag dang /_gang dag 'thun pa dag dang /_gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dag dang /_mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin 
[\[296a.5\]]du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/_lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/_bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[296a.6\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad thob ste thams cad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_lus tshad med pa dang /_thams cad zil gyis gnon cing thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba 
[\[296a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_lus rtsi sman dang 'dra ba'i phyir mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi skyon zhi bar byed pa dang /_thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas 'khor thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob pas 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]bag tsha ba med pa dang /_yang dag par sbyor bas slob ma bsam pa can dang /_gdams ngag can dang rjes su bstan pa dang /_'thun pas slob ma mi phyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gnas pas slob ma shin tu dul ba dang /_chos bstan pa la the tshom med pas 
[\[296b.2\]]spobs pa myur ba dang /_gleng ba med pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /_gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smin pas 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sems pa la sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad 'byin pa dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi 
[\[296b.3\]]khyab pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mngon du lta ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams tshad med pa brtan pa'i phyir blta bas mi ngoms pa dang /_yang dag par khong du chud pas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /_spyod lam mi 'khrugs pas glang po'i lta 
[\[296b.4\]]stangs kyis lta ba dang /_spro ba che bas seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don yod par rnam par 'gro ba dang /_ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas ngag la dbang ba dang /_yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas kun nas mig dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[296b.5\]]spobs pa myur bas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /_bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa'i rnyed pa'i mchog dang /_grags pa'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas gtugs pas bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang /_mthu bo che chen po'i lus 
[\[296b.6\]]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas rdzi ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can la bde ba bskyed pa las mi ldog cing 'khrugs pa med la brel phongs pa med pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[296b.7\]]kyi ston par gyur pas/_chos dang gtsug lag mang po shes pa dang /_chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas tshe dpag tu med pa dang /_shin tu mur thug cing mthas klas pas mthong ba dang /_rig pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_dran pa dang /_thos pa don yod pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]pa nyid du khong du chud pas shes rab mi 'khrugs pa dang /_chos smra zhing nyes par smra ba med pas gtam rgyun chags pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma lus pa spangs pas bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rang byung 
[\[297a.2\]]bas slob dpon med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud pas rnam pa thams cad shes pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu 'thob bo//_//bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad 
[\[297a.3\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gang dag la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub/_de skad ces gsol 
[\[297a.4\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa dag la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub ste/_de dag las [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam zhig 
[\[297a.5\]]bstan par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'di ni sngon dam bcas pa la brtan pas mngon par grub bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'di ni sngon sbyin pa sna tshogs 
[\[297a.6\]]bsags pas mngon par grub bo/_/zhabs kyi rting pa yangs shing zhabs byin gyis mtho ba ni sngon sems can gzhan dag khyad du ma bsad pas grub bo/_/sor mo ring ba ni sngon sems can rnams chos kyis bsrungs shing bskyabs te sbas pa byas pas grub bo/_/phyag dang zhabs 
[\[297a.7\]]dra bar 'brel ba ni sngon gzhan gyi g.yog 'khor ma phye bas grub bo/_/phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa ni sngon bgo ba sna tshogs byin pas grub bo/_/bdun mtho ba ni sngon bza' ba dang btung ba rgya chen po byin pas grub bo/_/byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ni sngon sangs 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos yongs su bzung bas grub bo/_/gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ni sngon gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs shing 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pas grub bo/_/ro stod seng ge'i ro stod lta bu ni sngon dge ba'i las rgya chen po mthar gyis spyad pas grub bo/_/thal gong rgyas pa ni sngon 
[\[297b.2\]]dge ba'i chos yang dag par spyad pas grub bo/_/dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa ni sngon mi 'jigs pas gzhan dbugs phyung bas grub bo/_/phyag ma btud cing ring ba ni sngon gzhan gyis ci bya'o cog byed pa la spro bas grub bo/_/sku rnam par dag pa ni sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 
[\[297b.3\]]ngoms mi myong bar yang dag par spyad pas grub bo/_/mgur dung lta bu ni sngon nad pa rnams la sman sna tshogs byin pas grub bo/_/'gram pa seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas grub bo/_/tshems bzhi bcur tshang ba ni sngon sems 
[\[297b.4\]]can la bsam pa mnyam par spyod pas grub bo/_/tshems thags bzang ba ni sngon sems can mi 'dum pa rnams kyi bsdums byas pas grub bo/_/tshems mnyam pa ni sngon yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu byin pas grub bo/_/tshems mche ba dkar ba ni/_sngon lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 
[\[297b.5\]]las shin tu bsrungs pas grub bo/_/ljags shin tu ring ba ni sngon bden pa'i tshig kun du bsrungs pas grub bo/_/ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa ni sngon bsod nams tshad med pas brtan cing yid du 'ong ba'i ro bro ba byin pas grub bo/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping ka'i sgra 
[\[297b.6\]]dbyangs dang ldan pa ni sngon sems can la 'jam pa'i tshig smras pa dang /_tshig bsdams pa dang /_kun dga' ba'i tshig bsgrags pas grub bo/_/spyan mthon mthing dang ldan pa ni sngon byams pa dang ldan zhing thams cad bsrungs pas grub bo/_/spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ni 
[\[297b.7\]]sngon bsam pa sgyu med pas grub bo/_/dpral ba'i smin mtshams kyi spu shin tu dkar ba ni sngon bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pas grub bo/_/dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ni sngon bla ma la gus shing 'dud pas grub bo/_/pags pa srab pa ni sngon chos yang dag par sdud 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]pa'i sems las su rung bas grub bo/_/pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba ni sngon yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang mal stan byin pas grub bo/_/spu'i khung bu nas ba spu re re skyes pa ni sngon 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs pas grub bo/_/spu'i rtse mo g.yas su 'khyil ba ni sngon 
[\[298a.2\]]mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag 'thun par 'dzin pas grub bo/_/dbu skra in dra nI la lta bu ni sngon srog chags thams cad la snying brtse zhing rdo dbyug dang mtshon cha bor bas grub bo/_/shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa ni 
[\[298a.3\]]sngon bdag dang sems can gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bas grub bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mthu bo che chen po'i lus kun nas mdzes pa 'di ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /_mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa 
[\[298a.4\]]dang /_gzhan 'jigs pa dag dbugs phyung ba dang /_sems can mi 'dum pa'i bsdums byas pas grub ste/_bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par 
[\[298a.5\]]grub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bka' stsal pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/
[\[298a.6\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo de de bzhin te/_bu mo de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di las bstan to/_/bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi 
[\[298a.7\]]rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di thos la thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du grub pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dpa' rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa de dag la ltos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[298b.2\]]gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos te/_snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/steng 
[\[298b.3\]]gi bar snang las kyang lha brgya stong gis me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/_sil snyan yang dkrol nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos 
[\[298b.4\]]la thos nas kyang mos shing yid ches te/_'dzin cing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/_de dag ni ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du lhar bcas 
[\[298b.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni sems can dman pa la mos shing nan tan la mi gnas pa rnams kyi sug par mchi bar mi 'gyur gyi bcom ldan 'das spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi 
[\[298b.6\]]sug par mchi bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su dag par spyod pa dang /_chos spyod pa'i sems can rnams ni chos 'di la dga' bar 'gyur te/_yid la 'bab cing mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas 
[\[298b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos spyod pa ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos spyod pa legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo 
[\[299a.2\]]bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni chos spyod pa'o/_/mdza' ba brtan pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa shes pa dang /_snying brtse ba dang bcas pa dang /_skyabs su song ba yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_nyam chung ba la bzod cing dang du len pa dang /_gtang bar dka' ba yongs 
[\[299a.3\]]su gtong ba dang /_phan pa'i dngos po dang /_phan 'dogs pa'i blo dang /_ngang tshul ngan pa rjes su srung ba dang /_chos nges par sems pa dang /_chos kun du srung ba dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos srung ba dang /_dben pa dang /_gcig pur dga' ba dang /_dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[299a.4\]]la yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_dgon pa'i yon tan la yongs su 'jal ba dang /_'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang /_sems can rjes su srung ba dang /_'khrul pa la lta ba dang /_byams pa la sbyor ba dang /_snying rje chen po la 'jug pa dang /_dga' bas chos la dga' zhing mchog tu dga' 
[\[299a.5\]]ba dang /_btang snyoms la bsam gtan 'cha' ba dang /_sems can gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la sbyor ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa smra ba dang /_khur blangs pa khyer ba dang /_sems mi zhum pa dang /_rung ba'i tshod shes pa dang /_tshor ba med pa dang /_
[\[299a.6\]]sdig pa mi 'dod pa dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_'dod pa'i 'thob pa spong ba dang /_'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_'thab pa med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_gnod sems med pa dang /_khro ba med pa dang /_
[\[299a.7\]]bzod pa dang /_des pa dang /_rgyu'i byed pa khong du chud pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_shes rab kyi nor gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_bla ma la gus 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_bka' blo bde ba dang /_'thun par 'dzin pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang /_'dud pa dang /_sems dma' ba dang /_bdag la mi stod pa dang /_gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_rang gi yon tan mi brjod pa dang /_gzhan gyi yon tan 
[\[299b.2\]]la mi smod pa dang /_'dod chags kyi rdul 'phyag pa dang /_zhe sdang gi tha ba rnam par spang ba dang /_gti mug gi mun pa mun nag med pa dang /_nga rgyal bcom pa dang /_spyod lam dang spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang /_chos la rim gro byed de dga' zhing dang la mchog tu dga' 
[\[299b.3\]]ba dang /_sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa dang /_chos la mos pa dang /_dge 'dun la ston pa ltar 'dzin pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom pa dang /_khyim nas byung ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang 
[\[299b.4\]]bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis mi g.yos pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_byams sdang la mtshungs par lta ba dang /_'dor te gsong por smras pa dang /_bzhin 'dzum pa dang /_khro gnyer med pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa 
[\[299b.5\]]dang /_kha gsag pa med pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_sgyu med pa dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa dang /_bsam pa shin tu dag pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don byed pa dang /_don 'thun pa dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran 
[\[299b.6\]]pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[299b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems rnam par dag par byed pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam srung 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]ba dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med par mos pa dang /_stong pa nyid nges par sems pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[300a.2\]]med pa shes pa dang /_khams gsum la mi gnas pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam la 'jug pa dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gis so sor 
[\[300a.3\]]rtog pa ni chos spyod pa'o/_/bu mo gzhan yang chos spyod pa ni gang na mig la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang /_rna ba la mi spyod pa dang /_sgra la mi spyod pa dang /_sgra'i mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang /_sna la mi spyod 
[\[300a.4\]]pa dang /_dri la mi spyod pa dang /_dri'i mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang /_lce la mi spyod pa dang /_ro la mi spyod pa dang /_ro'i mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang /_lus la mi spyod pa dang /_reg pa la mi spyod pa dang /_reg pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang /_yid la mi spyod pa dang /_chos la mi spyod 
[\[300a.5\]]pa dang /_chos kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o/_/gzugs la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi mi rtag pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi bdag med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_
[\[300a.6\]]gzugs kyi zhi ba la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan ma med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi smon pa med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi dben pa la mi 
[\[300a.7\]]spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi rang bzhin la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi ji lta ba bzhin la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi ma skyes pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi 'byung ba med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi gzhi med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi gnas med pa la 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]mi spyod pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la mi spyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i sdug 
[\[300b.2\]]bsngal ba la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bdag med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i zhi ba la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i smon pa med pa la mi spyod 
[\[300b.3\]]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i dben pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ji lta ba bzhin la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa la mi spyod 
[\[300b.4\]]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la mi spyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o/_/khams la mi spyod pa dang /_skye 
[\[300b.5\]]mched la mi spyod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gang spyod pa med cing rab tu spyod pa med pa 'di ni chos spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gang na spyod pa med cing rnam par spyod pa med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_
[\[300b.6\]]'jug pa med pa dang /_gang na sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na 'dod pa dang /_'du byed la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na chos la yang mi spyod la chos 
[\[300b.7\]]ma yin pa la yang mi spyod pa dang /_gang na gnyis la mi spyod pa dang /_sna tshogs la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa la mi spyod pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la mi spyod pa 'di ni chos spyod 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]pa'o/_/gang na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i rlom sems la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na ril po dang /_rdzas la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las 
[\[301a.2\]]skyes pa dang /_shed bur 'dzin pa dang /_sgro 'dogs pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnas pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mi spyod pa dang /_gang na rtag pa dang chad pa la mi spyod pa dang /_mthar 'dzin par 
[\[301a.3\]]lta ba la mi spyod pa dang /_dbus la mngon par zhen pa la mi spyod pa dang /_bdag dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas dang gnas med pa'i gnas dang /_chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang /_chos thams cad kyi gnas dang /_stong pa dang mi stong pa'i gnas dang /_shin tu gnas pa'i gnas 
[\[301a.4\]]dang /_chos thams cad mi g.yo ba dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_rgyu ba med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_khas len pa med pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_gang chos 'di la shes la shes pas 
[\[301a.5\]]rlom sems kyang med pa 'di ni yang dag pa dang /_de kho na dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos shes pa zhes bya'o/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bur chos thams cad khong du chud nas sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i phyir 'khor ba la yang spyod la/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[301a.6\]]chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag phul yin no/_/chos spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/bu mo rin chen gyis ni mu tig gi se mo do bye ba brgya stong ri ba bcom 
[\[301a.7\]]ldan 'das la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos spyod pa 'di la brtson pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson pa lags so/_/de'i lung bstan pa ni 'di lags te/_byang chub kyi snying po la gnas nas 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab par blta'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya shes sam/_de nas bu mo rin chen gyis 
[\[301b.2\]]de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'di la chos dbyings sems can khams/_/yang dag nyid kyis mnyam rtogs nas/_/gnyis med rtogs pa gang yin pa/_/de ni mi ldog phyag rgya yin/_/gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/
[\[301b.3\]]da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/_/thams cad chos kyi dbyings mnyam par/_/rtogs pa de dag phyir mi ldog_/gang yang 'dus byas khams rnams dang /_/gang yang 'dus ma byas pa'i khams/_/dben pa'i don gyis stong par ni/_/khong du chud pa phyir mi ldog_/sngon gyi mtha' ni 
[\[301b.4\]]mtha' yas pa/_/de yi tshad ni mi dmigs pa/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig ldan pa/_/khong du de chud phyir mi ldog_/'jig rten pa yi chos gang dag_/spyod par btags pa'i spyod yul rnams/_/shes rab kyis ni de rtogs pa/_/gang yin de dag phyir mi ldog_/bdud kyi yul ni ji snyed 
[\[301b.5\]]pa/_/gang gis sangs rgyas yul rnams dang /_/de dag mi gnyis shes pa ni/_/phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa yin/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gang /_/nyon mongs gang dag mtha' yas pa/_/gang gis rtog pa'i rtsa ba las/_/byung bar shes pa phyir mi ldog_/'khor ba 
[\[301b.6\]]dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/byang chub zhi bar bstan pa yang /_/tha dad ma yin kun mnyam par/_/khong du chud pa phyir mi ldog_/phung po ji bzhin byang chub ste/_/phung po byang chub mi gnyis shing /_/sgyu ma 'dra bar mnyam shes te/_/rnam rtog med pa de dag mkhas/_/gang yang 
[\[301b.7\]]khams rnams bzhi po dag_/nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin te/_/gzung med khong du chud pa ni/_/yang dag phyag rgyas btab pa yin/_/mig ni byang chub byang chub min/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni stong bar gsungs/_/ji ltar mig bzhin byang chub ste/_/rtag tu mnyam 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]pa nyid kyis mnyam/_/de ltar skye mched thams cad kyang /_/rtag tu stong ste byang chub mnyam/_/tshul 'di rab tu shes pa dag_/phyag rgya de yis btab pa yin/_/sems can rnams ni kun gyi sems/_/sems gcig gis ni rab shes pa/_/de ni rdzogs 
[\[302a.2\]]pa'i byang chub las/_/phyir mi ldog par the tshom med/_/sems can kun gyi dbang po ni/_/rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/_/pha rol phyin pa gang yin pa/_/de dag phyir mi ldog pa yin/_/thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yin/_/rgyun mi chad par rgyun du yang /_/bskal pa bye 
[\[302a.3\]]bar brjod kyang go/_/de yi bsngags pa de mi zad/_/nam mkha'i khams ni zad 'gyur la/_/rlung ni zhags pas gzung 'gyur srid/_/de yi spobs pa 'jig rten gyi/_/zad par bya bar yong mi nus/_/gang gis sems ni mi rmongs shing /_/thos pa'ang chud zar mi 'gyur 
[\[302a.4\]]la/_/chos rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/_/gzungs ni de dag spyod yul yin/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'dren pa yi/_/dam pa'i chos ni gang bshad pa/_/gzungs thob pas ni de thams cad/_/dran pa dang ni shes pas 'dzin/_/gzungs ni shin tu bslabs pas na/_/sngon gyi 
[\[302a.5\]]bskal pa bye bar ni/_/skyob pa rnams kyi chos thos pa/_/de dag dris nas ston par 'gyur/_/phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa/_/de dag gzungs ni 'di 'dra ste/_/spobs pa dag kyang 'di 'dra zhing /_/de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o/_/chos rnams phyag rgya stong pa nyid/_/rnam smin 
[\[302a.6\]]med cing bsal med pa/_/stong pa'i phyag rgyas gang btab pa/_/de dag phyir mi ldog par bstan/_/nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i chos/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung med par/_/mtha' ni khong du rab chud la/_/phyag rgyas btab pa phyir mi ldog_/chos ni rten nas 'byung ba ste/_/
[\[302a.7\]]rgyu med pa yi chos med do/_/chos gang rgyu las byung ba dag_/de yi mtshan nyid 'gog pa'o/_/chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/mtshan nyid phyag rgya de 'dra ba'i/_/phyag rgyas gang btab phyir mi ldog_/phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa/_/sems can 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]kun gyi spyod pa dang /_/gzugs dang spyod lam dus rnams kyang /_/skad cig gcig la rab tu ston/_/sbyin pa'i tshogs ni mtha' yas te/_/bsod nams rtag tu mi zad pa/_/gal te ro gcig 'gyur na ni/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang gang bar 'gyur/_/de dag tshul khrims 
[\[302b.2\]]che ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims 'byung gnas te/_/dpag tu med cing mtha' yang med/_/nam mkha' yi ni dbyings dang 'dra/_/sems can kun dang nyan thos dang /_/rgyal ba re re'i tshul khrims ni/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul khrims kyi/_/bcu drug cha yi rin mi chog_/
[\[302b.3\]]de dag bzod pa mi zad de/_/de dag skye ba med pas bskyed/_/bzod pa mi zad phun sum tshogs/_/phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin/_/de dag brtson 'grus che ba nyid/_/yang dag brtson pa dpag tu med/_/rtul ba dpag tu med pa ste/_/sems can thams cad tshim par byed/_/brten pa 
[\[302b.4\]]rtag tu mnyam par bzhag_/g.yeng ba med cing shin tu bsdam/_/bya ba rnams ni kun ston kyang /_/mnyam par bzhag las g.yo ba med/_/shes rab kyis ni chags med thob/_/lta ba'i bag chags rnam par sbyang /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul rdzogs par thob/_/phun sum tshogs 
[\[302b.5\]]pa'i zhing yang sbyangs/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgyas btab pa de/_/ye shes pha rol phyin pa thob/_/thabs chen dag kyang shin tu bslab/_/byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod/_/sems can yongs su smin byed pa/_/de dag spyod yul mtha' yas te/_/spyod pa ci 'dra bsam ci 'dra/_/de dag spyod pa shes pa med/_/
[\[302b.6\]]dgra bcom dag dang rang rgyal dang /_/bdud dang mu stegs gzhan kun gyis/_/de dag spyod yul tshad med pa/_/shes par nus pa ma yin no/_/de dag bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang /_/rnam 'phrul 'du byed bcas pa min/_/dpa' bo lhun gyis grub par ni/_/bya ba de dag kun la 'jug_/tshe dang 'jug 
[\[302b.7\]]dang 'chi 'pho dang /_/byang chub kyi ni snying po dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs kyang ston/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na/_/zhing rnams kun na snang ba ni/_/nyi zla lta bur gsal ba ste/_/de dag nam mkha' mtshungs par ldan/_/theg pa mos pa ci bzhin par/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]pa'ang ston mod kyi/_/mi ldog phyag rgya gang yin pa/_/phyag rgya de ni 'dor ma yin/_/nam mkhas ci tsam khyab pa dag_/de srid ye shes khyab par byed/_/phyag rgya las ni mi ldog pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de dag mkhyen/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya 'di bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[303a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas lung bstan par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bu mo rin chen la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_bu mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog par 
[\[303a.3\]]bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa ni legs so/_/legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bu mo rin chen gyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba las na de phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa lags te/_the tshom ma mchis so/_/
[\[303a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das chos 'di mngon sum du ma gyur pa 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ston par nus pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_bu mo rin chen gyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_bzod pa rab tu thob pa/_
[\[303a.5\]]theg pa chen po'i gting thob pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad 
[\[303a.6\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo theg pa chen po de ni sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pas rgya che ba'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kun du ston pas theg pa de ni sgrib pa med pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag dang bral bas theg pa de ni dri ma med pa'o/_/thams cad du rnam par 
[\[303a.7\]]grol ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid yin pas theg pa de ni kun du snang ba'o/_/gdod ma nas kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas theg pa de ni 'od gsal ba'o/_/bag chags dang bral ba'i phyir theg pa de ni yongs su dkar ba'o/_/tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu bsrungs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni yongs 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]su dag pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po shin tu brtags pa'i phyir theg pa de ni mnyam par legs par gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi phung pos legs par brtags pa'i phyir theg pa de ni zag pa med pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i phung po shin tu dkar bar byas pa'i phyir theg pa de ni nges par grol ba'o/_/
[\[303b.2\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston pa'o/_/stobs bcus shin tu yongs su zin pas theg pa de ni mi thul ba'o/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/
[\[303b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis shin tu yongs su zin pas theg pa de ni byin gyi rlabs thogs pa med par 'gro ba'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyi phyir theg pa de ni mnyam pa'o/_/chos dang 'thun pas bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir theg 
[\[303b.4\]]pa de ni chos chos dang 'thun pas nges par 'joms pa'o/_/bdud kyi phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal bas theg pa de ni rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o/_/theg pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/theg pa de ni phung po'i bdud yongs su shes pa'o/_/theg pa de ni 'chi 
[\[303b.5\]]bdag gi bdud dang bral ba'o/_/theg pa de ni lha'i bu'i bdud rnam par spangs pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni 'byor pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[303b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni brtan pa mi phyed pa'o/_/drang po ma yin pa dang snyom las thams cad dang bral bas theg pa de ni skyon med pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[303b.7\]]su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni sems kyi gdung ba'i skyon dang bral ba'o/_/theg pa de ni lam bzang po thams cad kyi gnas su 'gro ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni thams cad la mkhas pa dang /_thams cad la mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_'jig 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]rten pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa thams cad kyis ci rigs par 'byung ba'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'gros kyis theg pa de ni 
[\[304a.2\]]'ong ba dang /_'gro ba med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gya nom pas theg pa de ni bde bar 'gro ba'o/_/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rlung gi shugs dang ldan pas theg pa de ni byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba'o/_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bltar mi 
[\[304a.3\]]mthong bas theg pa de ni dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bde bar lta ba'i phyir theg pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis 'gro ba'o/_/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir theg pa 
[\[304a.4\]]de ni yang dag par spong ba la mnyam par legs par gnas pa'o/_/bar mi phyed pas theg pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'o/_/zag pa med pa'i chos 'ong ba'i phyir theg pa de ni khams gsum las byung ba'o/_/'dus byas kyi khams kyi snang 
[\[304a.5\]]ba thob pas theg pa de ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa mi 'dod pas theg pa de ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed cing kha lo sgyur te legs par khrid pa'o/_/spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bas theg pa de ni mngon par 
[\[304a.6\]]'phags pa'o/_/theg pa de ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/theg pa de ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu shes pa'o/_/gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pas theg pa de ni sgo phye ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyam pa'i phyir theg 
[\[304a.7\]]pa de ni ro gcig pa'o/_/grags pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i phyir theg pa de ni bsgrags pa'o/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyi phyir theg pa de ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o/_/bsngags pa mtha' yas pas theg pa de ni brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]skyong ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa'o/_/sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas theg pa de ni ser sna can rnams la gtong ba sbyin pa'o/_/snying rje chen pos shin tu zin pas theg pa de ni ngang tshul ngan pa rnams la tshul khrims sbyin pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i 
[\[304b.2\]]sems med pas theg pa de ni gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams bzod pa sbyin pa'o/_/go cha brtan pa mi 'dor bas theg pa de ni le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus sbyin pa'o/_/sems dul zhing zhi la las su rung bas theg pa de ni sems g.yeng ba rnams la bsam gtan sbyin pa'o/_/
[\[304b.3\]]sems can thams cad thos pa la sbyor bas theg pa de ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams la shes rab sbyin pa'o/_/sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas theg pa de ni bde ba thams cad sgrub cing sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'o/_/theg pa de ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis sangs 
[\[304b.4\]]rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes kun du ston pa/_theg pa thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa ste/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_
[\[304b.5\]]'di skad ces bdag kyang theg pa chen po la zhugs te/_sems can tshad ma mchis pa theg pa chen po 'di la dgod par bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis thams cad mkhyen par myur du 
[\[304b.6\]]nges par mi 'byung ba theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_bar du gcod pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen 
[\[304b.7\]]pa myur du nges par mi 'byung ngo /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa nyid mngon par 'dod pa dang /_skye ba la gnas te tshangs par spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]pa dang /_longs spyod bdog pa rnams la ser sna byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la mnyam par mi sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims lhod pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba dang /_gnod sems dang khong khro ba bag la nyal bar byed pa dang /_sems zhum pa dang brjed ngas 
[\[305a.2\]]pa dang /_thos pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /_dpyod pa med pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal 'phel ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang /_sems kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang dam pa'i chos mi srung ba dang /_slob dpon chos 'chab pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[305a.3\]]rnams 'dor ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos gtong ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po sten pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su mi sngo ste/_phung po gsum pa dang mi 'thun pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus rlom sems su byed pa dang /_thabs med par lhung ba'i blo 
[\[305a.4\]]dang /_phyir zhing dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa mi smra ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par sems pa dang /_ma thos pa'i chos spong ba dang /_bdud kyi las khong du mi chud pa dang /_'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mi 
[\[305a.5\]]byed pa dang /_'khor bas yongs su skyo ba ste/_bu mo sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa yang dag phul yin te/_bar du gcod pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen par myur du nges par mi 'byung ngo /_/de lta mod kyi 'on kyang bu mo theg pa chen po'i yon tan ji tsam 
[\[305a.6\]]pa bar du gcod pa yang de tsam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus byas kyi skyon ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa yang de tsam mo/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang de tsam mo/_/theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang bsngags pa 
[\[305a.7\]]ji tsam pa de bzhin gshegs pas sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu mkhyen pa yang de tsam ste/_de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu mkhyen pa ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa dang yon 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]tan yang de tsam mo/_/bu mo de lta bas na ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i nyon mongs par gyur pa'i chos yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/chos gang dag gis theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag la bsten par bya/_bsgom par 
[\[305b.2\]]bya/_mang du bya'o/_/de la theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang zhe na/_bu mo chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes 
[\[305b.3\]]gnyen du gyur pa dang /_gzhan gyis byas pa rnams la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad la bsam pa brtan pa dang /_bya ba thams cad yongs su grub pa la zhum pa med pa dang /_bsam pa dag pas sems rnyog pa med pa dang spyod lam thams cad 
[\[305b.4\]]du rnam par mi rtog pas lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pas ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor bas sems yongs su dag pa dang /_lan la mi re bas sbyin pa yongs su dag pa dang /_ngang tshul ngan pa yongs su skyob pas 
[\[305b.5\]]tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta bas bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/_brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pas bsam 
[\[305b.6\]]gtan yongs su dag pa dang /_bag chags thams cad yang dag par 'joms pas shes rab yongs su dag pa dang /_bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su spong bas sems pa dang /_kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pas yi dam la brtan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin 
[\[305b.7\]]par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams mi 'dor ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su srung bas sangs rgyas la byas pa gzo ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rab tu rdzogs par byed pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]ngoms pa dang /_gong ma'i khyad par khong du chud pas de la mi chags pa dang /_spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med par nyan pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa shin tu mthong ba'i phyir chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa dang /_'phags pa'i nor bdun rab tu thob 
[\[306a.2\]]pa'i phyir dbul ba med pa dang /_bdag la dbang bas rang dbang yod de bran ma yin pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 
[\[306a.3\]]pa dang /_rnam par grol ba bsgrubs pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang /_lhag mthong gi tshogs dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa sgom pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi sgo mo kun du ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[306a.4\]]snyed kyi ye shes khong du chud pas nang nye bar zhi ba dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i phyir zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing gnas pa lung bstan pa ste/_bu mo chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 
[\[306a.5\]]'gyur ba'o/_/theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu srog chags bdun khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod 
[\[306a.6\]]pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang las kyang lha brgya stong gis ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra phyung ste me tog kyang gtor/_sil snyan yang dkrol nas gang theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang bsngags pa bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos la thos nas kyang mos pa dang mos nas 
[\[306a.7\]]kyang len cing 'dzin te/_/yang dag par nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs don mang po dang ldan pa/_sgrib pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa/_nges pa'i don dang ldan pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 
[\[306b.2\]]'dul ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kun du 'dzin pa/_shin tu gdon mi 'tshal ba/_zab mo nges pa'i tshig bstan pa 'di bstan pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang bar bgyi/_gzung bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[306b.3\]]'di chos smra ba gang gi sug par mchis pa dang /_mdzod du tshud pa dang /_glegs bam du mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su gzung ba'i sug las bgyi'o/_/
[\[306b.4\]]gang sems sdang bas skabs tshol ba de dag ci nas kyang chos smra ba de dag ci lta bur mi 'gyur bar shin tu tshar dgum par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba gnang 
[\[306b.5\]]ste grogs po dag chos smra ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dam bcas par gyur pa ni legs so legs so/_/grogs po dag chos smra ba yongs su gzung bas/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba yin no/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[306b.6\]]gzung ba byas pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bu mo rin chen gyis dam pa'i chos yongs su dris pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/gzhan la yang rgya 
[\[306b.7\]]cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la mos pa/_dmigs pa la gnas pa'i bzod pas bskal pa brgya stong du sbyin pa byin pa bas gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs te/_gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston cing /_
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs nas snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /_gang byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa la rab tu zhugs na/_de de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/_'di ltar theg pa chen po la ches myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[307a.2\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 
[\[307a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bden pa dang /_chos dang /_don dang /_'dul ba la mkhas pa'i sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig_/yon tan rin po che mtha' yas par sems bskyed pa bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 
[\[307a.4\]]'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos spyod pa mtha' dag ces bya ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba dang /_'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang /_bu mo rin chen 
[\[307a.5\]]gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bzung zhing /_gzhan dag la yang bshad na yon tan gyi chos dpag tu med pa la chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[307a.6\]]byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni 'dir 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_bu mo rin chen dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[307a.7\]]yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs sto//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//

[\[307b.1\]{D170}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya shrI ma tI brAh+ma NI pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[307b.2\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na/_dge slong bdun brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[307b.3\]]snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /_thabs cig tu grong khyer bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so/_/
[\[307b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA rA Na sIr mthar 'chags su bsod snyoms mdzad cing /_bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_bsod snyoms kyi phyir phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang /_bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dad par 
[\[307b.5\]]bya ba/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi pha rol du son pa/_zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol du byon pa/_zhi ba dul ba/_bsrungs pa dang /_sdig pa med pa dbang po dul ba/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/_

[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das legs par byon to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa so so ci rigs par bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze mo

[\[308a.3\]]rA Na sIr drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes bdag gis thos na/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bskor ba'i chos ji lta bu zhig lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan

[\[308b\]]

[\[308b.6\]]'byung ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma mchis na/_'du byed rnams ci las 'byung /_sdug bsngal yang ci las 'byung /_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na zhugs shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa ba ma mchis na de'i yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_yal ga phre'u ci ltar 
[\[308b.7\]]mngon par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa ma byung zhing mchis pa ma lags na ma rig pa 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen kyang lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin te/_dpal ldan ma rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]chos thams cad stong na byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa ma rtogs pa dag las mngon par 'du byed de/_las rnams yod pas srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed do/_/srid pa yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar zad de/_'di la las mngon par 'du byed pa 
[\[309a.2\]]yang su yang med cing srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yang med de/_de ni chos rnams kyi don dam pa'o/_/dpal ldan ma 'on kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[309a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/dpal ldan ma tha snyad ni yang dag pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la khong du chud par byed pa po yang med/_de la shes par byed pa yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/dpal ldan ma 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin
