[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo nas mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo 'di lta bu bskor bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs 
[\[309b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu 
[\[309b.3\]]dag byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[309b.4\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_
[\[309b.5\]]rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ma pham pa khyod kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'dis tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la 
[\[309b.6\]]gtor ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa bram ze mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir ngan 'gro log par ltung 
[\[309b.7\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas drug khri bzhi stong la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_bla mar byed par 'gyur/_ri mor byed par 'gyur/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur/_thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su bdag snang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa 
[\[310a.2\]]la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/des sems can grangs med 
[\[310a.3\]]dpag tu med pa dag gi don byas nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[310a.4\]]to/_/bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa yod de/_bram ze mo dpal ldan ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas sngon bud med kyi lus nyid la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[310a.5\]]gzigs kyi sku la me tog gi phreng ba gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi sku la yang chos gos gsol te/_de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas lo stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de la zab mo'i gnas rnams kyang zhus so/_/de bzhin 
[\[310a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang zhal zas kyis tshim par byas so/_/bstabs par yang byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la yang a ti mug ta ka'i me tog dag gis gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[310a.7\]]lnga po dag blangs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer te/_bcom ldan 'das des zla ba gnyis bshos gsol to/_/chags zung gcig kyang phul lo/_/
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la gser gyi phreng bas gtor te/_'di skad ces bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po las ma gyur cig ces smras te/_ma pham pa 'di 
[\[310b.2\]]yang bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /_bram ze mo dpal ldan ma dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[310b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA warma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[310b.4\]{D171}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma ha la li kA pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya [(,]ba [)]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[310b.5\]]yul bi dzi na yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu grong khyer chen po yangs pa can ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_de'i tshe grong gi bud med rgan mo gtugs pa/_'khogs pa/_
[\[310b.6\]]na tshod las 'das par gyur pa/_skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig dgon pa na rtswa sdud cing 'dug ste/_bud med des bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dang bar byed pa dbang po dul ba/_thugs dul ba/_dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/_sbas pa/_skyon med pa/_dbang po dul ba/_mtsho ltar dang zhing 
[\[310b.7\]]gsal la rnyog pa med pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/_dpal gyis lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa thag ring po nas byon pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sems dad par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bud med des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_
[\[311a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skye ba gang nas mchis/_rga ba gang nas mchis/_gang du mchi/_bcom ldan 'das na ba gang nas mchis/_'chi ba gang nas mchis/_gang du mchi/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs gang nas mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed 
[\[311a.3\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang nas mchis/_gang du mchi/_bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams gang nas mchis/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams gang nas mchis/_gang du mchi/_bcom ldan 'das mig gang nas 
[\[311a.4\]]mchis/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid gang nas mchis/_gang du mchi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sring mo skye ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_rga ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/sring mo na ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_'chi ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/sring mo gzugs gang 
[\[311a.5\]]nas kyang mi 'ong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/_/sring mo sa'i khams gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams gang nas kyang mi 
[\[311a.6\]]'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/sring mo mig gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/sring mo 'di lta ste/_dper na gtsub shing dang /_gtsub stan la yang brten la/_de bskyed pa'i mi'i rtsol ba la yang brten na me 'byung ste/_me de yang 
[\[311a.7\]]rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas rgyu med pa dang shi bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo 'di ci snyam du sems/_me de gang nas 'ong /_gang du song /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhugs de ni tshogs pa'i dbang gis byung /_tshogs pa dang bral bas 'gags te 'gum mo/_/bka' stsal pa/_sring mo de bzhin du chos thams 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]cad kyang tshogs pa'i dbang gis 'byung /_tshogs pa dang bral bas 'gags te/_'di la chos gang yang gang nas kyang 'ong ba'am/_gang du yang 'gro ba med do/_/sring mo 'di lta ste/_mig dang gzugs la brten nas/_mig gi rnam par shes pa byung yang mig gi rnam par shes pa de la skyed par byed pa yang 
[\[311b.2\]]med/_'gags par byed pa yang med/_gang du yang sogs pa med/_phung po gang las kyang 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba yang med la/_gang gi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis las mngon par 'dus byas nas khams gsum du 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gyis 'bras bu nye bar ston te/_'bras bu de yang stong pa/_'ong ba 
[\[311b.3\]]med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_sus kyang ma bskyed pa/_sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/_sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid dang /_chos rnams la rten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa byung yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 
[\[311b.4\]]de la skyed par byed pa yang med/_'gags par byed pa yang med/_gang yang sogs pa yang /_phung po gang las kyang 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba yang med la/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis las mngon par 'du byas nas khams gsum du 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gyis 'bras bu nye bar ston te/_'bras 
[\[311b.5\]]bu de yang stong pa 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa/_sus kyang ma bskyed pa/_sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/_sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_shing dang /_pags pa dang /_dbyug gu la yang brten/_de skyed pa'i mi'i rtsol ba la yang brten nas rnga'i sgra 'byung ste/_rnga'i sgra de 
[\[311b.6\]]'das pa yang stong /_ma 'ongs pa yang stong /_da ltar byung ba yang stong ste/_sgra ni shing la yang mi gnas/_pags pa la yang mi gnas/_dbyug gu la yang mi gnas/_mi'i lag pa la yang mi gnas mod kyi/_'on kyang de'i rkyen gyis sgra 'dogs te/_gang sgra de 'dogs pa de yang stong pa/_'ong ba med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_
[\[311b.7\]]sus kyang ma bskyed pa/_sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/_sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o/_/sring mo de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rkyen gyi kho na la rag las pa ste/_'di ltar ma rig pa dang /_sred pa dang /_las dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/chos de dag yod na 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba 'dogs te/_
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]gang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs pa de yang stong pa/_'ong ba med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_sus kyang ma bskyed pa/_sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/_sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o/_/sring mo de ltar sus rnga sgra'i tshul rab tu shes pa des stong pa nyid rab tu shes so/_/sus stong pa nyid 
[\[312a.2\]]rab tu shes pa des mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes so/_/sus mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes pa de/_tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs kyang dngos po gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med de/_bdag gi 'di dang /_de ni bdag go zhe'am/_sems can no zhe'am/_srog go zhe'am/_gso 
[\[312a.3\]]ba'o zhe'am/_skyes bu'o zhe'am/_gang zag go zhe'am/_shed las skyes so zhe'am/_shed bu'o zhe'am/_byed pa po zhe'am/_byed du 'jug pa po zhe'am/_len pa po zhe'am/_'dor ba po zhes de mngon par zhen pa med par chos ston/_chos rab tu ston/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ston/_yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 
[\[312a.4\]]ston to/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na ri mo mkhan nam/_ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma zhig gis ras bcos ma shin tu phyi bdar byas pa'am/_shing leb bam/_rtsig ngos shin tu phyi bdar byas pa zhig la tshon sna tshogs 'gyed cing gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dang gang 'dod pa 'di lta ste/_skyes pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am/_
[\[312a.5\]]bud med kyi gzugs kyi rnam pa'am/_glang po che'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am/_rta'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am/_bong bu'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am/_de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba med par tshegs chung ngus mngon par sgrub cing 'dri ste/_mngon par sgrub par byed kyang /_de la chos 
[\[312a.6\]]gang yang ri mo mkhan gyi lag pa'am/_sems las gzugs su 'phos pa med mod kyi/_'on kyang de'i rkyen gyis gzugs 'dogs te/_gang gzugs 'dogs pa de yang stong pa/_'ong ba med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_sus kyang ma bskyed pa/_sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/_sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags 
[\[312a.7\]]pa'o/_/sring mo de bzhin du bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa rnams yod na 'di lta ste lha'am mi'i nang du bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par grub kyang de la gang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba ni rdul tsam yang med mod kyi 'on kyang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]gyis skye ba sna tshogs yod de/_skye mched yod pa'i lus su rnam par rig go/_/de bzhin du bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams yod na 'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha ma yin rnams su bsod nams ma yin pa'i 
[\[312b.2\]]lus mngon par 'grub kyang de la gang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba ni rdul tsam yang med mod kyi/_'on kyang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba sna tshogs yod de/_skye mched yod pas lus su rnam par rig go/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na klu rnams kyi klu'i mthus sprin gyi tshogs 
[\[312b.3\]]rgya chen po 'byung ste/_sprin gyi dra ba de dag gis sa khebs par byas nas char chen po rgya cher 'bebs te/_char chen po rgya cher phab nas kyang sgang dang gshongs ngoms par byed de/_sgang dang gshongs ngoms par byas nas/_slar 'gro yang de dag klu'i lus sam sems las byung ba yang med mod kyi/_klu rnams 
[\[312b.4\]]kyis klu'i mthu nyid kyis sprin gyi tshogs rgya chen po 'byung ngo /_/sring mo de bzhin du bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa yod na 'di lta ste/_lha'am mi'i nang du bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnams mngon par 'grub bo/_/de bzhin du bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 
[\[312b.5\]]'du byed pa rnams yod na 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha ma yin rnams su bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par 'grub kyang de la mngon par 'du bya ba yang stong pa/_mngon par 'du byed pa po yang stong pa/_mngon par 
[\[312b.6\]]'du byed pa'i 'bras bu yang stong pa'o/_/sring mo mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa rnams yod na gzugs med pa rnams su rnam par shes pa mtshams sbyor te/_gang gis rnam par shes pa de gzugs med pa rnams su mtshams sbyor ba de yang stong pa/_gang rnam par shes pa de gzugs med pa rnams 
[\[312b.7\]]su mtshams sbyor ba de yang stong pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sring mo chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/_'on kyang chos rnams 'dogs so/_/mkhas pa rnams ni de la mngon par mi zhen te/_mngon par zhen pa med pas mi rtsod do/_/rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog go/_/gsol pa/_'di ltar bcom 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo bka' stsal pas bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang chos 'di dag la shes rab kyi mig 'jug ste slar zhing yid gnyis ma mchis/_the tshom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon ni chos 'di dag ma thos pas the tshom mchis so/_/da ni bdag rgas/_/bdag 'khogs/_
[\[313a.2\]]bdag sdug bsngal/_bdag dbul/_bdag mgon ma mchis te/_bdag mi 'tsho zhing 'gum mi mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos 'di thos pas 'di na rgas pa'am/_dbul ba'am/_bde ba'am/_nad ma mchis pa'am/_na ba'am/_phyug pa'am/_dbul ba gang yang ma mchis so/_/zhes bdag tu 'du shes pa 
[\[313a.3\]]dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu bka' stsal pa/_des kyang 'di ltar rab tu btsal bas bud med 'di ni bsod nams dang ldan pa mkhas pa/_shes rab can 
[\[313a.4\]]gyi rang bzhin can lags pa snyam bdag bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_bud med 'di ni bsod nams dang ldan pa mkhas pa/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin can no/_/kun dga' bo bud med 'di tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du nga'i 
[\[313a.5\]]mar gyur te/_kun dga' bo ngas tshe rabs de dang de dag tu yang bud med 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/kun dga' bo nga bud med 'di la shin tu phangs par bya ba dang /_dang ba dang gus par gyur to/_/'di yang bdag gi bu spyad pa gang la spyod pa'i spyad pa de la bdag gis kyang spyad de/_theg 
[\[313a.6\]]pa bde ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar dbul bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[313a.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa la nga rab tu byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe kun dga' bo bud med 'di nga'i mar gyur te/_des 'dod pas nga ma btang nas de'i phyir nga za ma gcig zan bcad pa dang /_de'i 'og tu 'dis 'dod pas nga btang bar gyur te/_kun 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]dga' bo 'di las de'i rnam par smin pas de ltar dbul bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo 'di ni 'di'i dbul ba'i tha ma yin te/_kun dga' bo bud med 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bud med kyi 
[\[313b.2\]]dbang po la 'dod chags dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po thob par gyur te/_der skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la 'dzud par 'gyur/_sems can 
[\[313b.3\]]grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la 'god par 'gyur/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la bkod nas da 
[\[313b.4\]]ste bskal pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog byed ces bya bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_
[\[313b.5\]]yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang kun spyod pa/_de yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/nga yi mdun na 
[\[313b.6\]]thal sbyar gang 'dug pa/_/rgan mo 'di la kun dga' khyod ltos shig_/'di ni mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/byang chub yan lag me tog byed ces bya/_/'di ni bud med dngos po 'di spangs nas/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro/_/rgyal ba tshe dpag med de bsnyen bkur nas/_/khams gsum rgyal ba 
[\[313b.7\]]mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'jig rten khams gzhan dag na gang bzhugs pa/_/drang srong chen po 'jig rten don mdzad pa/_/rnam 'dren de dag la yang bsnyen bkur nas/_/'di ni mtshungs med mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de dag kun las chos kyang thos gyur nas/_/bsam pa dag pas de bzhin 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems mchog mi bskyod gnas nas ni/_/sems can dpag med chos la spyod par byed/_/de yi tshe na gang dag dman pa dang /_/sna tshogs lus dang kha dog ngan pa dang /_/rmongs dang 'theng po de bzhin zhar ba dang /_/lag rdum mdze can de dag 'byung mi 
[\[314a.2\]]'gyur/_/nyi zla me dang glog dang nor bu rnams/_/de dag 'od ni de tshe 'byung mi 'gyur/_/rnam 'dren byang chub yan lag me tog gi/_/thub pa'i 'od kyis kun du gsal bar khyab/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha mchog rnams kyi ni/_/chu zheng rtags dang kha dog ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra'i rang bzhin can gyi skye bo yis/_/de tshe ma smad 
[\[314a.3\]]zhing ni gang bar 'gyur/_/de na bud med bdud kyi ris kyang med/_/bdud kyi bud med bdud kyi phyag brnyan med/_/bde bar gshegs pa de na chos ston tshe/_/de na mu stegs can gyi ming mi grags/_/bde bar gshegs pa de na chos ston tshe/_/de dus [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro'i skyes gnas dang /_/sems 
[\[314a.4\]]dmyal ngan song rnams kyi ming mi grags/_/de na bud med ming yang grags mi 'gyur/_/'di na nyan thos rkyen gyi theg pa ltar/_/de tshe theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med/_/kun kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang ldan/_/de dag byams la gnas shing snying rje can/_/zhing der mi rnams thams 
[\[314a.5\]]cad rtag par yang /_/brdzus shing skyes te mngal las rnam par thar/_/skye dran blo mchog ldan shing mkhas pa ste/_/legs par gsungs pa thos nas thos pa 'dzin/_/zhing gi bkod tshul ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur ba/_/yon tan bskal par 'dir ni brjod byas kyang /_/rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig 
[\[314a.6\]]lta bur/_/dpe tsam du yang brjod par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_rgan mo de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[314a.7\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
